33a7(mdo sde): mkhyen la mtha' yas ye shes can/ /'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro/ /legs par bshad pa'i chos ni gang thos kyang / /sangs rgyas dag gis bshad par the tshom med/ /rgyal
33b1(mdo sde): ba kun gyi chos la de mos te/ /'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro/ /stong pa bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa ltar/ /nges don mdo sde dag gi bye brag shes/ /gang las sems
33b2(mdo sde): can gang zag skyes bu bstan/ /chos de thams cad drang ba'i don du shes/ /'jig rten 'di na mu stegs mang yod pa/ /de dag la yang de ni yid mi khro/ /de dag la ni snying rje nye bar 'jog /
33b3(mdo sde): 'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro/ /de la gzungs rnams yongs su snang bar 'gyur/ /snang ba de la nam yang the tshom med/ /bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig smras te/ /'di dag
33b4(mdo sde): bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro/ /rlung dang chu dang me dang sa rnams kyi/ /khams bzhi po ni rnam pa gzhan 'gyur yang / /sangs rgyas byang chub las ni de mi ldog /'di dag bzod pa dang
33b5(mdo sde): po'i khyad par ro/ /'jig rten bzo gnas mang po ci yod pa/ /thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des bslabs te/ /bdag las lhag pa su yang mi mthong ba/ /'di dag bzod pa dang
33b6(mdo sde): po'i khyad par ro/ /zhi gnas stobs kyis bskyod pa med gyur cing / /lhag mthong gis ni ri bo lta bur gyur/ /sems can kun gyis 'khrugs par mi nus te/ /de ni bzod pa gnyis su
33b7(mdo sde): bshad pa yin/ /mnyam par bzhag bzhin du ni ldang zhing smra/ /mnyam par bzhag pas 'dug cing 'chag par byed/ /mkhas pa ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol phyin/ /'di dag bzod pa
34a1(mdo sde): gnyis pa'i khyad par ro/ /mnyam par bzhag pas mngon shes lnga thob ste/ /chos rnams ston cing zhing ni brgyar yang 'gro/ de ni rdzu 'phrul stobs las mi
34a2(mdo sde): nyams te/ /'di dag bzod pa gnyis pa'i khyad par ro/ /de ni de 'dra'i ting 'dzin zhi ba bstan/ /mnyam par bzhag pa de yi sems kyi tshod/ /'dzin nus pa yi sems can gang
34a3(mdo sde): yang med/ /'di dag bzod pa gnyis pa'i khyad par ro/ /'jig rten 'di na gang yod sems can kun/ /de dag sangs rgyas mkhyen pas chos ston ston kyang / /bshad pa thams cad
34a4(mdo sde): de bzhin 'dzin nus te/ /'di dag bzod pa gnyis pa'i khyad par ro/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang phyogs dang / /steng dang 'og dang de bzhin phyogs mtshams ni/ /thams cad
34a5(mdo sde): na yang 'jig rten mgon po mthong / /de ni bzod pa gsum par bstan pa yin/ /gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sku lus su/ /'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab sprul nas ni/ /srog chags
34a6(mdo sde): bye ba mang la chos ston te/ /'di dag bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di'i dzam+bu'i gling kun na/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni snang bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten lha
34a7(mdo sde): dang lha min bcas par grags/ /'di dag bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul de bzhin cho ga dang / /bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba/ /kun la
34b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' des bslabs ste/ /'di dag bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro/ /'jig rten khams 'di sems can ci yod pas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsngags pa brjod gyur
34b2(mdo sde): la| |de la yid ni rjes su dgar byed na/ /sangs rgyas ye shes la ni bslabs ma yin/ /'jig rten khams 'di'i sems can su yod pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' la ni mi snyan
34b3(mdo sde): brjod/ /de dag la ni yid kyis khro byed na/ /da dung sangs rgyas ye shes des ma bslabs/ /nor rnyed pas ni yid bder mi 'gyur te/ /nor rnams ma rnyed na yang mi dga' med/ /ri dang
34b4(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i sems la rtag tu gnas/ /'di dag bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro/ /sgra yi rjes 'gro bzod pa 'di bstan te/ /bsam pa sgom pa rjes su mthun pa dang / /thos pa las byung de
34b5(mdo sde): ni skye ba med/ /'di la gang bslabs de ni byang chub lam/ /bzod pa bla na med pa gsum po 'di/ /byang chub sems dpas nam zhig thob gyur na/ /mi mchog bde bar gshegs pa des
34b6(mdo sde): mthong ste/ /rdul med byang chub tu'ang de lung ston/ /de nas lung bstan pa ni de thob nas/ /sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ /zhing rnams 'od kyis shin tu gsal bar gyur/ /lha
34b7(mdo sde): rnams bya ba me tog char pa 'bebs/ /de la lung bstan de yang thos nas ni/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas kyang / /bdag cag mchod rten rgyal bar 'gyur snyam ste/ /byang
35a1(mdo sde): chub dam pa mchog la sems bskyed 'gyur/ /nam zhig bla med bzod pa gsum po 'di/ /byang chub sems dpas thob par gyur pa na/ /de ni mi skye 'chi bar
35a2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ /de la 'chi 'pho med cing skye ba'ang med/ /nam zhig bla med bzod pa gsum po 'di/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob gyur na/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'ang mi
35a3(mdo sde): mthong ste/ /chos rnams thams cad chos nyid gnas par mthong / /'di ltar mi bden par ni des rig ste/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur rang bzhin stong / /stong pa dag kyang mi mthong
35a4(mdo sde): 'chi ba'ang med/ /chos 'di thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /nam zhig la las de la gus byas shing / /rim gro bkur sti mchod pa byas na yang / /de la yid ni dga' bar mi
35a5(mdo sde): byed de/ /chos rnams rang bzhin stong par de yis shes/ /sems can dag gis spyos bsdigs brdegs na yang / /de dag la ni nga rgyal khro mi srid/ /de dag sems can thar bar
35a6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ /de dag la ni byams pa brtan par skyed/ /rdo dang dbyug pa dag gis brdegs btsogs kyang / /mkhas pa de la khro bar mi byed de/ /bdag med bzod la rab tu
35a7(mdo sde): gnas pa la/ /nga rgyal dang ni khro ba'i tha ba med/ /'di ltar des ni mi bden nyid du shes/ /sgyu ma lta bur chos rnams rang bzhin stong / /chos tshul de 'dra ba la de gnas na/ /
35b1(mdo sde): lhar bcas 'jig rten dag na shin tu bkur/ /nam zhig sems can dag ni mtshon thogs nas/ /de yi lus dang yan lag mang gtubs kyang / /de dag la ni yid kyis khro ba med/ /snying
35b2(mdo sde): rje byams pa las kyang nyams mi 'gyur/ /de dag lus dang yan lag gcod pa'i tshe/ /de ni de la 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ /'di dag byang chub mchog la ma bkod par/ /de srid zhi
35b3(mdo sde): bar mya ngan nga mi 'da'/ /de 'dra'i bzod stobs bla na med pa la/ /bdag med bzod pa mnyam nyid gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po yis/ /bskal par bye bar rtag
35b4(mdo sde): tu shin tu bsgoms/ /de las lhag par gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /ji tsam sangs rgyas mkhyen pas don mi byed/ /de srid byang chub reg pa ma yin na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ci
35b5(mdo sde): zhig smos/ /grags pa chen po brjod pa mtha' yas pa/ /bdag med bzod la rab tu gnas pa yi/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgyar brjod kyang / /de yi bsngags pa zad par sla
35b6(mdo sde): pa min/ /de phyir byang chub mchog rab bla na med/ /ye shes phung po 'tshang rgyar su 'dod pa/ /de ni rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bzod pa sgoms/ /byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' mi
35b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /bzod pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta
36a1(mdo sde): bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing / /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
36a2(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
36a3(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad dngos po
36a4(mdo sde): med pa| ngo bo nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ stong pa/ gzod ma nas zhi ba/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa
36a5(mdo sde): yin par rab tu shes par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nam chos thams cad dngos po med pa/ ngo bo nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan
36a6(mdo sde): nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ stong pa/ gzod ma nas zhi ba/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhon
36a7(mdo sde): nu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhon
36b1(mdo sde): nu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa de ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos
36b2(mdo sde): thams cad la 'dod chags par mi byed/ zhe sdang bar mi byed/ gti mug par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / chos de mi
36b3(mdo sde): dmigs te/ gang 'dod chags pa dang / gang la 'dod chags pa dang / gang gis 'dod chags pa dang / gang zhe sdang ba dang / gang la zhe sdang ba dang / gang gis zhe sdang ba dang / gang
36b4(mdo sde): gti mug pa dang / gang la gti mug pa dang / gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs so/ /chos de yang dag par rjes su mi
36b5(mdo sde): mthong zhing ma dmigs na khams gsum thams cad la ma chags par 'gyur te/ myur du ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang
36b6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa ste/ /thams cad mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med/ /skyes pa med cing
36b7(mdo sde): 'gags pa med par yang / /de ltar chos rnams shin tu rig par gyis/ /thams cad dngos po med cing yi ge med/ /stong pa zhi ba gzod nas dri ma med/ /de ltar chos rnams
37a1(mdo sde): gang gis shes pa ni/ /gzhon nu de ni sangs rgyas zhes kyang brjod/ /de phyir rang bzhin mnyam nyid rnams spros pa/ /ngo bo nyid kyis chos kun rang bzhin
37a2(mdo sde): med| |bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'di su 'dod pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi yum 'di thob par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu/ de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/
37a3(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ gzhal du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med par gyur pa/
37a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
37a5(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /gzhon
37a6(mdo sde): nu| 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya zhe na/ gzhon nu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de skyes ma thag tu steng gi
37a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags nas gom pa bdun por te tshig 'di skad gsung ngo / /chos thams cad dngos po med pa las byung ba'o/ /chos thams cad
37b1(mdo sde): dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes gsungs te/ gzhon nu/ sgra de'i dbyangs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas so/ /de nas sa'i lha nas bzung ste tshangs
37b2(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra bsgrags shing dbyangs kyis rjes su go bar byas te/ e ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skyes ma thag tu steng gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas
37b3(mdo sde): gom pa bdun bor te/ dngos po med pa'i sgra 'byin pa las na dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes mtshan dngos po med pa las byung ba/ dngos po med pa las byung
37b4(mdo sde): ba'o zhes btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de byang chub thob pa na shing thams cad kyi lo ma dang / rtsa ba dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal thams cad dang / ri'i rtse mo thams cad
37b5(mdo sde): las kyang dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes sgra byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de na sgrar btags pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad las dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes rnam par rig
37b6(mdo sde): par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo / /gzhon nu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba de'i
37b7(mdo sde): gsung rab la rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo / /gzhon nu/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems
38a1(mdo sde): d e bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
38a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
38a3(mdo sde): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung bas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin 'di
38a4(mdo sde): bshad do/ /de ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rab tu dad de/ sems rab tu dad pas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos dur smrig gyon nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /
38a5(mdo sde): de rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bzung ste/ bzung zhing bcangs bklags kun chub par byas nas bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des
38a6(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ngo / /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las
38a7(mdo sde): kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan to/ /sangs rgyas de dag thams cad las mnyan nas kyang bzung ngo / /kun chub par byas so/ /bcangs so/ /bklags so/ /bton to/ /nyon mongs
38b1(mdo sde): pa med par bsgoms shing mang du byas te/ bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas so/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa nyi shu 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
38b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don legs par bsams pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ des sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byas/ sems can tshad med
38b3(mdo sde): pa'i don byas nas de'i 'og tu shing zad pa'i me ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /gzhon nu/ de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di byang chub sems dpa'
38b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces spras byed pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
38b5(mdo sde): de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di nyid rgyas par tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /sngon 'das dus kyi bskal pa bsam
38b6(mdo sde): yas na/ /mi yi gtso bo byung ba ngas dran te/ /drang srong chen po gzings kyis don mdzad pa/ /de ming dngos po med las byung zhes bya/ /skyes ma thag tu mkha' la rab 'dug nas/ /
38b7(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad dngos po med par bstan/ /de tshe de dang mthun par mtshan btags te/ /sgras ni 'jig rten kun tu grags par byas/ /lha rnams thams cad rab tu sgra 'byin pa/
39a1(mdo sde): dngos po med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /skyes ma thag tu gom pa bdun bor te/ /rgyal bas chos rnams dngos po med par bshad/ /thub pa chos rnams
39a2(mdo sde): thams cad ston pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal por nam 'gyur tshe/ /rtsi shing gel ba ri dang brag rnams las/ /chos rnams dngos po med ces sgra yang 'byung / /'jig rten de na ji
39a3(mdo sde): snyed sgra yod pa/ /thams cad dngos med ci'ang med pa zhes/ /de lta bur ni 'jig rten 'dren pa yi/ /sgra dbyangs rnam pa shin tu byung bar gyur/ /de yi dus na rgyal po'i bu skyes pa//
39a4(mdo sde): ming ni rtag tu snying rje sems zhes bya/ /shin tu gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa zhig /rgyal ba de yi drung du nyer 'ongs te/ /thub pa khyu mchog zhabs la phyag btsal nas/ /ri
39a5(mdo sde): mor bcas pas bskor bar byas nas ni/ /rdul bral bla na med pa'i chos mnyan phyir/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis der 'dug go /rgyal ba dpa' bo des ni bsam mkhyen nas/ /
39a6(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu bshad pa mdzad/ /des ni rdul bral ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/ /rgyal mchog bstan la myur bar rab tu byung / /rab tu de byung ting 'dzin 'di yang ni/ /
39a7(mdo sde): bzung zhing bklags te yongs su chub byas pas/ /bskal pa bye ba nyi shu tshang bar ni/ /log par ltung ba'i sar yang yong ma song / /de ni dge bar byas pa'i las de yis/ /
39b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas/ /rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du yang / /ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni goms par byas/ /de phyis 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas gyur/ /ming ni
39b2(mdo sde): don legs bsams zhes rtag tu brjod/ /sems can bye ba mang po'i don byas nas/ /phyi ma'i dus la me bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /dngos po med pa las byung ba'i le'u ste/
39b3(mdo sde): brgyad pa'o// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
39b4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji ltar na bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
39b5(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya zhing / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa
39b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang
39b7(mdo sde): bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung nod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la'ang
40a1(mdo sde): rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po
40a2(mdo sde): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed pa ste/ 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
40a3(mdo sde): thams cad byung ngo / /gzhon nu/ de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang
40a4(mdo sde): bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gzung bar bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de phyir byang chub tu ni 'tshang rgya zhing / /srid pa'i mtsho las sems
40a5(mdo sde): can sgrol 'dod pas/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mdo sde 'di zungs shig /byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon
40a6(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
40a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
40b1(mdo sde): chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o/ /chos thams cad
40b2(mdo sde): rmi lam lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / nam mkha' lta bur rab tu shes
40b3(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nam chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes shing / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta
40b4(mdo sde): bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / nam mkha' lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su
40b5(mdo sde): shes pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /chos zab mo bzod pa dang ldan pa de 'dod chags par
40b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i chos la mi chags/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i chos la mi sdang / gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi rmongs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos de yang dag par
40b7(mdo sde): rjes su mi mthong / chos de mi dmigs te/ gang 'dod chags pa dang / gang la 'dod chags pa dang / gang gis 'dod chags pa dang / gang zhe sdang ba dang / gang la zhe sdang ba
41a1(mdo sde): dang | gang gis zhe sdang ba dang / gang gti mug pa dang / gang la gti mug pa dang / gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su
41a2(mdo sde): mi mthong zhing chos de mi dmigs so/ /chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs pas 'dod chags pa med pa/ zhe sdang ba med pa/ gti mug pa med pa/ sems phyin ci ma
41a3(mdo sde): log pa/ mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /spros pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /brgal ba pho rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /skam la phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /bde bar son pa zhes bya'o/ /mi 'jigs
41a4(mdo sde): pa thob pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims can zhes bya'o/ /ye shes can zhes bya'o/ /shes rab can zhes bya'o/ /bsod nams can zhes bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul can zhes bya'o/ /dran pa can
41a5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /blo gros can zhes bya'o/ /rtogs pa can zhes bya'o/ /ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyangs
41a6(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'ang med pa zhes bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o/ /nyon
41a7(mdo sde): mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa
41b1(mdo sde): byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyong ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par
41b2(mdo sde): grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /bram ze zhes bya'o/ /khrus byas pa zhes bya'o/ /pha rol tu song ba zhes bya'o/ /rig par byed pa
41b3(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /gtsang sbra can zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sras zhes bya'o/ /shAkya'i sras zhes bya'o/ /tsher ma dkrugs pa zhes bya'o/ /khrims ma dral ba zhes bya'o/ /'obs dral ba zhes bya'o//
41b4(mdo sde): 'obs las brgal ba zhes bya'o/ /zug rdu phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /nad med pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong zhes bya'o/ /kun nas dkris pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu dam pa
41b5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu mchog ces bya'o/ /skyes bu chen po zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu seng ge zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu glang po che zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu cang shes pa zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu lcid khyer ba
41b6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu dpa' po zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu rtsal po che zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu me tog ces bya'o/ /skyes bu pad+ma zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu pad+ma dkar po zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu 'dul ba zhes
41b7(mdo sde): bya'o| |skyes bu zla ba zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu phal pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /mi gos pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos zab mo bzod pa la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
42a1(mdo sde): 'di bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /nam zhig 'jig rten khams 'di 'byung ba dang / /'jig rten thams cad nam mkhar gyur
42a2(mdo sde): pa'i tshe/ /ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin te/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /'jig rten 'di na ji snyed ci yong pa/ /chu yi phung po 'di ni 'og tu 'gro /'og
42a3(mdo sde): tu ci 'drar steng du'ang de bzhin te/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar bar snang cung zad sprin med las/ /skad cig tu ni sprin gyi dkyil 'khor snang / /thog
42a4(mdo sde): ma ga las byung bar shes par bya/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad shes par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das pa dag /ji ltar yid la byas bzhin gzugs brnyan
42a5(mdo sde): snang | |sngon mtha' ji bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin te/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar dbu ba mang po rdos pa dag /chu bos khyer ba skyes bus nges mthong
42a6(mdo sde): ste| |de la brtags na snying po yong mi snang / /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar char pa'i thigs chen bab pa na/ /chu yi chu bur dag ni tha dad 'byung / /
42a7(mdo sde): byung nas zhig ste chu yi chu bur med/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar spring yig grong gzhan bskur pa las/ /dge dang mi dge'i bya ba so sor 'byung //
42b1(mdo sde): sgra las spring yig tu yang 'phos pa med/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar mi dag chang gis myos nas ni/ /sa 'di kun tu 'khor snyam byed mod kyi/ /sa 'di
42b2(mdo sde): 'gul zhing g.yos pa'ang med pa ltar/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /me long ngos dang 'bru mar snod rnams la/ /bud med kha bzhin rgyan pas bltas pa na/ /byis
42b3(mdo sde): pa de ni de la chags bskyed nas/ /'dod pa 'tshol ba'i phyir yang shin tu rgyug /bzhin ni der yang 'phos pa ma yin te/ /gzugs brnyan la ni nam yang bzhin mi rnyed/ /rmongs pa de
42b4(mdo sde): dag 'dod chags skyes pa ltar/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang / /sgyu ma ji bzhin rmi lam ji lta bur/ /mtshan ma sgom pa
42b5(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar nam mkha' dang bar zla shar ba/ /de yi gzugs brnyan dang ba'i mtshor snang ste/ /zla ba chu yi nang du
42b6(mdo sde): 'phos pa med/ /chos kun mtshan nyid de 'drar shes par gyis/ /ji ltar mi dag nags ri'i khrod 'dug nas/ /glu len smra dang rgod dang du ba las/ /brag ca thos kyang snang ba med pa ltar
42b7(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /glu dang rol mo de bzhin du ba yang / /de la brten nas brag ca 'byung mod kyi/ /sgra la dbyangs de nam yang yod ma yin/ /chos rnams
43a1(mdo sde): thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod bsten pa/ /skyes bu sad par gyur nas mi mthong ste/ /byis pa shin tu 'dod la chags
43a2(mdo sde): shing zhe na/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /sgyu ma byed pa dag gis gzugs sprul te/ /rta dang glang po'i shing rta sna tshogs byas/ /de la ji ltar snang ba gang yang
43a3(mdo sde): med| |chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na/ /bu pho byung zhing shi ba des mthong nas/ /byung nas dga' zhing shi nas mi dga'
43a4(mdo sde): ltar| |chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar mtshan mo chu yi zla ba dag /dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu nang snang / /chu zla stong pa gsog ste gzung du med/ /
43a5(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar sos ka'i nyi ma phyed dus na/ /skyes bu skom pas gdungs shing 'gro ba yis/ /smig rgyu dag la chu yi phung por mthong //
43a6(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /smig rgyu la yang chu ni yong med na/ /sems can rmongs pa de la 'thung 'dod de/ /mi bden chu ni 'thung bar yong mi nus/ /
43a7(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar chu shing rlon pa'i sdong po la/ /snying po 'dod phyir skyes bus de gshags kyang / /nang dang phyi rol kun na snying po
43b1(mdo sde): med| |chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /mig dang rna ba sna yang tshad ma min/ /lce dang lus dang sems kyang tshad ma min/ /dbang po 'di dag gal te tshad yin na/ /
43b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam gyis su la ci zhig bya/ /'di ltar dbang po 'di dag tshad min zhing / /ngo bo nyid kyis bems po lung ma bstan/ /de phyir mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam 'dod pa/ /des ni
43b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam gyis bya ba byos/ /lus la sngon gyi tha ma rab brtags na/ /de la lus med lus su 'du shes med/ /gang la lus med lus su shes med pa/ /de ni 'dus ma byas
43b4(mdo sde): kyi rigs zhes bya/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la chos med de/ /gang phyir 'di med nam yang yod mi 'gyur/ /rtog can dag gi yod dang med ces bya/ /de ltar spyod pa sdug bsngal zhi mi
43b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /yod dang med ces bya ba gnyi ga mtha'/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te/ /de phyir gnyis ka'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas/ /mkhas pa dbus la'ang gnas par
43b6(mdo sde): yong mi byed/ /yod dang med ces bya ba rtsod pa ste/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang rtsod pa yin/ /rtsod par gyur pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur/ /rtsod pa med par gyur pa sdug bsngal
43b7(mdo sde): 'gag / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam byas te/ /byis pa bdag nyid lus la mngon sum snyems/ /lus la mngon sum gyur pa rlom sems med/ /de ni rlom sems mang po thams
44a1(mdo sde): cad spangs/ /bsam gtan bzhi dag gi yang gtam byas nas/ /byis pa bdag nyid bsam gtan spyod yul smra/ /bsam gtan nyon mongs med cing rlom
44a2(mdo sde): sems med/ /shes pas rtogs nas dregs pa rab tu spongs/ /bden pa bzhi yi gtam rnams byas nas kyang / /byis pa bdag nyid bden pa mthong zhes zer/ /bden pa mthong
44a3(mdo sde): la rlom sems gang yang med/ /rlom sems med pa bden pa rgyal bas gsungs/ /tshul khrims srung zhing de yis snyems mi bya/ /chos rnams mnyan zhing des ni mi snyems te/ /
44a4(mdo sde): gang dag shes rab chung ngu de snyems pa/ /rtsa ba de las de yi sdug bsngal 'phel/ /'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis/ /dregs pa sdug bsngal rtsa ba yin par
44a5(mdo sde): bstan/ /rgyags pas dregs pa sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel/ /rlom sems med pa sdug bsngal 'gag par 'gyur/ /ji snyed chos mang yongs su chub byas nas/ /thos pas rgyags
44a6(mdo sde): shing tshul khrims mi srung na/ /tshul khrims 'chal pas ngan 'gror de 'gro la/ /thos pa mang pos de la skyob mi nus/ /gal te tshul khrims grags pas de rgyags shing / /mang
44a7(mdo sde): du thos la brtson par mi byed na/ /tshul khrims 'bras bu ma lus zad nas ni/ /phyir yang sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na ting 'dzin sgom byed kyang / /de
44b1(mdo sde): ni bdag tu 'du shes gzhig mi byed/ /de yi nyon mongs phyir yang rab tu ldang / /lhag spyod kyis ni ting 'dzin 'dir bsgoms bzhin/ /gal te bdag med chos la rab rtog cing / /de dag
44b2(mdo sde): brtags nas gal te sgom byed na/ /'bras bu mya ngan 'das thob rgyu de yin/ /rgyu gzhan de dag zhi bar 'gyur mi srid/ /mi zhig chom rkun mang pos rab gtses nas/ /'tsho bar
44b3(mdo sde): 'dod pas bros shing 'gror brtsal na/ /de yi rkang pa 'gro zhing rgyug ma nus/ /chos rkun dag gis de bzung bcom pa ltar/ /de bzhin tshul khrims nyams pa rmongs pa'i mi/ /'dus
44b4(mdo sde): byas dag las 'bros par 'dod mod kyi/ /tshul khrims nyams pas de yang 'bros mi nus/ /na rga 'chi ba dag gis shin tu bcom/ /ji ltar mi rgod stong phrag mang po dag/ rnam
44b5(mdo sde): pa du ma'i sgo nas sdigs byed pa'o/ /de bzhin nyon mongs sgo rnams du ma nas/ /mi rgod bzhin du dge ba'i phyogs rnams 'joms/ /gang gis phung po bdag med rab brtags
44b6(mdo sde): te| |spyos shing brgyad kyang zhum par mi 'gyur ba/ /nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang du de mi 'gro/ stong pa shes pa de la 'khrug pa med/ /'gro mang phung po stong par ston mod kyi/ /ji
44b7(mdo sde): ltar bdag med de dag mi shes te/ /mi shes de dag gzhan gyis brgal na yang / /khro ba'i zil gyis non cing tshig rtsub smra/ /mi dag na zhing lus ni sdug bsngal te/ /lo grangs
45a1(mdo sde): mang por res 'ga' ma thar ba/ /de ni yun ring nad kyis nyon mongs pas/ /nad rnams gso ba'i phyir yang sman pa btsal/ /yang dang yang ni de yis btsal
45a2(mdo sde): ba dang / /sman pa mkhas shing rig pa des rnyed de/ /des kyang snying rje che bar bzhag nas ni/ /sman 'di btang bar gyis shig smras pa dang / /sman mang bzang zhing phangs
45a3(mdo sde): pa des blangs nas/ /na ba 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i sman mi 'thung / /sman pas ma lan sman gyis ma nyes te/ /nad pa de nyid kyis ni nyes pa yin/ /de bzhin bstan pa 'di la rab
45a4(mdo sde): byung ste/ /stobs dang bsam gtan dbang po kun rig nas/ /sgom pa la ni mngon par brtson mi byed/ /rigs par mi brtson ga la mya ngan 'da'/ /rtag tu chos kun rang bzhin
45a5(mdo sde): stong pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jig /srid pa thams cad yong ye stong pa ste/ /nyi tshe'i stong pa mu stegs can dag gi /mkhas pa byis pa dag dang rtsod
45a6(mdo sde): mi byed/ /byis pa dag ni ri mor byas nas spongs/ /zhe sdang sems kyis bdag gi drung 'ong zhes/ /byis pa'i chos la brten par yong mi byed/ /byis pa dag gi rang bzhin
45a7(mdo sde): rgyud rig nas/ /mkhas pa byis pa dag dang mi 'grogs te/ /ji srid du ni byis pa legs bsnyen kyang / /de dag phyir yang dgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa byis pa dag la
45b1(mdo sde): yid mi rton/ /mkhas dang byis pa'i rang bzhin chos nyid ni/ /byis pa'i rang bzhin ngang tshul tha dad de/ /so so'i skye bo la ni mdza' ba med/ /chos dang ldan pa'i tshig tu smras na yang / /yid
45b2(mdo sde): mi ches dang zhe sdang khro ba dag / mngon par ston pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos/ /don 'di rnam par rig pas yid mi rton/ /byis pa dang ni byis par mthun 'byor pa/ /ji ltar mi gtsang ba dang mi
45b3(mdo sde): gtsang bzhin/ /mkhas pa dag ni mkhas pa'i skye bo dang / /mthun zhing 'byor pa mar dang nying khu bzhin/ /'khor ba'i nyes la so sor ma brtags te/ /las kyi rnam par smin la mi 'jug
45b4(mdo sde): cing | |sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshig la ma dad pas/ /byis pa de dag bcad cing gtub par 'gyur/ /mi thob rab tu rnyed dka' thob nas ni/ /bzo yi gnas dag la ni mkhas ma gyur/ /dbul
45b5(mdo sde): por gyur cing nor yang yong med de/ /de nas 'tsho ba med pas rab tu 'byung / /sangs rgyas bstan 'dir de dag rab byung nas/ /lhung bzed chos gos dag la chags par 'gyur/ /de dag
45b6(mdo sde): sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs zin pas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bslab pa mi spyod de/ /de dag bdag gi tshul khrims ma mthong bas/ /byis pa dag ni sems gnas mi rnyed cing / /nyin
45b7(mdo sde): mtshan rnal 'byor la yang mi brtson pas/ /de dag sdig pa'i lam la smod mi byed/ /lus dang sems ni shin tu mi sdom pa/ /de ni tshig tu mi smra ci yang med/ /su yis nyes pa ci byas
46a1(mdo sde): brgal lo zhes/ /rtag tu gzhan gyi nyes pa 'tshol zhing rtog /byis pa dag ni zas la chags gyur nas/ /zas la tshod rig par ni mi byed de/ /sangs rgyas
46a2(mdo sde): bsod nams kyis ni zas rnyed kyang / /de la byis pa byas pa gzo mi 'gyur/ /de dag kha zas ro zhim bsod pa dag /rnyed nas rnal 'byor mi brtson za zhing 'thung / /de dag la ni zas de
46a3(mdo sde): gdug par 'gyur/ /bal glang phru gus rtsa ba ma bkrus bzhin/ /mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa ni/ /kha zas bzang po gtsang ma za mod kyi/ /de dag la ni chags par mi 'gyur
46a4(mdo sde): te| |ma chags bzhin du za zhing rnal 'byor brtson/ /mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa dag /byis pa gang nas legs par 'ongs zhes smra/ /de bzhin snyan pa'i tshig gis
46a5(mdo sde): nyer bsdus nas/ /de dag la ni snying rje nye bar 'jog /byis pa la ni gang phan snying brtse ba/ /de la gnod pa byung na byis pa dga'/ /de lta'i nyes phyir byis pa rnam spangs te/ /ri
46a6(mdo sde): dwags bzhin du gcig pu dgon par gnas/ /mkhas pas 'di 'dra'i nyes pa rig nas ni/ /shes rab dman bsten bdag ni mtho ris nyams/ /byang chub thob par ga la
46a7(mdo sde): 'gyur snyam ste/ /byis pa rnams dang nam yang yong mi bsten/ /byams pa la ni mkhas pa gnas par 'gyur/ /snying rje dag la gnas shing dga' spyod dang / /srid pa kun la rtag
46b1(mdo sde): tu btang snyoms pa/ /ting nge 'dzin bsgoms byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /mya ngan med zhi byang chub nges rtogs shing / /sems can na rgas gzir bar rig nas ni/ /de la snying rje rab tu nyer
46b2(mdo sde): bzhag ste/ /don dam ldan pa'i gtam rnams ston par byed/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid brjod du med pa dang / /bde bar gshegs pa'i bden pa sus shes pa/ /de dag 'di lta bu yi chos
46b3(mdo sde): thos nas/ /'phags pa zang zing med pa'i bzod pa thob/ /chos zab mo la bzod pa'i le'u ste/ dgu pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur
46b4(mdo sde): gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na nan tan snying por bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa'
46b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nan tan snying por byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba ma yin na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos/ de nas zla 'od gzhon
46b6(mdo sde): nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom
46b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gdams pa dang / rjes su
47a1(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di legs par bstan cing legs par bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad bstan te/ legs par bshad pa dang / legs
47a2(mdo sde): par bkod pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang ma lags
47a3(mdo sde): na mu stegs can gzhan gyi lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang nan tan snying por bgyis te lus dang srog la'ang mi lta bar bgyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su
47a4(mdo sde): slob bo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par
47a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bdud sdig can shin tu gzhig par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/
47a6(mdo sde): bdag ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa bdag gi spyi bo la bzhag
47a7(mdo sde): par gsol/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam mkha' 'dra zhing rdul bral gzugs bzang 'chang / /shes rab sras po lus dang mtshan mi mnga'/ /yon tan rgya mtsho rab zab
47b1(mdo sde): thugs rje can/ /mtshungs med phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor zhog /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las byung ba/ mtshan sna tshogs
47b2(mdo sde): kyis shin tu brgyan pa/ lha'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor bzhag go /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa bzhag
47b3(mdo sde): ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / rdo rje lta bu dang / yid ltar mgyogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad
47b4(mdo sde): ston pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ston pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol
47b5(mdo sde): tu phyin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag mngon du gyur to/ /gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo du ma mngon
47b6(mdo sde): du gyur to/ /dga' ba dang bde ba gang de 'phags pas brjod pa/ lha yul pa rgya che zhing dpe med pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa
47b7(mdo sde): rab tu thob bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dra bas mdzes 'brel bum pa lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' zhing / /dpal be'u 'khor lo rgyal mtshan ba dan nya ris mnga'/ /bskal pa bye
48a1(mdo sde): mang rin chen gtong la zhugs pa'i phyag / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nu'i spyi bor bzhag /de nas lha yul pa rgya che zhing dpe med pa/ sangs
48a2(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba dang ldan par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
48a3(mdo sde): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs
48a4(mdo sde): su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /bla med mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan phan sems can gnyen rtsa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs bcu bden
48a5(mdo sde): pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po shin tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo
48a6(mdo sde): dgra bzhi rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtson pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi sku mchog mnga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje
48a7(mdo sde): byams 'od rgyal ba'i nyi ma mun sel ba/ /shes rab shin tu yangs pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil du shar/ /don dam shin tu zab pa'i chos rnams ston mdzad pa/ /lha khyod la
48b1(mdo sde): ni rtag tu bdag kyang skyabs su mchi/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan
48b2(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang bdag
48b3(mdo sde): gi sdum par bshos gsol bar thugs la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag gi sdum par gtsang ma'i bshos gsol bar/ /mi dbang sras dang
48b4(mdo sde): bcas la gsol ba 'debs/ /thub pa'i dbang po bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /mgon po lha yi gtso bos gnang bar mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i
48b5(mdo sde): phyir| byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du sang bshos gsol bar cang mi gsung bar gyur
48b6(mdo sde): pas gnang ngo / /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
48b7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas zla 'od
49a1(mdo sde): g zhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar du de'i bar
49a2(mdo sde): gyi lam thams cad legs par brgyan te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam yangs shing che la/ rtswa dang / sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / rdo dang / gyo
49a3(mdo sde): mo dang / gseg ma med par bsal te/ bye ma gtsang mas bdal nas/ ka tsa lin+di ka ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde ba/ dbyangs dga' bar byas te/ lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /
49a4(mdo sde): pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / ma li ka dang / tsam+pa ka dang / skya nar dang / kund dang / ti la ka dang / ke sa ra dang / mya
49a5(mdo sde): ngan 'tshang la sogs pa dus thams cad kyi me tog bzang pos ni kun tu khebs par byas/ /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang /
49a6(mdo sde): rin po che'i rta babs dang / bla re ni bres/ rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs ni ngos la dbyangs/ rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod de dag thams cad nas ni a ga ru
49a7(mdo sde): nag pos gang ba'i du ba 'thul/ phyogs phyogs su ni bro mkhan dang / gar mkhan lha'i glu gar dang / rol mo shin tu 'byor cing legs par bslabs pa rnams bkod/
49b1(mdo sde): skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo shin tu brgyan pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ku Na ba dang / pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga mu kuN+Da
49b2(mdo sde): dang | rdza rnga chen po thogs pa rnams bkod/ lam gyi ngos gnyis su shing ta la mthon po lha'i rin po che sna tshogs dang dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres
49b3(mdo sde): shing sgra 'khrol bas brgyan pa rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi mkha' rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing sna tshogs khrun dang sboms su ldan pa
49b4(mdo sde): sna tshogs dang / dus thams cad kyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag btsugs so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lam ni sna tshogs shin tu legs
49b5(mdo sde): par brgyan/ /bla res dang ni gdugs dang ba dan sgreng / /sil snyan dag gi sgra dag rab tu 'byin/ /glu sgra yid du 'ong ba'ang de bzhin te/ /bud med mang po bro rdung gar byed dang / /
49b6(mdo sde): gos bzang khrag khrig rnam mang sna tshogs dang / /me tog phreng ba bzang zhing mdzes pa yis/ /lam mchog yangs pa de ni rab tu brgyan/ /grong mchog gtsang ma 'dir ni thugs
49b7(mdo sde): rje can/ /sangs rgyas thub pa'i zla ba gshegs so zhes/ /zla 'od gzhon nus dad pa rab bskyed nas/ /rgya che yangs pa'i lam ni shin tu brgyan/ /lha rdzas kyi ni bye ma gtsang ma
50a1(mdo sde): bdal/ /rab tu yid 'ong me tog mchog rnams bkram/ /rin chen rta babs dag kyang legs par btsugs/ /lam ni lha yi grong khyer bzhin du mdzes/ /zla
50a2(mdo sde): 'od gzhon nu shin tu yid dga' bas/ /de ltar lam rnams sna tshogs legs brgyan te/ /lha dang lha min klu yis de mthong nas/ /ngo mtshar gyur cing a la la zhes smra/ /lam gyi
50a3(mdo sde): g.yas g.yon dzam+bu'i chu gser gyi/ /ta la mtho zhing bzang la zlum pa dag /rin chen dril bu'i dra bas g.yogs shing dkris/ /sgra 'khrol rnam pa du ma mang po btsugs/ /de bzhin
50a4(mdo sde): rin chen sdong po khrag khrig ni/ /dus kun gyi yang me tog rgyas pa btsugs/ /de yis yangs pa'i lam brgyan mdzes gyur pa/ /mtho ris na ni dga' ba'i tshal bu bzhin/ /rin po
50a5(mdo sde): che las byas pa'i mkha' rten ni/ /dra ba'i chun po 'od 'bar shin tu mdzes/ /dpe med mthong zhing che la rgyas pa dag /lam gyi g.yas g.yon 'gram du btsugs shing bkod/ /
50a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'jig rten gsum dbang gang nas ni/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du gshegs pa yi/ /lam chen de ni de dag rab brgyan pas/ /rnam pa thams cad du yang mdzes par
50a7(mdo sde): gyur| |g.yas g.yon su ni rin chen pog phor dpyangs/ /de dag a ga ru yang nag pos bkang / /pog phor kun nas du ba sprin bzhin 'khrigs/ /lha yi dri zhim rnam pa sna
50b1(mdo sde): tshogs 'byung / /ji srid grong khyer chu dron sgo bar dang / /ri rgyal bya rgod phung po ji srid par/ /zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal ba'i phyir/ /lha rdzas dpe med yangs pas brgyan pa byas/ /de
50b2(mdo sde): nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas lam de rin po che bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan pa byas nas/ /zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs te/ rgyal po'i khab
50b3(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer chen po gang na ba dang / rang gi lha'i khyim mtho zhing che la yangs pa gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas rang gi khyim du zhugs so/ /zhugs nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang /
50b4(mdo sde): myang ba mang zhing bzang ba g.yor bcug ste/ zhal zas ro sna brgya pa sbyar nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po chag chag legs par btab/ byi dor legs
50b5(mdo sde): par byas nas me tog sil ma ni bkram/ bdug spos kyis ni bdugs/ bla re ni bres/ dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po ni dbyangs/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgreng ste/ de
50b6(mdo sde): ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i lam srang dang grong bar du bcas pa rdo dang gyo mo dang gseg ma med par byas/ me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/ tsan+dan gyi phye mas ni gtor/ skar
50b7(mdo sde): khung dang / rta babs dang / sgo khang dang / pa gam dang / skar khung dra ba ris dang / zla ba kham pa lta bus ni brgyan cing tsan+dan gyis byug pa byas te/ de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
51a1(mdo sde): chen po dpag tu med pa'i bkod pas rab tu brgyan nas/ rang gi khyim yang rgyan sna tshogs pa rnam pa du mas brgyan te/ rin po che'i phreng ba rnam pa du ma ni rab
51a2(mdo sde): tu dbyangs/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i gos kyis ni brgyan cing nye 'khor yang mdzes par byas/ phreng ba dang lda ldi rnam pa tha dad pa du mas ni brgyan pa byed du bcug/ rin po che'i
51a3(mdo sde): stan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni 'ding du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i dang mi'i
51a4(mdo sde): las 'das pa bshams so/ /rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi bog phor ni phyogs bzhir dbyangs te/ de dag nas a ga ru 'ba' zhig gi du ba 'thul bar byas so/ /zla 'od gzhon
51a5(mdo sde): nur gyur pas khyim mchog de'ang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir lha'i glu gar dang sil snyan ni bsgrags/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
51a6(mdo sde): dang | ba dan ni sgreng / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin
51a7(mdo sde): pa brgya stong gis ni gang zhing rnam par bltas/ rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs rnam pa du mas ni gang bar byas so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zla 'od kyis ni khyim mchog
51b1(mdo sde): yangs pa yang / /rgya cher thams cad shin tu brgyan par byas/ /gang la 'jig rten sgron ma bzhugs pa yi/ /lha rdzas seng ge'i khri ni dbus su btsugs/ /'jig rten sgron mdzad rgyal pa'i
51b2(mdo sde): gtso bo yi/ /dge 'dun dag ni gang la 'dug 'gyur pa/ /rin chen shin tu rnam par bkra ba'i stan/ /bye ba stong phrag mtha' yas lags par bting / /rin chen sna tshogs kun
51b3(mdo sde): gyi bdug spos snod/ /a ga ru yis shin tu gang byas te/ /phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang rnam par dbyangs/ /de dag nas ni yid 'ong dri rnams 'thul/ /zla 'od kyis ni stobs
51b4(mdo sde): bcu gshegs pa'i phyir/ /rin chen me tog mdzes pa sna tshogs dang / /me tog dri mchog bzang po rnam mang gis/ /khyim gyi sa gzhi bzang po kun tu bkram/ /gar byed glu len sil snyan
51b5(mdo sde): sgra dag gis/ /khyim mchog thams cad kun tu sgra yis gang / /gdugs dang ba dan dag kyang shin tu sgreng / /khyim kun lam mer mdzes pa lha yi bzhin/ /zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim mchog
51b6(mdo sde): chen po yang / /skyes bu na chung tshogs kyis brgyan gyur cing / /klu dang gnod sbyin lha min mang pos gang / /brgya phrag mang po'i lha yis rnam par bltas/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur
51b7(mdo sde): pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'ang brgyan/ bdag gi khyim yang legs par brgyan nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang / nang par snga rabs kyi dus kyi tshe sil snyan sna tshogs
52a1(mdo sde): brgya dag ni rab tu dkrol/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba du ma ni sgreng ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu
52a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang lha'i me tog man+da ras snyim pa bkang ste/ de dag las la ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ spyan ras
52a3(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / spos kyi glang po che dang / rin po che'i tog dang / mngon par 'byung dka' dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dpa'
52a4(mdo sde): bo'i sde dang / lag bzang dang / rin chen me tog dang / mthong ba don yod dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du
52a5(mdo sde): bdar te/ rta dang ba lang du ma shin tu brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa mang po dang 'dres pa/ gzhan yang yul gyi mi dpag tu med pa'i tshogs dang / bdag nyid kyang lha'i me tog
52a6(mdo sde): mnad ras snyim pa bkang ste byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub
52a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i a la la zhes lha'i ga zha'i sgra yid du 'thad cing / yid du 'ong ba/ yid 'phrog pa dag sgrog cing / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgo nas phyir byung ste/
52b1(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
52b2(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i me tog mnad ra bas snyim pa gang bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems
52b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i snyim pa na me tog
52b4(mdo sde): mnad ra ba yod pa des bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla
52b5(mdo sde): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas gdugs tshod la bab pa /
52b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bshos gtsang sbyar lags te/ da de'i dus la bab par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun
52b7(mdo sde): du bcas pa dang / dbang che ba dang / dbang che bar grags pa rgya che zhing rlabs che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong dang / nam mkha'
53a1(mdo sde): lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / srul po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag dang yang thabs gcig tu rgyal
53a2(mdo sde): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs shing bdag gi sdum par yang gdugs tshod gsol ba'i dus la bab bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ gdugs tshod la bab bo/ /de la 'di
53a3(mdo sde): skad ces bya ste/ bdag gis grong khyer mchog kun legs par brgyan/ /mgon po bdag gi sdum pa'ang de bzhin te/ /lha yi zhal zas ro brgya bshams shing sbyar/ /gdugs
53a4(mdo sde): tshod bab kyi bde gshegs bzhengs su gsol/ /drang srong mchog gis phyag bgyis stobs bcu yon tan 'chang / /sras kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing grong du gshegs/
53a5(mdo sde): snang byed nyi ma mun pa'i tshogs sel bzhengs su gsol/ /bcom ldan bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol gdugs tshod bab/ /sras dang thabs gcig bdag gi sdum par
53a6(mdo sde): gshegs su gsol/ /'gro ba mang po'i tshogs kyi don kyang bgyis par 'gyur/ /ji ltar mar me mdzad kyis khyod la lung bstan pa/ /de bzhin bdag kyang 'jig rten mngon
53a7(mdo sde): sum lung ston cig / bdag 'dir lung bstan 'jig rten thos nas ni/ /sems kyang mchog tu rgya cher rab bskyed de/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'di
53b1(mdo sde): na snod min sems can gang yang med/ /bzhengs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha/ /bdag la rjes su phan mdzod sdum par gshegs/ /ji ltar bdag gi sdum par
53b2(mdo sde): khyod gshegs pa/ /de bzhin byang chub shing dbang drung bdag mchi/ /byang chub shing dbang de drung bdag mchis nas/ /mi g.yo mi 'gul bar ni gnas bcas te/ /byams pas sder
53b3(mdo sde): bcas bdud rnams pham bgyis nas/ /khyod kyis brnyes bzhin byang chub thob par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsol ba mkhyen nas/ zla 'od
53b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pas slar bka' stsal pa/ longs shig zla 'od rgyal ba'i sras/ /longs shig sbyin dga' sems can mchog /longs shig snying rje tshul khrims
53b5(mdo sde): brtan/ /zan la deng ni khyim du 'dong / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs nas sngar gdan las bzhengs te/ sham thabs gsol/ chos gos dang lhung
53b6(mdo sde): b zed bsnams nas dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du
53b7(mdo sde): bdar te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags
54a1(mdo sde): dang / srul po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong du mas mchod cing mngon par bstod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul
54a2(mdo sde): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam gyis 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu gtong / sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni
54a3(mdo sde): rab tu dkrol/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni mngon par sgreng / gzugs dang kha dog rags pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngang pa dang /
54a4(mdo sde): khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / bzhad dang / tsa ko ra dang / rma bya dang / tsa sha dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ka la ping+ka dang / ku na la la sogs pa bya'i khyu mang po bum
54a5(mdo sde): sgra snyan cing 'jam la yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma 'byin pas ni bar snang la lha bzhin du so so'i nga ros rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin/ lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi bdug spos
54a6(mdo sde): kyi snod yangs shing che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang bai DUR+ya dang / an+da rnyil dang / shel dang / spug gi yu ba can dag gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gzugs
54a7(mdo sde): bzang dang / dbang po'i tog dang / rang rod can dang / ba ku la dang / lngas rtsen dang / shAkya 'phel la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gi lag pa gnyis na gtun
54b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa bzhin du thogs te/ spos sprul gyi snying po dang / go shir Sha dang / mr-i Na la dang / ha ri dang / ma la ya dang / tsan+dan dmar po dang / a ga ru la sogs pas bkang ba'i du ba
54b2(mdo sde): ni 'thul/ phyogs so so nas lhags pa'i rgyal po dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa rnams rta dang ba glang rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa'i tshogs su ma dang / shing
54b3(mdo sde): rta dang / dpung bu chung gis yongs su bskor cing phreng ba dang / lda ldi mang po dang / rin po che'i phreng ba lag na thogs shing sngon logs nas rkang gis 'gro'o/ /rta dang glang po che legs
54b4(mdo sde): par brgyan pa ma zhon par khrid pa dag kyang / rang gi stabs kyis mngon par 'gro zhing skad yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin to/ /tshangs pa'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs nas
54b5(mdo sde): mchod pa dang rim gro bsnyen bkur byed cing 'gro'o/ /g.yon phyogs nas ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rgya che zhing rlabs che ba/ bgrang ba las
54b6(mdo sde): 'das pa rnams lha'i cod pan bzang po dang / gdu bu rgyan can dang / rna cha dang / gdu bu dang / me tog rna rgyan dang / rin po che'i tsong tsong dang / me tog gi phreng bas lus brgyan
54b7(mdo sde): cing | gzugs mngon par snang bas lha'i me tog man+dA ra dang / mdog mdzes dang / ko bi dA ra dang / s+thA la ka dang / ku ra ba ka dang / tsam+pa ka dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / mya ngan
55a1(mdo sde): 'tshang dang / skya snar dang / a ti mug+ta ka dang / ut+pa la dang / ba ku la dang / mal+li ka dang / kund dang / ke sa ra dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar
55a2(mdo sde): po dang / dri mchog dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i a ga ru dang / shing rin po che'i 'bras bu can dag lag na thogs shing sil snyan sna tshogs brgya stong ni shin tu
55a3(mdo sde): dkrol/ gos bye ba ni g.yob cing a la zhes ga zha'i sgra dag ni 'byin/ me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i
55a4(mdo sde): ngos thams cad bar mtshams med par gang bar 'khod de/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom
55a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das chu dron yod pa'i sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gdugs tshod la gshegs so/ /de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /sangs rgyas de
55a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo yon tan kun gyis rab brgyan pa/ /zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab snang mdzad cing / /bcom ldan mi yi seng ge gshegs
55a7(mdo sde): par gyur/ /spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen don yod dang / /spos kyi bal glang rin chen lag bzang dang / /rin chen tog dang 'byung dka' dpa' bo dang / /de dang gzhan
55b1(mdo sde): dag rgyal ba'i zhabs 'bring byed/ /g.yas phyogs na ni mi pham 'dug gyur te/ /de ming byams pa yon tan mtha' yas phyug / bar du ma chod sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /bsod nams
55b2(mdo sde): ye shes tshogs kyang rab tu rdzogs/ /byams dang btang snyoms dga' bas lus bsgoms shing / /chos kyi bdag nyid chen po snying rjes bskyed/ /yon tan mtha' yas thub dbang
55b3(mdo sde): yon tan sems/ /bde gshegs thugs rje can gyi zhabs 'bring byed/ /de yi rjes la bskal pa bzang po yi/ /blo gros chen po ldan pa ji snyed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas stong du bzhis ma
55b4(mdo sde): tshang ba dag / de dag gis kyang byams pa mdun du bdar/ /gang sngon rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/ /bskal pa dag la rgyal ba mtha' yas mchod/ /zla ba mdzes pa'i 'od 'dra
55b5(mdo sde): lha yi lus/ /zla 'od dpa' bo yang ni mdun na 'dug /snying rje mchog gi g.yon phyogs 'dug pa ni/ /'jam dpal bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang / /dpa' bo rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis
55b6(mdo sde): mngon 'phags pa/ /brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing du 'gro ba'o/ /de yi 'og tu nyan thos dge 'dun te/ /shA ri'i bu 'og maud+gal nag po dang / /'od srung rab 'byor dga' bo ka pi na/ /
55b7(mdo sde): bzang ldan rgyal po de bzhin kauN+Di n+ya/ /kun dga' de bzhin gnas brtan sgra gcan zin/ /legs 'ongs kron tsi gang po 'char ba po/ /nam gru gsus chen nye 'khor ma 'gags
56a1(mdo sde): pa| |ral pa can ni stong du tshang ba dag / nyan thos dge 'dun 'og tu thams cad kyang / /dka' thub drag mchog rig byed cho ga shes/ /dmod pa 'dor dang
56a2(mdo sde): phan 'dogs nus pa yi/ /drang srong dul ba thal sbyar 'dud pa byed/ /zhi ba'i yid dang dul ba'i yid rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten sgron ma mdun bdar te/ /thugs rjer
56a3(mdo sde): ldan pa'i mi yi seng ge gshegs/ /sems can stong rnams rab tu thar bar mdzad/ /ston zla tha chung zla ba nya ba ltar/ /skar tshogs dbang po yongs su dag pa bzhin/ /tshangs
56a4(mdo sde): pa stong phrag dag ni brgya mang gis/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ston pa yongs su bskor/ /grong khyer gyi ni sgo steng zhabs bzhag tshe/ /nags tshal stug por bcas pa'i sa yang
56a5(mdo sde): g.yos/ /lha dang lha min lto 'phye'i tshogs rnams kyang / /me tog bzang po dri mchog 'thor bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa 'khor lo rin po ches
56a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab
56a7(mdo sde): tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab
56b1(mdo sde): tu 'khrugs/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur te/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub
56b2(mdo sde): phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar
56b3(mdo sde): gyur nas 'jig rten du snang ba chen po'ang byung bar gyur to/ /ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul grangs med dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang snang ngo // //'phags
56b4(mdo sde): pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bzhi pa/ de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /grong khyer mchog der 'dren pa gshegs pa na/ /sgo yi them pa la ni
56b5(mdo sde): zhabs mchog bzhag pa'i tshe/ /de yi dpal gyis sa 'di rab tu g.yos/ /grong khyer mchog 'di'i sems can rab tu dga'/ /mi gang bkres shing skom par gyur pa dag/ de tshe de
56b6(mdo sde): dag bkres pa med par gyur/ /rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/ /bkres shing skom pa dag dang bral bar gyur/ /rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/ /dmus
56b7(mdo sde): long gyur pa'i mi gang ci yod dang / /rna bas mi thos mgon med bsod nams chung / /de dag thams cad mig dang rna ba thob/ /rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/

57a4(mdo sde): dang mi dang grul bum srin po dang / /skyes bu gnas pa dga' mgu sems rangs te/ /byang chub dam pa mchog la dad bskyed nas/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa'i gdugs kyang
57a5(mdo sde): 'dzin/ /rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/ /sil snyan stong dag ma brdungs sgra 'byin te/ /shin tu yid 'ong rol mo'i dbyangs thos pas/ /de tshe sems can thams cad
57a6(mdo sde): rab tu dga'/ /sdong po stong phrag brgya dag 'dud par gyur/ /de tshe me tog kun kyang rab tu rgyas/ /bar snang las ni lha rnams brgya stong dag /rgyal ba la yang mi min mchod pa byed/ /
57a7(mdo sde): rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/ /glang po brgya dag sems dga' sgra 'byin te/ /rta dang ba glang rgyal po lus kyang stod/ /ri dwags rgyal po seng ge sgra 'byin byed/ /sa
57b1(mdo sde): dbang rgyal po gang su ji snyed cig / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag nas lhags pa rnams/ /rgyal ba'i dpal gzi de 'dra mthong nas ni/ /rab tu sems dga' sa la 'dug cing 'dud/ /

57b3(mdo sde): tig do shal bzang po dang / /sna tshogs rgyan mang dga' skyed 'thor bar byed/ /byang chub sems mchog dpe med bskyed nas su/ /kha cig na bza' rin chen 'thor bar byed/ /kha cig
57b4(mdo sde): gser gyi dra ba bzang po 'thor/ /kha cig me tog rgyal bzang 'thor bar byed/ /la la gser gyi rgyan ni dam pa 'thor/ /kha cig de bzhin gdu bu 'thor bar byed/ /la la gdu bu

57b6(mdo sde): rten mgon po sgo na bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /mi dag kha cig gser gyi tsong tsong 'thor/ /sems dad gtsug gi nor bu mchog kyang 'thor/ /la la rin chen dra ba 'thor bar byed/ /sems
57b7(mdo sde): can shin tu mi bzad sdug bsngal zhing / /gtse ba rnam mang zug rngus zug pa yang / /'dren pa skyes bu gtso bo'i dpal gyis ni/ /thams cad bde ba dang yang ldan par gyur/ /khu
58a1(mdo sde): byug dang ni ri skegs rma bya dang / /de bzhin khrung khrung dang ni mtsho bya dang / /bya mang kun ni nam mkhar 'dug nas su/ /shin tu yid 'ong mchog gi sgra yang
58a2(mdo sde): 'byin/ /de tshe bya tshogs mang po rab dga' bas/ /'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ste/ /gang gis snyan pa'i sgra skad de thos pa/ /de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi/ /
58a3(mdo sde): sems can bye bas dga' ba'i sgra thos nas/ /thams cad rjes su mthun pa'i bzod thob ste/ /ma 'ongs dus na rgyal bar khyed 'gyur zhes/ /de dag kun la bde gshegs lung
58a4(mdo sde): yang ston/ /de yi dus na nyon mongs mi 'byung ste/ /chos kyi rgyal la thams cad ri mor bcas/ /de tshe 'dren pa'i sku byad mthong nas ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la mos
58a5(mdo sde): bskyed de/ /bdag cag nam zhig 'di 'dra'i mkhyen thob snyam/ /bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung ston te/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i pa spu khung re nas/ /'od zer dag ni stong
58a6(mdo sde): phrag brgya yang byung / /de las lhag par gang+gA'i bye snyed de/ /de dag gi yang mtshan ma gzung mi nus/ /de tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyang mi snang ste/ /me dang nor bu lha kun 'od kyang med/ /
58a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba grong gshegs sangs rgyas rnam mdzes pa/ /de tshe 'od rnams thams cad yong mi mngon/ /tshogs chen dang ni bde gshegs lam bzhud tshe/ /gang du stobs bcu yi ni
58b1(mdo sde): zhabs 'thog par/ /sa las pad+ma dag ni stong phrag brgya/ /'dab ma bye ba stong ldan gtsang ma byung / /'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe/ /de na nyal nyil mi gtsang med
58b2(mdo sde): par gyur/ /grong khyer thams cad dri mchog bdug pa yi/ /spos ngad yid du 'ong ba kun nas ldang / /grong dang srang rnams yongs su dag gyur te/ /rdo dang gseg ma med cing spos chus
58b3(mdo sde): btab/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i bsod nams de 'dra ste/ /rnam pa sna tshogs me tog sil ma bkram/ /gnod sbyin brgya stong gtum por sems pa dag /sangs rgyas mi dbang gser
58b4(mdo sde): 'dra mthong nas ni/ /'dren la dga' ba rgya che rab bskyed nas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun skyabs su 'gro /lha rnams bye ba dang ni brgya phrag stong / /mi dbang lta bar 'ongs pa
58b5(mdo sde): de dag kun/ /bde bar gshegs la me tog char phab ste/ /me tog gtor nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug /rgyal la mi yis me tog gang gtor ba/ /nam mkha'i ngos la me tog
58b6(mdo sde): gdugs su gyur/ /lha rnams kyis ni me tog gtor ba yang / /sa steng lha yi me tog bkram par gyur/ /lha dang mi dang grul bum srin po rnams/ /de mthong nas ni nam yang ngoms mi
58b7(mdo sde): myong | |mgon po stobs bcu ldan pa mthong nas kyang / /rab tu dga' zhing sems bde rangs par gyur/ /nam tshe skyes bu mchog gi sku mthong nas/ /sems can thams cad dga'
59a1(mdo sde): mgu rangs gyur bas/ /lha yi me tog la yang yid mi sems/ /de dag la ni ngo mtshar 'dzin pa med/ /stobs bcu'i g.yas phyogs na ni tshangs pa ste/ /de
59a2(mdo sde): bzhin g.yon na brgya byin lha yi rgyal/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na lha mang bye 'khod de/ /skyes bu mchog la shin tu gus pa skyed/ /lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal ba bskor/ /lha dang mi
59a3(mdo sde): yi dpal gzi kun phrogs nas/ /zhabs mthil sa la ri mo 'byin bzhin du/ /grong khyer du ni bcom ldan spyan drangs gshegs/ /sku lus dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa ni/ /nam
59a4(mdo sde): mkha' skar ma dag gis gang ba bzhin/ /nam mkha' la ni zla ba nya ba ltar/ /rgyal po'i lam na sangs rgyas lam me bzhugs/ /nor bu rin chen rnam dag bzang po ni/ /nyes pa'i
59a5(mdo sde): skyon bral rab tu snang bar byed/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su'ang 'od gtsang byung / /de bzhin rgyal ba 'jig rten kun snang mdzad/ /lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal ba bskor/ /
59a6(mdo sde): mi yi gtso bo rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs/ /zhabs mthil sa la ri mo 'byin bzhin du/ /zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du sangs rgyas gshegs/ /grong khyer mchog ni kun tu legs
59a7(mdo sde): brgyan te/ /rgyal mtshan bye ba phrag stong rab tu sgreng / /de yis kun spos bzang rnam par byugs/ /yid 'ong de bzhin dbyar gyi me tog gtor/ /gang tshe bde gshegs gtam rnams
59b1(mdo sde): ston pa na/ /mgon po srang bzhud mi la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /rgyal bas der ni 'phrul ba rnam sprul te/ /de dag la yang sangs rgyas chos bzang ston/ /srog chags brgya stong dag gis de
59b2(mdo sde): thos nas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la smon lam 'debs/ /nam bdag 'di 'dra'i ye shes thob snyam ste/ /bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung yang ston/ /gang gis rgyal ba mi dbang
59b3(mdo sde): spyan drangs pa/ /sbyin pa de ni mu mtha' med gyur pa/ /rnyed mchog bsam gyis mi khyab des rnyed ces/ /la la dag ni de la mos pa skyed/ /'khor ba dag na shin tu mthong dka' ba/ /skye
59b4(mdo sde): dgu dag la phan mdzad thugs kyang brtse/ /thugs rje can de bdag gis sang la yang / /spyan drang snyam du la la sems kyang skyed/ /la la ba gam cog gi steng 'dug cing / /lus ni shin
59b5(mdo sde): tu sdug cing mdzes par brgyan/ /byang chub sems mchog dam pa bskyed nas ni/ /stobs bcu ldan la lha yi me tog 'thor/ /la las bla med sems mchog rab bskyed nas/ /me tog tsam
59b6(mdo sde): pa mdzes pa'i phreng ba dang / /a ti mug+ta de bzhin dbyar gyi spos/ /dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang la la 'thor/ /kha cig gos kyis shin tu lus brgyan te/ /me tog bzang po dag kyang thogs
59b7(mdo sde): shing 'greng / /me tog sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi thogs/ /rgyal ba mthu chen de yi phyogs su 'thor/ /la la pad+ma dang ni ku mu da/ /ut+pal gser gyi me tog bzang po 'thor/ /la la rin
60a1(mdo sde): chen me tog der 'thor te/ /la la tsan+dan phye ma 'thor bar byed/ /'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe/ /ngo mtshar dpag tu med pa rnams kyang
60a2(mdo sde): byung | |mtshungs med de dag brjod par mi nus te/ /sangs rgyas ye shes skye bo bye mang bkod/ /mi che mi gdung bden pa mthong ba dang / /gzhan yang gya nom snang dang shin tu
60a3(mdo sde): mthong / /de bzhin 'og min 'dod chags bral ba rnams/ /thams cad mi dbang blta phyir nye bar lhags/ /de bzhin dge ba'i lha rnams dpag med dang / /dge chung lha gzhan
60a4(mdo sde): dag kyang sems dga' zhing / /dge rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams/ /'dren pa drang srong chen po blta phyir lhags/ /tshad med 'od kyang de bzhin dpag med dang / /'od chung
60a5(mdo sde): gi ni lha rnams ci yod dang / /'od gsal ba yang khrag khrig mang po der/ /'jig rten mgon po blta phyir de dag lhags/ /tshangs 'khor ba dag brgya stong mang po dang / /tshangs pa'i
60a6(mdo sde): mdun 'don dad pa de bzhin te/ /tshangs ris kyang ni brgya phrag mang po rnams/ /thams cad 'dren pa blta phyir nye bar lhags/ /de bzhin gzhan 'phrul gyi yang lha rnams dang / /gzhan
60a7(mdo sde): yang 'phrul dga'i sems can dag pa dang / /dga' ldan 'thab bral lha rnams rab dga' zhing / /thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags/ /brgya byin lha rgyal sum
60b1(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa/ /lha yi bu mo bye ba brgya dag lhags/ /'dir ni me tog char kyang rab 'bebs shing / /sangs rgyas thub dbang blta phyir nye bar lhags/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba
60b2(mdo sde): bzhi po yang / /rnam thos bu dang klu dbang mig mi bzang / /yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes sems dga' ste/ /de kun mi dbang bstod cing nye bar lhags/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po mthu
60b3(mdo sde): ldan ir bir yang / /dga' ba skyes shing gnod sbyin brgyas bskor te/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug cing sems dga' nas/ /me tog sna tshogs du ma'i char kyang 'bebs/ /rtag tu
60b4(mdo sde): myos dang phreng 'dzin lha rnams kyang / /spos dang phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs thogs/ /'khor dang bcas pa thams cad sems dga' zhing / /de na skyes bu mchog la mchod pa byed/ /
60b5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs mang po yang / /gnod sbyin bu mo de dag rab brgyan te/ /gnod sbyin rol mo rab tu snyan pa dang / /shin tu yid 'ong brgyas ni sangs rgyas mchod/ /glu
60b6(mdo sde): dbyangs sil snyan 'jam zhing snyan pa la/ /mkhas pa mi'am ci yi bu mo stong / /mi 'am ci yi rgyal po ldon pa yang / /rgyal mchog mchod par spos ngad ldang las lhags/ /bde
60b7(mdo sde): mchog stobs ldan sgra gcan thags bzang ris/ /lha min bu mo stong gi 'khor bcas dang / /lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po gzhan mang yang / /rin po che yi char phab nye bar lhags/ /
61a1(mdo sde): srin po khrag khrig brgya phrag mtha' yas kyang / /srin po bye ba brgya yis bsnyen bkur zhing / /me tog sil ma sna tshogs mang po yang / /skyes bu mchog la
61a2(mdo sde): gus par rab tu 'thor/ /klu yi rgyal po ri bo legs pa yang / /'khor mang de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags/ /rin chen me tog rnam mang mchog thogs te/ /bde gshegs
61a3(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu 'dud/ /klu dbang pad+ma dang ni pad+ma che/ /de bzhin nor yod mtha' yas gdengs ka can/ /de dag khyu mchog drung du nyer lhags te/ /bde bar gshegs
61a4(mdo sde): la gus pas rab tu 'dud/ /klu yi rgyal po nor bu yid dga' zhing / /khyu mchog zhabs kyi drung du nye bar 'ongs/ /klu yi me tog dri zhim mchog thogs te/ /ha cang mi ring bde
61a5(mdo sde): gshegs spyan sngar 'dug / de bzhin ma dros klu yi rgyal po yang / /klu yi bu mo shin tu bslabs pa'i mchog /rnga dang sil snyan stong phrag brgya brdung zhing / /'jig rten mgon
61a6(mdo sde): po mchod phyir nye bar lhags/ /ma dros pa yi bu pho lnga brgya dag /ye shes yangs pa bla med 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /gnyen 'dab dag gis bskor cing dgar gyur nas/ /rang gis
61a7(mdo sde): rang byung mchod phyir nye bar lhags/ /de bzhin klu yi rgyal po sog med kyang / /skyes bu mchog la thal sbyar rab btud nas/ /klu yi me tog mdzes shing bzang ba thogs/ /
61b1(mdo sde): mkha' la 'dug nas thub rgyal mchod pa byed/ /de bzhin klu yi rgyal po btang bzung yang / /rab tu yid bde dga' mgu skyes nas ni/ /rin chen mu tig sna tshogs thogs nas su/ /
61b2(mdo sde): der 'ongs 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor/ /de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dus can yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nyer 'ongs te/ /dga' zhing rin chen phreng ba mdzes mchog
61b3(mdo sde): thogs/ /skyes bu dam pa la yang mchod rab byas/ /de yang bde gshegs yon tan rjes dran zhing / /gus pa chen po shin tu bskyed nas ni/ /gnyen 'dab klu mang dag gis de bskor
61b4(mdo sde): cing | |'dren pa'i bsngags pa rnam pa mang po brjod/ /de bzhin klu dbang dga' bo nye dga' dang / /de bzhin 'jog po gau tam nag po yang / /rgyal ba blta zhing der ni nye bar 'ongs/ /bde
61b5(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa'i zhabs la 'dud pa byed/ /klu yi rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma yang / /thub mchog rgyal ba 'od srung dran pa dang / /bdag nyid mi khom skyes pa mthong nas ni/ /klu
61b6(mdo sde): brgyas yongs su bskor te du zhing 'ongs/ /kye ma bdag sngon the tshom byung gyur te/ /bdag gis e la'i 'dab kyang sngon bcad pas/ /des ni mi khom par yang bdag skyes te/ /rgyal
61b7(mdo sde): ba'i chos ni rig par sla ba min/ /shin tu smad pa'i skye bo'i lus 'di dang / /klu yi skye gnas bdag gis rab spangs la/ /chos gang byang chub snying por skyes mchog gis/ /rtogs pa
62a1(mdo sde): bsil ba bdag gis rtogs par bya/ /klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho 'khor los bsgyur/ /bye ma gsum snyed klu yi 'khor gyis bskor/ /chu lha gzi can rin chen do
62a2(mdo sde): shal thogs/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod phyir nye bar 'ongs/ /rgyal ba la ni rdo 'phangs des bzung ste/ /de tshe nam mkha' la'ang 'dug gyur pa/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi gnod sbyin
62a3(mdo sde): ci zhig 'dzin/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gus par 'dug /lcang lo can gyi rgyal po'i gnas kun kyang / /stong par gyur cing gnod sbyin gang yang med/ /thams cad
62a4(mdo sde): kyis kyang phan tshun dam bcas te/ /'jig rten mgon po blta bar thams cad lhags/ /de bzhin bong rna dang ni khab spu dang / /gnod sbyin 'brog gnas 'jigs byed de bzhin
62a5(mdo sde): te| |gangs gnas rir 'dug gnod sbyin bong bu dag / rgyal ba rang byung drung du nye bar lhags/ /dbang po'i tog dang gzugs bzang rad rod can/ /bskul dang dus 'phel lnga po
62a6(mdo sde): dang | |gnod sbyin dbang po gzhan yang stong rnams ni/ /bdug spos snod rnams thogs shing nye bar lhags/ /lus dbyibs ma legs mi sdug mang po rnams/ /gzugs kyi
62a7(mdo sde): rnam pa mang zhing rgyan por ba/ /de yi dus na brgya stong mang po dag /gnod sbyin gyi ni me tog thogs te lhags/ /gau tam ri byi phur bu rgyal byed dang / /kau shi ka dang 'od srung
62b1(mdo sde): mArkaN+Da/ /thams cad bshes dang par sha gar gA dag /thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags/ /mi sbyin yang ni de bzhin dga' mgu ste/ /drang srong rgyas pa kud tsa ang
62b2(mdo sde): gi ra| |shed can ngan spong bad tsa gnas 'jog rnams/ /de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags/ /'dza' man bA man be'i sham bA ya dang / /'dza' mag nI dang grog
62b3(mdo sde): mkhar drang srong mchog / dkar bar gnas dang mi'u thung spen pa rnams/ /'dren pa blta zhing grong khyer mchog tu lhags/ /drang srong mthong nas de tshe drang srong dga'/ /thub rgyal
62b4(mdo sde): zhabs mchog la ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /'jig rten sgron la phyag byas mngon bstod de/ /thal mo sbyar nas dpa' bo'i spyan sngar 'greng / /'jig rten ci yod drang srong mang po kun/ /
62b5(mdo sde): de dag mi dbang blta bar nyer lhags te/ /mthong nas mchod pa rgya cher byas nas kyang / /sangs rgyas spyan sngar thal mo rab sbyar 'dug /rgya mtsho dag na gnas pa'i nam mkha' lding / /
62b6(mdo sde): bram ze'i cha byad du yang sprul byas nas/ /cod pan sna tshogs blta na sdug pa thogs/ /bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal nam mkhar 'khod/ /grong brgya dang ni 'dzam gling nags
62b7(mdo sde): tshal na/ /gnas shing rten pa'i lha rnams gang yod dang / /grong gi lha mo ma lus thams cad kyang / /nye bar lhags shing gtso bo mchod par byed/ /nags tshal gyi yang lha rnams
63a1(mdo sde): mtha' yas dang / /ri yi lha rnams thams cad nye bar 'ongs/ /'bab chu'i lha kun mtha' dag de bzhin du/ /'dren pa mchod pa byed cing nye bar lhags/ /
63a2(mdo sde): mya nga ma dgon pa'i lha mo brgya rnams dang / /ri rtse'i lha mo ji snyed ma lus dang / /mtsho dang chu mig rdzing gi lha rnams dang / /rgya mtsho'i lha yang sangs rgyas drung du lhags/ /lha dang
63a3(mdo sde): lha min klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs/ /mi 'am ci dang grul bum nam mkha' lding / /de bzhin yi dwags srul bo mang po dag/ skyes bu mchog la ri mor bya ba byed/ /'dren pa grong
63a4(mdo sde): khyer mchog der gshegs pa na/ /rgyal ba mchog la de dag mchod pa byed/ /lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin rgyal/ /blta bas rtag tu chog par yang mi 'gyur/ /sngon gyi
63a5(mdo sde): srid par 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la mchod mchog byas/ /bsod nams 'bras bu smin pa de 'dra ste/ /skyes bu mi dbang blta bas ngoms mi myong / /rgyal
63a6(mdo sde): bas sangs rgyas zhing du 'od btang tshe/ /lhun po de bzhin rab lhun khor yug ri/ /kha ba can gyi ri dang spos ngad ldan/ /de dag rgyal ba'i 'od la sgrib pa med/ /sangs rgyas zhing
63a7(mdo sde): 'di'i rgya mtsho ci yod pa/ /de dag de tshes dang 'dra bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kun tu yang / /me tog dag gis gtor cing mnyam par gyur/ /'od zer brgya stong
63b1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa dag / chos kyi rgyal po'i zhabs kyi mthil nas byung / /sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal med par byas nas bde ba myong / /der ni stobs
63b2(mdo sde): bcu ldan pas chos bshad pas/ /lha dang mi yi mig kyang rnam par dag/ srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa rnams/ /thams cad sangs rgyas ye shes nges par gyur/ /'dren pa
63b3(mdo sde): grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa na/ /bde gshegs cho 'phrul mang po dag gis ni/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod du mi sla ste/ /rgyal ba bde gshegs 'gro ba thams cad dga'/ /bde
63b4(mdo sde): gshegs yon tan de dag dpag med de/ /mi mchog yon tan rab kyi pha rol phyin/ /yon tan khyad par kun gyi pha rol son/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing la mgos phyag 'tshal//
63b5(mdo sde): grong khyer du gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim gyi srang du byung ste/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur
63b6(mdo sde): pa'i khyim du gshegs so/ /gshegs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun kyang so sor gar 'os pa'i stan la
63b7(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas mchod yon chen po rim
64a1(mdo sde): gyis gsol te/ zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa bzang zhing mang ba'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / gzhib pa dang / btung ba rnams bdag nyid
64a2(mdo sde): kyis gsol cing bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas lhung bzed bzhag ste phyag bcabs par rig nas ras bcos bu phrugs bye ba stong phrag brgya ri ba bcom ldan 'das
64a3(mdo sde): kyi sku la gsol to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la'ang so sor chos gos sum phrugs su phul nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
