64a4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man+dA ras gtor te/ mchod cing mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das
64a5(mdo sde): la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do/ /skyes pa med cing 'gags med pa/ /sku lus mi mnga' bsam mi khyab/ /gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/ /
64a6(mdo sde): yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo shes rab mchog gis bskyed/ /thabs dang stobs kyi rtsal kyang mnga'/ /sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra ba ste/ /bzod mthar phyin la phyag
64a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhugs pa'i spyod yul te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal rab tu dga' dang bde/ /btung bar ting nge 'dzin te bshos su bsam gtan
64b1(mdo sde): mchog/ stong nyid dgon par gnas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal bas thugs rje bsnyen pas na/ /gzugs kyi sku yang ston par mdzad/ /sems can dag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /btung
64b2(mdo sde): dang bshos kyang gsol bar gda'/ /e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste/ /'jig rten 'di ni khyod mchod nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu mchi/ /mi
64b3(mdo sde): mnyam mnyam pa'i mgon gcig po la de skad bstod/ /gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dgar gyur tshig smras pa/ /sangs rgyas mtshungs med bsam yas sku mnga' bshos gsol bas/ /lha
64b4(mdo sde): yi lha khyod bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur/ /de ltar zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya pa ni bzhes par gsol/ lha'i na bza' rin thang med
64b5(mdo sde): pa phrugs kyis ni sku la gsol/ lha'i me tog man+dA ras ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas ni mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
64b6(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas ci spyad na/ /rtag tu chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu
64b7(mdo sde): 'tshal/ /mkhas pa bgyi ba dag la ji ltar 'jug/ bgyi bar 'jug pa 'dren pas bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar mngal dag tu yang yong mi skye/ /
65a1(mdo sde): ji lta bur na 'khor rnams mi phyed 'gyur/ /'di la ji ltar spobs pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /chos rnams kun la
65a2(mdo sde): mngon par mkhyen pa 'jug/ rkang gnyis gtso bo zil gyis mi non pa/ /zhu ba zhu yis bdag la lung ston cig /chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen la/ /brjod du med pa tshig
65a3(mdo sde): tu brjod par mdzad/ /seng ges wa rnams ji ltar pham bgyis pa/ /mu stegs gzhan la'ang sangs rgyas de bzhin te/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen cing / /chos rnams
65a4(mdo sde): kun la'ang ye shes rjes su 'jug/ ye shes chags med spyod yul yongs su dag /chos kyi mnga' bdag bdag la de lung ston/ /'das pa mkhyen cing ma 'ongs de bzhin te/ /
65a5(mdo sde): da ltar 'di na ci mchis pa yang mkhyen/ /dus gsum la ni ye shes thogs med 'jug /de phyir bdag zhu shAkya seng ge la/ /dus gsum ldan pa'i rgyal ba'i chos nyid ni/ /chos
65a6(mdo sde): kyi rgyal pos chos nyid rab tu mkhyen/ /rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas/ /de phyir bdag zhu ye shes rgya mtsho la/ /khyod la 'khrul ba'i chos ni ci yang med/ /de bas khyod kyi
65a7(mdo sde): sems pa ma lus spangs/ /mdud spangs tha ba gti mug rab tu bcad/ /mi dbang bdag la byang chub spyod pa ston/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid ci 'drar rgyal bas mkhyen/ /chos kyi
65b1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid de 'dra bdag la ston/ /bdag gis mtshan nyid de 'dra'i chos rtogs nas/ /mtshan nyid de 'dra'i byang chub spyod pa spyad/ /sems can spyod pa mi mthun mtha' yas pa/ /ji
65b2(mdo sde): ltar spyod pa spyad par 'jug pa lags/ /gang thos sems can spyod pa 'tshal 'gyur ba/ /spyod la 'jug pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid mi mthun chos kyi rang bzhin mtshan//
65b3(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid stong rang bzhin rnam dag pa/ /byang chub sems dpas ji ltar mngon sum 'gyur/ /chos kyi tshul rnams bdag la bstan du gsol/ /'di la chos rnams kun gyi pha rol
65b4(mdo sde): phyin| |bstan pa'i tshig kun la yang shin tu mkhas/ /the tshom mi mnga' nem nur the tshom med/ /bdag la sangs rgyas byang chub bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla
65b5(mdo sde): 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
65b6(mdo sde): gcig dang ldan na yon tan 'di dag rab tu thob ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/
65b7(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa yin no/ /gzhon nu/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
66a1(mdo sde): chen pos chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ming med cing ming
66a2(mdo sde): dang bral bar rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad sgra med pa/ tshig gi lam dang bral ba/ yi ge dang bral ba/ skye ba dang bral ba/ 'gog pa dang bral ba/ rgyu dang mtshan nyid mi mthun
66a3(mdo sde): pa| rkyen dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa/ dben pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam
66a4(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba/ yid dang bral bar rab tu shes so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /chos rnams bstan pa gcig po ni/ /chos
66a5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab mkhyen pas/ /shes rab mchog gis bshad pa yin/ /de lta bur ni chos bstan rnams/ /byang chub sems
66a6(mdo sde): dpa' sus shes pa/ /mdo sde bye ba rab ston kyang / /de la byang chub rgyun chad med/ /'dren pas byin gyis brlabs pas na/ /yang dag nyid kyi mtha' yang shes/ /yang dag
66a7(mdo sde): mtha' de rab shes na/ /de la ci yang bshad pa med/ /gcig gis kyang ni thams cad shes/ /gcig gis kyang ni thams cad mthong / /ji snyed mang por bshad na yang / /
66b1(mdo sde): de la dregs pa skye ba med/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med par/ /de ltar sems kyis nges brtags shing / /ming du bstan pa bslabs pas na/ /yang dag nyid du tshig kyang
66b2(mdo sde): smra| |sgra dbyangs gang dag ci thos pa/ /de yi sngon gyi mtha' shes te/ /sgra yi sngon gyi mtha' shes nas/ /sgra dag gis ni de mi 'phrogs/ /sgra yi sngon mtha' ji 'dra bar/ /chos
66b3(mdo sde): rnams mtshan nyid de bzhin te/ /chos rnams de ltar rab shes na/ /mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos rnams thams cad mi skye zhing / /'byung ba med par rab tu shes/ /bstan pa
66b4(mdo sde): 'di ni rab shes na/ /rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /nam zhig skye ba dran gyur na/ /de tshe bya ba dag la 'jug /bya ba dag la zhugs pa yi/ /'khor rnams shin tu mi phyed 'gyur/ /
66b5(mdo sde): de ltar chos rnams stong par ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa/ /des ni gang yang mi shes med/ /'di ni ci yang med pa'i mtha'/ /ci yang med pa'i mtha' la yang / /
66b6(mdo sde): byis pa dag gis ci dag brtags/ /bskal pa bye bar de dag des/ /yang dang yang du 'khor bar gyur/ /ji ltar 'dren pas mkhyen pa bzhin/ /gal te de dag rtog rig na/ /de las
66b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mi skye ste/ /ngan 'gro rnams su'ang de mi 'gro /so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis/ /de ltar tshul 'di ma shes pas/ /gang du chos rnams 'gag pa yi/ /'di 'dra'i chos
67a1(mdo sde): rnams spong bar byed/ /chos kun rnyed pa med par ni/ /chos kyi 'du shes gang byung ba/ /de lta bu yi 'du shes te/ /'du shes de ltar rig par gyis/ /
67a2(mdo sde): rnam par shes dang 'du shes su/ /byis pa dag gis 'di brtags te/ /brtags pa yi ni chos rnams la/ /mkhas pa 'dir ni rmongs mi 'gyur/ /stong pa rnyog pa med pa'i chos/ /
67a3(mdo sde): 'di ni mkhas pa'i sa yin te/ /'di la byis pa'i spyod yul med/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod yul lo/ /zhi ba stong pa rab bstan pa/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa/ /sa
67a4(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas sras spyod pa/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyan yin no/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag /bag chags rab tu spangs gyur pa/ /de dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrogs
67a5(mdo sde): te| |sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas/ /chos rnams thams cad gnas med de/ /de dag la ni gnas yod min/ /gang gis de ltar gnas zhes pa/ /de la byang chub rnyed
67a6(mdo sde): mi dka'/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang bzod/ /bshes gnyen bzang po bsten byas nas/ /bya ba 'di dag rnam rig na/ /byang chub myur du de 'tshang rgya/ /de la lha klus
67a7(mdo sde): rtag tu bkur sti byed/ /gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dri za dang / /nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad dang / /mi 'am ci dang srin pos mchod pa byed/ /sangs rgyas bye
67b1(mdo sde): ba de yi snyan pa brjod/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por mi 'chad par/ /chos bshad pa yi bsngags pa brjod na yang / /de yi mu mtha' zad par nus mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang
67b2(mdo sde): gis stong shes pa/ /de ni srog chags bye ba'i don mang byed/ /shin tu nges pas 'khor la chos ston te/ /thos nas dga' zhing ri mor byed pa skyed/ /de dag gis ni ye shes yangs
67b3(mdo sde): pa 'byung / /de phyir rgyal ba mi mchog mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhing rnams na yang bkod pa bzang po mthong / /'jig rten mgon po de la chos rnams ston/ /chos kun sgyu ma lta bur
67b4(mdo sde): shes par gyis/ /ji ltar bar snang rang bzhin stong pa ltar/ /de dag gi yang rang bzhin de 'drar shes/ /de ltar spyod pa ci la'ang chags mi 'gyur/ /ye shes chags pa med
67b5(mdo sde): pas don byed cing / /'jig rten na yang byang chub spyad mchog spyod/ /shes pas chos kun la'ang rab brtags te/ /de dag zhing rnams gzhan du'ang sprul pa 'gyed/ /sprul pa de
67b6(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas don byas nas/ /ji ltar chas nyid bzhin du rang bzhin 'gyur/ /byang chub sems la mi gang gnas pa rnams/ /bsam pa ji bzhin don rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ /
67b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rigs ni gnas par gang brtson pa/ /de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas byas pa gzo/ /rnam par 'bar ba'i lus dang rab ldan zhing / /mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis de la 'byung / /
68a1(mdo sde): phan yon gzhan yang mang po mtha' yas pa/ /ting 'dzin mchog la spyod pas thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu mi sgul stobs kyang che bar 'gyur/ /de yi
68a2(mdo sde): gzi brjid rgyal pos mi bzod de/ /mkhas pa su dag sangs rgyas chos spyod pa/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing shin tu mdzes par 'gyur/ /bsod nams gzi brjid dpal gyis mngon
68a3(mdo sde): 'phags te/ /lhas kyang de yi gzi brjid bzod mi 'gyur/ /su dag byang chub sems la brten gnas pa/ /de ni rtag tu srog chags kun gyi bshes/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'di
68a4(mdo sde): ni rab ston pa/ /de la nam yang mun pa med par 'gyur/ /sgra dang tshig gi lam bral brjod du med/ /nam mkha' ji bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin te/ /'di lta bu yi tshul mchog rnam
68a5(mdo sde): rig na/ /de yi spobs pa dag kyang mi zad 'gyur/ /mdo sde dag ni brgya stong rab bshad kyang / /sngon gyi mtha' ma phra zhib rab tu shes/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu phra shes
68a6(mdo sde): pas| |mkhas pa'i tshig ni rtag tu thogs pa med/ /rtag par tshul brgya dag la mkhas gyur cing / /sgra dang nges tshig rnam pa mang la mkhas/ /las dang 'bras bu rnam smin
68a7(mdo sde): nges pa ste/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag de 'drar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa bdag nyid chen po stobs bcu'i sras/ /ma tshang med pa'i stobs kyis shugs 'chang zhing / /shin
68b1(mdo sde): tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /de yi dran pa rtag par yongs su dag/ shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /yid du mi 'ong sgra ni thos mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu snyan cing yid
68b2(mdo sde): 'ong sgra yang thos/ /de yi tshig ni rtag tu yid 'ong 'gyur/ /shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /dran dang blo gros shes rab rtogs dang ldan/ /de bzhin sems kyang rnyog med
68b3(mdo sde): dang bar 'gyur/ /mdo sde brgya phrag du ma rab tu 'chad/ /yon tan 'di 'dra'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /yi ge dang ni tshig rnams 'byed la mkhas/ /tha dad pa yi sgra mang du ma
68b4(mdo sde): shes| |don dang tshig 'brul yang mkhas par 'gyur/ /shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /lha dang mi dang klu 'brug srin po dang / /lha min lto 'phye mi'am ci la yang / /
68b5(mdo sde): rtag tu sdug cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /'byung po yi dwags srin po'i tshogs rnams ni/ /sha la za ba shin tu mi zad pa/ /de dag
68b6(mdo sde): nam yang de la 'jigs mi byed/ /mkhas pa de dag yangs pa'i gtam thos nas/ /shin tu dga' zhing ba spu zing zhes byed/ /sangs rgyas la yang dga' ba rgya cher bskyed/ /de
68b7(mdo sde): dag bsam gyis mi khyab don chen thob/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i chos mdzod 'di bzung ba'i/ /bskal pa stong mang de yi bsod nams stobs/ /rab tu brjod kyang rdzogs par
69a1(mdo sde): mi nus te/ /dpag tu med cing mtha' yas tshad med do/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di bzung ba yis/ /'das pa'i rgyal ba dpag med thams cad dang / /
69a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu na/ /sangs rgyas gang bzhugs de dag de yis mchod/ /skyes bu la la bsod nams 'dod pas 'dir/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i thugs rje
69a3(mdo sde): can dag la/ /dga' ba dpag tu med pa bskyed nas ni/ /bskal pa mtha' yas dpag med rim gro byas/ /skyes bu gnyis pa bsod nams 'dod pa yis/ /don dam tshul 'di
69a4(mdo sde): las ni tshigs bcad gcig / phyi ma'i dus su gyur tshe 'dzin pa ni/ /de la snga ma'i bsod nams char mi phod/ /'di ni sangs rgyas mchod pa rab mchog ste/ /phyi ma mi bzad dus su
69a5(mdo sde): gyur pa'i tshe/ /'di las tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad gcig thos nas/ /'dzin pa des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mchod/ /de dag rtag tu rnyed mchog legs par rnyed/ /de dag
69a6(mdo sde): grong gi zas mchog legs par zos/ /stobs bcu'i sras kyi thu bo dam pa ste/ /de yis rgyal ba mang po yun ring mchod/ /bya rgod phung po'i ri 'dir nga yang mthong / /de dag
69a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mkhyen la ngas lung bstan/ /mya ngan nga 'das nas ni byams pa yang / /de tshe de la lung yang ston par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas tshe dpag med pa yang / /
69b1(mdo sde): nga yi bde ba can du kun 'dong zhes/ /phan yon rnam pa du ma de la 'chad/ /mngon dga' der song sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs mthong / /bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par yang / /
69b2(mdo sde): log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa yong mi 'byung / /byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di spyod pa ni/ /rtag tu yid rab bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /de phyir bye brag 'di 'phags de 'dra ste/ /'di
69b3(mdo sde): ni rab tu bshad pa phan yon mchog / so so'i tshig la nga yi rjes slobs la/ /phyi ma'i dus la mdo sde 'di zungs shig /mdo sde 'dzin pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// //gzhon nu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa de'i yon tan dang phan yon de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
69b4(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par smra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / med pas mi skur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang gis de bzhin
69b5(mdo sde): gshegs par rab tu dbye ba'i chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas par rab tu shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon
69b6(mdo sde): nu| sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni mtha' yas te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam pa dang bral bas na/ de dag bsam pa'am dpag par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu
70a1(mdo sde): sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa ste/ gzhon nu/ de ltar sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid
70a2(mdo sde): kyang de yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa chos thams
70a3(mdo sde): cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin te/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid don gcig tu bstan pa/ yang dag pa
70a4(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ni/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid kyis nges par brtags pa zhes bya ste/ 'byung ba la mkhas shing khams
70a5(mdo sde): gsum las 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so/ /ji lta ba bzhin du lta zhing log par mi smra/ rnam pa gzhan du mi smra/ ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed/ khams
70a6(mdo sde): gsum la ma chags shing khams gsum las yang dag par 'das te/ 'dod pa'i sa dang / gzugs kyi sa dang / gzugs med pa'i sa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sa dang
70a7(mdo sde): ming gis dang / sgra'i sa las 'das shing yi ge dang chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ ye shes mi zad par bsgoms pa /brjod du med pa'i chos rtogs pa/ yi ge shes
70b1(mdo sde): pa| yi ge la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes
70b2(mdo sde): pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa yin te/ gtan la dbab pa'i blo dang ldan
70b3(mdo sde): zhing | bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis zil gyis mi non to/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha dang mi'i skye dgu sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa khrag
70b4(mdo sde): khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyis bye ba brgya stong 'khyil ba'i gzungs dang / sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang / chos rnam par mthong ba'i bzod pa so sor thob nas/ bcom ldan
70b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis de dag thams cad la bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
70b6(mdo sde): rgya ste| thams cad kyang ming ni tha dad/ tshe'i tshad ni gcig par sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o
70b7(mdo sde): zhes lung bstan to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blo dang ldan pa gang / /bla na med pa'i byang chub rab 'tshol zhing / /chos dang de bzhin don la mkhas pa
71a1(mdo sde): de| |chos kyi ngo bo nyid la spyod pa yin/ /yang dag ma yin pa yi tshig mi smra/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag ci 'dra ba/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi chos ni de yin te/
71a2(mdo sde): dpa' bo the tshom bral bas shin tu rig/ chos kun don gcig par ni rab shes te/ /mgo gcig tu ni stong pa nyid yin pas/ /de dag la ni tha dad gyur pa med/ /don gcig
71a3(mdo sde): la ni shin tu bslabs pa yin/ /rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med pa dang / /dmigs pa med par blo gros ldan pas shes/ /zad pa dang ni mi zad 'du shes kyang / /ma lus par
71a4(mdo sde): ni thams cad rab tu spangs/ /de ni chos sku mi yi seng ge la/ /stobs bcu ldan pa gzugs su mi lta zhing / /de ni phyin ci log kun rab spangs pas/ /mtshan rnams su yang
71a5(mdo sde): lta bar yod mi 'gyur/ /chos rnams 'di dag bsam mi khyab/ /bsam dang bral zhing rang bzhin zhi/ /de lta bur ni rab shes nas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong
71a6(mdo sde): ji ltar bdag gi 'du shes rig / de bzhin kun tu blo yang gtong / /chos kun de yi rang bzhin te/ /rnam par dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /yid la nam yang 'byung ba med/ /
71a7(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad shes pas na/ /khams gsum las ni rnam par grol/ /de la smon lam 'debs pa med/ /yang dag ji bzhin du ni mthong gyur cing / /ma log
71b1(mdo sde): tshig smra rnam pa gzhan mi smra/ /de yi tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyang / /rgyal ba dag gi mthu yis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i sa dang nyon mongs sa rnams dang / /gzugs
71b2(mdo sde): dang gzugs med las kyang shin tu 'da'/ /chos rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing / /rab tu dga' bas 'gro la phan par spyod/ /ming gi sa las 'das shing sgra yang shes/ /
71b3(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyis gsog tu gyur pa ste/ /ji srid tsam du yun ring brjod na yang / /de la gnas par byed pa yod ma yin/ /'du shes rab tu rgyu ba med/ /lta ba log pa kun nas zad/ /
71b4(mdo sde): blo yang shin tu gtan la phab/ /brtan pa nam mkha' 'dra bar spyod/ /gal te bdud bye khrag khrig rnams/ /de yi sems dkrug phyir 'ongs kyang / /bdud rnams thams cad zil
71b5(mdo sde): mnan te/ /de yi dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur/ /bdud kyi rgya mo rnams spangs te/ /tshul khrims yongs dag gdung ba med/ /bsam gtan dag gi bde la mos/ /'jig rten stong par
71b6(mdo sde): rab tu shes/ /'jig rten phung por smras pa yang / /de dag stong par rab tu rig /skye ba med cing 'gag med pas/ /chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' bzhin/ /de dag
71b7(mdo sde): bdag nyid gtong byed kyi/ /stobs bcu'i tshul khrims thos mi gtong / /de ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin/ /gar smon par yang skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par
72a1(mdo sde): 'gro/ sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mthong / /mtho ris dag ni mi 'dod de/ /smon lam rnams ni yongs mi gtong / /chos nyid dag ni de spyod tshe/ /skad cig
72a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus nyams mi byed/ /phyogs bcu yi ni sangs rgyas kyis/ /de ni shin tu bstod pa yin/ /de phyir gzhon nu ting 'dzin las/ /chos 'di dag ni rab thob nas/ /shes kyi
72a3(mdo sde): khe ni rnam spongs la/ /skye bo mang la chos rab ston/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mang ldan pa/ /rang 'byung 'gyur bar gang 'dod pas/ /dge ba 'di la rab bslabs na/ /stobs
72a4(mdo sde): kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur slob pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur
72a5(mdo sde): pa la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
72a6(mdo sde): rgya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ de la ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba bzhin
72a7(mdo sde): nyid dang / mnyam pa nyid me mnyam pa med pa dang / mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ rnam par ma bsgrubs pa/ kun nas slong ba med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med
72b1(mdo sde): pa| rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / kun nas rtog pa yongs su chad pa/ sems kyi dmigs pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ rnam par rig pa yongs su chad pa/ 'dod chags
72b2(mdo sde): dang | zhe sdang dang / gti mug yongs su chad pa/ mtha' med pa/ mthar yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ yid la byed pa yongs su chad pa/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi
72b3(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid shes pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / brtan pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / nan tan gyi gnas su gyur pa/ nyon mongs pa
72b4(mdo sde): med pa'i sa/ zhi ba'i sa spros pa thams cad yongs su chad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul/ yon tan thams
72b5(mdo sde): cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni/ gzhon nu/ ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'di la
72b6(mdo sde): gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral ba yin/ sems 'khrul pa med pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom
72b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ting 'dzin mnyam pa med pa'i sa/ /shin tu mthong dka' phra zhing zhi/ /'du shes thams cad bcom pa ste/ /de phyir
73a1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med/ /gzung ba med cing bstan du med/ /sems kyang dmigs pa med pa ste/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces
73a2(mdo sde): bya| |nam zhig mnyam par gzhag gyur te/ /chos kun la ni rlom sems med/ /rlom sems med pa ji bzhin pa/ /de ni ting nge 'dzin ces bsgrags/ /chos ni rdul tsam yod
73a3(mdo sde): med de/ /rdul ces bya ba'ang yod ma yin/ /chos rnams dmigs su med pa ste/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /sems kyi dmigs pa med pa yang / /de ni rnam par rtog ces
73a4(mdo sde): bya| |chos de rnam par ma brtags pa/ /de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis/ /sgra yis don rnams rab bstan te/ /sgra de nyid kyang dngos po med/ /sgra ni brag ca lta bu ste/ /bar
73a5(mdo sde): snang dag gi nam mkha' bzhin/ /chos 'di rnams ni mi gnas te/ /'di dag la ni gnas mi dmigs/ /mi gnas pa ni gnas kyi sgra/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mi rnyed do/ /'gro zhing
73a6(mdo sde): 'chi 'phor brjod pa yi/ /de lta bu yi 'gro ba med/ /'gro ba med pa 'gro ba'i sgras/ /ting nge 'dzin du de phyir gsungs/ /mnyam gzhag ma yin de ni rlom sems brjod/ /
73a7(mdo sde): mnyam gzhag 'di yang rlom sems gnyis pa ste/ /rlom sems med par byang chub rim par spyod/ /dran pa rlom sems med pa byang chub mchog /mnyam dang mi mnyam zhi
73b1(mdo sde): ba sangs rgyas sa/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong mtshan med 'di yin te/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas sa 'di bsten byas na/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la de brtson yin/ /don gyi rnam par rig pa 'jug pa la/ /
73b2(mdo sde): yi ge dag gis 'jug par mi nus te/ /sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam par spangs nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag 'gyur de la rlom sems med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin
73b3(mdo sde): 'di| |ji ltar bshad bzhin gnas shing brtson byed na/ /gal te zhing 'di bskal pas 'tshig gyur kyang / /ri mchog dbus su zhugs pas mes mi 'tshig /bskal pa brgya phrag mang por
73b4(mdo sde): rab bsregs kyang / /nam mkha' sngon chad nam yang mi 'tshig bzhin/ /chos rnams nam mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas/ /de ni me yi nang du yong mi 'tshig /gal te sangs rgyas
73b5(mdo sde): zhing rnams 'bar gyur la/ /'bar ba 'di dag ma lus zhi zhig ces/ /ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab na/ /sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med/ /de ni rdzu 'phrul
73b6(mdo sde): stobs kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/ /nam mkha' la yang thogs pa med par 'gro /rjes su bstan bzhin ting 'dzin gnas pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag myong / /skye
73b7(mdo sde): zhing 'chi 'phor de 'gyur yang / /skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho med/ /gang gis de ltar rnam rig pa/ /de la ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'/ /'chi 'pho skye ba med par ni/ /'jig rten mgon pos
74a1(mdo sde): rab tu bshad/ /de ltar 'jig rten mgon rig nas/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang rig /'jig rten gyis ni ma gos shing / /'jig rten chos la mi chags
74a2(mdo sde): te| |lus ni thogs pa med par ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed/ /zhing dag na ni 'jig rten 'dren/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu mthong / /sangs rgyas dag gis
74a3(mdo sde): zhing bshad pa/ /chos rnams de dag der yang nyan/ /de la mi shes yong med de/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang rab tu 'chad/ /chos kyi rnam pa rtag tu rig /de ni chos kyi dbyings
74a4(mdo sde): kyi tshul/ /bskal pa bye bar 'chad ston kyang / /de yi spobs pa zad mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan mang po/ /mkhas pa dag kyang sprul par byed/ /byang chub sems
74a5(mdo sde): dpa' sprul pa ni/ /pad+ma 'dab ma stong dag la/ /skyil mo krung bcas 'dug pa dag /zhing nas zhing du 'gro bar byed/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgoms nas ni/ /gzungs dang mdo sde
74a6(mdo sde): bzang po dang / /mdo sde gzhan yang bye ba dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ston/ /sems can mang po bsam mi khyab/ /phyir mi ldog la 'god par byed/ /sangs rgyas byang
74a7(mdo sde): chub rab ston kyang / /spobs pa dag ni zad mi 'gyur/ /rin chen rnam par brgyan pa yi/ /khang pa brtsegs zhugs de 'gro ste/ /dri dang ldan pa'i me tog gis/ /'dren pa la
74b1(mdo sde): yang mngon par 'thor/ /dri dang ldan pa'i phye mas kyang / /'dren pa la ni rab tu 'thor/ /de dag thams cad byang chub phyir/ /rgya che ba yi mchod pa byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa
74b2(mdo sde): yi| |yon tan dpag med de dag ni/ /nam zhig nyon mongs med gyur pa/ /de tshe rdzu 'phrul de dag thob/ /nyon mongs dag ni mi skye zhing / /dag pa dang ba 'od gsal ba/ /mi 'phrugs
74b3(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo/ /rab tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi/ /nyon mongs med cing mya ngan bral/ /spros med rnam par ma spros pa/ /spros pa dag las
74b4(mdo sde): shin tu 'das/ /yi ge'i spyod pa med pa ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de/ /dbyangs kyis rig par dka' bas na/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /zad mi shes shing nye bar
74b5(mdo sde): zhi| |lhun gyis 'grub cing bstan med pa/ /rnyog med yang dag nyid kyi mtha'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul lo/ /'ong dang 'gro ba med pa dang / /spros med lhun gyis grub pa
74b6(mdo sde): yi| |chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bslab pa ste/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di bslabs nas/ /yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin/ /tshu rol dang ni pha
74b7(mdo sde): rol med/ /sngon mtha' rnam par ma brtags te/ /de phyir sangs rgyas de dag kun/ /yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin/ /'ong dang 'gro ba med pa dang / /spros med lhun gyis grub pa
75a1(mdo sde): yi| |chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen nas ni/ /de dag de las pha rol phyin/ /ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa/ de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las longs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
75a2(mdo sde): sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bcom
75a3(mdo sde): l dan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
75a4(mdo sde): bslab pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa legs par bshad pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring por bslab pa 'di la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag
75a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag spobs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
75a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la skabs phye nas
75b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do/ /'dod dang khro bas rtag tu zil non cing / /sdug bsngal gtses pa'i sems can
75b2(mdo sde): gzigs nas ni/ /skye dgu thar byed sangs rgyas gyur cig ces/ /byang chub phyir ni khyod kyis sems kyang bskyed/ /dpa' bos bskal pa bye ba mang spyad de/ /sbyin dang dul dang
75b3(mdo sde): legs sdom rtag tu gnas/ /bzod dang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson 'grus des/ /sbyin pa dag kyang mtha' yas rgya cher byin/ /rkang lag dang ni srog kyang rab gtong zhing / /khyod
75b4(mdo sde): kyi yid la nam yang skyo med de/ /gser dngul de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang / /chags med gyur nas rgyal po'i srid kyang gtong / /khyod kyi tshul khrims dri med rnam dag ste/ /bdag
75b5(mdo sde): nyid gtong zhing tshul khrims yong mi 'dral/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rab tu bsdams/ /bde gshegs sems dul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bzod la dgyes shing bzod
75b6(mdo sde): pa'i lam la gnas/ /lus ni dum bur byas kyang 'khrugs med de/ /byams pa bsgoms pas de las 'o ma zags/ /bde gshegs ngo mtshar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs
75b7(mdo sde): bcu dag gi stobs dang ldan gyur cing / /chags med ye shes gnas pas chos kun rtogs/ /thugs rjes 'jig rten phan mdzad chos kyi rje/ /skye dgu 'di yi don bzhed thugs brtse
76a1(mdo sde): ba| |stong par mkhyen cing 'di na sems can med/ /de bzhin 'jig rten lam stor gzigs nas ni/ /de dag rang bzhin bdag med chos rtogs bgyis/ /
76a2(mdo sde): rnam grol skyes kyang gang na'ang rnam grol med/ /so sor brtags te bag med thams cad spangs/ /bdud sde mtha' yas stobs dang ldan pa bcom/ /ye shes mtha' yas byang
76a3(mdo sde): chub rgya cher mkhyen/ /mchog tu rnam dag zhi pa'i tshos kyang ston/ /zla ba skar mar bcas pa gnam lhung zhing / /ri dang grong du bcas pa'i sa zhig la/ /nam mkha'i khams ni
76a4(mdo sde): rnam pa gzhan gyur kyang / /khyod ni mi bden pa yi tshig mi gsung / /skye dgu dmigs pa dag la dga' ba dang / /sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyis gzigs nas ni/ /stong
76a5(mdo sde): pa nyid dang zab cing zhi ba yin/ /dmigs pa med pa dag ni ston par mdzad/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /mi dmigs pa yi bslab pa la/ /dpa' bo chen pos
76a6(mdo sde): bslabs pas na/ /khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/ /ji lta bu yi chos bslabs pa/ /de lta bu yi chos ston te/ /mu stegs gzhan dag ji snyed dang / /byis pa dag gis sa
76a7(mdo sde): 'di min/ /bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas pa/ /mi mkhas de dag 'khrul par 'gyur/ /chos rnams bdag med rig pas na/ /khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/ /dpa' bo chen po
76b1(mdo sde): yang dag gsung / /yang dag chos la rab tu gnas/ /mgon po yang dag bden gnas te/ /yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung / /khyod kyi smon lam btab pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi yang dag
76b2(mdo sde): spyod pa byung / /yang dag de yi rgyu 'dra bas/ /yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung / /yang dag spyod pa phun sum tshogs/ /yang dag mtha' la shin tu bslabs/ /yang dag bsam pa yang
76b3(mdo sde): dag spyod/ /yang dag mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi shes rab mnyam pa med/ /ye shes gsung ba 'od mdzad pa/ /ye shes khyad par rab brnyes shing / /ye shes gsung
76b4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis byams pa rab bsgoms te/ /sems can kun gyi bshes gnyen khyod/ /ri rab bzhin du mi sgul te/ /mi g.yo rab tu gnas pa po/ /ston pa'i 'khor
76b5(mdo sde): tshogs rgya che yang / /tshogs mang dag kyang sdud par mdzad/ /shes rab zab mo bde bar gshegs/ /'khor gyi nang gshegs sgra yang sgrog /sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs
76b6(mdo sde): shing | |seng ge'i stabs su rnam par gshegs/ /khyod kyis mu stegs kun btul ba/ /seng ge yis ni wa rnams bzhin/ /dpa' bo ma dul dul mdzad pa/ /ma dul ba dag khyod
76b7(mdo sde): kyis btul/ /de dag mdza' sdug brtan gyur che/ /dbyer mi phyed cing legs par gnas/ /lta ba sna tshogs gnas pa yi/ /sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni/ /sdug dang
77a1(mdo sde): mi sdug med pa yi/ /bdag med chos ni khyod ston te/ /ma bslabs pa yi byis pa dag /log pa'i lam la spyod pa rnams/ /'dren pa gang nas gshegs
77a2(mdo sde): pa yi| |lam yang rab tu khyod kyis bstan/ /bdag tu 'dzin la su gnas pa/ /de dag sdug bsngal nyid la gnas/ /gang la sdug bsngal med pa yi/ /bdag med de dag mi shes
77a3(mdo sde): so| |'khrul pa med pa'i chos tshig khyod ston te/ /khyod la 'khrul pa mi rnyed 'jig rten mgon/ /khyod ni ma log pa yi tshig gsung ste/ /sdug bsngal mang thar mdzad la phyag
77a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /lha klu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig phrag /brgya stong mang po mkha' la 'khod pa rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi don ldan gsung thos nas/ /thams cad 'dren
77a5(mdo sde): la rab tu dga' ba skyed/ /tshig ni rab tu snyan cing bzang la 'thad/ /mnyen zhing 'jam la yid 'ong dus dang 'byor/ /gsung gi yan lag dpag tu med dang ldan/ /
77a6(mdo sde): phan byed skye bo mang po thar byed pa/ /sil snyan brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang / /lha yi dbyangs sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mchog /shin tu snyan pa dus gcig 'byor
77a7(mdo sde): gyur kyang / /bde gshegs gsung gcig gis ni zil gyis non/ /khu byug bya mang 'jam pa'i sgra 'byin dang / /kun la shin tu yid 'thad dbyangs snyan dag /bya tshogs
77b1(mdo sde): mang po thams cad sgra 'byin pa/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi char yang des mi phod/ /lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan pa dang / /sil snyan rol mo glu dbyangs 'jam pa dang / /pi wang rdza rnga rnga chen
77b2(mdo sde): dung gi sgra/ /de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod/ /khu byug ne tso ri skegs sgra rnams dang / /khrung khrung rma bya mi 'am ci yi sgra/ /sgra dbyangs yid 'ong snyan pa ci yod pa/ /de dag
77b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod/ /snyan cing mnyen la yid 'ong dga' ba dang / /shin tu mnyen la rab bsngags zhi ba'i tshig /dbyangs rnams thams cad dus gcig bsgrags pa bas//
77b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mchog dgar 'gyur yin/ /lha mi mi dbang lha ma yin rnams dang / /srid gsum sems can mtha' dag ci yod pa/ /'od byed rnams kyi 'od snang de dag
77b5(mdo sde): ni| |bde gshegs 'od zer gcig gis zil gyis non/ /bde gshegs sku ni me tog rgyas pa bzhin/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis sna tshogs spras shing brgyan/ /bsod nams
77b6(mdo sde): brgyas grub dag cing rnam par dang / /rgyal ba'i sku ni 'jig rten kun tu lhan/ /dung gi sgra dang 'khar rnga sgra snyan dang / /rnga'i sgra de bzhin kim pa la yi sgra/ /rab tu 'jam zhing
77b7(mdo sde): 'thad pa'i sgra de kun/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod/ /sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig stong gi sgra/ /sgra skad gsal zhing mnyen pa lha yi 'dra/ /lha dang lha mo'i sgra dbyangs
78a1(mdo sde): dgar 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod/ /khrung khrung rma bya ngur pa khu byug dang / /ngang pa ku nal rnam mang bya yi tshogs/ /
78a2(mdo sde): de dag sgra snyan dus gcig tshogs pas kyang / /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod/ /klu dang gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dang / /lha dbang tshangs pa lha yi bdag po'i
78a3(mdo sde): sgra| |srid gsum yid 'ong 'thad pa ci yod pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod/ /tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha yi dbang po dang / /nyi ma dang ni nor bu rin chen 'od/ /
78a4(mdo sde): kun gyi 'od ni rnam pa du ma dag /'od kun rgyal ba'i 'od kyis zil gyis non/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang shin tu rnam par dag /ye shes dag pa srid pa gsum na gos
78a5(mdo sde): pa med/ /mi dbang yon tan dbyig tshogs yon tan rin chen mnga'/ /rang byung yon tan thams cad kyis ni mnyam med mnyam/ /de ltar stobs bcu bden pa gsung la bstod
78a6(mdo sde): nas ni/ /gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dga' bas tshig smras pa/ /sangs rgyas gzhal med dpag yas la ni mchod pa yis/ /shAkya thub bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur cig
78a7(mdo sde): smra| |bde bar gshegs pas de yi spyod pa mchog mkhyen nas/ /mi dbang chags med ye shes mnga' ba 'dzum pa mdzad/ /stobs bcu sras kyi thu bo byams pas de zhus
78b1(mdo sde): te| |'dran pas gang gi slad du 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad/ /sa 'di dag kyang rnam pa drug tu yongs su g.yos/ /lha dang klu rnams mkha' la 'dug cing rab dga' ste/ /shin tu sems rangs
78b2(mdo sde): mgu bas sangs rgyas lta zhing mchis/ /bde gshegs zil gyis ma non de dag lung bstan gsol/ /skyes bu mchog gi ye shes gang la zhugs pa ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
78b3(mdo sde): dag gi sa ma lags/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad pa/ /ye shes rnam dag dpe med ye shes ma lus gsungs/ /shAkya'i seng+ge stobs bcu mnga' zhing rnam 'dren
78b4(mdo sde): pa| |rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes kyi yang pha rol phyin/ /'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang tha ba gti mug sel/ /rab tu 'od snang mdzad pa khyod la zhu ba lags/ /byang chub dam pa mchog
78b5(mdo sde): 'di rab tu 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /'dren pa khyod kyis bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed dang / /de las lhag par yang ni spyod pa rab tu spyod/ /gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di mdzad bstan du gsol//
78b6(mdo sde): ye shes dam pa mchog 'di rab tu 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /ston pas phyag dang zhabs kyang yongs su btang ba mdzad/ /sras dang btsun mo gnyen bshes rtsa lag phangs pa btang / /thub
78b7(mdo sde): pa 'dzum pa bstan pa 'di yi rgyu gang lags/ /rta dang ba glang dang ni shing rta rkang thang dang / /bran dang nor bu dngul dang mu tig khyod kyis btang / /spyod pa mchog spyod tshe ni khyod kyis ma
79a1(mdo sde): btang ba/ /rin po che dang nor rdzas dag ni gang yang med/ /srid pa gsum na ye shes dag ni mchog tu gyur/ /sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa rab tu
79a2(mdo sde): mkhyen/ /sems dang khams dang mos pa dag la'ang mkhas shing rig /gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan pa mdzad/ /mi yi gtso bo la ni gang gis mchod/ /gang gi don ni
79a3(mdo sde): rgya che yangs par 'gyur/ /spyod pa 'di yang su dag rab tu 'dzin/ /thub pa gang gi don du 'dzum 'di bstan/ /sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ /pad+ma bye ba 'dab ma bye bar ldan
79a4(mdo sde): gser gyi pad+ma shin tu 'od gsal ba/ /mdzes shing yid du 'thad pas las byung / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul rab che ba/ /rgyal ba'i thugs kyi sras po de la mchis/ /chos
79a5(mdo sde): smra ba yang mang po 'dir mchis te/ /'dren pa la ni de yi slad du zhu/ /rnga dang dung dang 'khar rnga sgra chen dang / /sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brdungs pa yi/ /de dag sgra ni nam mkha' 'di
79a6(mdo sde): las gda'/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni bsam mi khyab/ /khrung khrung ngang pa ka la ping+ka dang / /khu byug bya tshogs mang po 'dus pa yi/ /sgra dbyangs rab tu snyan pa phyung ba
79a7(mdo sde): yang | |de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod/ /gang gis sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rnams/ /sngon gyi bskal pa mang por bsnyen par bgyis/ /gang gis mi yi gtso bo
79b1(mdo sde): rab mchod na/ /su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan/ /ri mo gus pa mchog kyang bskyed nas ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar thob 'gyur zhes/ /gang gis rkang gnyis gtso la sngon
79b2(mdo sde): tshad zhus/ /su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan/ /stobs bcu ldan pa ji snyed 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon bde gshegs dang / /mi yi gtso bo thams cad rab tu mkhyen/ /
79b3(mdo sde): de phyir skye dgu'i don du zhu ba lags/ /srog chags kun gyi spyod yul mtha' yas dang / /mi rnams gang gi bsam pa ji 'dra dang / /skye dgu'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /
79b4(mdo sde): de phyir mi yi gtso la zhu ba lags/ /rgyu dang rigs pa 'dul la mkhas pa dag /sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar thob snyam pa/ /spyod pa mchog la su dag spyod pa rnams/ /de phyir
79b5(mdo sde): bdag ni rkang gnyis gtso la zhu/ /gang gis phra zhing shin tu blta dka'i chos/ /stong pa zhi ba mtshungs med bsam mi khyab/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyod yul bsgoms pa rnams/ /
79b6(mdo sde): de dag slad du 'dren pa bdag zhu'o/ /srog chags 'gro ba bsam yas kun gyi phyir/ /gang gis byams pa snying rje rab bsgoms shing / /gang la sems can 'du shes med pa
79b7(mdo sde): dag |de phyir rkang gnyis gtso la bdag zhu'o/ /gang dag ye shes mtshungs med bsam mi khyab/ /de dag la ni gzung ba yong med de/ /sems dang spyod yul dag gi pha rol
80a1(mdo sde): phyin| |de phyir mgon po la ni bdag zhu'o/ /tshul khrims ye shes yon tan pha rol phyin/ /dus gsum la ni ye shes mtshungs med 'jug /khyod la 'khrul
80a2(mdo sde): pa dag ni mi mnga' na/ /su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan/ /shA ri'i bu dang ma 'gags maud+gal bu/ /bde gshegs nyan thos gzhan gang su mchis pa/ /'di la de dag
80a3(mdo sde): ye shes mi 'jug ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul bla na med/ /chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin/ /bslabs pa'i spyod pa kun gyis mngon par 'phags/ /'dren
80a4(mdo sde): pa thugs rje dag kyang rab bskyed la/ /don dam mkhyen pa gsung sgra dbyung bar gsol/ /sngon gang bskal pa bye ba mang por yang / /skyabs dang dpung gnyen mchog tu gyur snyam
80a5(mdo sde): ste| |de 'dra'i sems kyis rkang gnyis gtso dris pa/ /'dren pas de yi 'bras bu deng gsung zhig /gang zag chen pos lung bstan mnyan pa'i phyir/ /gnod sbyin srin po grul
80a6(mdo sde): bum gsang ba po/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo la ni rab rtog cing / /thams cad thal mo sbyar te gus par 'khod/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po nas/ /byang chub sems dpa'
80a7(mdo sde): 'phrul ldan mang po mchis/ /bde gshegs sras kyi gtso bo thugs las skyes/ /thams cad thal mo sbyar zhing gus pas 'khod/ /shAkya seng+ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir/ /mi
80b1(mdo sde): 'khrugs zhing phyogs 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /shar phyogs nas ni spos kyi glang po yang / /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mdun bdar mchis/ /shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i
80b2(mdo sde): phyir| |bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog nas/ /mthu chen thob dang spyan ras gzigs dbang yang / /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig lhan cig mchis/ /gang dag sngan chad
80b3(mdo sde): bskal pa bye mang snyed/ /ye shes dam pa mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /rgya mtsho kun gyi bye ma mnyam pa yi/ /bde gshegs dpag tu med pa bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /sangs rgyas
80b4(mdo sde): kun gyis bstod cing rab bsngags pa/ /chos rnams kun gyi yon tan pha rol phyin/ /'jig rten phyogs rnams kun tu rab grags pa/ /'jam dbyangs legs par thal mo sbyar
80b5(mdo sde): te mchis/ /sangs rgyas zhing du khrag khrig spyad bgyis kyang / /'di 'dra rnams ni mthong ba rnyed dka' ste/ /legs bslabs sangs rgyas sras po yon tan can/ /thams cad thal mo
80b6(mdo sde): rab sbyar gus par 'khod/ /ston pa kun gyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ /mkhas pa 'dir mchis ci 'dra de lta bu/ /snod du gyur pa 'di na gzhan ma mchis/ /'dren pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs
80b7(mdo sde): su brjod pa gsungs/ /rgyal ba rnam 'dren gleng gzhi ma mchis par/ /gang zag dam pa 'dzum pa mi ston na/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan pa/ /rnga mchog sgra ldan gsung
81a1(mdo sde): dbyangs dbyung du gsol/ /ngang pa khu byug rma bya sa ra sa/ /'brug gi sgra skad khyu mchog sgra 'byin bzhin/ /lha yi rol mo snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ /sems can
81a2(mdo sde): grol mdzad gsung gis lung ston cig / byams pa skyed cing dga' ba 'phel bar bgyid/ /ye shes ston cing ma rig sel ba ste/ /don la rtog cing shes rab 'phel bgyid cing / /
81a3(mdo sde): bskal ba khrag khrig bye bar rnam sbyong ba/ /rtogs pas nges bgyis dngos po rnam par bshig /sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i tshig don nges par ston/ /mu stegs kun gyi smra ba rnam
81a4(mdo sde): par 'joms/ /stong pa srog med sems can med pa sgom/ /bsod nams stong phrag brgya yis legs par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya yis 'dir spyad de/ /lha rnams
81a5(mdo sde): stong phrag brgya yis rab tu bstod/ /tshangs pa stong phrag brgya yis phyag kyang bgyis/ /gnod sbyin srin po grul bum dad bgyid de/ /klu dang lto 'phye 'dab bzang grol bar bgyid/ /
81a6(mdo sde): rtag tu ma chags shin tu ldan pa ste/ /las dge'i 'bras bus 'phags pa gsung phyungs shig /rgyal ba ji snyed mya ngan 'das pa dang / /gang dag ma byon pa dang bzhugs pa rnams/ /
81a7(mdo sde): thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen cing thogs mi mnga'/ /'dren pa yon tan kun gyis shin tu 'phags/ /'byung po 'dzin pa ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /sa 'di thams cad rnam pa
81b1(mdo sde): drug tu g.yos/ /lha yi tshogs rnams mkha' las me tog 'thor/ /lha yi spos ngad yid du 'ong ba ldang / /'dod chags zhe sdang rab rib ma lus bsal/ /tshul khrims yongs dag
81b2(mdo sde): yid kyang yongs su dag / mtshan med rab tu zhi ba'i stong la dgyes/ /seng ge'i sgra skad sgrogs shig thugs rje can/ /spobs dang ldan zhing shin tu snyan pa yangs/ /rgyal ba'i shes rab
81b3(mdo sde): rdzogs shing ye shes rdzogs/ /thugs rje ldan pa khyod 'dra 'jig rten med/ /gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs/ /rma bya khu byug ka la ping+ka'i sgra/ /shang shang te'u'i sgra yang yid
81b4(mdo sde): 'ong ba/ /dga' 'gyur skad kun dus gcig tshogs pas kyang / /bde gshegs gsung gi char ni des mi phod/ /rnga dang rdza rnga 'khar rnga de bzhin te/ /dung dang gling bu de bzhin pi wang
81b5(mdo sde): dang | |sil snyan stong gi sgra rnams gcig tu 'dus/ /de dag bde gshegs sgra yi char mi phod/ /lha yi sil snyan dam pa stong gi sgra/ /lha yi bu mo glu dbyangs snyan pa dang / /rol
81b6(mdo sde): mo'i sgra rnams dga' ba skyed bgyid pa/ /de dag bde gshegs gsung gi char mi phod/ /'jig rten phan pa khyod kyi gsung gcig las/ /mos pa tha dad bzhin du sgra 'byung ste/ /rgyal
81b7(mdo sde): ba bdag la ston snyam so so sems/ /gang gi slad du khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad bstan/ /lha yi sgra dang de bzhin klu yi skad/ /mi 'am ci yi sgra snyan ci mchis pa/ /de dag nam yang nyon
82a1(mdo sde): mongs zhi mi bgyid/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni rtag tu nyon mongs sel/ /dga' ba skyed cing 'dod chags dga' ma lags/ /byams pa skyed cing zhe sdang blo ma lags
82a2(mdo sde): shes rab skyed cing gti mug blo ma lags/ /sangs rgyas gsung gis dri ma thams cad sel/ /'khor las slad rol tu ni sgra mi 'byung / /thams cad kyi yang nem nur brgya mang
82a3(mdo sde): gcod/ /mtho ba ma lags dma' ba ma lags pa/ /thub pa'i gsung ni snyoms shing bde ba ston/ /ri dang nags bcas sa 'di gas gyur cing / /rgya mtsho'i chu dag de bzhin bas
82a4(mdo sde): gyur la/ /zla ba nyi ma sa la lhung gyur kyang / /rgyal bas bshad pa rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur/ /tshig gi yan lag thams cad dag pa'i gsung / /seng ge'i sgra skad 'jam zhing mnyen
82a5(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bde gshegs thugs rje can/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad bstan du gsol/ /'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi/ /'jig
82a6(mdo sde): rten sems can ji snyed kun gyi yang / /sems dang spyod pa kun la rab tu mkhas/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol/ /rgyal ba ji snyed su dag thugs rje can/
82a7(mdo sde): dbang dang ye shes kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /dri med zla zhal rgyal ba de dag ni/ /rtag tu rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod kyang mtshungs med pa/ /gang+gA'i
82b1(mdo sde): bye snyed yon tan brjod bgyis kyang / /yon tan dag gi tshad brjod mi nus pa/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol/ /'dzum pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar bka' stsal pa/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid
82b2(mdo sde): kyis| |mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas bstod/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag 'phags brjod pa/ /rtag tu khor mor shin tu bsngags par 'gyur/ /sngon yang rgyal
82b3(mdo sde): po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong / /rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du 'dis/ /ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di yang rab tu dris/ /byang chub spyod
82b4(mdo sde): pa mchog 'di spyad pa na/ /'di ni kun tu nga yi bur gyur te/ /thams cad du yang spobs dang ldan par gyur/ /kun tu rtag par tshangs par spyod pa spyad/ /de ni phyi dus 'jigs pa
82b5(mdo sde): chen po la/ /'di la ma pham khyod nyid nga yi dpang / /rtag tu tshangs spyod gtsang la gnas nas ni/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di shin tu rgyas byed 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni rab 'tshol
82b6(mdo sde): zhing | |lam 'dir zhugs pas byang chub des thob 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mang pos yongs bzungs te/ /'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mchog byed 'gyur/ /nga ni ye shes la yang
83a1(mdo sde): rab gnas te/ /zla 'od spyod pa khyad zhugs lung bstan cing / /'di yi srog dang tshangs par spyod pa dag /phyi ma'i dus la bar chad med par bya/ /lag
83a2(mdo sde): mthil skyu ru 'bru lnga bkod pa bzhin/ /ma 'ongs pa na gang la mchod 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas bye ba dag ni phrag stong dang / /de las lhag par gang+gA'i bye snyed shes/ /lha dang
83a3(mdo sde): klu rnams bye ba brgyad cu dang / /gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag bdun cu dag /phyi ma'i dus la brtson pa byed par 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo la yang mchod pa byed/ /rkang gnyis
83a4(mdo sde): gtso la mchod pa mchog byas te/ /ye shes bla med 'di ni rab bsgrubs nas/ /phyi ma'i dus la de ni 'jig rten mgon/ /rgyal ba dri med 'od ces bya bar 'gyur/ /zla 'od
83a5(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas bdag nyid kyi/ /lung bstan 'di thos dga' bas rgyas gyur te/ /ta la bdun srid du ni mngon 'phags nas/ /mkha' la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa
83a6(mdo sde): brjod/ /e ma rgyal ba chos mchog ston mdzad pa/ /rnam grol ye shes bdag po stobs la gnas/ /shin tu nges pa'i ye shes mchog gnas pas/ /pha rol rgol ba
83a7(mdo sde): dag gis zil mi non/ /chags pa spangs shing rnam par grol la reg /dngos po rnam bshig srid par chags mi mdzad/ /khyod la spros pa mtha' dag kun mi mnga'/ /
83b1(mdo sde): srid pa gsum la chags med ye shes 'jug /spros pa thams cad kyis kyang mi gos shing / /lta ba spros pa mtha' dag rab tu spangs/ /lam yang shin tu bsgoms shing gnas med
83b2(mdo sde): pa| |zil gyis mnon su dang mi 'phrod med/ /khyod ni khams gsum dag la gnas med de/ /chu bo dang ni mdud pa thams cad spangs/ /srid pa'i 'khri shing 'ching ba mtha' dag
83b3(mdo sde): bcad/ /srid pa spangs shing srid par mtshams sbyor med/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen cing / /brjod du med pa'i tshig kyang thugs su chud/ /mu stegs phyin ci
83b4(mdo sde): log la gnas pa dag / mi mkhas de bzhin seng+ges wa bzhin bshig /bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos kyi gter/ /gter mchog dam pa bdag gis deng thob ste/ /ngan
83b5(mdo sde): 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad spangs/ /'dren par mi 'gyur snyam pa'i the tshom med/ /gser gyi kha dog mdzes shing 'od gsal ba/ /phyag brkyang de yi mgo la rab bzhag nas/ /lhar
83b6(mdo sde): bcas 'jig rten dag kyang dpang bkod de/ /mi yi khyu mchog byang chub dbang bskur mdzad/ /'dzum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// //de
83b7(mdo sde): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad
84a1(mdo sde): srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya bar 'dod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' zhing bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa 'di la sems can rnams
84a2(mdo sde): rab tu dgod par 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang
84a3(mdo sde): bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod par bya/ kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la yang rgya
84a4(mdo sde): cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni ngan
84a5(mdo sde): song thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa/ nad thams cad las rab tu thar par byed pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams
84a6(mdo sde): cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di thos shing bzung ste bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
84a7(mdo sde): d pa' chen po de sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa la sems can
84b1(mdo sde): rnams rab tu 'god de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang myur du thob bo/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom
84b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /
84b3(mdo sde): sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa dran pa ni/ /bde gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshan bstan pa la/ /dge slong mkhas pa chos smra byung ba yang / /de yi ming ni tshangs pas byin zhes bya/ /nga ni blo
84b4(mdo sde): gros zhes bya rgyal po'i bu/ /na bar gyur te mi bzad sdug bsngal tshor/ /de tshe tshangs pas byin pa chos smra ba/ /nga yi slob dpon du ni gyur pa yin/ /nga ni sman pa lnga brgya mi nyung ba/ /
84b5(mdo sde): brtson pa'i yid kyis nad dpyad gso bar byed/ /nga yi nad ni gso bar ma nus nas/ /nga yi gnyen bshes kun kyang sdug bsngal gyur/ /nga yang na bar dge slong des thos nas/ /nad
84b6(mdo sde): dri bar ni nga yi drung du 'ongs/ /tshangs byin nga la brtse ba rab bskyed nas/ /ting 'dzin mchog 'di de tshe bshad par gyur/ /nga ni ting 'dzin dam pa 'di thos nas/ /'phags pa'i dga'
84b7(mdo sde): bzang zing med pa skyes/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab shes pas/ /nga yang de yi dus na nad las sos/ /mar me mdzad ni spyad pa spyod pa na/ /dge slong chos smra mkhas par gyur pa
85a1(mdo sde): yin| |nga ni blo gros rgyal po'i bur gyur te/ /ting 'dzin ye shes kyis ni nad las thar/ /de bas gzhon nu khyod kyis phyi dus na/ /yongs su nyams pa 'di
85a2(mdo sde): dag rjes dran zhing / /byis pas nyes par brjod pa'i tshig bzod gyis/ /ting 'dzin 'di yang gzung la legs par lhogs/ /phyi ma'i dus la dge slong mang po dag /brkam zhing gtum
85a3(mdo sde): la ma bsngams 'byung bar 'gyur/ sdig la dga' zhing lhung bzed chos gos chags/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /rgod cing dbang po g.yengs pa phrag dog can/ /
85a4(mdo sde): grong la chags shing rnyed pa 'dod pa dag /sbyor ba byed pa'i skabs la rtag tu gnas/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /lag pa dang ni rkang pa rnam par rdob/ /rtse 'jo
85a5(mdo sde): rgod la rtag par rab tu zhugs/ /gcig la gcig ni mgul 'khyud lag kyang sbrel/ /grong du spyod lam gzhan du sgyur bar byed/ /mi rigs sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ste/ /
85a6(mdo sde): gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu chags/ /gzugs kyis rgyugs shing 'dun pa bor ba yin/ /grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor kun tu rgyu/ /de dag bza' dang btung la rab tu
85a7(mdo sde): zhugs/ /glu dang bro gar de bzhin rol mo dang / /nyo 'tshong lhag par byed cing rtag tu brtson/ /btung ba dag la chags shing ngo tsha bor/ /mi rigs brtson pa spring yig skur bar
85b1(mdo sde): byed| |tshul khrims de bzhin lam dag btang nas ni/ /khyim pa dag dang bsten cing khrims dral nas/ /de dag tshul zhig log par shin tu gnas/ /las gang sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag
85b2(mdo sde): smad pa/ /srang dang tshad la g.yo sgyu byed par zhugs/ /de 'dra'i sdig pa nyon mongs las byas pas/ /las ngan byed pa de dag ngan song 'gro /dung dang gser dang nor bu nor mang dang / /khyim
85b3(mdo sde): dang gnyen bshes rnam spangs rab byung ste/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas/ /sdig pa'i las rnams shin tu spyod par byed/ /nor dang 'bru la snying por 'du shes shing / /
85b4(mdo sde): bzhon dang ba lang shing rta rnams la chags/ /gang la bslab pa'i nan tan med pa rnams/ /de dag gis kyang ci phyir mgo bo bregs/ /ngas ni sngon tshe spyod pa spyad pa na/ /bskal pa stong du
85b5(mdo sde): shin tu dka' spyad de/ /nga yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di btsal na/ /de dag de tshe 'di thos gad mos 'debs/ /de dag yun ring brdzun smra tshangs mi spyod/ /rtag tu rnyed la dga' zhing ngan song
85b6(mdo sde): gzhol/ /tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa de ni chos min smra/ /de dag phan tshun dbye ba'i phyir 'jug ste/ /rigs pa ma yin pas ni rnyed pa 'tshol//
85b7(mdo sde): gcig la gcig ni mi snyan rab brjod de/ /shi 'phos nas ni ngan song sar yang 'gro/ de dag brgya dang stong gi nang na yang / /de tshe bzod pa'i stobs ldan shin tu dkon/ /de phyir 'thab
86a1(mdo sde): la brtson pa mang po 'byung / /bzod pa spangs nas rab tu spros pa byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' nged yin tshig tu smra/ /de yi sgra yang phyogs dang phyogs su
86a2(mdo sde): 'gro| mi bden sgra yi dregs pas de rgyags te/ /tshul khrims nyams la byang chub ga la yod/ /gang la bsam pa rnam par dag med cing / /chos 'di la yang bzod pa med pa dang / /
86a3(mdo sde): chos rnams spong byed byang chub 'di thob pa/ /ngas ni ma thos nam yang yong ma mthong / /de dag 'jigs shing skrag nas khyim spangs te/ /rab tu byung nas shin tu dam du 'dzin/ /
86a4(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa'i theg pa spangs byas nas/ /bye brag lhag par 'dod pa brlag par 'gyur/ /shes rab dman zhing yon tan rnam spangs pa/ /theg pa mchog gi nyes pa rtag tu
86a5(mdo sde): brjod/ /gang gi skyabs su de dag rab zhugs pa/ /de nyid la yang nyes pa brgya dag brjod/ /'tsho ba med pa mang po rab byung ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rnam pa kun mi 'dod/ /byis
86a6(mdo sde): pa de dag bdag tu lta la gnas/ /stong pa nyid ni thos nas skrag par 'gyur/ /phan tshun du yang rtsod pa byas nas ni/ /gnod sems khong khro tha ba rab tu skyed/ /phan tshun du yang
86a7(mdo sde): skur ba mngon 'debs shing / /sdig pa byas nas shin tu dga' ba rnyed/ /gang dag tshul khrims gnas shing yon tan ldan/ /byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod rtogs pa/ /
86b1(mdo sde): mnyen zhing des la shin tu bsdams pa rnams/ /de dag de tshe yongs su brnyas par 'gyur/ /gang la shin tu gtum sems ldan 'byung dang / /mi bzad ma rungs ngan pa'i las byed pa/ /
86b2(mdo sde): chos ma yin pa spyod cing 'thab la dga'/ /de dag de yi dus na mchod par 'gyur/ /bsgo bar bya zhing rab tu go bar bya/ /gzhon nu nga la dad pa'i phyir 'brang na/ /bde bar gshegs
86b3(mdo sde): pas bstan pa 'di dran nas/ /de dag la ni nam yang yid mi rton/ /de dag 'dod chags che zhing zhe sdang che/ /gti mug che zhing nga rgyal dregs pas rgyags/ /lus kyang ma dul ngag kyang
86b4(mdo sde): ma dul zhing / /sems kyang ma dul ngan song gzhol ba yin/ /nga ni yon tan dag gi bsngags brjod na/ /dge slong yon tan dag la mi spyod de/ /tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi 'gyur/ /
86b5(mdo sde): nan tan lhur byed byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /sngon byung ba'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// //de nas gtam 'di mthar phyin par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
86b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pa de ltar 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhus pa/ ri yi rgyal po bya rgod phung po ste/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas gnas par
86b7(mdo sde): bde gshegs bzhud/ /'jig rten sgron ma der yang gshegs nas ni/ /khyod la bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
87a1(mdo sde): d pa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la yid kyis tshigs su bcad
87a2(mdo sde): bas btang ba/ ri yi rgyal por rgyal ba mngon gnas par/ /ma pham bdud rnams pham byas khyod song zhig /der ni 'gro ba kun gyi don chen yang / /bla na med pa myur du grub
87a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la
87a4(mdo sde): yid kyis phyag btsal/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'khor de nas byung ste sangs rgyas mu med pa rgya mtsho'i bye ma snyed kyi gnas ri'i rgyal
87a5(mdo sde): po bya rgod kyi phung po mchod rten chen po gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir de'i mod la ri'i rgyal po bya
87a6(mdo sde): rgod kyi phung po mnyam zhing yangs pa rgya che ba/ sdong du ma dang / tsher ma dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing kho ra khor yug kun rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis
87a7(mdo sde): brlabs te/ sa gzhi rin po che an+da rnyil 'bar ba bsam gyis mi khyab la dpe med pa'i lha'i rgyan thams cad dang rin po ches brgyan pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs
87b1(mdo sde): med pa du ma'i bkod pas rab tu spras pa/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas khyim gyi nye 'khor brgyan cing spud de/ bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs nas ni bdug pa 'thul bar byas
87b2(mdo sde): phreng ba dang lda ldis ni brgyan/ me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra dbyangs ni bsgrags/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lhab lhub bsgreng bas ni gang / khyams kyi dkyil 'khor
87b3(mdo sde): du ni bla re bres/ 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus su ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i lha'i seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul te/ rgyu spun las ma byas pa'i gos ni bting / ka tsa lin+da ltar
87b4(mdo sde): 'jam zhing reg na bde ba dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas ni g.yogs/ steng du snying po beg tsher ni bting / snam rten mtha' gnyis dmar po ni bshams/ chu zheng dang 'phang du
87b5(mdo sde): dpag tshad tsam yod pa btsugs te/ zhabs rten ni lha dang mi'i las 'das pa/ dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa/ ras rin po che bcos
87b6(mdo sde): bus g.yogs pa/ seng ge'i khri la btags pa'i lha'i rin po che'i dril bu las ni sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba gsal bar 'byung / phyogs kun tu ni nor bu rin po che chen pos
87b7(mdo sde): snang bar gyur/ rin po che'i gdugs chen po rtsa ba ni bai DUR+ya dri ma med pa'i rin po che chen po las byas par mngon par sprul to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
88a1(mdo sde): p o byams pas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po khor yug dang bcas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i bkod pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan
88a2(mdo sde): pa mngon par sprul nas skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du zhugs par gyur to/ /zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag byas te/ bcom ldan
88a3(mdo sde): 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stan la 'dug go / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ri yang lha rdzas yangs shing rgya che ba/ /rin chen rdo steng bzang zhing dga' ba dang / /
88a4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab lha rdzas yid kyi khyams/ /dbus su rin chen seng+ge'i khri yang btsugs/ /lha rdzas gdugs las yid 'ong sgra 'byung zhing / /phyogs su nor bu rin chen 'od cher
88a5(mdo sde): 'byung / /rtsa ba yid du 'thad pa'i bai DUR+ya/ /ma pham rgyal ba'i sras pos de ltar sprul/ /ri yang rin chen sna tshogs rnam par bkra/ rin chen gdan mchog rgyang grags tshad tsam
88a6(mdo sde): du| |byams pa dpa' bos de dag rab sprul nas/ /skad cig de nyid la ni khyim du zhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po rgya mtsho lta bu la chos kyi gtam yang dag par
88a7(mdo sde): bstan te/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas/ yang dag par btsud de gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so/ /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu
88b1(mdo sde): 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgor byung nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gang na yod pa der gshegs te byon pa dang / byams pas sprul pa'i khyams gang
88b2(mdo sde): na yod pa der gshegs te byon nas byams pas mngon par sprul pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis ni yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
88b3(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
88b4(mdo sde): mi ma yin pas ni phyag byas te 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang na chos ston to/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thams cad lhags par gyur pa rnams dang /
88b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig mang po dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa
88b6(mdo sde): thogs nas rol mo ni byed/ pheg ni rdob/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan ni sgreng / phreng ba chen po dbul ba ni thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
88b7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po zhi ba'i sgo nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri gang na yod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
89a1(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma
89a2(mdo sde): dang | na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas mchod pa chen po byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gus pa dang ldan
89a3(mdo sde): ri mo dang ldan par chos dri ba'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
89a4(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
89a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa
89a6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phye'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
89a7(mdo sde): la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig / de skad ces bka' stsal te go skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
89b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol
89b2(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
89b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
89b4(mdo sde): shing 'grogs na bde ba yin/ dul zhing dul ba'i sa thob pa yin te/ de pha rol gyis gshes sam/ spyos pa'i tshig nyes par smra zhing / nyes par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod
89b5(mdo sde): cing mi mjed pa'i rang bzhin can yin/ las la lta zhing nga rgyal bcom pa dang chos 'dod pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ chos dang po 'di dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89b6(mdo sde): chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag cing
89b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang / tshul khrims la skyon med pa dang / tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur pa dang / tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul
90a1(mdo sde): khrims mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'bags pa dang / tshul khrims mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims dang / mkhas pas
90a2(mdo sde): bstod pa'i tshul khrims pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ chos gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
90a3(mdo sde): yang | gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum la sems skrag pa dang / sems dngangs pa dang / skyo ba dang / don du mi gnyer cing mngon par
90a4(mdo sde): mi dga' ba dang / ma chags ma zhen pa dang / khams gsum la yid skyo bas khams gsum las gzhan du sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams thar bar bya'o zhes brtson zhing
90a5(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par sgrub pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
90a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad cing chos yongs su 'tshol bas mi ngoms pa yin/ mang du
90a7(mdo sde): thos shing 'jigs pa med pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos lhur byed pa yin te/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lhur byed pa ma yin/ shes kyi khe lhur byed pa ma yin/ phan pa'i dngos po
90b1(mdo sde): sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis chos ji skad du thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa gzhan la rgya cher 'chad cing rab tu ston pa yin te/ shes kyi khe 'dod pas ni ma yin gyi/ ci nas
90b2(mdo sde): sems can 'di rnams chos 'di dag thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam pa ste/ gzhon nu/ chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan
90b3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu/ chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
90b4(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
90b5(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gzhon nu/ rnam grangs 'dis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'di ltar sangs rgyas mang pos bshad pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos yang dag
90b6(mdo sde): par rab tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bstod pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po'i drung du nga rab tu byung nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam
90b7(mdo sde): pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgya cher mnyan te bzung ngo / /dris shing bcangs so/ /bklags so/ /bton to/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas bsgoms shing mang du
91a1(mdo sde): byas so/ /gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gyis sangs rgyas mang po nges par brjod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon
91a2(mdo sde): byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ dran pa bskal pa gzhal med dpag
91a3(mdo sde): yas na/ /rgyal ba dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra byung ste/ /bde gshegs dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra de yi/ /tshe tshad lo yang brgya phrag drug cur gyur/ /de yi pha rol sangs rgyas
91a4(mdo sde): gzhan byung ba/ /mi mchog mtshan ni ye shes dbang phyug ste/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo yi shes dbang phyug gi /tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bcu gnyis so/ /ye shes dbang
91a5(mdo sde): phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /gzi brjid dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo gzi brjid dbang phyug gi /tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag drug cu bdun/ /gzi brjid dbang
91a6(mdo sde): phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /blo gros dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo blo gros dbang phyug gi /tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshang / /blo gros dbang
91a7(mdo sde): phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i dbang phyug gi /tshe yi tshad ni lo khri bzhi stong gyur/ /tshangs pa'i
91b1(mdo sde): dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /me yi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo me yi dbang phyug gi /tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong gyur/ /me yi dbang phyug
91b2(mdo sde): pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal de yi/ /tshe yi tshad ni nyin zhag bdun du gyur/ /tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha
91b3(mdo sde): rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi /tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshang / /tshogs kyi dbang phyug pha
91b4(mdo sde): rol sangs rgyas ni/ /dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi /tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag dgur tshang / /dbyangs kyi dbang phyug
91b5(mdo sde): pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /dbyangs kyi zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi zhal gyi yang / /tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag bcur tshang / /dbyangs kyi zhal gyi pha rol
91b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ni/ /zla ba'i zhal zhes bya ba'i rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo zla ba'i zhal gyi ni/ /tshe yi tshad kyang nyin zhag gcig tu gyur/ /zla ba'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /nyi ma'i
91b7(mdo sde): zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo nyi ma'i zhal gyi yang / /tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag bco brgyad do/ /nyi ma'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba'i
92a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal gyi yang / /tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag nyi shu'o/ /tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i snyan
92a2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i snyan pa yi/ /tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bco brgyad gyur/ /bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas 'di dag dang / /'jig rten rnam
92a3(mdo sde): par 'dren pa nyis brgya byung / /zil gyis mi non de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /mtshan rnams 'dir yang brjod kyi mnyan par gyis/ /mtha' yas dbyangs dang rnam par grags pa'i
92a4(mdo sde): dbyangs/ /rnam par bsgrags pa'i gzi brjid rnam grags sgra/ /sgra skad rnam grags sgra dbyangs mchod pa dang / /dbyangs kyi yan lag dpa' dang dbyangs dag dang / /ye shes
92a5(mdo sde): stobs dang ye shes bye brag 'gro / zil gyis ma non ye shes yang dag 'phags/ /ye shes 'od 'phro ye shes mngon par 'phags/ /ye shes rnam grangs de bzhin ye shes
92a6(mdo sde): dpa'/ /tshangs pa'i stobs dang tshangs nor tshangs pa'i mchog /tshangs pa'i lhar bcas de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /tshangs pa'i dbang phyug tshangs pa'i mi dbang spyan/ /tshangs
92a7(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dbyangs yan lag tshangs pas byin/ /gzi brjid stobs dang gzi ldan gzi brjid mchog /gzi brjid dbang phyug gzi brjid mngon par 'phags/ /gzi brjid khyab dang
92b1(mdo sde): gzi brjid shin tu nges/ /gzi brjid sgra dbyangs shin tu rnam grags gzi/ /'jigs btsan stobs dang 'jigs btsan blo gros dang / /shin tu 'jigs btsan 'jigs zhal 'jigs
92b2(mdo sde): btsan 'phags/ /'jigs btsan 'od 'phro 'jigs mchog 'jigs pa'i dbyangs/ /'jig rten rnam 'dren rgyal ba 'di dag byung / /sgra dbyangs zab mo dang ni dpal 'dzin dang / /rnam dag
92b3(mdo sde): sgra yi dbang phyug tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /mtha' yas dbyangs dang shin tu rnam grol dbyangs/ /bdud kyi stobs dang bdud rnams skrag byed dang / /spyan bzang dang ni zhal gtsang spyan
92b4(mdo sde): dag dang / /rnam par dag pa'i spyan dang mtha' yas spyan/ /kun nas spyan dang rnam par grags pa'i spyan/ /spyan gyis zil gyis gnon dang ma smad spyan/ /dul mchog dul dang shin
92b5(mdo sde): tu dul ba'i sems/ /dul rab zhi ba'i dbang po zhi ba'i yid/ /zhi ba'i bla ma zhi dpal rab tu zhi/ /zhi ba'i pha rol phyin dang zhi bar dpa'/ /bla mar gnas pa zhi ba dul bar sems/ /
92b6(mdo sde): shin tu dul dang zhi dbang zhi ba'i yid/ /zhi ba'i bla ma zhi ba'i dpal 'bar ba/ /zhi ba rab zhi dbang phyug zhi bar dpa'/ /tshogs dbang tshogs gtso tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / /
92b7(mdo sde): tshogs rnams zil gnon tshogs bzang ye shes gtsang / /tshogs kyi dbang chen tshogs dbang dpa' bo dang / /gzhan yang tshogs bzang rab rtu rnam pa 'byed/ /chos kyi rgyal
93a1(mdo sde): mtshan de bzhin chos kyi tog / chos kyi bram chos kyi rang bzhin 'phags/ /chos kyi stobs ldan chos bzang dpa' bo dang / /rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa
93a2(mdo sde): byung | |rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges par ni/ /mtshan gcig pa yang bye phrag brgyad cu ste/ /bskal pa gnyis la 'dren pa 'di dag byung / /byang chub phyir ni 'di dag ngas mchod
93a3(mdo sde): de| |rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams gang dag nyan byed cing / /thos nas rnam par grags pa'i mtshan 'dzin na/ /de dag myur du ting 'dzin 'di thob
93a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i
93a5(mdo sde): le'u 'di zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la rgya cher rgyas par rab tu bstan to/ /sangs rgyas 'di dag gi yang pha rol na/ /bskal pa bsam yas dpag tu med pa'i tshe/ /lha mis mchod
93a6(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas gzhan zhig byung / /de yi mtshan ni mi dbang dbyangs zhes bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi dbang dbyangs kyi ni/ /tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong ste/ /nyan
93a7(mdo sde): thos dag ni bye ba brgya phrag gsum/ /de yi 'dus pa dang por gyur pa yin/ /mngon shes drug ldan gsum rig dbang po thul/ /mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/ /
93b1(mdo sde): zag pa zad pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa/ /'od mdzad kyi ni dge 'dun de tshe byung / /bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs byung ste/ /blo gros zab
93b2(mdo sde): cing grags pa shin tu che/ /mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur/ /mngon par shes pa thob cing spobs par ldan/ /stong pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud/ /zhing ni bye bar de
93b3(mdo sde): las lhag par yang / /gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du 'phrul gyis 'gro /rkang gnyis gtso la dri ba dris nas ni/ /phyir yang rgyal pa de yi drung du 'ong / /mdo sde sgrub pa'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas/ /snang
93b4(mdo sde): bar gyur pa sa yi steng na rgyu/ /sems can don phyir spyad pa rnam spyod de/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po mthu chen ni/ /'dod pa'i rkyen gyis sdig pa mi byed de/ /de dag la ni lha yang
93b5(mdo sde): smon pa skyed/ /srid pa'i 'gro bar mi gnas don mi gnyer/ /mnyam gzhag bsam gtan gnas pa'i spyod yul can/ /rnam par nges pa'i don ldan 'jigs med pa/ /dri ma med
93b6(mdo sde): bar rtag tu tshangs par spyod/ /tshig kyang rgyun mi chad cing spobs par ldan/ /nges tshig bstan pa'i tshig gi don la mkhas/ /sangs rgyas sras po kun tu yang dag ston/ /dge ba'i
93b7(mdo sde): las rnams kyis kyang yongs su bzung / /bskal pa mtha' yas par ni spyod pas 'phags/ /'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bstod cing bsngags/ /rnam par thar dang don tshig yang
94a1(mdo sde): dag ston/ /tshul khrims shin tu dag cing nyon mongs med/ /chu yis pad+ma bzhin du mi chags te/ /khams gsum las ni rnam grol bag yod pa/ /'jig
94a2(mdo sde): rten chos brgyad dag gis mi gos shing / /lus kyang rnam dag las kyang yongs su dag /'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes mthu yang che/ /chags pa med cing sangs rgyas yon tan
94a3(mdo sde): gnas/ /sems can kun gyi rten dang dbung gnyen te/ /tshig tsam ma yin nan tan snying por byed/ /gang la gnas pa de nyid gzhan la ston/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang
94a4(mdo sde): yongs su bzung / /rgyal ba rnams kyi mjed 'dzin thugs brtan pa/ /khams gsum thams cad la yang skrag pa'i yid/ /rab tu sems zhi rtag tu dgon par spyad/ /'jig
94a5(mdo sde): rten 'dren pa rnams kyis byin brlabs pas/ /mdo sde bye ba phrag stong 'chad par byed/ /'chad pa de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/ /'jig rten dag gi tshig kun rnam
94a6(mdo sde): spangs te/ /stong pa nyid la mos shing don dam ston/ /bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho bzhin/ /mang du thos shing mkhas pa shes rab ldan/ /gzhon nu bskal pa bye
94a7(mdo sde): ba mang por ni/ /rgyun chad med par bsngags par brjod kyang / /de ni cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs gcig po bzhin/ /de tshe mi yi dbang
94b1(mdo sde): po'i dbyangs de ni/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di ston te/ /stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di yang / /lha dang klu rnams kyis ni gang bar gyur/ /de yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di
94b2(mdo sde): bshad tshe/ /sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ /lha dang mi rnams gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /sangs rgyas ye shes la ni mi ldog gnas/ /der yang mi dbang rgyal po byung ba ni/ /dpal gyi stobs
94b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba mthu che ba/ /de la bu yang brgya phrag lnga yod de/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug /rgyal po de yi btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ni/ /bud med bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu
94b4(mdo sde): yod| |sa bdag rgyal po de yi bu mo yang / /bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang pa byung / /de yang ston zla tha chung nya ba la/ /yan lag brgyad ldan gso sbyong bzung nas ni/ /bye ba khrag
94b5(mdo sde): khrig brgyad cu lhan cig tu/ /'jig rten gtso bo'i drung du nye bar 'ongs/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhabs la phyag btsal te/ /rgyal ba de yi spyan sngar rgyal po 'dug /rgyal po de yi lhag
