94b6(mdo sde): pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rkang gnyis dbang pos bshad/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal po des thos nas/ /rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin du kun spangs te/ /gnyen
94b7(mdo sde): dang rtsa lag sdug pa yongs btang nas/ /rgyal ba de yi drung du rab tu byung / /bu yang brgya phrag lnga dag rab byung ste/ /de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor dang sras mo dang / /gnyen bshes
95a1(mdo sde): rtsa lag mang po gzhan dag kyang / /bye ba khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa drug byung / /bu dang chung mar bcas pa rab byung nas/ kha zas sgrub pa'i sa yang bor nas
95a2(mdo sde): ni| |rgyun ma chad par lo brgyad bar du bcags/ /'chag cing 'greng bzhin 'chi ba'i dus kyang byas/ /rgyal po'i glang po ting 'dzin sems dpa' de/ /rtag par rab tu mnyam
95a3(mdo sde): gzhag dus byas pas/ /de'ang rgyal po'i pho brang der skyes te/ /mngal gyi dri mas ma gos brdzus te byung / /de yi pha ni brtan pa'i stobs zhes bya/ /blo gros che zhes bya ba mar gyur
95a4(mdo sde): te| |gzhon nu btsas ma thag tu tshig smra ba/ /'jig rten mgon po de nyid bzhugs sam ge /'jig rten mgon pos bdag gi sems mkhyen nas/ /de phyir bdag la zhi ba'i
95a5(mdo sde): ting 'dzin bshad/ /rkyen rnams med cing rkyen dang bral ba yang / /srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams ni gcig tu bstan/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya gang / /mdo sde bye ba
95a6(mdo sde): khrag khrig byung ba dag / byang chub sems dpa'i nor ni bla med pa/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /lus kyang gtsang zhing de bzhin ngag gtsang ba/ /sems
95a7(mdo sde): gtsang de bzhin lta ba gtsang ma dang / /dmigs pa rnams las yang dag 'da' ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /chud mi za ba'i 'bras bu chos bstan
95b1(mdo sde): pa| |lam mchog yan lag brgyad ldan sgom pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs dang phrad cing shes rab rno/ /bden la 'jug dang rtag tu chos shes pa/ /phung po yongs shes khams rnams
95b2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid/ /skye mched rnam pa kun tu bsal ba ste/ /skye ba med pa mngon sum 'jug pa dag /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /so so yang dag rig pa bzhi la 'jug /yi ge
95b3(mdo sde): thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes dang / /dngos por 'jug pa las ni 'da' ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /dbyangs rnams yongs su shes shing dga' ba thob/ /bde
95b4(mdo sde): gshegs bsngags pa la'ang dgar gyur cing / /'phags pa dag gi tshul 'jam drang po yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /des pa nam yang khro gnyer mi byed cing / /
95b5(mdo sde): mnyen zhing 'jam pa bzhin yang 'dzum pa ste/ /sems can mthong nas sngon du smra ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /le lo med cing bla ma'i ri mo byed/ /srid zhu che
95b6(mdo sde): bas phyag 'tshal sdug par lta/ /skye ba dag gis chog shes dkar ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /'tsho ba dag cing de bzhin dgen gnas dang / /sbyangs pa dag la
95b7(mdo sde): gnas shing dran mi nyams/ /phung po dang ni khams la mkhas pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /skye mched mkhas shing mngon shes ye shes dang / /nyon mongs bsal
96a1(mdo sde): ba dul ba'i sa rnams dang / /gsang sngags mang po thams cad 'chad pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba kun las 'da' ba
96a2(mdo sde): dang | |skye ba dran zhing chos la ne ma nur med/ /chos la sems shing thos pa 'tshol ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /khyad par 'gro zhing rtag tu sgom la 'jug /ltung
96a3(mdo sde): ba dag la mkhas shing 'byung bar gnas/ /de la gnas pas bag la nyal ba sel/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /gang las ye shes rno ba'i mchog 'byung ba/ /mi
96a4(mdo sde): g.yo ri bo bzhin du mi sgul ba/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan dang gzungs kyi sgo/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /rtag tu dkar po'i chos rnams yongs 'tshol zhing / /
96a5(mdo sde): sdig pa'i chos rnams khor mor rnam par spong / /rtag tu nyon mongs phyogs rnams rgyu ba med/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /bslab pa kun la rtogs par khong
96a6(mdo sde): du chud/ /mkhas pa ting 'dzin gnas pa rtogs par rig /sems can dag gi bsam pa shes pas skul/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu chos kyang ston/ /khyad par shes pa
96a7(mdo sde): skye ba shes pa dang / /mtha' yas shes pa shin tu rdzogs par shes/ /'gro ba kun du mtshams sbyor shes pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /khyim gyi
96b1(mdo sde): gnas spangs rab tu 'byung ba'i sems/ /khams gsum la yang mi dga' mi 'dzin cing / /sems rnams rab tu 'dzin cing dag 'byed pa/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /
96b2(mdo sde): skyob pa chos rnams la yang ma chags shing / /rtag tu chos kyi mchog kyang yongs su 'dzin/ /las kyi rnam par smin la brtan mos pa/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /
96b3(mdo sde): 'dul ba la yang mkhas shing rnam smin shes/ /de bzhin 'thab cing rtsod pa nye bar zhi/ /'thab pa med cing rtsod pa med pa'i sa/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /bzod
96b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag 'dzin cing khro med gnas/ /chos la rnam par nges shing rtag tu mkhas/ /tshig rnams rab tu 'byed la ye shes mthong / /thugs rje bskyed nas chos rnams ston pa
96b5(mdo sde): mdzad/ /sngon gyi mtha' shes phyi ma'i mtha' shes te/ /bde gshegs bstan las dus gsum mnyam pa nyid/ /'khor gsum dag ni yongs su chad par gsungs/ /rgyal ba chos
96b6(mdo sde): kyi bdag po de skad ston/ /sems kyang rab tu gnas shing rtse gcig dang / /lus kyang rnam par gnas dang 'phags pa'i sa/ /spyod lam dag kyang rtag tu bsrung ba yi/ /chos ni
96b7(mdo sde): skyes bu byu mchog thub pa ston/ /khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing mdzes pa dang / /'jig rten shes pa rigs pa'i tshigs rnams gsung / /chos rnams 'byung ba srog chags rang bzhin
97a1(mdo sde): dang | |byang chub dam pa mchog gi chos kyang ston/ /rjes su phan gdags pa dang khrel yod dang / /mi dge ba yi sems la smod pa dang / /sbyangs pa rjes su
97a2(mdo sde): mi gtong bsod snyoms spyod/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /khrel yod po che shes pa rtag tu spyod/ /bla ma la yang gus smra ldang ba dang / /thog ma nyid nas
97a3(mdo sde): nga rgyal tshar bcad par/ /chos rnams rgyal ba chos rje de ltar ston/ /sems ni ldang ba nas kyang sems dge ste/ /ye shes khong du chud cing rtogs par byed/ /mi shes phyogs
97a4(mdo sde): rnams rtag tu rnam par spong / /byang chub mchog gi chos rnams ston pa mdzad/ /sems la 'jug pa dang ni sgra shes pa/ /nges pa'i tshig la 'jug cing don rtogs dang / /gnod pa
97a5(mdo sde): thams cad rtag tu rnam spang bar/ /rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de ltar ston/ /skyes bu dam pa rtag tu yang dag bsten/ /skyes bu ngan pa dag ni rnam par spang / /rgyal ba la yang rtag
97a6(mdo sde): tu dad cing dga'/ /chos mchog rgyal pa de ltar ston pa mdzad/ /btags pa dang ni brda dang tha snyad dang / /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams ni rtag par spang / /rnyed dang ma rnyed pa
97a7(mdo sde): la zhum pa med/ /chos kyi dam pa rgyal bas de ltar bstan/ /bkur sti rnyed kyang mtshar du mi bzung zhing / /bkur sti ma byas na yang btang snyoms bzhag /yang dag bsngags pas
97b1(mdo sde): nam yang rlom sems med/ /'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /gshe zhing smod pa thams cad bzod par bya/ /khyim pa kun dang lhan cig mi bsten cing / /rab tu byung ba dang
97b2(mdo sde): yang 'grogs mi bya/ /rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de skad ston/ /spyod yul ma yin thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul la ni rab tu gnas/ /spyod pa phun sum tshogs
97b3(mdo sde): shing dul ba'i sems/ /chos kyi tshul 'di bde bar gshegs pas bshad/ /byis pa'i chos rnams rtag tu rnam par spang / /rigs sun pa yang thams cad spang bar bya/ /sangs
97b4(mdo sde): rgyas bstan pa rtag par yongs su bsrung / /chos kyi bdag po rgyal ba de skad ston/ /smra ba nyung zhing rab tu 'brel la snyan/ /gzhan dag la yang tshig 'jam dge bar smra/ /phas kyi
97b5(mdo sde): rgol ba chos dang ldan pas 'dul/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /dus su 'gro ste dus la ma bab min/ /so so'i skye bo kun la yid mi brtan/ /sdug bsngal reg kyang yi mug
97b6(mdo sde): med par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /dbul po mthong na nor dang ldan par bya/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong na brtse ba bskyed/ /phan pa'i dngos la rtag tu gdams
97b7(mdo sde): par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /chos kyi sems can rnams la phan gdags shing / /'jig rten zang zing rtag tu gtang bar bya/ /bsags par mi bya srung bar mi
98a1(mdo sde): bya ste/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /tshul khrims bsngags shing tshul khrims 'chal pa smad/ /g.yo sgyu med cing tshul khrims ldan la bsten//
98a2(mdo sde): nor la mi gnas bdog pa thams cad gtong / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma gnyer ba dang / /ji skad smras pa de bzhin thams cad bya/ /
98a3(mdo sde): chos smra ba yang mi chad bsten par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /ri mor bcas shing rtag tu yid dgar bya/ /zhi ba'i lta bas khor mor gnas par bya/ /sngon
98a4(mdo sde): spyod rnams la rtag par shin tu nges/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /dge ba'i spyod par rtag tu sngon du 'gro /'du shes bzlog dang dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang / /
98a5(mdo sde): mtshan ma spang ba la yang thabs mkhas pa/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /mdo sde sgrub pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang / /bden pa bstan pa'i tshig la gdon mi za/ /
98a6(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mngon du byed/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /mgo gcig tu ni tshig rnams brjod par bya/ /ji lta bzhin du mthong zhes rtogs par
98a7(mdo sde): mkhas/ /rtag tu tshig la the tshom med par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos kyang rtag tu bsten/ /'jigs pa med cing tshul khrims stobs
98b1(mdo sde): la gnas/ /ting 'dzin gnas kyis mnyam par 'jug par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /shes kyi khe 'dod phyir ni yong mi bstan/ /sems kyang gya gyu can du mi bya
98b2(mdo sde): ste| |lta bar byas pa thams cad rnam par spang / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /spobs pa mchog dang gzugs kyang dam pa ste/ /ye shes snang ba pha rol mtha'
98b3(mdo sde): ma med/ /gsang sngags byin rlabs rigs par spobs pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /lam 'di sgom bdag ni tshul gyi sgo/ /bstan pa 'di la spyad nas nan
98b4(mdo sde): tan dang / /tshul dang gdams pa rjes su bstan pa bzang / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa sangs rgyas bsngags/ /bzod la gnas pas
98b5(mdo sde): nyes pa rnam par spang / /ye shes la yang gnas nas mi shes spang / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /ye shes rten yin de bzhin rnal 'byor sa/ /byang chub zhugs pa'i
98b6(mdo sde): rnal 'byor dbang phyug ste/ /skyes bu dam pa rtag par bsten pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /mi rigs brtson pa 'khor mor rnam par spang / /sangs rgyas sa ni de bzhin
98b7(mdo sde): gshegs pas bshad/ /mkhas pa kun gyis rjes su yi rang ba/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /byis pa mi shes pas ni spangs pa ste/ /'di ni nyan thos mang po'i sa ma
99a1(mdo sde): yin| |byang chub sems dpa' dag gis rtag tu bzung / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su 'brang / /lha rnams kyis
99a2(mdo sde): kyang mchod cing ri mor byas/ /tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong yi rang ba/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba ston mdzad dam/ /nam mkha' lding dang gnod sbyin mi'am ci/ /klu yang stong gis rtag
99a3(mdo sde): tu phyag byas pa/ /byang chub dam pa rgyal bas gsungs pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /shin tu mkhas pas rtag tu yongs thob ste/ /nor mchog dam pa yang
99a4(mdo sde): ni legs par rnyed/ /zang zing med pa'i ye shes gso ba mchog /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba bshad mdzad dam/ /ye shes mdzod yin spobs pa mi zad pa/ /'di ni mdo sde bye bar
99a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa ste/ /khams gsum yongs shes yang dag shes pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba bshad mdzad dam/ /gang la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ /'di ni pha rol 'gro
99a6(mdo sde): ba'i gzings su bstan/ /'di ni chu bo rgal ba'i gru yin te/ 'di ni snyan grags bsngags phreng 'phel bar byed/ /gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs
99a7(mdo sde): pa rnams la bstod pa yin/ /skyes bu khyu mchog la yang bsngags pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mi zad yon tan tshul/ /gang dag la ni ting 'dzin 'di bshad pa/ /'di
99b1(mdo sde): ni zhe sdang zhe bar byams pa bstan/ /'di ni snying rje can gyi btang snyoms sa/ /'di ni grags pa chen po'i dbugs 'byin pa/ /seng ge'i sgra sgrogs rnams kyi nan tan te/ /'di las sangs
99b2(mdo sde): rgyas/ ye shes mchog kyang 'byung / /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya ste/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dren bdag gis bshad/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba rgyal bas bshad pa 'di/ /thams cad
99b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed/ /'di ni byang chub rab zhugs spyod pa ste/ /bdud kyi sde rnams shin tu skrag par byed/ /rgyal bas ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ /skyob pa chos la
99b4(mdo sde): gnas pa'i rig sngags 'di/ /dgra yi nang du srung ba dam pa ste/ /phas kyi rgol ba chos kyis tshar gcod pa/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten byas na/ /'di ni spobs pa'i sar yang
99b5(mdo sde): rab tu bstan/ /stobs dang rnam thar de bzhin dbang po dang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams bco brgyad bye brag 'phags/ /stobs bcu rnams kyang yongs su 'tshol ba ste/ /sangs rgyas
99b6(mdo sde): ye shes kyi yang snga ltas so/ /skyes mchog 'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtse bas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'ang yin/ /sangs rgyas dag gi sras kyis 'di bzung ste/ /
99b7(mdo sde): 'di ni rnam thar 'dod pa'i lam du bstan/ ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di thos nas/ /de la bde gshegs sras po dga' bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su rdzogs
100a1(mdo sde): pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa 'tshol ba 'di/ /rnam dag sems gtsang nyon mongs med pa yis/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten par gyis/ /
100a2(mdo sde): rgyal ba bzhin du de yi lus dag ste/ /rna par thar dang ye shes rnam grol mthong / /'dod chags 'ching bas rtag tu nyon mi mongs/ /ting 'dzin bzang po 'di la brten par gyis/
100a3(mdo sde): zhe sdang sa min gti mur bral ba ste/ /bde ba 'dod pa'i ye shes 'byung ba yin/ /rig ba skye zhing ma rig 'jig pa ste/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten par gyis/ /rnam grol
100a4(mdo sde): snying por byed pa ngoms par bshad/ /bsam gtan pa la ting 'dzin zhi 'di bstan/ /sangs rgyas ma smad pa yi spyan yin te/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten par gyis/ /'di
100a5(mdo sde): ni zhing mang ston pa'i mngon par shes/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul te/ /ting 'dzin 'di nyid sgom par byed pa la/ /gzungs de rnams kyang rnyed par dka' mi
100a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi ba'i gnas/ /'di ni byin rlabs mtha' yas ston pa ste/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bsnyen par byed pa yi/ /ye shes phra zhing yangs pa rnam par
100a7(mdo sde): dag| gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ma thos/ /mi rig brtson pas 'di ni rtogs mi 'gyur/ /yi ge thams cad rnam par bzlog pa ste/ /dbyangs kyis rnam par go bar nus ma yin/ /
100b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rig pas 'di shes te/ /chos kyi bdag pos ji ltar gang bshad pa/ /ting 'dzin 'di la brten par byed pa yi/ /zhi ba dag dang smad pa med pas rtogs/ /brtson 'grus brtsams
100b2(mdo sde): pas rab tu 'di bzung ste/ /bsnyen bkur byas shing rtag tu legs par bcangs/ /ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen par byed pa ni/ /sdug bsngal zad cing skye ba 'gog pa shes/ /chos rnams kun gyi
100b3(mdo sde): skye ba med pa bstan/ /de ltar srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad na/ /sangs rgyas grags chen dag gis ye shes mchog /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal pas bshad mdzad dam/ /gzhon nu de yis tshigs
100b4(mdo sde): bcad 'di thos nas/ /khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad rnams/ /dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro bzod pa der thob ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes las ni mi ldog gnas/ /brtan pa'i stobs
100b5(mdo sde): kyis gzhon nu de la smras/ /da dung 'jig rten mgon po de bzhugs so/ /khye'u khyod la don 'di dri bar bya/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni khyod kyis su las thos/ /gzhon nus smras pa rgyal po
100b6(mdo sde): gsan du gsol/ /bdag gis bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas ni/ /bye ba khrag khrig mthongs te ri mor bgyis/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang bdag gis dris/ /gzhan yang bskal pa dgu
100b7(mdo sde): bcu rtsa dgu dang / /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong du/ /de dang der bdag skye ba dran par gyur/ /nam yang mngal du skyes par ma gyur to/ /de nas bdag gis ting 'dzin 'di
101a1(mdo sde): bsgoms te/ /rgyal ba de dag 'chad pa dag par thos/ /thos nas bshad pa la yang mos bskyed de/ /ne ma nur med pas byang chub reg par bgyi/ /dge slong
101a2(mdo sde): su dag bdag la kun 'dri zhing / /ting 'dzin 'di la yongs su chud bgyid pa/ /de la bdag ni gus par ri mor bgyid/ /'jig rten don mdzad dag la bgyis bzhin/ /su las
101a3(mdo sde): bdag gis tshigs bcad gcig tsam yang / /lung mnos rjes mthun spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /de dag la yang bdag ni ston pa snyam/ /sangs rgyas bzhin du gus pas ri mo bgyid//
101a4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin yongs su chub par bgyid pa 'di/ /su dag la la bdag la 'dri ba yang / 'jig rten 'dren pa rgyal bar mi 'gyur bar/ /rmi lam na yang bdag la the tshom med/ /
101a5(mdo sde): dge slong rgan rabs bar ma gzhon nu la/ /bdag ni ri mo gus dang ldan bar bgyid/ /ri mor ldan pas bdag gi snyan pa dang / /de bzhin bsod nams grags pa yon tan
101a6(mdo sde): 'phel/ /'thab cing rtsod pa dag la brtson mi bgyid/ /de tshe bdag ni brtson pa chung bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa bgyis pas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gyur/ /dge ba bgyis pas 'gro ba
101a7(mdo sde): gzhan du 'gyur/ /mi rigs brtson par sbyor zhing ma bsngags pa/ /de dag gi ni mi snyan tshig thos nas/ /de tshe bdag gir bgyi ba las su 'dzin/ /las rnams bgyis pa rnam
101b1(mdo sde): par chud mi za/ /de la khro ba'i dbang du mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i bzod pa'i stobs 'dzin te/ /'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bzod pa bsngags/ /bzod pa bsgoms pa byang chub
101b2(mdo sde): rnyed mi dka'/ /bdag kyang rtag tu tshul khrims ldan par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims la yang gzhan dag rab tu 'god/ /tshul khrims bsngags pa rtag tu bdag brjod de/ /de na bdag
101b3(mdo sde): gi tshig kyang btsun par gyur/ /dgon pa'i bsngags pa dag kyang rtag tu brjod/ /tshul khrims la ni rtog bar rab gnas te/ /rtag tu gso sbyong dag kyang 'dzin du stsal/ /de dag
101b4(mdo sde): byang chub la yang yang dag btsud/ /de dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag bstabs/ /chos dang don rnams la yang rab tu gnas/ /gang la mtha' dang chags pa 'di med pa/ /byang
101b5(mdo sde): chub lam la de dag sad par bgyis/ /bdag dran bskal pa 'das pa'i dus shig na/ /rgyal ba sgra yi yan lag dbyangs byung ste/ /de yi spyan sngar bdag gis dam bcas pa/
101b6(mdo sde): bdag ni rtag tu bzod pa'i stobs ldan bgyi/ /yi dam bcas pa de la gnas nas ni/ /lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu phrag bzhir yang / /bdag la bdud kyis shin tu smad cing
101b7(mdo sde): spyos/ /'on kyang bdag gi sems ni yong ma 'khrugs/ /der ni bdud kyis bgam zhing sad na yang / /bdag gi byams bzod brtan par 'tshal nas ni/ /sems dang
102a1(mdo sde): bdag gi rkang la phyag 'tshal te/ /lnga brgya byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs/ /bdag ni rtag tu ser sna med par gyur/ /gtong ba'i bsngags pa dag kyang khor
102a2(mdo sde): mor 'chad/ /phyug cing nor ldan bdag nyid chen bor gyur/ /mu ge'i tshe yang bdag nyid sbyin bdag gyur/ /dge slong su dag ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin cing / /su dag klog cing su dag
102a3(mdo sde): lung nod pa/ /de dag la ni bdag kyang bsnyen bkur bgyid/ /de dag thams cad mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /bdag ni bla na med pa'i las de yis/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po
102a4(mdo sde): mang po mthong / /rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang rab byung ste/ /rtag tu chos smra ba ni mkhas par gyur/ /sbyangs pa la yang rtag tu bdag brtson te/ /bas mtha' dgon pa la yang 'khor mor
102a5(mdo sde): gnas/ /kha zas phyir ni tshul 'chos mi bgyid de/ /ngan ngon tsam dag gis kyang chog shes gyur/ /bdag ni rtag tu phrag dog ma mchis te/ /bdag ni khyim la'ang chags par mi
102a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /khyim la chags pa dag ni phrag dog skye/ /phrag dog ma mchis nags dgon dpa' bar bgyid/ /bdag ni rtag tu byams la gnas par gyur/ /gshe zhing sdigs
102a7(mdo sde): kyang khro ba mi skyed de/ /byams pa la yang gnas pa des pas yi/ /snyan pa'i phreng ba phyogs bzhir rab tu mched/ /rtag tu cho ga shes 'dod pa nyung bar gyur/ /dgon par gnas
102b1(mdo sde): shing sbyangs pa'i yon tan brtson/ /bsod snyoms len bdag kyang mi gtong ste/ /sbyangs pa la yang yi dam brtan par gyur/ /rtag tu dang bar bcas shing dad par gyur/ /khor mor
102b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa mang / /dad pa mang pa'i phan yon 'di lags te/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing dbang po mnyams gyur/ /gang dag 'chad pa de la bdag gnas te/ /bdag ni
102b3(mdo sde): rtag tu nan tan snying por bgyid/ /nan tan snying por bgyid la lha klu yang / /rab tu dad pa'i sems kyis ri mor bgyid/ /yon tan ji snyed brjod pa 'di dag dang / /gzhan yang
102b4(mdo sde): rnam pa du ma mang po yod/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rtogs par su 'dod pa/ /mkhas pa 'di dag rtag tu bslab par bgyid/ /'di bas ches mang dka' ba spyad pa ni/ /sngon gyi
102b5(mdo sde): bskal pa du mar mang spyad dran/ /da ltar de dag brjod par mi nus kyi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du da mchi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rno mkhas des/ /de yi mod
102b6(mdo sde): la mngon shes lnga thob nas/ /de yang srog chags bye ba brgyad cu dang / /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rgyal ba'i drung du song / /brtan pa'i stobs kyang mchog tu dga' rangs nas/ /de tshe bye ba
102b7(mdo sde): brgya phrag drug cu dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nyer lhags te/ /zhabs la phyag btsal nas ni spyan sngar 'dug /rgyal po de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/ /rkang gnyis
103a1(mdo sde): dbang pos ting 'dzin 'di bshad de/ /rgyal po des kyang ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/ /rgyal srid btang ste ma chags rab tu byung / /rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin
103a2(mdo sde): 'di la sgom/ /klog cing 'chad de rab tu ston par byed/ /bskal pa drug cu 'das pa'i 'og tu de/ /pad+ma bla ma zhes bya rgyal bar gyur/ /rgyal po lhan cig rgyal ba'i drung 'ong ba/ /
103a3(mdo sde): bye ba brgya phrag drug cu mi nyung ba/ /de dag kyang ni ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/ /de tshe dga' zhing mgu bas rab tu byung / /de dag rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin 'di/ /bzung zing bklags
103a4(mdo sde): te rab tu ston par byed/ /bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu 'das nas ni/ /bskal pa gcig la byang chub mchog reg ste/ /mtshan ni ye shes bla ma mtha' yas pa/ /lha mis
103a5(mdo sde): mchod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams su gyur/ /de la rkang gnyis gtso bo re res kyang / /sems can gang+gA'i bye snyed grol bar byas/ /byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyod pa na/ /nga ni rgyal
103a6(mdo sde): po dpal gyi stobs su gyur/ /nga yi bu dag lnga brgya yod pa yang / /rjes su chos rnams skyong ba 'di dag yin/ /de tshe gang su nga yi mar gyur pa/ /de ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid
103a7(mdo sde): yin te/ /bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang ba yis/ /nga yi bu mo de kun mya ngan 'das/ /stobs brtan zhes bya rgyal po gang byung ba/ /rab tu mdzod mang 'khor los bsgyur
103b1(mdo sde): ba'i mchog/ de tshe rgyal po zas gtsang de yin te/ de dang der yang nga yi yab tu gyur/ /de ltar ngas ni bskal pa bye stong du/ le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa yis/ /byang chub
103b2(mdo sde): mchog 'di yang dag sgrub pa na/ /ting 'dzin yongs su 'tshol ba rnam par dag /gzhon nu de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang / /ting 'dzin 'di la sgom par 'dod pa dag /brtson 'grus
103b3(mdo sde): brtsams shing srog la mi lta bar/ /gzhon nu rtag par nga yi rjes su slobs/ /sangs rgyas mang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// //de
103b4(mdo sde): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa
103b5(mdo sde): dang | kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cer rab tu ston pa de la yon tan
103b6(mdo sde): gyi phan yon bzhir rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams zil gyis mi non par 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ ye shes dpag
103b7(mdo sde): tu med par 'gyur/ spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par
104a1(mdo sde): byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'dod pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de la yon tan
104a2(mdo sde): gyi phan yon 'di bzhi yod par rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba/ /ting 'dzin zhi
104a3(mdo sde): ba 'di bzung na/ /rtag pa'i dus su bsod nams kyang / /shin tu zil gyis mi non 'gyur/ /byang chub spyod pa bye brag 'phags/ /mchog tu dag pa spyod pa na/ /dpa' bo rtag pa'i
104a4(mdo sde): dus su yang / /bsod nams dag gis bsrungs par 'gyur/ /de la phas kyi rgol ba dag /su yang 'tshe bar yongs mi byed/ /rtag pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyis/ /yongs su bzung
104a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rtag pa'i dus su ye shes kyang / /dpag tu med par 'gyur ba yin/ /zhi ba'i rten 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /spobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi
104a6(mdo sde): ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /rtag tu bsod nams phung po zil mi no/ /byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod pa na/ phas kyi rgol ba med cing mi tshugs 'gyur/ /de yi ye shes yangs
104a7(mdo sde): shing rno bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin spobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/ /mig kyang dag 'gyur rtag tu mkhas pa de/ /dran pa'i stobs dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang 'byung / /don
104b1(mdo sde): gyi tshig rnams rab tu ston byed na/ /mkhas pa dag gi shin tu yid 'ong 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni rab bshad na/ /shes rab ldan pa skye bo mang pos rig /ting 'dzin zhi ba
104b2(mdo sde): mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /chos gos dam pa mchog dang mal cha dang / /mgron dug nyer dang bza' zhing bca' ba'ang rnyed/ /shin tu gzhon zhing blta na sdug par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin
104b3(mdo sde): zhi ba mchog 'di 'tshol ba na/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po mang po mthong / /'dren pa dag la mtshungs med mchod pa byed/ /de la bar chad dag kyang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin
104b4(mdo sde): zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /sems dga' tshigs bcad snyan pa brgya dag gis/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar bstod 'gyur te/ /de ni nyams par nam yang yong mi 'gyur/ /ting
104b5(mdo sde): 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /de yi mdun du 'jig rten mgon po ni/ /mtshan dang dpe byad mdzes pa'i sku bzhugs te/ /de yi ye shes nyams par yong mi 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin
104b6(mdo sde): zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /nam yang zhum pa'i sems su mi 'gyur te/ /rtag tu phyug cing dbul po ma yin 'gyur/ /sems kyang 'dzin cing chags par yong mi 'gyur/ /ting
104b7(mdo sde): 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /mi khom par yang gnas par mi 'gyur te/ /sa bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /de yi rgyal srid rtag tu bde bar 'ong /
105a1(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar ni bshad kyang mi zad de/ /ye shes yangs pa de la the tshom med/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i sa 'di thos nas ni/ /brtan pa ji ltar brtan pa de bzhin
105a2(mdo sde): gnas/ /bskal pa bye la mtha' yas dpag med du/ /stobs bcus de yi phan yon brjod na yang / /cha tsam du ni mongs su brjod mi 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs blangs pa
105a3(mdo sde): bzhin/ /de tshe gzhon nu de yang rab dga' pas/ /langs nas rab tu thal sbyar phyag btsal te/ /mgu rangs stobs bcu yi ni mngon sum 'dug/ tshig rab mchog gis ched
105a4(mdo sde): du rjod pa brjod/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /mi gtsos 'di dag ji tsam du/ /phan yon legs par rab bshad pa/ /dpa' bo chen po bsam mi khyab/ /phyi ma'i dus
105a5(mdo sde): na su dag ni/ /mdo sde 'di la nyan par 'gyur/ /phan par dgongs shing thugs brtse ba/ /dpa' bo chen po bdag la gsungs/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /ston pas
105a6(mdo sde): de la bshad mdzad de/ /bcom ldan chags med ye shes can/ /tshig kyang 'di skad rab tu gsung / /su dag chos kyi rjes slob cing / /mdo sde 'di ni nyan 'gyur ba/ /nan tan
105a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang / /gzhon nu bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab 'tshol bas/ /mi dbang dag la mchod byed cing / /byams pa'i sems la snyen byed
105b1(mdo sde): pa/ |mdo sde 'di ni nyan par 'gyur/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs/ /yon tan mchog la bsnyen byas shing / /nan tan la yang gnas nas su/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan par
105b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po'i bstan pa la/ /gang gis tshul khrims bshig pa dang / /sdig pa byed pa'i la gnas ni/ /mdo sde 'di yang thos mi 'gyur/ /dpa' bo tshangs par
105b3(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / /gang gi sems kyang mi brkam zhing / /sangs rgyas dag gis byin brlabs pa/ /de dag la gnas thos par 'gyur/ /gang gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag /'jig rten
105b4(mdo sde): mgon po ri mor byas/ /de dag lag nas mdo sde 'di/ /phyi ma'i dus na thos par 'gyur/ /gang dag tshe rabs snga ma la/ /mu stegs can du gyur ba ni/ /de dag mdo sde 'di thos na/ /
105b5(mdo sde): yid ni dga' zhing bder mi 'gyur/ /nga yi bstan pa 'di la ni/ /'tsho ba 'dod phyir rab byung nas/ /rnyed dang bkur stis zil gyis non/ /gcig la gcig kyang smod par byed/ /
105b6(mdo sde): dge slong dbang po ma bsdams pa/ /gzhan gyi bud med rab snyegs shing / /tshul khrims 'chal pa rnyed pa 'dod/ /mdo sde 'di la dad mi byed/ /sangs rgyas brnyes pa'i bsod
105b7(mdo sde): nams dang / /bsam gtan thob par mi 'dod cing / /bdag tu 'du shes gnas pa dag /mdo sde 'di la dad mi byed/ /phyi ma'i dus na 'byung ba ni/ /'jig rten bsam gtan
106a1(mdo sde): 'bras bur 'dzin/ /dgra bcom bsod snyoms zos nas kyang / /sangs rgyas byang chub smod par byed/ /dzam+bu yi ni gling 'di ni/ /mchod rten ci yod kun
106a2(mdo sde): bshig pas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs na/ /sdig pa 'di ni khyad par che/ /gang gis gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /dgra bcom dag ni bsad pa bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs
106a3(mdo sde): na| |sdig pa 'di ni khyad par che/ /mi bzad pa yi phyi dus la/ /dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab bshad par/ /khyed la su dag spro ba yod/ /de tshe gzhon nu
106a4(mdo sde): langs nas ni/ /du zhing rgyal la 'di skad gsol/ /sangs rgyas thugs kyi sras po yis/ /'di skad seng ge'i sgra yang bsgrags/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das/ /
106a5(mdo sde): mi bzad pa yi phyi dus la/ /lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste/ /bdag gis mdo sde rgyas par bgyi/ /byis pa rnams kyi mi bden pa/ /brgyad cing spyos pa bzod par bgyi/ /
106a6(mdo sde): gshe ba dang ni sdigs pa yang / /'dren pa dang du blang bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la/ /ngan sems dag ni bskyed pa'am/ /gang sngon bdag gis
106a7(mdo sde): sdig pa yi/ /las rnams bgyis pa byang bar bgyi/ /spyi bo la ni phyag bzhag ste/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/
106b1(mdo sde): zla 'od la ni ston pa gsung / /gzhon nu phyi ma'i dus dag la/ /khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa dang / /srog gi bar chad mi 'byung bar/ /khyod la byin gyis brlab par bya/ /chos smra ba na
106b2(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang / /brgyad brgya po dag langs nas ni/ /phyi ma'i dus la bdag cag kyang / /mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa lags/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin yang / /bye ba brgyad cu nyer lhags
106b3(mdo sde): te| |gzhan yang khrag khrig drug cu rnams/ /'jig rten mgon la 'di skad smra/ /dge slong dag ni 'di rnams las/ /de ring su dag langs pa rnams/ /phyi dus de tshe bdag cag gis/ /
106b4(mdo sde): 'dren pa rab tu bsrung bar bgyi/ /mdo sde 'di ni bshad pa'i tshe/ /ston pa yi ni byin rlabs kyis/ /gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /zhir rnams
106b5(mdo sde): ji snyed rab g.yos pas/ kun tu sangs rgyas sprul pa dag /'jig rten mgon pos rab bkye ste/ /de dag gis kyang chos rab bstan/ /zhing de so so re rer yang / /sems can bye ba
106b6(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab/ /de tshe de 'dra'i chos thos nas/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes bkod/ /sangs rgyas kyi yang zhing 'di nas/ /sems can bye ba dgu bcu rnams/ /byang chub kyi ni
106b7(mdo sde): sems bskyed de/ /sangs rgyas la yang me tog 'thor/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu na/ /bskal pa gcig la thams cad kyang / /rnam par 'dren pa nyid 'gyur zhes/ /de dag mi
107a1(mdo sde): gtsos lung bstan to/ /dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/ /dge bsnyen pa dang dge bsnyen ma/ /srog chags bye ba bdun cu drug /gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pa/ /
107a2(mdo sde): de dag mi gtsos lung bstan te/ /byang chub spyod par bskyod cing / /gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi/ /'jig rten 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab 'tshol bas/
107a3(mdo sde): thams cad la yang mchod pa byed/ /mdo sde bla na med pa 'di/ /de dang der yang thos par 'gyur/ /byams pa yi ni sangs rgyas la/ /bla na med pa'i mchod byas te/ /dam pa'i
107a4(mdo sde): chos mchog bzung nas ni/ /bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang na sangs rgyas rdul bral ba/ /tshe dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs/ /de la byang chub mchog gi phyir/ /mchod
107a5(mdo sde): pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /mdo sde dam pa 'di thos nas/ /ma 'ongs pa yi bskal pa ni/ /grangs med bdun cu rtsa gsum du/ /ngan 'gro rnams su yong mi 'gro/ /phyi ma'i dus
107a6(mdo sde): la su dag ni/ /mdo sde dam pa nyan 'gyur zhing / /'chang ngam klog par byed pa yang / /de dag kun gyis nga la mchod/ /ji snyed mdun na 'dug pa rnams/ /thams cad la yang
107a7(mdo sde): bsgo bya ste/ /ngas ni dka' bas thos pa yi/ /byang chub 'di yang yongs su gtad/ /ting nge 'dzin rjes su gtad pa'i le'u ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// //de
107b1(mdo sde): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi rang
107b2(mdo sde): bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa thos nas mi skrag par 'dod pa dang / mi dngang bar 'dod
107b3(mdo sde): pa dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par
107b4(mdo sde): bya'o| |sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su dri ba la mkhas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su btsal ba la mkhas par bya'o/ /
107b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas mi skrag /mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom
107b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ji lta bur na byang chub sems dpa'
107b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
108a1(mdo sde): chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur
108a2(mdo sde): ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu| byang chub sems dpa' sems
108a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang
108a4(mdo sde): ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas sgom par byed pa dang / mang du byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
108a5(mdo sde): ston na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
108a6(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na
108a7(mdo sde): mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i
108b1(mdo sde): tshig 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la nges par bstan pa na/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i
108b2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das las thos nas/ de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur bas chos thams
108b3(mdo sde): cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di rab tu thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa'ang mngon
108b4(mdo sde): par shes pa chen po thob par gyur to/ /sems can dpag tu med pa'ang snying rje chen por 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i sems skyes so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
108b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab
108b6(mdo sde): tu ldeg / 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur
108b7(mdo sde): 'ur| shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ mtha'
109a1(mdo sde): dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho zhing / snang ba dpag tu med pa'ang 'jig rten du byung / lha'i spos kyi char chen po'ang mngon par bab bo/
109a2(mdo sde): lha dang lha'i bu ji snyed chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus te lhags pa de dag nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge
109a3(mdo sde): 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon gyi tshig dpag tu med pa 'di dag thos nas lha dang lha'i bu de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skyes
109a4(mdo sde): nas a la la zhes gzhan sgrogs pa'i sgra byed do/ /lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bebs so/ /lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang rab tu rdung ngo /
109a5(mdo sde): brjod pa gcig pa'i dbyangs kyis tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /a la la/ bdag cag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las yon
109a6(mdo sde): tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa 'di dag thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag thams cad kyang gcig car mthun par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
109a7(mdo sde): chen po zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas ji ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
109b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyis kyang chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par bgyi'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das 'khor rgya mtsho'i
109b2(mdo sde): nang na chos ston pa la/ dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can zhes bya ba rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sil snyan lnga brgya dang bcas te nam mkha' las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
109b3(mdo sde): sngar 'dug go / de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang
109b4(mdo sde): na ji lta ba bzhin du rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /glu dbyangs dag ji ltar len pa de bzhin du deng lha'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
109b5(mdo sde): la'ang mchod pa'i phyir glu dbyangs rab tu sbyar ro/ /de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can sil snyan thogs pa lnga brgya po de dag dang sgra gcig tu sbyar te/ pi wang gi khog pa baiDUR+ya las
109b6(mdo sde): byas pa dag kyang thogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'dus
109b7(mdo sde): byas pas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa la mkhas pa thob pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam
110a1(mdo sde): par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo ba dang / dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can la'ang rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra la mkhas pa bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
110a2(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ngas bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan lnga brgya
110a3(mdo sde): po shin tu legs par sbyar pa/ legs par blangs pa de dag las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don dang ldan pa chos nyid dang ldan pa'i sgra byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam
110a4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo / /skra gcig khyon la sangs rgyas mang po ni/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ci yod snyed/ /rgyal ba de dag
110a5(mdo sde): zhing yang de snyed de/ /de dag mtshan nyid mi 'dra skal mi mnyam/ /skra yi khyon la 'gro ba lnga rnams te/ /sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror 'gro ba dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig
110a6(mdo sde): rten lha dang mi rnams zhugs/ /'dres pa med cing gnod par 'gyur ba'ang med/ /de yi gnas su mtsho dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /chu klung de bzhin mtshe'u dang lteng ka rnams//
110a7(mdo sde): 'dres pa med cing gnod par mi 'gyur te/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /de yi gnas su ri bo du ma ste/ /khor yug dang ni lhun po rab lhun dang / /btang zung dang ni
110b1(mdo sde): btang bzung chen po dang / /'bigs byed bya rgod phung po gangs kyi ri/ /gnas der sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa/ /tsha dang rab tu tsha ba nyams mi dga'/ /de na sems can dmyal skyes tshor
110b2(mdo sde): ba yi| |sdug bsngal de dag rjes su myong bar byed/ /de yi gnas na lha yi gzhal med khang / /de dag dpag tshad bcu gnyis dbyangs dga' ba/ /lha rnams stong phrag mang po de dag kyang / /lha
110b3(mdo sde): yi dga' ba shin tu bde ba myong / /de yi gnas su sangs rgyas rnams skye zhing / /'jig rten rig pa'i bstan pa 'bar ba snang / /gang gis rnam dag spyod pa ma sbyangs pa/ /ye shes bral ba
110b4(mdo sde): dag gis de mi mthong / /de yi gnas nyid na yang chos nub cing / /'dren pa mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang thos/ /de yi gnas nyid na yang la la yis/ /'dren pa bzhugs te chos kyang ston
110b5(mdo sde): ces thos/ /de yi gnas nyid na yang la la dag /tshe tshad lo ni bsam yas bzhugs snyam 'dzin/ /de yi gnas na'ang 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / /ring du mi 'tsho zhes ni sgra yang thos//
110b6(mdo sde): gnas der la la 'di snyam 'du shes te/ /yid kyi 'du shes dang ni 'dzin pa yis/ /bde gshegs mthong mchod sangs rgyas mnyes byas snyam/ /skyes pa med cing mchod pa byas
110b7(mdo sde): pa'ang med/ /mi dag bdag gi khyim na rmi lam bzhin/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' myong nas/ /phyir sad nas kyang de yis gdod ma mthong / /de ni rmi lam yin par de
111a1(mdo sde): yis shes/ /de bzhin mthong thos rig dang bye brag byed/ /'di dag thams cad mi bden rmi lam bzhin/ /gang gis ting 'dzin 'di yang thob gyur pa/ /des
111a2(mdo sde): ni chos kyi rang bzhin 'di dag shes/ /su la'ang sdug dang mi sdug med pa ni/ /mi de 'jig rten na yang bde skyid rtag /su dag nags khrod mngon par dga' ba yi/ /dge sbyong de
111a3(mdo sde): ni shin tu bde ba myong / /su dag ci la'ang bdag gir bya ba med/ /yongs su 'dzin pa rnam pa kun tu spangs/ /bse ru bzhin du 'jig rten 'di na gnas/ /nam mkha' la ni rlung
111a4(mdo sde): dag rgyu ba bzhin/ /lam rnams bsgoms shing ye shes rab tu zhugs/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa bdag med par/ /chos rnams 'di dag gang gis rab bsgoms pa/ /
111a5(mdo sde): de yi spobs pa dag ni mtha' yas 'gyur/ /su dag 'jig rten na ni yid chags med/ /de dag sems ni rtag tu rlung dang 'dra/ /sdug dang mi sdug la yang chags pa med/ /'jig
111a6(mdo sde): rten na ni mi de shin tu skyid/ /mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa sdug bsngal te/ /sdug ba dang yang bral ba sdug bsngal yin/ /mthar byas 'di gnyis rab tu spangs nas ni/ /mi gang
111a7(mdo sde): chos la dga' ba de dag skyid/ /gang zhig chos 'di thos nas chags byed cing / /chos ma yin pa thos nas khong khro byed/ /nga rgyal rgyags pas bcom pa log pa de/ /nga rgyal
111b1(mdo sde): dbang gis sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /su dag mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas te/ /rtag tu khengs pa med cing 'dud pa med/ /sdug dang mi sdug pa las rab grol ba/ /de dag rtag tu grol
111b2(mdo sde): yid legs par gnas/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag par rab gnas te/ /bsam gtan bsam mi khyab pa la rtag gnas shing / /su dag nags khrod zhi bar dga' ba ni/ /de dag nam
111b3(mdo sde): yang yid gnyis yong mi 'gyur/ /mi bden pa la su dag rab zhugs shing / /byis pa 'dod pa'i yon tan rtag tu dga'/ /bya rgod dag ni ro la mos pa bzhin/ /de dag rtag par bdud kyi
111b4(mdo sde): dbang du 'gro / yang pi wang gi sgra de las tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byung nas zla 'od gzhon nur rgyur pas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa zab mo nges par
111b5(mdo sde): rtogs pa la mkhas pa rjes su thob bo/ /dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can yang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /lha dang mi yi skye dgu sems can dpag tu med pa bla na med
111b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi'ang don byas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par
111b7(mdo sde): bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang
112a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
112a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad gdon mi za zhing tshul khrims shin tu yongs su
112a3(mdo sde): dag par bya'o/ /'du 'dzin med pa mang zhing sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang / yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang / chos
112a4(mdo sde): 'tshol ba la brtson pa dang / chos la don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' ba dang / chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la
112a5(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gzhon nu/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
112a6(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhan yang gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dod pa dang / myur
112a7(mdo sde): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas brtson 'grus brtsams shing lus dang srog la mi lta bar bya ste/ gang
112b1(mdo sde): snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag rgyun mi chad par yongs su btsal bar bya/ g.yo med pas bsnyen par bya/ bsten par
112b2(mdo sde): bya| rim gror bya ste/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag lhags pa'i bsam pas yongs su btsal nas kyang de dag las snying rje chen po la
112b3(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa
112b4(mdo sde): med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /gang las snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la dga'
112b5(mdo sde): ba dang gus pas ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su 'tshol ba dang / sri zhu bya ba dang /
112b6(mdo sde): g.yog bya ba la yid mi skyo bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
112b7(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /bde bar snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob bo/ /gzhon nu/ de lta bas na mgo dad gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du byas te rtag par dge ba'i
113a1(mdo sde): bshes gnyen yongs su btsal bar bya/ g.yo med pas bsten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ rim gror bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems
113a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khar las na/ snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
113a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ci smos/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba dang / sri zhu bya ba dang / g.yog bya ba la yid yongs su mi skyo bar bya'o zhes gzhon
113a4(mdo sde): nu khyod kyis rtag tu de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid shin tu brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur
113a5(mdo sde): gyur pa la sngon byung ba bstan pa tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /'das pa'i bskal ba bye ba mang po ste/ /dpag tu med cing gzhal
113a6(mdo sde): med bsam mi khyab/ /de tshe dbang tog rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes/ /'dren pa rkang gnyis gtso bo byung bar gyur/ /des ni ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad de/ /de la mi dang srog dang
113a7(mdo sde): gang zag med/ /sgyu ma chu bur smig rgyu glog 'dra zhing / /chos rnams thams cad chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /shi nas 'jig rten pha rol 'gro ba yi/ /sems can shed las skyes pa mi
113b1(mdo sde): dmigs kyang / /las rnams byas pa med par mi 'gyur te/ /dkar gnag ji bzhin 'bras bu smin par byed/ /rigs pa'i tshul gyi sgo 'di bzang po ste/ /phra zhing mthong dka' rgyal ba'i
113b2(mdo sde): spyod yul yin/ /gang la yi ge'i tshig kyang mi dmigs pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub nyid ni bcom ldan mkhyen/ /yangs pa'i gzungs dang ye shes bsags pa ste/ /mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig
113b3(mdo sde): rnams kyang 'byung / /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig spyod yul te/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bcom ldan rab tu 'chang / /'di ni na ba nad las thar byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpas bsgrubs pa'i
113b4(mdo sde): nor yin te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab tu bsngags/ /bye ba khrag khrig lha yis rab tu mchod/ /skye bo byis pa kun la yang dag ston/ /mu stegs can gyis rtag par
113b5(mdo sde): yongs su spangs/ /tshul khrims nor ni mchog tu sangs rgyas gsungs/ /nam mkha' la ni glog bzhin chags mi 'gyur/ /gang gis rgyal ba bye ba rab mchod cing / /sbyin dang tshul
113b6(mdo sde): khrims spyad pa mkhas pa dang / /sngan chad sdig pa'i grogs po spangs pa dag /de dag gi ni bla med pha rol nor/ /de na dge slong chos smra 'dug pa dag /tshangs par spyod pa bde
113b7(mdo sde): gshegs thugs kyi sras/ /rjes su mthun pa'i chos 'di thos nas ni/ /'jig rten 'dren par sems kyang bskyed par gyur/ /'dren pa dbang tog rgyal mtshan rgyal po yis/ /
114a1(mdo sde): chos smra de la yang ni tshig gsungs pa/ /dge slong dngos po mchog tu bya dka' yis/ /byang chub dam pa mchog la sems skyed cig /nor bu rin chen 'dra
114a2(mdo sde): par tshul khrims srungs/ /rjes su mthun pa'i grogs la rtag par sten/ /sdig pa'i grogs la nam yang ma bsten dang / /sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs thob/ /dbang po
114a3(mdo sde): tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i drung / /gang gis byang chub sems mchog bskyed pa ni/ /de dag thams cad chos smrar rab 'gyur te/ /tshangs par spyod pa bde gshegs thugs gyi
114a4(mdo sde): sras| |dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i le'u ste/ nyi shu pa'o// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bdun pa/ de nas yang
114a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang /
114a6(mdo sde): yon tan gyi chos thams cad la gdon mi za bar bya'o/ /'du 'dzi mang ba ma yin par bya'o/ /sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa
114a7(mdo sde): dang | yongs su dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang / chos yongs su 'tshol ba la brtson pa dang / chos la don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' ba dang / chos
114b1(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos dang chos kyi rjes su mthun pa la zhugs par bya'o/ /des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gang
114b2(mdo sde): las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la'ang des dga' ba dang gus pas ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge ba'i
114b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thams cad gdon mi za ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par blangs te gnas na de myur du spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa las nges par 'byung bar
114b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nem nur
114b5(mdo sde): dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom gyi mun pa sel ba'i phyir snang ba lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thams cad nges
114b6(mdo sde): bar bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i gtam gyi rgyud tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ sngon
114b7(mdo sde): byung dzam+bu'i gling zhes bya ba 'dir/ /g.yel ba med pa'i khye'u mchog gnyis byung ste/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la rab byung nas/ /bse ru bzhin du nags khrod stug por
115a1(mdo sde): gnas/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing bsam gtan bzhi rnams thob/ /snyan dngags bstan bcos mkhas shing rdzogs pa ste/ /bar snang gi ni rjes dang sa yang rig
115a2(mdo sde): de dag nam mkha' la yang thogs med 'gro / de dag nags khrod stug po bsil ba der/ /me tog sna tshogs yid du 'ong bas gang / /bya yang sna tshogs mang pos bsnyen pa der/ /phan
115a3(mdo sde): tshun du ni gtam dag rab tu smra/ /rgyal po ri dwags 'chor zhing song song na/ /sgra grags nas ni nags tshal der 'ongs te/ /rgyal pos chos smra de gnyis mthong nas ni/ /de la mchog
115a4(mdo sde): tu dga' ba nye bar bzhag / de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtam byas nas/ /de dag rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug pa dang / /rgyal po de yi dmag mang mtha' yas pa/ /bye ba khrag
115a5(mdo sde): khrig drug cu nye bar lhags/ /de nas chos smra de dag so so nas/ /rgyal po de la smras pa rgyal rigs nyon/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog tu rnyed par dka'/ /sa yi bdag po rtag tu
115a6(mdo sde): bag yod gyis/ /tshe ni rtag tu 'gro zhing mi gnas te/ /ri yi chu bo bzhin du myur du 'gro /nad dang mya ngan rga bas gzir ba la/ /khyod la dge ba'i lam 'dra skyabs gzhan med/ /
115a7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i glang po chos rnams bskyang bar gyis/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i bstan pa 'di yang srungs/ /zad pa'i dus la shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po'i glang po chos kyi
115b1(mdo sde): phyogs gnas kyis/ /de ltar de tshe mkhas pa de dag gis/ /rnam pa du mar mi dbang gdams pa byas/ /rgyal po khrag khrig drug cur bcas pa yis/ /de tshe byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
115b2(mdo sde): do| |de tshe rgyal po'i glang po chos thos nas/ /des shing dge ba'i chos rnams smra ba la/ /rangs shing yid bde dga' ba rab skyes nas/ /rkang pa la yang phyag btsal de nas song / /rgyal
115b3(mdo sde): po de yi dge slong mang po dag / rnyed pa 'dod cing de yi khyim du 'jug /de dag de mi 'dra ba'i spyod mthong nas/ /de la rgyal po de ltar ri mo med/ /bstan pa de yang ston pa 'das pa yi
115b4(mdo sde): de tshe lo yi tha mar gyur pa ste/ /dzam+bu'i gling na snod gyur rab tu nyung / /ma bsdams pa dag shin tu mang po byung / /de nas dge slong mang po brkam zhing chags/ /rnyed pa 'dod cing dmigs
115b5(mdo sde): pa'i lta ba can/ /bde gshegs bstan pa rab tu zhig pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po de yang bsgyur cing byed du bcug /chos smra gnyis po 'di ni gsad par gyis/ /'di dag mu stegs chad par smra
115b6(mdo sde): ba ste| |yun ring spyod par yang dag 'dzud byed kyang / /de dag gang du'ang mya ngan 'da' mi ston/ /las kyang 'jig cing rnam par smin pa 'jig /tshul 'chos 'di dag phung po med ces smra/
115b7(mdo sde): rgyal po 'di dag yul nas spangs nas ni/ /'dir yang chos ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag gi ni tshig thos de yi tshe/ /rgyal po'i glang po the tshom byung bar gyur/ /chos smra
116a1(mdo sde): gnyis po 'di ni gsad par bya/ /btang snyoms bzhag na gnod par 'gyur srid snyam/ /rgyal po de phyir 'brang ba lha mo zhig /tshe rabs snga mar lhan cig spyod
116a2(mdo sde): pa spyad/ /yun ring dus nas phan 'dod mkhas pa ste/ /de yis rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/ /rgyal rigs sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig dag gis/ /'di lta bu yi sems ni ma
116a3(mdo sde): bskyed cig / dge slong chos smra mkhas pa gnyis po 'di/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig gis ma spongs shig /de dag gis ni nags khrod ci bshad pa/ /shin tu 'jigs pa mi
116a4(mdo sde): bzad dus kyi tshe/ /rgyal po'i glang po chos kyi phyogs gnas kyis/ /mi yi bdag po cung zad mi dran nam/ /rgyal po yang dag tshig gis bskul ba yis/ /de ni rgyal po'i bstan pa mi
116a5(mdo sde): gtong gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po'i nub bo ma rungs pa/ /nyen gor rgyal po byed pa des rbad de/ /rgyal po khyod kyi gcen ni sdig pa can/ /bdag gi srog kyang nam du 'dod mi byed/ /dge
116a6(mdo sde): slong gnyis po rig sngags drag ldan pa/ /de dag nam mkha' la yang sngags kyis 'gro/ /de thos nas ni khyod kyi drung du 'ongs/ /thams cad 'dus te gsol ba 'debs pa ni/ /rig
116a7(mdo sde): sngags drag ldan 'di gnyis myur du gsod/ /phyis gdod 'gyod par gyur na ma legs so/ /de tshe rgyal po'i glang po go bgos nas/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi tshig gis der chas
116b1(mdo sde): te| |rgyal po dmag sde kun gyis yongs bskor nas/ /nags nas dge slong gang na yod par lhags/ /rgyal po mi zad drag shul sems rig nas/ /klu dang gnod sbyin nags der gnas
116b2(mdo sde): pa yis/ /rdo dang so phag char phab phyir bskrad de/ /des ni rgyal po sde dang bcas pa btags/ /ltos shig sdig pa'i grogs kyi tshig gis ni/ /de tshe ma rungs rgyal po 'chi dus byas/ /
116b3(mdo sde): chos smra dag la khro ba byas bas na/ /der ni tshe rabs drug cur mnar med song / /rgyal rigs rgyal po gang gis rbad pa yi/ /dge slong dmigs lta mang po de dag kyang / /tshe rabs
116b4(mdo sde): bye ba brgya phrag bsam yas su/ /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/ /lha mo gang gis rgyal po bskul bstan cing / /gang gis chos smra de dag bsrungs pa ni/ /
116b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa mthong / /spyad pa spyod cing de dag mchod pa byas/ /bye ba khrag khrig drug cu mtha' yas pas/ /rgyal po dang ni lhan cig chos thos shing / /byang
116b6(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems mchog bskyed pa dag / 'jig rten khams mang du yang sangs rgyas gyur/ /de dag tshe tshad bskal ba byed ba mang / /de dag ye shes gzhal med bsam mi khyab/ /de
116b7(mdo sde): dag kun gyis ting 'dzin bzang po 'di/ /bshad nas rkang gnyis gtso bo mya ngan 'das/ /tshul khrims tshangs pa yon tan ye shes bsags/ /bla na med pa'i tshig 'di thos
117a1(mdo sde): nas ni/ /g.yeng ba med par bag yod spyod cig dang / /sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs thob/ /phyogs bcu dag gi de bzhin gshegs
117a2(mdo sde): pa rnams/ /sems zhi snying rje byams pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /'jig rten kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen mthong / /'jig rten kun tu chos kyi char 'bebs 'gyur/ /
117a3(mdo sde): gzhon nu khye'u mchog gnyis po byung ba yang / /gzhan yin snyam na de ltar mi blta ste/ /mar me mdzad ni de na gcig tu gyur/ /de tshe chos smra gnyis pa nga yin no/ /gang gis
117a4(mdo sde): rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos pa/ /rgyal po der yang byams pa de tshe gyur/ /lha mo phan 'dod mkhas pa gang byung ba/ /gzhon nu khyod ni de tshe der gyur to/ /rgyal po de yi nu bo gang
117a5(mdo sde): byung ba/ /dge slong chos smra 'di gnyis sod cig ces/ /dge slong rnyed ba 'dod pas rbad pa ni/ /lha sbyin de yi tshe na der gyur to/ /sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu
117a6(mdo sde): gcig pa'o/ / //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
117a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang
117b1(mdo sde): srog la ma chags par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ lus dang srog la chags pa'i phyir sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu/
117b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang srog la ma chags pa rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par mi dka' na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta
117b3(mdo sde): ci smos/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na lus dang srog la'ang ma chags par bya'o zhes de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /rtag tu khor mor rnag gi lus
117b4(mdo sde): 'di la/ /byis pa rnams ni rab tu chags byed de/ /srog la 'du zhing bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir/ /mi mkhas pa dag rtag tu sdig pa byed/ /su dag snying po med pa'i lus srog la/ /
117b5(mdo sde): lhag par chags pa yod pa ma yin pa/ /de dag gis ni bdud kyi sde bcom ste/ /byang chub shing drung byang chub rab tu rtogs/ /su dag bdag med stong pa'i lus rnams dang / /srog
117b6(mdo sde): kyang rmi lam g.yo ba zil pa 'dra/ /'di gnyis la ni chags par byed 'gyur ba/ /de dag shi 'phos sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /lus nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi
117b7(mdo sde): shu gnyis pa'o/ / //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
118a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
118a2(mdo sde): pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yin te/ gzugs kyi skus rab
118a3(mdo sde): tu phye ba ma yin no/ /gzhon nu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la smon par 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shes
118a4(mdo sde): par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdan par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ bsgom par
118a5(mdo sde): bya| bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par bya/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bsod nams brgya pa
118a6(mdo sde): las skyes pa'i blo dang don gcig tu bstan pa yin te/ chos las skyes pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/ zab pa/ tshad med pa/ tshad med
118a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos/ mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam par ba shig pa/ mi g.yo ba/ mi gnas pa/ shin tu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ mi snang ba/ mig gi
118b1(mdo sde): lam las yang dag par 'das pa ni chos kyi skur rab tu shes par bya ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam pa'i sa dang bral ba/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa/ spros pa
118b2(mdo sde): thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la smon par 'dod pa rnams kyi sgra las shin tu 'das pa'i snying po ste 'dod chags las yang
118b3(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa/ dbyer mi phyed pa ste zhe sdang las yang dag par 'das pa/ brtan pa ste gti mug las yang dag par 'das pa/ stong pa nyid du bstan pas nges par bstan pa/ ma
118b4(mdo sde): skyes pa/ skye ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ tha snyad du brtags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ bye brag med pa/ sgras mya ngan las 'das pa/ dbyangs kyis zhi ba/ brdas
118b5(mdo sde): mtshungs par gyur pa/ don dam pas brdar gyur pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba'i tshig gis don dam pa/ yongs su gdung ba med pas bsil ba/ gnas med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ kha
118b6(mdo sde): dog bstan pas mu med pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyang ba las byung ba ste/ gzhon nu/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
118b7(mdo sde): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'di 'dra'i 'jig rten mgon po'i sku/ /su dag shes par 'dod pa ni/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni sgom gyis dang / /sangs rgyas
119a1(mdo sde): sku ni shes par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sku ni dag pa ste/ /bsod nams brgya skyes 'od kyang gsal/ /de ni bar snang mtshungs pa ste/ /de la tha dad bya
119a2(mdo sde): ba med/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba/ /mtshan rnams kyang ni de 'dra ste/ /de yi mtshan rnams ci 'dra ba/ /de yi sku yang de 'dra'o/ /sku ni byang chub mtshan nyid de/ /
119a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing yang de 'dra zhing / /stobs dang rnam thar bsam gtan yang / /de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig /de ltar sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur te/ /'jig rten mgon
119a4(mdo sde): po'i de 'dra bas/ /sus kyang sha yi mig gis ni/ /nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/ /mang po dag kyang 'di skad smra/ /ngas ni 'jig rten 'dren pa mthong / /sku yang gser gyi kha dog
119a5(mdo sde): la| |'jig rten thams cad snang bar mdzad/ /sangs rgyas dag gi byin rlabs dang / /mthu dang rnam par sprul pa yis/ /de ltar mtshan gyis spras pa yi/ /sku dag shin tu snang ba yin
119a6(mdo sde): bong tshod khrun dang sboms su yang / /sangs rgyas sku ni bshad mod kyi/ /sku yi tshad mi ma rnyed de/ /de phyir bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas sku ni 'di tsam zhes/ /gal te tshad kyang
119a7(mdo sde): rnyed gyur na/ /lha dag dang ni mi rnams dang / /ston pa bye brag med par 'gyur/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyi ni/ /rnam par smin pa'ang de yi mtshan/ /ming dang gzugs
119b1(mdo sde): kyang de 'dra mtshan/ /rnam par dag cing 'od gsal 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /bskal pa bye bar bsnyen pa ltar/ /sus kyang ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di/ /nam yang goms par
119b2(mdo sde): ma byas so/ /dkar po'i chos ni mang po yis/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bskyed bste/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rgya che bas/ /nga yi lus kyang mi snang ngo / /gang gi sems ni ci 'dra ba/ /ming dang gzugs
119b3(mdo sde): kyang de 'dra ste/ /rang bzhin med pa'i sems kyi ni/ /ming dang gzugs kyang mtshan de 'dra/ /ming dang gzugs la gang gi ni/ /'du shes rags pa 'jug pa yang / /skal pa mi mnyam
119b4(mdo sde): 'du shes kyis/ /rags pa'i sems kyang skye bar 'gyur/ /ming dang gzugs la su dag gi /'du shes phra mo 'jug pa ni/ /ming dang gzugs la ma chags pas/ /sems ni rab tu
119b5(mdo sde): 'od gsal 'gyur/ /ngas dran sngon gyi tshe rabs ni/ /grangs med pa dag bdun du yang / /sdig pa'i 'du shes gsum po dag /nam yang skyes par ma gyur to/ /nga yis sems ni zag med de//
119b6(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang / /nga yi lus ni mi snang ngo / /ji ltar gang gi dngos po las/ /yid kyang rnam par grol gyur pa/ /de dag
119b7(mdo sde): de yi dngos po dang / /phyir yang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po kun las rnam pa kun/ /nga yi rnam shes rnam grol te/ /sems kyi rang bzhin shes pas na/ /phyir yang ye
120a1(mdo sde): shes 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhing rnams bye ba phrag stong du/ /nga yi sprul pa dag kyang 'gro/ /sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed/ /de la lus kyang rnyed mi
120a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma med/ /ji ltar nam mkha' de bzhin du/ /nga yi sku yang brjod med cing / /shes par dka' bar rab tu bstan/ /dpa' bo chen po chos
120a3(mdo sde): kyi sku/ /sku ni chos las skyes pa ste/ /gzugs kyi skur rin nam du yang / /rgyal ba gdags par yong mi nus/ /ji ltar bshad pa 'di dag kyang / /thos nas dga' bar 'gyur
120a4(mdo sde): ba ni| |de la sdig can bdud kyis kyang / /glan ka rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /zab mo yi ni chos thos nas/ /de la skrag pa mi 'byung ste/ /de ni srog gi phyir du yang / /sangs
120a5(mdo sde): rgyas byang chub spong mi byed/ /mdo sde bye ba phrag stong gi/ yang dag bstan pa shes par 'gyur/ /gang dang gang du song bar yang / /'jig rten dag la snang bar 'gyur/ /
120a6(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma dang las kyis kyang shes par sla ba ma yin te/ sngon po'am/ kha dog sngon po'am/ sngon po lta bur ston pa'am
120a7(mdo sde): 'od sngon po 'byung ba'am/ ser po'am/ kha dog ser po'am/ ser po lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od ser po 'byung ba'am/ dmar po'am/ kha dog dmar po'am/ dmar
120b1(mdo sde): po lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba'am/ dkar po'am/ kha dog dkar po'am/ dkar po lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba'am/ le brgan nam/ kha dog le
120b2(mdo sde): brgan nam/ le brgan lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od le brgan 'byung ba'am/ shes lam/ shel gyi kha dog gam/ shel lta bur ston pa'am/ shel gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/ me'am/
120b3(mdo sde): me'i kha dog gam/ me lta bur ston pa'am/ me'i 'od 'byung ba'am/ mar gyi snying po'am/ mar gyi kha dog gam/ mar lta bur ston pa'am/ mar gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/ gser
120b4(mdo sde): ram| gser gyi kha dog gam/ gser lta bur ston pa'am/ gser gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/ bai DUR+ya'am/ bai DUR+ya'i kha dog gam/ bai DUR+ya lta bur ston pa'am/ bai DUR+ya'i 'od 'byung
120b5(mdo sde): ba'am/ glog gam/ glog gi kha dog gam/ glog lta bur ston pa'am/ glog gi 'od 'byung ba'am/ tshangs pa'am/ tshangs pa'i kha dog gam/ tshangs pa lta bur ston pa'am/
120b6(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'am/ lha 'am/ lha'i kha dog gam/ lha lta bur ston pa'am/ lha'i 'od 'byung ba'o zhes shes par sla ba ma yin no/ /gzhon nu/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs
120b7(mdo sde): pa'i sku ni dag bste/ mtshan ma dag gis bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa/ mtshan ma thams cad kyis kyang bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/ bsam gyis
121a1(mdo sde): mi khyab par bstan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang
121a2(mdo sde): gzugs kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pas sku'i tshad gzung bar sla ba ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams
121a3(mdo sde): kyi rdul phran dang / /rdul du ming yang ston pa dang / /mche'u dang rdzing dang lteng ka dang / /rgya mtsho na yang ji snyed chu/ /'di snyed rdul phran yod do zhes/ /de dag la ni mtha' mi rnyed//
121a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la ni skra rtse yis/ /chu thigs gzhal bar nus kyang ni/ /'jig rten mgon po'i dpe nyid du/ /yang dag bstan par mi rung ngo / /chu yi thigs pa dpag med cing / /de
121a5(mdo sde): bzhin rab tu phra ba'i rdul/ /de bas sems can gcig gi yang / /shin tu mang du ngas mthong ste/ /mos pa dang ni sems bskyed pa/ /du ma dag ni shes mi sla/ /ngas ni sku
121a6(mdo sde): yi yon tan dag / yang dag pa ni gang bstan pa/ /sems can kun gyi mos pa yang / /de dag dpe ru bzod mi 'gyur/ /mtshan ma dang ni las rnams dang / /kha dog snang ba 'di
121a7(mdo sde): 'dra zhes/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni shes mi nus/ /nga yi bye brag de 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ma bral ba ste/ /chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/ /zab cing dpag tu med pa ste/ /de phyir
121b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas bsam du med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas sku yang bsam du med/ /sku de bsam du med pa yi/ /chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/ /sangs rgyas sku ni sems
121b2(mdo sde): kyis kyang / /bsam par bzod pa ma yin te/ /de ltar de yi sku la yang / /chad kyang nye bar mi dmigs so/ /chos rnams de dag spag tu med/ /bskal pa bye bar bsnyen pas na/ /
121b3(mdo sde): de phyir nga yi lus kyang ni/ /'od gsal bsam du med pa grub/ /sems can kun gyis gzung du med/ /tshad kyis gzung bya ma yin te/ /de lta sangs rgyas sku dag ni/ /tshad med
121b4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /tshad med pa yi chos dag gis/ /de la tshad ni brtag tu med/ /ma brtag pa yi chos dag gis/ /de ltar sangs rgyas ma brtags so/ /rtog pa dag ni tshad
121b5(mdo sde): du bstan/ /rtog pa med pa tshad med yin/ /mi rtog rtog dang bral bas na/ /de phyir sangs rgyas bsam du med/ /ji ltar nam mkha' tshad med la/ /sus kyang gzhal du mi nus
121b6(mdo sde): pa| |de bzhin sangs rgyas sku dag kyang / /nam mkha' nyid dang 'dra zhing mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas sku ni de lta bur/ /gang gis rig pa rgyal ba'i sras/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab
121b7(mdo sde): pa| |sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu gsum pa'o// //de nas yang bcom
122a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ci nas kyang
122a2(mdo sde): bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon sum du bya bar 'dod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig
122a3(mdo sde): pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa 'di bzhi mngon sum du bya'o snyam na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa'
122a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya/ kun chub bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cig kha ton du bya/ nyon
122a5(mdo sde): mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya/ bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ de la chos
122a6(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gzhon nu/ gzugs su brjod pa ji snyed yod pa/ gzhon nu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang de snyed do/ /de
122a7(mdo sde): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ji snyed ba dang / gzhon nu/ rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod
122b1(mdo sde): pa'ang de snyed de/ gzhon nu/ de ltar gzugs su brjod pa mtha' yas mu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab
122b2(mdo sde): ste| de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gzhon nu/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa mtha' yas mu med de/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin
122b3(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /gzhon nu/ de ltar 'dus byas la'ang nyes pa grangs med/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang phan
122b4(mdo sde): yon grangs med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa'ang grangs med do/ /gzhon nu/ 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i ming ji snyed yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
122b5(mdo sde): bsngags pa'ang de snyed do/ /gzhon nu/ 'di ltar mya ngan 'das pa'i ming grangs med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa'ang grangs med do/ /gzhon nu/ 'di bzhi ni
122b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par brjod pa ste/ de dag mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ni ma yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
122b7(mdo sde): 'du byed brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba
123a1(mdo sde): brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ gzhon nu/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi
123a2(mdo sde): khyab par brjod pa bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa ste/ de dag ni mthar
123a3(mdo sde): phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bzhi po de dag nyid de/ de bzhin du rgyas par bstan par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
123a4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas
123a5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
123a6(mdo sde): kyi rigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun
123a7(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
123b1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo
123b2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par bstan pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang
123b3(mdo sde): zhe na| 'du byed nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nges par bstan
123b4(mdo sde): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgra bzhi ste/ bzhi
123b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
123b6(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi tshig bsam
123b7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshig bsam
124a1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig gi lam bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi
124a2(mdo sde): tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab
124a3(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa bzhi ste/ bzhi
124a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
124a5(mdo sde): pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
124a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi lha la nges par rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis
124a7(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag
124b1(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi la rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis
124b2(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni
124b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming la rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ming la rtog pa
124b4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/
124b5(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jug pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa la 'jug pa bsam
124b6(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang
124b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrol ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun
125a1(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub
125a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi rdo rje'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa
125a3(mdo sde): dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
125a4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig
125a5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di
