125a6(mdo sde): bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa
125a7(mdo sde): sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag
125b1(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam
125b2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni
125b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btags pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa btags pa'i tshig
125b4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon
125b5(mdo sde): nu| 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa snang ba'i tshig
125b6(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di
125b7(mdo sde): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsal ba'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsal ba'i
126a1(mdo sde): tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi
126a2(mdo sde): khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa
126a3(mdo sde): dang | 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba spyod pa'i
126a4(mdo sde): tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spyad pa'i tshig bsam
126a5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba spyad
126a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed bsam
126a7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
126b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
126b2(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa
126b3(mdo sde): dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang
126b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa rgyu ba med pa'i tshig
126b5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon
126b6(mdo sde): nu| 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mu med
126b7(mdo sde): pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /
127a1(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal du med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis
127a2(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
127a3(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grangs med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi
127a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'du byed grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa grangs
127a5(mdo sde): med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
127a6(mdo sde): kyi dpag tu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam
127a7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon
127b1(mdo sde): nu| 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshad med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa tshad
127b2(mdo sde): med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di
127b3(mdo sde): bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su
127b4(mdo sde): bshad pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
127b5(mdo sde): 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du
127b6(mdo sde): byed yongs su bshad pa'i shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa bsags
127b7(mdo sde): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i rigs bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi shes pa'i rigs bsam
128a1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi
128a2(mdo sde): khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi
128a3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
128a4(mdo sde): ba'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
128a5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas
128a6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
128a7(mdo sde): mdo sde bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi mdo sde bsags ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab
128b1(mdo sde): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni
128b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mang du thos pa bsam
128b3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag
128b4(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas
128b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa bzhi
128b6(mdo sde): ste| bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bslab pa bsam
128b7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe
129a1(mdo sde): na/ 'du byed kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
129a2(mdo sde): spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las bzhi
129a3(mdo sde): ste| bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bsam gyis
129a4(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
129a5(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
129a6(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom par bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed
129a7(mdo sde): kyi lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i lam bsgom pa
129b1(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun nas nyon
129b2(mdo sde): mongs pa'i shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis
129b3(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//
129b4(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
129b5(mdo sde): 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam
129b6(mdo sde): par byang ba'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma rig pa shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang
129b7(mdo sde): zhe na| 'du byed kyi ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
130a1(mdo sde): pa'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni
130a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sdug
130a3(mdo sde): bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi
130a4(mdo sde): khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yid mi bde ba shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam
130a5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab
130a6(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbul po shes pa bzhi
130a7(mdo sde): ste| bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dbul po shes pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon
130b1(mdo sde): mongs pa'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
130b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi skye ba shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
130b3(mdo sde): dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang
130b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi
130b5(mdo sde): khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang
130b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyi rol shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i phyi rol shes pa
130b7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon
131a1(mdo sde): nu| 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis
131a2(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
131a3(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang
131a4(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'du byed kyi bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs ba'i bden pa
131a5(mdo sde): shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi srid
131a6(mdo sde): pa shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas
131a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
131b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi dngos po shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
131b2(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub
131b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi gang zag shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i gang zag shes pa bsam
131b4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/
131b5(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa bzhi ste/ mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma
131b6(mdo sde): yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas
131b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
132a1(mdo sde): dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no/ /
132a2(mdo sde): gzungs bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs dang po'o/ /dbyangs mtha' yas par
132a3(mdo sde): bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs gnyis pa'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs gsum pa'o/ /
132a4(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba'i yon tan gyis phan yon mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs bzhi pa ste/ gzungs bzhi po ni 'di dag go /gzhon nu/ 'di ltar
132a5(mdo sde): gzungs gang yin pa de ni shes pa'o/ /de ni chos so/ /'di ltar chos shes pas chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /chos shes pa la don gang yin pa de ni don so so yang dag par
132a6(mdo sde): rig pa zhes bya'o/ /chos shes pa la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /chos shes pa la tha snyad du ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / 'dogs
132a7(mdo sde): pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / rab tu 'god pa dang / 'byed pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / tshig thogs pa med pa dang / tshig mi 'dor zhing ma lkugs
132b1(mdo sde): mi dig pa dang / tshig zhum pa med pa 'di ni/ gzhon nu/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
132b2(mdo sde): so| |sangs rgyas ye shes ji snyed pa/ /gzugs su brtags pa'ang de snyed do/ /gzugs su brtags pa ji snyed pa/ /gzugs su brjod pa'ang de snyed do/ /gzugs su brjod pa ji snyed
132b3(mdo sde): pa| |tshul khrims ming yang de snyed de/ /tshul khrims ming yang ji snyed pa/ /sangs rgyas ming yang de snyed do/ /sangs rgyas ming ni ji snyed pa/ /sems can ming yang de snyed do/ /sems
132b4(mdo sde): can gcig gi ming yang ni/ /de snyed du ni ngas bshad do/ /ming dang brjod pa mtha' yas pa/ /gang dag ngas ni sngar bshad rnams/ /tshul khrims ming dang sangs rgyas ming / /sems
132b5(mdo sde): can ming dang de dag mtshungs/ /'dus byas nyes pa ji snyed pa/ /mya ngan 'das bsngags de snyed de/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bsngags pa dang / /dpe yang de snyed ngas bshad do/ /ji snyed
132b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems rnams skye ba nges bsten pa/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spu gcig nas/ /'od zer dag kyang de snyed 'byung / /sems can kun gyi mos pa dang / /ming
132b7(mdo sde): rnams ji snyed yod pa bas/ /de bas mi yi dbang po yi/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag bsngags pa mang / /sems can kun gyis ming yod pa/ /de dag sems can gcig la bstan/ /sems
133a1(mdo sde): can gcig ming ji snyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi ming du bstan/ /so so yang dag rig 'jug pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
133a2(mdo sde): phyir yang ni/ /ming rnams mtha' yas nges par bstan/ /mdo sde bye ba bsam yas rnams/ /ji ltar bshad snyam gang sems pa/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab brjod la/ /zhum pa med par
133a3(mdo sde): bshad par gyis/ /'khor gyi nang du thogs med par/ /mdo sde bye ba rab tu 'chad/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med pa/ /de bzhin de la'ang chos rnams ston/ /de ltar byang chub
133a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dag / sems can dag pa skyob pa rnams/ /mdo sde 'di dag bzung nas ni/ /ye shes phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /dad pas ji lta ji ltar bur/ /tshul 'di rab tu
133a5(mdo sde): ston byed pa/ /de bzhin de yi ye shes 'phel/ /gangs ri la ni sdong po bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po brgyad pa/ gzhon nu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod na
133a6(mdo sde): chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
133b1(mdo sde): po chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta bas gzugs las gzhan du byang chub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs las gzhan du'ang byang chub la mi spyod/ gzugs las gzhan du'ang
133b2(mdo sde): byang chub yongs su mi 'tshol/ gzugs las gzhan du'ang byang chub yang dag par mi sgrub/ gzugs las gzhan du'ang sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud/ gzugs
133b3(mdo sde): las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ste/ gzugs kyi mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs par lta'o/ /gzugs kyang gzhan gzugs
133b4(mdo sde): kyi ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan no zhes de ltar mi lta'o/ /gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gzhan no zhes de ltar yang mi lta'o/ /gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang /
133b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lta na chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod do/ /de
133b6(mdo sde): bzhin du tshor ba las gzhan du ma yin/ 'du shes las gzhan du ma yin/ 'du byed rnams las gzhan du ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du byang chub mi mthong / rnam
133b7(mdo sde): par shes pa las gzhan du'ang byang chub la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang byang chub yongs su mi 'tshol/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang byang chub yang dag
134a1(mdo sde): bar mi sgrub/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du 'ang sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin
134a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi mthong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs par lta'o/ /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan/ rnam par
134a3(mdo sde): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan no zhes de ltar mi lta'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gzhan no zhes de ltar yang mi lta'o/ /rnam par
134a4(mdo sde): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lta na chos
134a5(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gzugs kyis kyang ni byang chub bstan/ /byang chub kyis
134a6(mdo sde): kyang gzugs bstan te/ /mi mtshungs pa yi sgra rnams kyis/ /chos kyi bla ma rab tu bstan/ /sgra yis gzugs kyi bla ma ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyis zab pa dag /gzugs dang byang chub
134a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa ste/ /tha dad bya ba de mi rnyed/ /mya ngan 'das pa zab par yang / /sgra yis rab tu bstan pa ltar/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi rnyed de/ /de yi sgra yang mi rnyed do/ /sgra dang mya ngan
134b1(mdo sde): 'das pa ni/ /gnyi ga rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin stong pa'i chos rnams la/ /mya ngan 'das pa rab tu bstan/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'da' ba ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi rnyed do/ /'di
134b2(mdo sde): ni chos rnams 'jug med pa/ /phyi sa ni ci 'dra de bzhin sngon/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs mnyam par/ /sangs rgyas bstan la brtson
134b3(mdo sde): pa yi/ /'byung ba lhur byed rnams kyis rig /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku mthong nas/ /'dren pa mthong zhing smra mod kyi/ /nga ni gzugs kyi sku lus su/ /sus kyang blta bar mi nus so/ /
134b4(mdo sde): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar/ /gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes te/ /gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes na/ /nga yi sku yang nges par bstan/ /de bzhin phung po lnga rnams kyi/ /chos kyi mtshan
134b5(mdo sde): nyid ngas shes te/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shes nas ni/ /chos kyi sku la rab tu gnas/ /chos kyi sku la rab gnas nas/ /sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /chos kyi sku la mi brten par
134b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas dag gi chos rnams ni/ /tshig gis bshad par mi nus te/ /'di 'dra'i tshul rnams mi shes pas/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sgra thos
134b7(mdo sde): nas| |tshig tsam gyis ni 'di skad smra/ /ngas ni 'dren pa mthong zhes te/ /'du shes thams cad spangs pa la/ /srid par 'du shes med par 'gyur/ /sgrar ni 'du shes 'dzin pa la/ /
135a1(mdo sde): nam yang ston pa mthong ba med/ /'di lta bu yi gzugs kyi mtshan/ /stong pa nyid ni sus shes pa/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin gzhan yin la/ /stong nyid gzhan
135a2(mdo sde): du ma gsungs te/ /gang gis gzugs rnams rab shes pa/ /des ni stong nyid rab tu shes/ /gzugs kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra bar/ /stong pa gang gis rab shes pa/ /des ni bdud
135a3(mdo sde): rnams bye ba snyed/ /zil gyis mnan te pham byed nus/ /gang gis gzugs rnams rab shes pa/ /des ni stong pa nyid kyang shes/ /gang gis stong nyid rab shes pa/ /des ni mya ngan
135a4(mdo sde): 'das pa shes/ /rnam pa 'di ni mi shes pas/ /dmigs pa can rnams rab tu brlag /dngos po med la dngos 'dzin cing / /dngos med la yang dngos su 'dzin/ /shes kyi khe
135a5(mdo sde): yis bslus pa dag / nga yi bstan las shin tu 'khyams/ /'bras bur 'du shes gnas pa la/ /dge sbyong nor ni gsog tu gyur/ /brtson 'grus nyams pa le lo can/ /tshul khrims
135a6(mdo sde): phung por mi gnas pa/ /kun nas langs pas smra ba ni/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bshad ma yin/ /la la dag ni 'di skad du/ /bdag cag byang chub zhugs zhes zer/ /ma dul zhing ni
135a7(mdo sde): ma byang ba/ /gcig la gcig kyang ri mo med/ /chos dag la yang mi gnas shing / /sgra 'dod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de lta bu ni de mos te/ /shes kyi khe ni 'chol ba'i phyir/ /
135b1(mdo sde): 'dus pa dag la sems byed cing / /rnyed pa 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyags dang bag med zil non pas/ /rnyed dang bkur sti don du gnyer/ /bkur sti rnyed la brten nas ni/ /shes
135b2(mdo sde): kyi khe rnams 'tshol ba dag / gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten byed/ /khyim mi mo la chags shing myos/ /dmigs pa dag la brten byed cing / /'dod pa'i srid la shin tu gnas/ /
135b3(mdo sde): bdud kyi yul du gnas nas ni/ /khyim pa dag gi las byed 'gyur/ /'dod pa me lce 'dra ba ni/ /khyim pa dag la ston par 'gyur/ /de dag gi yang khyim zhugs nas/ /de yi rigs kyang
135b4(mdo sde): sun byed 'gyur/ /de dag la ni khyim pa rnams/ /ston pa nyid du 'du shes 'gyur/ /rab tu gnas bcas de dag gi /bu dang chung ma sun par byed/ /su dag de la zas skom gyis/ /phan
135b5(mdo sde): 'dogs pa ni byed par 'gyur/ /de yi bu mo bud med la/ /chung ma nyid du 'du shes 'gyur/ /de dag 'dir ni rab byung nas/ /ji ltar gzhan gyi bud med chags/ /khyim pa bdag gi
135b6(mdo sde): chung ma la/ /de ltar mos shing chags mi 'gyur/ /khyim pa skye bo'i gos gyon la/ /ngas ni bslab pa gang bshad pa/ /de tshe dge slong de dag la/ /bslab pa de yang med par 'gyur/ /
135b7(mdo sde): de dag rnga dung rdza rnga yis/ /nga la mchod pa byed 'gyur te/ /mchod pa'i dam pa gang yin pa/ /nan tan 'di ni med par 'gyur/ /de dag bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal/ /tshul khrims
136a1(mdo sde): gnas pa mthong nas ni/ /phan tshun du yang 'di skad du/ /'di dag nged dang 'dra zhes smra/ /sdig pa'i spyod yul tshul khrims 'chal/ /de dag tshul khrims
136a2(mdo sde): bsngags thos nas/ /kun nas langs pa 'di skad du/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa 'di min smra/ /de dag la ni ngo tsha med/ /dge sbyong gi ni nor stor te/ /mi bden tshig gis rtsod byed cing / /
136a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu spong / /ngan sems ldan pa de dag ni/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di bor te/ /chos rnams rab tu spangs nas ni/ /mnar med par yang gnas par 'gyur//
136a4(mdo sde): gang dag spyod pa de 'dra ba/ /ngas ni ma thos ma mthong ste/ /byis pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas ye shes thob mi 'gyur/ /de dag gi yang tshul 'chos dang / /de la g.yo
136a5(mdo sde): yang ci yod pa/ /thams cad de bzhin ngas shes te/ /de la nga yi ye shes 'jug /de yi 'khrul pa mang po ni/ /gal te bskal par rab bshad kyang / /byang chub sems dpar khas
136a6(mdo sde): 'che yi/ /cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur/ /gzhon nur gyur pa de dag ni/ /sdig pa mi byed yong med de/ /phyi ma'i dus la de dag dang / /khyod ni ston par ma byed cig /smra ba
136a7(mdo sde): dang ni gtam gyis la/ /de dag la ni ri mor gyis/ /byang chub dam pa'i don gyi phyir/ /zhum pa med par bkur sti gyis/ /lo grangs du lon kun dris la/ /de dag rgan par gyur
136b1(mdo sde): na yang / /de la ri mo legs gyis la/ /rkang pa la yang mgos phyag 'tshol/ /byang chub snying po rnams mthong na/ /de dag 'khrul pa mi blta'o/ /de la khong khro mi bskyed cing / /rtag
136b2(mdo sde): tu byams pa'i sems su bya/ /gang gi 'khrul pa ci mthong yang / /de dag gi ni nyes mi brjod/ /ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa/ /'bras bu de 'dra thob par 'gyur/ /bzhin gyi zla ba 'dzum
136b3(mdo sde): bzhin du/ /rgan rabs dang ni gsar bu la/ /rtag tu gsong por smra ba dang / /des shing nga rgyal bcom par bya/ /chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms kyis/ /de dag la ni phan gdags
136b4(mdo sde): shing | |'di dag thams cad 'dren 'gyur zhes/ /de ltar khyod kyi sems zhog cig /gal te chos kyi sbyin pa'i phyir/ /de dag khyod la gsol 'debs na/ /dang por tshig ni 'di
136b5(mdo sde): skad smros/ /kho bos mtshungs med ma bslabs so/ /'di skad du ni tshig brjod de/ /tshe dang ldan pa mkhas shing rig /bdag nyid chen po'i mdun du ni/ /bdag gis ga la bshad nus
136b6(mdo sde): smros| |gya tshom du ni ma smra bar/ /de dag gi ni snod rtogs la/ /snod du rung bar rig na ni/ /ma gsol bar yang bshad par gyis/ /tshul khrims 'chal ba 'khor nang na/ /mang du gnas
136b7(mdo sde): par mthong na khyod/ /yo byad bsnyungs pa ma 'chad par/ /sbyin pa yi ni bsngags pa brjod/ /tshul khrims gtsang la rab gnas shing / /ji ste 'dod pa nyung yod na/ /byams pa'i sems
137a1(mdo sde): ni bskyed nas su/ /yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam gyis shig /gal te sdig pa 'dod nyung zhing / /tshul khrims ldan pa mang yod na/ /de tshe phyogs rnyed gyur
137a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ /tshul khrims kyi yang bsngags pa brjod/ /thog mar 'khor rnams zhes bya ste/ /gal te gtsang yod de yi tshe/ /dge ba'i chos rnams ji snyed pa/ /thams cad der
137a3(mdo sde): ni rab tu bstan/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan thos pa dang / /de bzhin 'dod nyung yo byad bsnyungs/ /rtag tu bsngags shing brjod
137a4(mdo sde): par bya/ /dgon gnas bsam gtan bsten pa dang / /'du 'dzir gnas pa spangs pa ni/ /de dag gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /'di yi bsngags pa brjod par bya/ /dgon par
137a5(mdo sde): gnas pa mi spong zhing / /tshul khrims la yang lhur mi gzung / /nang du 'jog la bsten bya zhing / /sbyin pa la ni lhur mi bya/ /tshul khrims phung por gnas na ni/ /mang du thos
137a6(mdo sde): pa bsgrub par bya/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni yongs btsal zhing / /ston pa'i ring bsrel mchod par bya/ /ting 'dzin zhi pa btsal ba'i phyir/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /
137a7(mdo sde): spos dang phreng ba byug pa yis/ /sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa bya/ /dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sil snyan dang / /glu dbyangs sbyar cing blangs nas su/ /zhum pa med cing mi g.yel
137b1(mdo sde): bar| |sangs rgyas kyi ni ring bsrel mchod/ /byang chub mchog gi don gyi phyir/ /spos dang phreng ba bdug pa dang / /gos dang phye ma ji snyed pa/ /de dag kun gyis mgon mchod gyis/ /
137b2(mdo sde): ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di 'tshol phyir/ /mchod pa ji snyed ci yod pa/ /dpag med bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /sangs rgyas kun la mchod par gyis/ /bla med sangs rgyas ye shes te/ /chags
137b3(mdo sde): med ye shes rab 'tshol bas/ /sems can kun la skal ba'i shas/ /mi gnas par ni mnyam par sbyin/ /mi gnas par ni gyur nas su/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /sangs
137b4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams la ngas kyang sngon/ /mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab byas/ /sangs rgyas skye ba rnyed par dka'/ /mir skye ba yang rnyed par dka'/ /bstan pa la yang dad pa dang / /rab byung
137b5(mdo sde): bsnyen rdzogs rnyed par dka'/ /gang gis byang chub sems bsngos pa/ /de dag ston pa mnyes par byas/ /dam bcas pa las ma g.yo bar/ /khyod ni nan tan gnas par gyis/ /zad
137b6(mdo sde): pa'i dus su nyer gnas tshe/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di bzung ste/ /rab tu brjod pa bzung byas na/ /myur du spobs pa thob par 'gyur/ /tshigs bcad gcig tsam bzung ba yang / /bsod
137b7(mdo sde): nams phung po bsam yas na/ /nyan par 'dod pas mdo sde yang / /thams cad bzung ba ci zhig smos/ /sems can thams cad byang chub thob/ /de dag mi g.yel mchod byas te//
138a1(mdo sde): bskal pa sems can snyed du yang / /rtag tu gus par mchod pa bas/ /ting 'dzin dam pa 'di las ni/ /gang gis tshigs bcad gcig bzung ba/ /bsod
138a2(mdo sde): nams snga ma thams cad ni/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas su/ /su dag nem nur mi byed pa/ /phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni
138a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pas rig / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu lnga pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la
138a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
138a5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas thabs mkhas par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/
138a6(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la nye du'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
138a7(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po ci yod pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rjes su mi rang bar byas te/ nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum sems can thams
138b1(mdo sde): cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po la rjes su yi rangs nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi
138b2(mdo sde): phung po de sems can thams cad la gtang bar bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de thabs mkhas pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pas
138b3(mdo sde): myur du ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
138b4(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sems can 'di dag thams cad bdag gi gnyen/ /'di yi bsod nams mang po ci yod pa/ /nyin yang lan gsum mtshan yang lan gsum du/ /
138b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems bskyed rjes su yi rang ngo / /su dag srog gi phyir yang sdig mi byed/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag la yi rang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' mos pa phun sum tshogs/ /
138b6(mdo sde): de dag bsod nams ci yod ci rang ngo / /gang dag sangs rgyas dad cing de bzhin du/ /chos dang dge 'dun dad la yi rang ngo / /byang chub nyid ni rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir/ /bde gshegs
138b7(mdo sde): mchod pa byed la yi rang ngo / /rdzogs ba'i byang chub gdung ni gnas bya'i phyir/ /sems can don du blo gros chen po yis/ /bla med byang chub dam pa mchog tu ni/ /gang gis sems
139a1(mdo sde): bskyed de la yi rang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' snying rjes non pa yis/ /nor dang 'bru dang rin chen btsun ma dang / /sras dang sras mo rgyal srid rgyas pa
139a2(mdo sde): dang | |bdag gi sha yang gtong la yi rang ngo / /shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas lus dul zhing / /thabs la mkhas pa'i bslabs par ba bslabs pas/ /sems can don
139a3(mdo sde): du rab tu dga' sems kyis/ /bdag gis lus kyang gtong la yi rang ngo / /gcig pu gnyis su med par nags gnas shing / /rtag tu bse ru ltar gyur 'tsho ba gtsang / /khor mor
139a4(mdo sde): bya ba nyung zhing su dag ni/ /khe phyir tshul 'chos med la yi rang ngo / /su dag bsten par mi byed phrag dog med/ khyim la sred par mi byed rtag par yang / /khams gsum dag
139a5(mdo sde): la rab tu 'jigs skrag ste/ /'jig rten ma chags spyod la yi rang ngo / /srid par skye ba kun la rab skyo zhing / /su dag spros pa med la yi rang ngo / /rtsod pa med cing nye bar
139a6(mdo sde): zhi ba'i sems/ /de la ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/ /gang gis 'du 'dzi nyes pa mthong nas ni/ /rtsod pa thams cad yongs spangs dgon par gnas/ /shing drung gnas
139a7(mdo sde): shing rnam grol lhur byed pa/ /bde gshegs sras la rjes su yi rang ngo / /bdag la mi bstod gzhan la mi smod cing / /dgon par gnas pa dag la yi rang ngo / /su dag bstan
139b1(mdo sde): ba 'di la bag yod cing / /bag med spangs pa de la yi rang ngo / /byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams ji snyed pa/ /kun gyi rtsa ba bag yod 'di yin te/ /sangs rgyas sras gang rtag tu bag yod
139b2(mdo sde): pa| |de dag ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa gter rnyed yin/ /rab tu byung ba gter ni gnyis pa ste/ /dad pa rnyed pa gter ni gsum pa yin/ /
139b3(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di ni gter rnyed bzhi pa'o/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul stong pa 'di thos nas/ /'di la mi spong ba yang gter rnyed yin/ /spobs pa mtha' yas pa yang gter rnyed pa/ /gzungs
139b4(mdo sde): rnams gang yin de dag gter gyi mchog / dge ba'i chos rnams ji snyed rjod pa dag /tshul khrims thos gtong bzod pa de bzhin te/ /thams cad kyi yang rtsa ba bag yod 'di/ /gter
139b5(mdo sde): rnyed yin par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la bag yod cing / /su dag la ni yang dag smon lam yod/ /de dag ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/ /
139b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la nye bar gyur/ /rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu drug pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la
139b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na bag yod par bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
140a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par mi dka' na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos/ gzhon nu/ ji ltar na byang
140a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag yod pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin no/ /gzhon
140a3(mdo sde): nu| ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
140a4(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa yin te/ de'i phan yon 'di dag nyon cig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /gzhon
140a5(mdo sde): nu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa la mos pa'i phan yon ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i ser sna'i nyon mongs pa tshar bcad pa yin/
140a6(mdo sde): de'i sems rtag tu gtong ba'i rjes su spel ba yin/ skye bo mang po dang thun mong pa'i longs spyod las snying po len pa yin/ longs spyod chen po'i rigs su skye zhing skyes ma
140a7(mdo sde): thag tu de gtong ba'i sems mngon du 'gyur ba yin/ 'khor bzhi rnams la phangs shing sdug pa yin/ 'jigs pa med cing zhum pa med par 'khor gyi nang du 'gro /phyogs dang
140b1(mdo sde): phyogs mtshams su de'i rgya cher brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa mngon par 'byung / rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon pa yin/ rkang mthil mnyam zhing rab tu gnas pa yin/ byang
140b2(mdo sde): chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa la mos pa'i legs pa ni
140b3(mdo sde): 'di bcu'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /des ni ser sna tshar bcad cing / /gtong ba'i sems kyang rnam par spel/ /snying po dag ni blangs par 'gyur/ /shin tu 'byor pa'i
140b4(mdo sde): rigs su skye/ /skyes ma thag tu de yi sems/ /gtong ba dag la shin tu 'jug /rab tu byung dang khyim pa yi/ /sems can rnams la phangs par 'gyur/ /'jigs pa med cing 'khor
140b5(mdo sde): du yang / /ma zhum par ni nye bar 'gro /grong dang grong khyer rnams su yang / /de yi sgra ni rgya cher 'gyur/ /rkang lag dag ni 'jam pa yang / /rnyed dka' bar ni yong mi 'gyur/ /sangs
140b6(mdo sde): rgyas dang ni nyan thos dang / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thob par 'gyur/ /ser sna'i sems ni nam yang mi 'byung ste/ /de yi sems ni rtag tu gtong la dga'/ /sems can bye ba mang
140b7(mdo sde): la phangs par 'gyur/ /ser sna med pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/ /de ni nor mang rigs su skye bar 'gyur/ /skyes nas de yi yid ni gtong la dga'/ /snying po blangs nas 'chi ba'i
141a1(mdo sde): dus byed 'gyur/ /ser sna med pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/ /'jigs pa med par 'khor gyi nang du 'gro /phyogs su rgya cher de yi sgra yang grags/ /de yi
141a2(mdo sde): rkang lag rtag tu 'jam par 'gyur/ /ser sna med pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par mi dka' ste/ /des ni sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos mthong //
141a3(mdo sde): mthong nas de dag dad pas mchod pa byed/ /ser sna med pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/ /sbyin pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu bdun pa'o// //gzhon nu/
141a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phan yon 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyis rjes su bskor cing yongs
141a5(mdo sde): su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su slob pa dang / mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa dang / dam bcas pa las mi g.yo ba dang / nan tan la gnas pa
141a6(mdo sde): dang | 'khor ba las 'byol ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa dang / kun nas ldang ba med par gnas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa dang / mi dbul
141a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ gzhon nu/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phan yon no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ye
141b1(mdo sde): shes yongs su rdzogs byed cing / /sangs rgyas dag gi rjes su slob/ /mkhas pa dag gis ma smad pa/ /rtag tu 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /dam bcas pa las mi g.yo zhing / /nan
141b2(mdo sde): tan la yang rab tu gnas/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob byed cing / /'khor ba las kyang shin tu 'byol/ /kun nas ldang ba med gnas shing / /ting nge 'dzin rnams myur du 'thob/ /dbul
141b3(mdo sde): por yang ni mi 'gyur te/ /tshul khrims phung por rab tu gnas/ /de yi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rjes su slob/ /de ltar de yi tshul
141b4(mdo sde): khrims yongs dag cing / /de la mkhas pa dag ni smod mi byed/ /dam bcas pa las mkhas pa mi g.yo zhing / /de ltar dpa' bo nan tan gnas par byed/ /'khor ba'i nyes pa
141b5(mdo sde): mang po mthong nas ni/ /'byol zhing mya ngan 'da' bar de yis 'gro /de ltar tshul khrims stobs la gnas pas na/ /de yi sems ni kun nas ldang mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs med
141b6(mdo sde): pa'i ting 'dzin myur du 'thob/ /tshul khrims dag pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/ /tshul khrims nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //gzhon nu/
141b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa la gnas shing byams pa la spyod pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mes mi tshig /mtshon gyis
142a1(mdo sde): mi gsod/ dug gis mi tshugs/ chus mi 'chi/ lha rnams de la srung bar byed/ lus mtshan gyis brgyan pa thob par 'gyur/ de'i ngan 'gro'i sgo
142a2(mdo sde): thams cad bcad par 'gyur/ de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnyed pa mi dka' bar 'gyur/ de bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar 'gyur/ de'i lus la dga' ba dang bde ba mi
142a3(mdo sde): 'dor bar 'gyur te/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa la gnas pa/ byams pa la spyod pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu'o/ /de la 'di skad ces
142a4(mdo sde): bya ste/ de ni mes kyang mi tshig ste/ /mtshon gyis kyang ni gsod mi 'gyur/ /lus la dug gis mi tshugs te/ /chus kyang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la lha rnams srung byed de/ /
142a5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan kyang 'byung / /de yi ngan 'gro kun bkag ste/ /bzod la gnas pa'i phan yon 'di/ /tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin yang / /de la rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/ /
142a6(mdo sde): rtag tu bde bar gnas byed cing / /dga' ba dag kyang bsam yas 'gyur/ /de ni me dang mtshon gyis yong mi gsod/ /bye brag tu ni chu nang mi 'chi ste/ /lha dang de bzhin klu dang
142a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin srung / /byams la gnas pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /de yi lus la sum cu gnyis mtshan 'byung / /de ni phyir yang log ltung 'gro mi 'gyur/ /shi 'phos nas ni
142b1(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas su skye/ /bzod la gnas pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /de ni nyin mtshan dag kyang bde bar 'da'/ /lus ni dga' bas rtag tu khyab par 'gyur/ /bzod cing des pa'i
142b2(mdo sde): stobs la de gnas pas/ /mkhas pa rtag tu dang ba'i sems su 'gyur/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu
142b3(mdo sde): ste| bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsnyen dka' bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba 'thob pa dang / lhas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / des thos pa'i chos
142b4(mdo sde): yongs su mi nyams pa dang / sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs 'thob pa dang / nad nyung bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i zas rnams kyang yang dag par bde bar
142b5(mdo sde): 'ju bar 'gyur ba dang / pad+ma lta bur 'gyur zhing mda' ste'u kha ma ltar mi 'gyur ba ste/ gzhon nu/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams
142b6(mdo sde): pa'i phan yon no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bsnyen dka' bar yang rtag tu 'gyur/ /de la le lo yod min te/ /lha rnams kyang ni srung bar byed/ /sangs rgyas dag ni myur du mthong / /
142b7(mdo sde): smon lam yongs su rdzogs byed de/ /ting 'dzin rigs ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /de la nad kyang mi 'byung ste/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i yon tan 'di/ /de yi zas dang skom dag kyang / /bde bar
143a1(mdo sde): 'ju ste rmya ba med/ /chu yi nang na ut+pal dag /rim gyis skye bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yang / /dkar po'i chos kyis rnam
143a2(mdo sde): par 'phel/ /de yi nyin dang mtshan mo yang / /'bras bu yod par 'da' bar 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus brtsam pa de bzhin gshegs/ /bskal pa du mar bsgrubs pa yis/ /byang
143a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ldan/ /de yi phan yon 'di dag bshad/ /des pa brtson 'grus brtsams 'gyur te/ /rgyal bdag gis yongs su bzung / /lha yang de la smon pa
143a4(mdo sde): bskyed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub myur 'tshang rgya/ /de yi thos pa yong mi 'bri/ /chos gzhan mang po smra bar byed/ /de yi spobs ba rgya cher 'phel/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phan yon
143a5(mdo sde): 'di| |ting 'dzin rigs kyang myur du 'thob/ /de la nam yang nad mi 'byung / /des ni kha zas ci zos pa/ /bde bar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur/ /mi g.yel brtson 'grus brtsams pa
143a6(mdo sde): yi| |dkar po'i phyogs ni nyin mtshan 'phel/ /de ltar brtson 'grus stobs ldan pas/ /ring por mi thogs byang chub 'gyur/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
143a7(mdo sde): chen po bsam gtan la mos pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod pa la gnas pa dang / spyod yul la spyod pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med par
143b1(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / dbang po sbas par 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba myong ba dang / 'dod pa las dben pa dang / bsam gtan gsog gis tshim pa med pa ma yin pa dang / bdud kyi yul las
143b2(mdo sde): thar ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa dang / rnam par grol ba rab tu smin par byed pa ste/ gzhon nu/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
143b3(mdo sde): po bsam gtan la mos pa'i phan yon no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ spyod pa dag la de gnas pas/ /de ni spyod pa med mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa ni spyod yul spyod/ /spyod yul ma
143b4(mdo sde): yin rnam par spong / /gdung ba med par de gnas te/ /dbang po bsdams shing sbas pa yin/ /de ni dga' ba myong byed de/ /bsam gtan sgom pa'i spyod yul lo/ /'dod pa'i sred
143b5(mdo sde): la 'dod chags bral/ /bsam gtan bde la sten byed de/ /bdud kyi yul las de thar cing / /sangs rgyas yul la de gnas so/ /rnal 'byor bye brag 'di yin te/ /gcig pu nags khrod
143b6(mdo sde): mos byed cing / /rnam par grol ba yongs su skong / /de ni bcu pa'i gnas yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni spyod la gnas/ /spyod pa ma yin thams cad rnam par spangs/ /spyod yul
143b7(mdo sde): ma yin spangs nas spyod yul gnas/ /ting 'dzin brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /de la gdung ba nam yang gdung mi 'gyur/ /'phags pa'i bde bar gnas pa rig nas su/ /lus dang
144a1(mdo sde): sems rnams kyang ni bde bar 'gyur/ /bsam gtan brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /dgon pa'i gnas dag tu yang bsrungs shing gnas/ /de la g.yeng
144a2(mdo sde): ba nam yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de ltar lus ni dben par gyur pas na/ /zang zing med pa'i dga' ba der 'thob bo/ /'dod pa dag gis mi gos nyon mongs med/ /de ltar bdud kyi
144a3(mdo sde): yul las thar pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rab gnas te/ /de yi rnam grol yongs su smin par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
144a4(mdo sde): po shes rab spyod pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong la sbyin pas dag par rlom sems mi byed pa yin/ tshul
144a5(mdo sde): khrims ma dral cing tshul khrims la mi gnas pa yin/ bzod pa'i stobs la gnas la sems can du 'du shes pa la mi gnas pa yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams la lus
144a6(mdo sde): dang sems dben pa yin/ bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed cing mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa yin/ bdud rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin/ pha rol rgol ba
144a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis rab tu mi sgul pa yin/ 'du byed 'jug pa thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po rgya cher 'jug ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
144b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sa la re ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'jug pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
144b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab spyod pa'i phan yon no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dpa' bo bdog pa thams cad gtong / /des ni dag par rlom sems med/ /tshul khrims
144b3(mdo sde): ma dral srung mod kyi/ /de la gnas par byed pa med/ /shes rab can de bzod sgom yang / /sems can 'du shes rnam par bzlog /brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin mod kyi/ /lus
144b4(mdo sde): dang sems ni rnam par dben/ /bsam gtan la yang sgom mod kyi/ /gnas pa med cing rten pa med/ /bdud kyis thub par dka' bar 'gyur/ /shes rab ldan pa'i yon tan
144b5(mdo sde): 'di| |pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis/ /de ni bskyod pa mi nus 'gyur/ /'khor ba na yang snang ba 'thob/ /shes rab yon tan 'di 'dra'o/ /sems can dag ni thams cad
144b6(mdo sde): la| |de ni snying rje che bar 'gyur/ /nyan thos rang rgyal ye shes la/ /nam yang re ba skyed mi 'gyur/ /bdog pa thams cad gtong yang rlom sems med/ /tshul khrims ma dral tshul
144b7(mdo sde): khrims mi gnas te/ /bzod pa sgom yang sems can 'du shes med/ /shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /brtson 'grus brtsams kyang rnam par dben pa yin/ /mi gnas
145a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed cing rten pa med/ /mkhas pa de ni bdud kyis thub par dka'/ /shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /pha rol rgol bas bskyod
145a2(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur zhing / /des ni 'dus byas 'di yi gting rnyed pas/ /sems can dag la snying rje rgya cher skyed/ /shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /de ltar sangs rgyas
145a3(mdo sde): yon tan de gnas pas/ /rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos rnams la ni/ /de dag nam yang smon pa mi skyed de/ /shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /gzhon nu/ byang chub
145a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du thos pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed pa dang / gnod sems mi skyed pa
145a5(mdo sde): dang | the tshom rnam par 'byed pa dang / lta ba drang por byed pa dang / lam log pa spong ba dang / lam la gnas pa dang / mi 'chi ba'i sgor gnas pa dang / byang chub tu bsnyen
145a6(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can thams cad la snang bar gyur pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa ste/ gzhon nu/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
145a7(mdo sde): chen po mang du thos pa'i phan yon no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ yang dag ji bzhin mkhyen pa yi/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /mang du thos pa'i phan yon ni/ /
145b1(mdo sde): bcu po 'di dag rab tu bshad/ /nyon mongs rnam par byang ba yi/ /phyogs gnyis po ni des shes te/ /kun nas nyon mongs yongs spangs nas/ /rnam par byang ba'i lam la ston/ /nem
145b2(mdo sde): nur rnam 'byed ye shes ldan/ /lta ba drang por rab srong zhing / /log pa'i lam yang rnam spangs te/ /drang po'i lam la gnas par byed/ /mi 'chi sgo la de gnas shing / /byang chub tu yang
145b3(mdo sde): nye bar 'gyur/ /sems can la yang snang 'gyur te/ /ngan song dag la 'jigs pa med/ /kun nas nyon mongs chos mang rab shes shing / /rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyang de bzhin shes/ /
145b4(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs yongs su spangs nas ni/ /rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi mchog la slob/ /srog chags kun gyi nem nur rnam 'byed cing / /de yi lta ba rtag tu drang por 'gyur/ /de ni log
145b5(mdo sde): pa'i lam yang rnam spangs te/ /zhi ba drang po'i lam la rtag tu gnas/ /mi 'chi lam la khor mor gnas 'gyur zhing / /dri med byang chub la yang nye bar 'gyur/ /srog chags mang po
145b6(mdo sde): kun la'ang snang bar 'gyur/ /de ni ngan 'gro dag la'ang 'jigs pa med/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyin pa lhur byed pa/ gzhan la chos
145b7(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bya ba ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang / bya ba la 'jug pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i chos la gnas
146a1(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po thob par byed pa dang / dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang / nyon mongs pa tshar gcod
146a2(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can thams cad la skal ba'i shas sbyin pa dang / de la dmigs pa'i byams pa sgom pa dang / tshe 'di la bde ba 'thob pa ste/ gzhon nu/ bcu po 'di dag ni
146a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa lhur byed pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i phan yon no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ su dag ser sna med par ni/ /chos
146a4(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pa mchog sbyin byed/ /de yi legs pa rnam bcur ni/ /'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bshad/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spong / /mkhas pa bya ba rnams la 'jug /skyes bu
146a5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos la dad/ /gtong ba'i sems la sten par byed/ /sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam sbyong ste/ /de yi zhing ni bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub snying por rtag tu 'dug /chos kyi sbyin
146a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu 'di/ /dngos po thams cad gtong byed cing / /chos kyi rgyal po'i rjes su slob/ /nyon mongs pa yang tshar bcad pa/ /de la byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /sems can kun la
146a7(mdo sde): skal pa'i shas/ /byams pa'i sems kyis rab tu sbyin/ /de ni phrag dog med 'gyur te/ /mi ma yin pa'i skyid pa 'thob/ /mkhas pas bya ba ma yin rnam spangs te/ /rtogs par bya ba
146b1(mdo sde): dag la gnas par byed/ /mkhas pa su dag chos kyi sbyin pa gtong / /bdag nyid chen po'i chos la rtag tu gnas/ /de yi zhing yang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /byang chub phyogs kyi
146b2(mdo sde): chos rnams rnam par 'phel/ /byang chub snying por rtag tu nye bar gyur/ /chos rnams byin pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /nyon mongs med cing dngos po yongs su btang / /dngos po'i rang
146b3(mdo sde): gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes/ /yongs su 'dzin pa kun las rnam par grol/ /de la chags pa nam yang yod mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa'i sems ni shin tu nyer gzhag pa/ /sems can
146b4(mdo sde): thams cad bde bar gyur cig ces/ /de ni byams sems 'gyur zhing phrag dog med/ /tshe 'di dag la'ang bde ba mi nyung 'gyur/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
146b5(mdo sde): chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la gnas pa dang / mi gnas par bsam gtan byed pa dang / skye ba la mi
146b6(mdo sde): smon pa dang / tshul khrims la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa la mi skur ba dang / mi 'gal bar gnas pa dang / dngos po mi dmigs pa dang / dben par gyur pa dang / sangs
146b7(mdo sde): rgyas la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ste/ gzhon nu/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i phan yon no/ /de
147a1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi dbang gnas pa gang yin pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te/ /des ni rnal 'byor gnas par byed/ /de la srog rnams dmigs
147a2(mdo sde): pa med/ /'jig rten kun la mi gnas shing / /'phags pa'i bsam gtan mi gtong ste/ /chos kyi rang bzhin mthong nas ni/ /skye ba la yang smon mi byed/ /tshul khrims mchog
147a3(mdo sde): tu mi 'dzin cing / /tshul khrims la yang gnas mi byed/ /zag pa med pa'i lam gzhan la/ /cung zad skur bar de mi byed/ /'gal ba med par de gnas shing / /rtsod pa dag kyang
147a4(mdo sde): yong med de/ /rnal 'byor dngos po mi dmigs shing / /rtag tu dben par gnas par byed/ /de ni srog gi don phyir yang / /sangs rgyas skur ba mi 'debs te/ /stong pa nyid la
147a5(mdo sde): des gyur cing / /lus kyi mngon sum 'jigs pa med/ /'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab/ /gus par byas nas chos 'dzin te/ /sangs
147a6(mdo sde): rgyas chos la nem nur med/ /gang dag mu stegs mang po'i sa ma yin/ /skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni gnas pa de/ /gang la srog med gang zag sems can med/ /de la byang chub sems
147a7(mdo sde): dpa' gnas par byed/ /de la gnas pa nam yang yod ma yin/ /mi gnas par ni bsam gtan bde ba sten/ /chos la sems can bdag med rnam rig pas/ /skye bar yang ni 'du
147b1(mdo sde): shes yong mi 'byung / /chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin rnam par rig /tshul khrims la yang cung zad gnas pa med/ /tshul khrims kyis ni dag par yongs mi sems/ /sangs rgyas dag
147b2(mdo sde): la rtag tu dad par byed/ /thams cad rang bzhin stong par rnam bsgoms pas/ /de la 'gal ba nam yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam chos bzung nas ni/ /'dren
147b3(mdo sde): pa dag la nam yang mi skur to/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang du yang dag par 'jog la mngon par brtson pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ /bcu gang zhe
147b4(mdo sde): na| 'di lta ste/ sems rnyog pa med pa dang / bag yod par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / spyod pa la dad pa dang / ye shes la nem nur med pa dang / sangs rgyas la
147b5(mdo sde): byas pa gzo ba dang / chos mi spong ba dang / shin tu bsdams par gnas pa dang / dul ba'i sa rjes su thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon sum du byed pa ste/ gzhon nu/
147b6(mdo sde): bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang du yang dag par 'jog la mngon par brtson pa'i phan yon no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de yi sems ni rnyog
147b7(mdo sde): pa med/ /bag med thams cad rnam spangs te/ /bag yod la yang gnas byed cing / /yang dag 'jog la spyod yul ba/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyod thos nas/ /sangs rgyas la ni
148a1(mdo sde): dad par byed/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes rnal 'byor the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rnams la byas pa gzo/ /sangs rgyas chos la the tshom
148a2(mdo sde): med| |shin tu bsdams shing gnas byed de/ /dul ba'i sa la rab tu gnas/ /yang dag rig pa des thob ste/ /rnyed dang bkur sti spangs nas su/ /gcig pu nags khrod mos
148a3(mdo sde): par byed/ /yang dag 'jog la spyod yul ba/ /de yi sems ni rnyog pa med par 'gyur/ /bag med pa yang thams cad yongs spangs te/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag tu bag yod 'gyur/ /
148a4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas dran nas ni/ /de yi spyod pa bla na med la dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen la the tshom med/ /
148a5(mdo sde): bsam gtan brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /sangs rgyas dag la rtag tu byas pa gzo/ /de ni srog gi phyir yang chos mi spong / /thams cad dus su shin tu bsdams par gnas/ /
148a6(mdo sde): ting 'dzin brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /shin tu dul ba'i sa ni rjes thob cing / /yang dag rig pa myur du mngon sum byed/ /tshig gi rgyun mi chad cing spobs par ldan/ /mdo
148a7(mdo sde): sde bye ba khrag khrig ston par byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub myur du de 'dzin te/ /'dren pa dag gis bstan pa yongs su srung / /des ni pha rol rgol ba kun bcom ste/ /sangs rgyas
148b1(mdo sde): kyi yang byang chub rgyas par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni shi 'phos nas/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams su 'gro /tshe dpag med las chos bzang mchog thos nas/ /skye ba med
148b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos la bzod pa 'thob/ / //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po dgu pa/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon par
148b3(mdo sde): gnas pa lhur byed pa dag gi phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bya ba nyung bar gnas pa dang / 'du 'dzi ring ba nas kyang ring du spong ba dang / de la rtsod pa med par
148b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa med par gnas pa dang / zag pa 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / rtsod pa'i gzhi mi byed pa dang / shin tu zhi bar spyod pa dang / shin tu bsdams par gnas pa dang /
148b5(mdo sde): thar pa dang mthun pa'i sems kyi rgyud du 'gyur ba dang / myur du rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed pa ste/ gzhon nu/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
148b6(mdo sde): dgon par gnas pa lhur byed pa'i phan yon no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rtag tu bya ba nyung bar 'gyur/ /'du 'dzi dag kyang ring du spong / /nags khrod gcig pu gnas pa ni/ /rtsod
148b7(mdo sde): pa dag kyang de la med/ /gnod pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /zag pa rnam par 'phel mi byed/ /de la rtsod gzhi mi 'byung ste/ /dgon par gnas pa'i yon tan 'di/ /lus dang ngag
149a1(mdo sde): yid rab bsdams te/ /de ni nye bar zhi bar spyod/ /thar pa dang ni mthun gyur cing / /rnam par grol ba myur du rig /rnal 'byor pa ni rtag tu bya ba nyung / /
149a2(mdo sde): 'du 'dzi mang po'i nyes pa kun spangs te/ /rnal 'byor pa dag nam yang rtsod mi byed/ /dgon par gnas pa'i phan yon 'di dag go /nam zhig de ni 'dus byas skyo gyur cing / /
149a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du ni gang la'ang 'dod pa med/ /zag pa dag kyang 'phel bar mi byed pa/ /nags khrod gnas pa de yi phan yon yin/ /de la rtsod gzhi nam yang mi 'byung ste/ /rtag tu zhi
149a4(mdo sde): la dga' zhing dben par spyod/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang bsdams pa ste/ /dgon par gnas pa de la yon tan mang / /de ni thar pa dang yang mthun gyur te/ /nags khrod
149a5(mdo sde): gnas shing rnam grol de bsten pas/ /rnam grol zhi ba myur du des rtogs 'gyur/ /'di kun dgon par gnas pa'i yon tan yin/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa'
149a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bsod snyoms spyod pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de shes kyi khe
149a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / de snyan pa 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / de rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / de 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la gnas pa dang / de tshul 'chos pa
149b1(mdo sde): dang | kha gsag med par 'gyur ba dang / de bdag la mi bstod gzhan la mi smod pa dang / de rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pas gzhan gyi khyim du spyod pa dang / zang zing med
149b2(mdo sde): par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas shing chos bstan pa gzung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ gzhon nu/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub
149b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod snyoms spyod pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i phan yon no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sbyangs pa dag la gang gnas
149b4(mdo sde): pa| |shes kyi khe yang mi 'dod cing / /snyan pa la yang mi smon te/ /rnyed dang ma rnyed mtshungs pa'i yid/ /sbyangs pa dag la gang gnas pa/ /'phags pa'i rigs ni mi gtong zhing / /tshul
149b5(mdo sde): 'chos pa dang kha gsag rnams/ /thams cad ring du rnam par spong / /bdag nyid la ni mi bstod cing / /gzhan dag la yang smod mi byed/ /khong khro rjes su chags med cing / /zang zing
149b6(mdo sde): med par chos ston te/ /de yi tshig kyang gzung bar 'gyur/ /bsod snyoms yon tan 'di dag go /shes kyi khe dang snyan dang rnyed mi 'tshol/ /'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la ni gnas
149b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ /mkhas pa tshul 'chos kha gsag med pa yin/ /sbyangs la brtson pa'i yon tan 'di 'dra'o/ /bdag la mi bstod gzhan la mi smod cing / /rtsub por smras kyang 'khrug
150a1(mdo sde): par yong mi 'gyur/ /bsngags pa thos kyang dga' ba mi skyed de/ /de ni bsod snyoms dag gis mgu bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med par sbyin/ /
150a2(mdo sde): de ni rnyed dang bkur sti mi 'tshol te/ /de yis bshad pa dag kyang gzung bar 'gyur/ /sbyangs par brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/ /gzhon nu/ de lta bu'i chos kyi yon tan la
150a3(mdo sde): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon pa la gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gter rnyed par 'gyur/ chos kyi gter rnyed par 'gyur/ ye shes kyi gter rnyed
150a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa'i gter rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs
150a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi gter rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben pa na spyod cing dgon par gnas nas mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob ste/
150a6(mdo sde): lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul te/ gzhon nu/ mngon
150a7(mdo sde): par shes pa 'di lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /de mi'i las 'das pa'i lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams mthong ngo / /de
150b1(mdo sde): bzhin du lha dang / nub dang / byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams mthong ste/ de sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu/
150b2(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi gter rnyed pa yin no/ /gzhon nu/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi gter rnyed pa yin
150b3(mdo sde): zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag phyogs bcu na chos ci ston pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis thos te/ de chos nyan pa dang mi
150b4(mdo sde): 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi gter rnyed pa yin no/ /gzhon nu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
150b5(mdo sde): po ye shes kyi gter rnyed pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de dang ldan pas chos thams cad 'dzin te/ kun bzung nas mi brjed cing sems can
150b6(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston te/ gang gi don gang yin pa de'ang rab tu shes so/ /gzhon nu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi gter rnyed pa yin no/ /gzhon nu/
150b7(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa'i gter rnyed pa yin zhe na/ de mngon par shes pas 'das
151a1(mdo sde): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa shes pa la 'jug ste/ gzhon nu/ de ltar na byang chub
151a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa'i gter rnyed pa yin no/ /gzhon nu/ mdor na byang chub sems dpa'
151a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang ma yin na pha rol
151a4(mdo sde): rgol ba thams cad lta ci smos/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa rtag tu dgon gnas te/ /sangs rgyas gter dang chos kyi gter/ /ye shes gter dang sngon mtha'i gter/ /
151a5(mdo sde): mngon shes lnga yang myur du 'thob/ /phan yon bcu'i le'u ste/ nyi shu dgu pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
151a6(mdo sde): stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na lha'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba'ang spangs te rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/
151a7(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas kyang sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas shing dben par gnas pa dang / bzod pa dang / des pa phun sum tshogs par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ mgo
151b1(mdo sde): dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams te chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun
151b2(mdo sde): chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la'ang rgya
151b3(mdo sde): cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ bse ru lta bur gyur pas gnyis su med par dgon pa dang nags 'dab tu rtag tu gnas par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ bdag nyid yongs
151b4(mdo sde): su gtong bas kyang sems can de dag gi don bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe don de nyid brjod pa'i phyir/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di tshigs
151b5(mdo sde): su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /'das pa'i bskal pa brgya mang rab dran te/ /grags pa mtha' yas 'dren pa gang byung ba/ /lha mi klu yi tshogs kyis mchod
151b6(mdo sde): pa ste/ /mtshan ni gzi brjid tshogs rgyal rgyal ba yin/ /dge slong bye ba phrag bcu drug mngon shes/ /yang dag rig dang dbang gi pha rol phyin/ /sbyangs tshul yo byad bsnyungs
151b7(mdo sde): pa zhi pa'i yid/ /de yi dus na de yi tshogs rnams byung / /grong khyer bye ba brgya phrag bdun cu drug /dpag tshad lnga yi tshad dang mnyam pas te/ /rin chen sna bdun bye brag 'phags
152a1(mdo sde): pa'i mchog / de tshe dzam+bu'i gling 'dir byung bar gyur/ /de tshe grong mchog dam pa de kun kyang / /skyed mos tshal brgya mang pos rab tu brgyan/ /skyed mos
152a2(mdo sde): tshal kun stug pa'i sprin bzhin du/ /me tog 'bras bus brgyan cing shing rnams rgyas/ /bza' shing rigs kyang sna tshogs mdzes pa dag /la ku a mra dzam+bu ba nas dkrigs/ /
152a3(mdo sde): kar ni tsam+pa pur na brgya yis kyang / /skyed mos tshal mchog de dag rab tu brgyan/ /n+ya gro ng+ha las bya mang sgra 'byin te/ /khu byug ka la ping+ka rma bya brgya/ /shang shang te'u dang kun la sgra 'byin
152a4(mdo sde): pa| |bya tshogs mang po de tshe snyan par sgrog / ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang skya 'dra ba dang / /bung ba kun la sgra dbyangs mchog sgrog ste/ /yan lag bkra zhing tshon che kha dog 'bar/ /shin tu
152a5(mdo sde): yid 'ong sgra 'jam dga' ba 'byin/ /de yi dus na bya mang de dag 'dus gyur te/ /ka la ping+ka rma bya ne tso dang / /khu byug ri skegs bya rnams sna tshogs pa/ /bya mang de dag sna tshogs
152a6(mdo sde): sgra yang 'byin/ /skyed mos tshal brgya dag na de dag gnas/ /btang zung mya ngan 'tshang dang paR+sha ka /a ti mug+ta me tog 'dab ma dang / /pad+ma ut+pal ku mud pad+ma dkar/ /pad+ma
152a7(mdo sde): 'dab stong brgya yis rab tu brgyan/ /me tog de dag rdzing bu mdzes par byed/ /dri zhim spos mchog dam pas so sor brgyan/ /rdzing bu sdug cing shin tu mdzes par gyur/ /de
152b1(mdo sde): tshe dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po ni/ /mi dbang brtan pas byin zhes bya ba byung / /de yi bu yang brgya phrag lnga yod de/ /byang bzhin bzang zhing shin tu blta na sdug /de tshe rgyal srid zhi zhing bde
152b2(mdo sde): bar gyur/ /gtse ba med cing dbyangs dga' rnal du bab/ /dzam+bu'i gling yang me tog mang pos brgyan/ /lha yi gnas dang ma tshungs shing bye brag med/ /de tshe sdig med stobs bcu ldan pa
152b3(mdo sde): mi| |rgyal ba de ni ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'char/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba rmi lam lta bu ste/ /'di la su yang mi skye 'chi ba med/ /sems can ming dang srog kyang mi rnyed de/ /chos 'di rnams ni rmi
152b4(mdo sde): lam chu shing 'dra/ /sgyu ma lta bu nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste/ /chu yi zla ba 'dra zhing smig rgyu bzhin/ /mi gang 'jig rten 'dir yang shi nas ni/ /'jig rten gzhan du 'pho zhing 'gro med kyang / /
152b5(mdo sde): las byas rnams ni nam yang med mi 'gyur/ /'khor ba na yang dkar gnag 'bras bu smin/ /rtag pa ma yin chad par mi 'gyur te/ /las bsags med cing gnas pa dag kyang med/ /
152b6(mdo sde): de yang byas nas reg par mi 'gyur min/ /gzhan gyis byas pa tshor bar 'gyur ba'ang med/ /'pho ba med cing phyir yang 'od ba med/ /thams cad yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang min//
152b7(mdo sde): 'di ni lta gnas 'jug pa dag pa min/ /sems can spyod pa rab zhi 'jug pa med/ /bde gshegs spyod yul rgyal ba'i yon tan ni/ /skye med zhi ba mtshan ma med pa'i gnas/ /
153a1(mdo sde): stobs dang gzungs rnams dang ni stobs bcu'i stobs/ /'di ni sangs rgyas khyu mchog gyur pa'i mchog /dkar po'i chos mchog yon tan bsags
153a2(mdo sde): pa ste/ /yon tan ye shes gzungs dang stobs rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba bya ba'i mchog /mngon shes mchog lnga 'thob pa dam pa'i tshul/ /'dir ni rang
153a3(mdo sde): bzhin gang na'ang shes pa med/ /'gro dang 'dug med mkhas pa'i chos kyi 'gros/ /chos kyi dbyings ni gar yang mi 'gro ste/ /de 'dra'i 'gro ba 'gro med chos kyi 'gros/ /
153a4(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi tshogs med ngo bo nyid kyi 'gros/ /'gro ba'i rang bzhin gang du'ang mi gnas te/ /mi gnas mi rten rang bzhin 'jug pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul rdul bral zhi ba'i
153a5(mdo sde): gnas/ /zhi ba rab zhi nye bar zhi ba'i 'gros/ /'gro ba de ni gar yang mi gnas te/ /rtag tu dngos po'i rang bzhin rjes su song / /mkhas shing mi g.yo mthong dka' shin tu
153a6(mdo sde): gnas/ /de ni mi g.yo bdag nyid gnas pa ste/ /mi gnas ma 'ongs rang bzhin gnas pa yin/ /rang bzhin gnas pa bshad par mi nus te/ /de ni stong pa mi g.yo chos kyi
153a7(mdo sde): gnas/ /dbyangs kyis bshad kyang dbyangs kyi 'jug pa med/ /dbyangs kyi rang bzhin 'jug pa chos kyi 'gros/ /dbyangs kyi tshogs gnas gang na'ang yod ma yin/ /de ltar
153b1(mdo sde): rang bzhin 'jug pa chos kyi 'gros/ /'gros kyi sgrar gsungs sems can 'gro ba med/ /chos kyi rang bzhin mkhas don 'gro ba ste/ /dbyangs kyang brjod de sems can 'gro ba med//
153b2(mdo sde): dbyangs rnams mi rnyed sems can 'gro ba med/ /mtha' dang mtha' med ma yin dbus 'gro med/ /yod med ma yin phyogs su 'gro ba med/ /rang bzhin 'gro ba ci 'dra shes pa ni/ /
153b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'di dag mnyam/ /sdul bral rnam par dag pa don dam gnas/ /zhi zhing rab zhi rdul med rdul bral ba/ /rtog dang rlom sems med pa rab zhi gnas/ /
153b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba thugs rje'i mchog ldan ston par mdzad/ /'di la yi ge spyod pa yod ma yin/ /'gro ba yangs shing yangs dog 'gro ba ste/ /sangs rgyas dag gis bsnyen cing rgyal bas bstod/
153b5(mdo sde): snang ba'i chos kyi tshul ni 'jug pa phra/ /de la gnas nas bde gshegs mtshungs med pa/ /chos kyi gter ni rdul bral yangs pa dang / /rin chen chos rnams rdul bral don dam stong / /
153b6(mdo sde): zhi ba'i don la 'jug pa ston par mdzad/ /rkang gnyis gtso bos ting 'dzin 'di bshad pa/ /rgyal po brtan byin gyis ni de tshe thos/ /de ni bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu dang / /rgyal ba snying
153b7(mdo sde): rje can drung rtag tu 'ongs/ /rgyal ba stobs ldan gus pa rab bskyed de/ /zhabs la mi yi bdag po phyag btsal nas/ /de tshe stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyan sngar 'dug /rab tu dga' zhing sor
154a1(mdo sde): bcu thal mo sbyar/ /de yi spyod pa yongs su dag rig nas/ /dbang po dag la dbang gi pha rol phyin/ /mi mchog rgyal ba mos pa mkhyen pa yis/ /de la ting
154a2(mdo sde): 'dzin dam pa 'di bshad do/ /rgyal po de ni don dam 'di thos tshe/ /'phags pa'i dga' ba mtshungs med skyes nas su/ /gling bzhi dag kyang thams cad rnam spangs te/ /'dod
154a3(mdo sde): pa bor nas khyim nas mngon par byung / /rgyal bar 'gyur zhes byang chub don du yang / /nam tshe rgyal pos sa bor rab byung che/ /dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan 'di yi mi kun kyang / /'dod
154a4(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan rnam spangs rab tu byung / /de tshe stobs bcu'i yon tan rgya che ste/ /brtson yid dge slong ma dang dge slong mang / /de tshe ma rmos ma btab rtsi 'khrungs te/ /lha rnams
154a5(mdo sde): kyang ni g.yog dang bsnyen bkur byed/ /dur smrig chos gos gsum dag byung bar gyur/ /dra ba mnyam zhing drub legs dpe med la/ /dri ma med cing rdul bral gser brgyan pa/ /
154a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yon tan bsod nams stobs las byung / /gzhon nu ltos shig rgyal mchog de yang ni/ /sa rnams thams cad rnam spangs rab byung na/ /zad pa'i dus na sems can
154a7(mdo sde): mang po dag / shin tu longs spyod chung yang khyim mi gtong / /shing sgrog dang ni bcing ba chad pa mang / /gshe zhing skyo bsdug bsngal mi dga' dang / /bla yi chad pa mang po bzod
154b1(mdo sde): par byed/ /longs spyod chung rab khyim na bza' ba med/ /shin tu tshe yang thung la nor yang med/ /rab tu bag chung bsod nams stobs kyang med/ /mi mkhas bzo yi gnas kyang mi
154b2(mdo sde): shes te/ /dbul por gyur cing khyim na nor yang med/ /dri ma ma dag gzhan gyi bud med chags/ /phrag dog byed cing shin tu btsal ba med/ /nyon mongs chos ldan tshul la mi gnas
154b3(mdo sde): kyang | |nged ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhes smra/ /gsug gis slu zhing bab chol byed pa dag /nga ni phyug po 'jig rten chos nor sbyin/ /gnod pa byed cing tshul 'chos sgyu ma dag /nged
154b4(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhes smra/ /gzhan dag ba son cing bcing dang gtse la dga'/ /tshul khrims 'chal ba ma rungs zhe sdang yid/ /byas pa mi gzo dbyen byed 'tshe bar gnas/ /
154b5(mdo sde): btsun pa byang chub spyod pa ston ces smras/ /gang las des ni byang chub spyod thos pa/ /de nyid la ni khong khro rab bskyed nas/ /mkhas pas 'khrul pa'i tshig 'ga' thos na yang / /de la mi
154b6(mdo sde): snyan brgya dag sgrog par byed/ /gzhon nu nga yi tshig 'di thos nas ni/ /de dag dang ni sten par ma byed cing / /byang chub dam pa reg par 'dod na ni/ /rmi lam du yang de la yid mi rton/ /
154b7(mdo sde): sbyangs tshul bsnyungs pa yon tan du ma brjod/ /yon tan bskal pa mang po brgyar bshad kyang / /de yi yon tan dag la mi gnas na/ /byang chub zhi ba mchog ni rtogs mi 'gyur/ /khor
155a1(mdo sde): mor yang ni dge zhing 'jam par gyis/ /tshul khrims dag cing rtag tu dang ba'i yid/ /khor mor tshul khrims yongs su dag par gyis/ /ring por
155a2(mdo sde): mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog thob 'gyur/ /nga rgyal ma byed tha ba ma bskyed par/ /rtag tu yid ni yongs su dag par gyis/ /nga rgyal rgyags dang 'chab pa kun spongs la/ /ting
155a3(mdo sde): 'dzin mchog 'dir rab tu thob par gyis/ /rtag tu yon tan las ni rgyal ba dran/ /gser mchog mdog 'dra shin tu 'od mdzad pa/ /mtshan mo gnam la skar mas gang ba
155a4(mdo sde): ltar| |thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis yongs su rgyas/ /'chag cing 'dug dang 'greng zhing nyal ba na/ /mi gang thub pa'i zla ba dran byed pa/ /de yi mdun na rtag tu ston pa bzhugs/ /
155a5(mdo sde): de ni rgya cher mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla re ba dan mchog /phye ma byug pa mang po kun thogs la/ /rtag tu bde bar gshegs la mchod pa gyis/ /ring
155a6(mdo sde): por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob/ /spos mchog phreng ba me tog bdug pa dang / /rol mo sil snyan mang po rab thogs la/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la mchod pa gyis/ /
155a7(mdo sde): ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob/ /glu gar bzang po sna tshogs mang po dang / /yid gtsang bzhad gad rol mo bzang po dang / /rtag par mar me'i phreng sdug bzang po yis//
155b1(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med la mchod bzang rab tu gyis/ /'khar rnga dang ni sgra snyan rdza rnga brgya/ /rnga dang gling bu'i sgra mchog sna tshogs dang / /sgra snyan rol mo'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis/ /dang ba'i yid
155b2(mdo sde): ldan 'dren pa mchod par gyis/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs shin tu mdzes pa dag /rin chen byi dor legs par byas pa yang / /blta na sdug cing shin tu bzang po gyis/ /ring por mi thogs/
155b3(mdo sde): ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob/ /de bzhin gser dag dang na dngul dag dang / /tsan+dan gyi ni sku gzugs bzang po dag /mdzes shing shin tu blta na sdug pa gyis/ /ring por mi thogs
