155b4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob/ /'jim pa dang ni de bzhin rdo ba dang / /shing dang ri mor bris pa'i sku gzugs dag /mdzes shing shin tu blta na sdug pa gyis/ /ring por mi thogs ting
155b5(mdo sde): 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob/ /rtag tu nags khyed dben par bsten par gyis/ /grong dang grong khyer dga' ba rnam spongs la/ /bse ru lta bur gnyis su med par gyis/ /ring por mi
155b6(mdo sde): thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob/ /nga ni chos rje khyod ni nga yi bu/ /nga yi ting 'dzin spyod pa rjes su slobs/ /nga ni de tshe phyogs su grags pa yi/ /mi dbang brtan pas byin zhes bya
155b7(mdo sde): bar gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /das sngon sangs rgyas mtha' yas mchod byas pa/ /rtag par ngas ni tshul khrims rnams dag bsrungs/ /nga yis stobs
156a1(mdo sde): bcu dag la ri mor byas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /ngas sngon bu dang chung ma yongs btang ste/ /mgo dang rkang lag mig mchog
156a2(mdo sde): bzang po byin/ /zhum pa'i sems su nam yang yongs ma byas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /nor 'bru bran pho bran mo brgya mang dang / /rin chen mang po
156a3(mdo sde): ngas ni yongs btang ste/ /slong ba mang po shin tu tshim par byas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /ngas sngon gser dang mu tig shel mang dang / /dung dang
156a4(mdo sde): man shel dang ni bai DUR+ya/ /nor bu gzugs gtsang byu ru 'bru rnams btang / /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /ngas ni rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan rnams dang / /mu
156a5(mdo sde): tig phreng mchog de bzhin seng ge can/ /rin chen dra ba bzang zhing mang ba btang / /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /ngas sngon gos mchog phra mo bye ba dag /
156a6(mdo sde): yongs su gtsang bkra shi du kul mchog /gser gyis spras pa mang po yongs su btang / /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /rta dang bal glang shing rta sna tshogs
156a7(mdo sde): dang | |bu dang chung ma rab sdug ngas btang ste/ /yid mi bde ba nam yang ma byung ngo / /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /'tshol bas sdug bsngal nyon mongs
156b1(mdo sde): gyur pa yi/ /shin tu dbul ba'i mi dag ngas mthong nas/ /de dag ngas ni dbul ba med par byas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /rta dang bal glang shing rta khrag
156b2(mdo sde): khrig dag / nor bu rin chen brgyan pa'i dra bas g.yogs/ /ngas sngon slong ba dag la sbyin pa byas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /ngas sngon skyed mos tshal ni mang
156b3(mdo sde): po dag / bye ba khrag khrig legs par brgyan byas te/ /yid kyang dga' zhing snying rje bskyed nas byin/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor
156b4(mdo sde): grong 'dab kyang / /ngas sngon legs par brgyan nas yongs su btang / /byin nas rtag tu dga' ba myong bar byas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /rin chen phung po ri
156b5(mdo sde): rab mnyam pa dang / /de bzhin gos dang rgyan rnams mang po yang / /ngas sngon slong bdag la sbyin pa byas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /shin tu dbul ba ngas ni
156b6(mdo sde): phyug por byas/ /rab tu nyon mongs gyur pa ngas bskyabs te/ /sdug bsngal gtses pa mang po bde bar byas/ /nga ni sa steng dbang phyug gyur pa'i tshe/ /skye bo'i tshogs rnams sdug bsngal
156b7(mdo sde): mthong nas ni/ /snying rje bskyed nas bde bar gyur cig ces/ /de dag la ni nga yis rgyal srid btang / /gzhon nu ngas ni ngo mtshar byas pa dang / /bskal pa brgya mang dka' ba ci spyad pa/ /
157a1(mdo sde): ngas ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /de dag bshad kyang zad par mi nus so/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /ngas ni ngo mtshar
157a2(mdo sde): dka' ba spyad pa ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod lam dad pa/ /mi rnams sems ni myos shing bslad par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu khyod la shin tu bsgo bar bya/ /dad par gyis
157a3(mdo sde): shig nga la mi bden med/ /bde gshegs rdzun gyi tshig ni mi gsung ste/ /thugs rje rgyal ba rtag tu bden par gsung / /ji ltar ting 'dzin mchog kyang 'thob 'gyur zhing / /
157a4(mdo sde): sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal thar bya zhes/ /bskal pa mang por spyod pa 'di dag dang / /gzhan yang ngas ni rnam pa mang po sbyangs/ /skad cig gang la ting 'dzin 'di yang
157a5(mdo sde): ni| |nga yis rab tu thob par gyur pa'i tshe/ /ting 'dzin dam pa ye shes chen po'i lam/ /ngas thob sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mthong / /rdzu 'phrul dag kyang mtha' yas ngas
157a6(mdo sde): thob ste/ /zhing brgya dag tu rnam par sprul pas 'gro /song nas gnas ni snying rje ldan pa la/ /dri ba bye ba khrag khrig mang po dris/ /bde gshegs dag gis nga la ci bstan pa/ /de
157a7(mdo sde): tshe dri ba bye ba khrag khrig bzung / /nga yis ma lus thams cad bzung byas te/ /tshig gcig tsam yang nga la nyams pa med/ /dri ba khrag khrig bye ba mang po yi/ /yang dag pa yi tshul
157b1(mdo sde): de ngas thos nas/ /rdul bral zhi ba'i gnas de ngas bshad de/ /sems can mang po ye shes lam la bkod/ /ngas ni ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nas su/ /bskal pa brgyar yang yang
157b2(mdo sde): dag tshul bslabs te/ /ngas sngon sems can bye ba khrag khrig rnams/ /rdul dang bral ba'i lam mchog dam par bkod/ /gang gis sngon gyi bde bar gshegs pa dag /rdul dang
157b3(mdo sde): bral ba'i tshul 'di ston pa rnams/ /ma mthong bas ni don dam stong pa yi/ /ting 'dzin mchog la dad par mi nus so/ /mi gang dang cing mkhas la cho ga shes/ /yang dag tshul zab
157b4(mdo sde): tshul rnams thos pa ni/ /de dag mi skrag dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ /thos nas rtag tu yid kyang rangs par 'gyur/ /de dang de dag byang chub 'di 'dzin te/ /de dag rjes su skyes pa'i nga
157b5(mdo sde): yi bu/ /de dag u dum+ba ra'i me tog 'dra/ /de phyir bskal pa brgyar yang ngas spyod do/ /ting 'dzin mchog 'di mi gang 'dzin pa ni/ /de dag log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa med/ /rtag
157b6(mdo sde): tu mi khom brgyad dang de bral te/ /sangs rgyas khrag khrig shin tu mang po mthong / /gang gi lag na ting 'dzin mchog yod pa/ /rgyal ba byams pa grags pa mtha' yas bzhin/ /sems
157b7(mdo sde): can rnams kyi don mang byed 'gyur zhes/ /blo gros mtha' yas de ni ngas lung bstan/ /ting 'dzin mchog 'di mi gang 'dzin pa ni/ /de dag dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan/ /rtogs
158a1(mdo sde): ldan ye shes 'phags pa thos pa 'dzin/ /de yi spobs pa dag kyang rgya cher 'gyur/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mchod
158a2(mdo sde): par bya ba yin/ /mis kyang rtag tu phyag byar 'os pa ste/ /khor mor 'byung po'i tshogs kyis mngon par srung / /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /de dag me dang chur yang
158a3(mdo sde): mi 'chi zhing / /de la dug dang mtshon gyis mi tshugs te/ /dgra dag gis kyang brgal bar mi nus 'gyur/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /de dag nags khrod shong
158a4(mdo sde): gnas rtag par yang / /lha dag khor mor bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin mang po de yi g.yog kyang byed/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /ye shes dag
158a5(mdo sde): kyang rgya mtsho 'dra bar 'gyur/ /thub pa'i yon tan brjod la thogs pa med/ /sangs rgyas yon tan yang dag rjod par byed/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /de yi thos
158a6(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas mu med de/ /tshad rnyed mi 'gyur ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin/ /ye shes sgron ma 'dzin cing rab rib sel/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /rtag par 'jam
158a7(mdo sde): zhing rigs pa'i tshig smra ste/ /'khor gyi nang du dga' bar 'gyur ba ston/ /seng ge bzhin du de ni sgra rnams sgrog /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /de ni sman pa dpyad mkhan
158b1(mdo sde): 'dra bar yang / /mang po'i rten dang dpung gnyen skyabs su 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na snang bar gyur cing spyod/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /'khrig pa dag la yid
158b2(mdo sde): kyang dga' mi byed/ /zhi gnas dga' zhing bsam gtan bde ba reg /rab tu zhi ba'i dbyings su zhi bar smra/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /de yid mtshan ma dag la
158b3(mdo sde): mi dga' ste/ /mtshan ma mang po thams cad rnam par bshig /mkhas pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing spyod/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /de yi mig kyang tha mal
158b4(mdo sde): ma yin 'thob/ /des ni rgyal ba mtha' yas mthong bar 'gyur/ /mtha' yas mig ldan de ni khyu mchog 'gyur/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /khrung khrung sgra dbyangs
158b5(mdo sde): 'jam zhing mnyen dang ldan/ /ka la ping+ka rnga yi dbyangs su 'gyur/ /glu dbyangs ldan zhing sgra skad 'jam par 'gyur/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /sprin gyi 'brug sgra
158b6(mdo sde): bsgrags pa'i skad rnams dang / /ngang pa'i sgra dbyangs bzhin du 'jam par sgrog /dbyangs kyi yan lag lnga brgyar ldan pa'i sgra/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /bskal
158b7(mdo sde): pa bye ba mang po khrag khrig tu/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag sna tshogs ldan pa yi/ /sgra dbyangs snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung / /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /zas la yi
159a1(mdo sde): kyang chags par mi 'gyur te/ /lhung bzed chos gos dag la dga' ma yin/ /'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes yo byad bsnyungs/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog
159a2(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /bdag nyid la yang bstod par mi 'gyur zhing / /gar yang gzhan la mi snyan mi brjod de/ /rtag tu bsam gtan dga' zhing phra ba'i sems/ /mi gang ting 'dzin
159a3(mdo sde): mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /rtag tu bdag nyid la yang rtog 'gyur te/ /gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag ni de mi 'tshol/ /'jig rten kun dang de ni mi 'phrod med/ /mi gang ting 'dzin
159a4(mdo sde): mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /spyod pa yongs dag sems la nyon mongs med/ /rtag tu g.yo yang med cing 'drid pa med/ /khor mor 'jam zhing rnam par thar la dga'/ /mi gang ting
159a5(mdo sde): 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /rtag tu gtong la shin tu mos par 'gyur/ /de ni ser sna'i sems la dga' mi byed/ /khor mor tshul khrims dang yang ldan par 'gyur/ /mi
159a6(mdo sde): gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing blta sdug mdzes pa ste/ /mdog kyang gser mchog 'dra bar snang bar byed/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams
159a7(mdo sde): 'chang bar 'gyur/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /de dag rtag par rab tu mdzes par 'gyur/ /khor mor rtog cing skye bo mang po la/ /phangs shing sdug ste lta bas mi
159b1(mdo sde): ngoms 'gyur/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /lha dang klu dang de bzhin gnod sbyin rnams/ /rtag tu yi rang dga' zhing mgu nas ni/ /grong du zhugs nas de yi bsngags
159b2(mdo sde): pa smra/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /tshangs pa brgya byin dbang sgyur mang po dag /rtag par de la rim gro rab tu byed/ /de yi yid kyang khengs par yong mi 'gyur/ /mi gang
159b3(mdo sde): ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /de la ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ste/ /mi khom med cing log ltung 'jigs pa med/ /log ltung 'jigs pa kun las yongs su grol/ /mi gang
159b4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos mchog zhib mo thos nas kyang / /de la nem nur yid gnyis mi 'byung ste/ /ye shes zab mo'i rjes su song ba yin/ /mi gang ting
159b5(mdo sde): 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ phra ba'i chos rnams gang dag ci thos kyang / /thams cad la ni dbang gi pha rol song / /gtan tshigs zhib cing stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mi gang
159b6(mdo sde): ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /rgyal bas gsung ni de skad rab bshad de/ /rtag par bdag ni de ltar bya snyam na/ /gzungs ni bye brag 'phags pa mchog thob 'gyur/ /mi gang
159b7(mdo sde): ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /nam tshe de yang 'chi ba'i dus byed pa/ /'od dpag med pa thugs rjer ldan pa ni/ /dge slong tshogs bcas de yi mdun na bzhugs/ /mi gang ting
160a1(mdo sde): 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /de dag gzungs rnams rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /chos kyi gter la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin/ /spobs dang ldan zhing tshig
160a2(mdo sde): kyang rgyun mi chad/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /chos 'dzin de dag gang du song bar yang / /'gro ba dag la kun tu snang bar 'gyur/ /shin tu spyod pa zhi zhing yid
160a3(mdo sde): rab zhi/ /rab tu dga' dang dri med 'od byed dang / /'od 'phro shin tu sbyang dka' mngon gyur dang / /ring du song dang mi g.yo legs pa'i blo/ /chos sprin sa bcu po yang 'thob par
160a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /tshe dang las dang yo byad mos pa dang / /smon lam rdzu 'phrul skye ba'i stobs rnams dang / /chos dang sems dang de bzhin ye shes che/ /dbang bcu 'di dag dpa' bos
160a5(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur/ /mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /mkhas pa chos kyi mdzod mchog rnam 'byed cing / /chos kyi sku la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin/ /de ni 'gro ba kun gyi
160a6(mdo sde): the tshom gcod/ /sems can thams cad bcom ldan snying rje can/ /srid pa'i mthar phyin bde gshegs gyur pa la/ /bskal pa mang po brgya 'am gang+gA yi/ /bye ma snyed dam lhag
160a7(mdo sde): par mchod byas pas/ /zad pa'i dus ni mi gang la la yis/ /'dir yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas su/ /yi rang zhes ni tshig gcig smras na yang / /snga ma'i bsod nams phung pos
160b1(mdo sde): char mi phod/ /gzhon nu su dag zhi ba'i spyod pa 'di/ /don dam stong pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog /rab tu 'don dang de bzhin glegs bam byas/ /chos smra blo gros dam pa gnas pa yin/
160b2(mdo sde): gzi brjid tshogs kyi rgyal po'i le'u ste/ sum cu pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta
160b3(mdo sde): bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ci nas bdag sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skad shes pa rtogs shing / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa rnam par
160b4(mdo sde): r ig nas chos bstan to snyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par
160b5(mdo sde): bya| gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/
160b6(mdo sde): gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin
160b7(mdo sde): na| |des ni 'das pa'i 'dren pa tshad med rnams kyang mthor/ /sngon gyi srid par brtson byas 'jig rten mgon pos dris/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog la gnas/ /
161a1(mdo sde): thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba gya nom rnyed par 'gyur/ /lha dang mi yi mchod pa dam pa des 'thob ste/ /bsam
161a2(mdo sde): gtan bde dang 'phags pa'i bde ba mchog kyang 'thob/ /thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/ /bsngags pa rgya cher thos kyang de ni dga' mi 'gyur/ /mi snyan pa
161a3(mdo sde): dag thos kyang zhum par mi 'gyur te/ /'jig rten chos brgyad dag gis mi sgul ri bo bzhin/ /thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/ /dge zhing mnyen par smra la
161a4(mdo sde): 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan/ /khro gnyer med cing rtag tu gsong por smra bar 'gyur/ /bzhin yang 'dzum zhing 'dren pa dag gi rjes su slob/ /thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di
161a5(mdo sde): 'dzin na/ /des shing 'grogs na bde la 'jam pa'i sems su 'gyur/ /rtag par rab tu dul zhing dul ba'i sa la gnas/ /'jam zhing dga' ba'i tshig smra shin tu bde bar zer/ /
161a6(mdo sde): thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/ /de ni gtam byed 'gyur yang rtsod cing 'thab pa med/ /zhe sdang tha ba de dag ma lus rnam spangs te/ /rtag par rab tu dga'
161a7(mdo sde): zhing de la mnyen pa yin/ /thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/ /mkhas pa rtag tu gtong la mos par rab 'gyur te/ /shin tu sdug bsngal skye bo mthong nas kha
161b1(mdo sde): zas sbyin/ /gtong la shin tu dga' zhing bdag nyid spyod mi dga'/ /thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/ /lha yang brgya stong de la smon pa shin tu skyed/ /klu dang lha
161b2(mdo sde): min gnod sbyin rtag tu g.yog byed de/ /nags dang nags 'dabs gnas pa de la srung bar byed/ /tshig ni thogs pa med cing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te/ /ngang pa'i sgra skad mi 'am
161b3(mdo sde): ci yi glu yi dbyangs/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag lnga brgya dga' ba'i sgra skad de/ /sgra sgrags shin tu grags pa'i sgra yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /ji snyed zhing rnams de dag skyes bu la la yis/ /
161b4(mdo sde): phra ba'i rdul du byas pa shes par nus kyang ni/ /ting 'dzin rdul bral mchog 'di mi gang 'dzin pa dag /de yi dbyangs sgra de bas shin tu mang bar 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di
161b5(mdo sde): yang mi gang 'dzin pa ni/ /dbang bcu 'thob cing sa yang brgyad dang gnyis 'thob ste/ /mkhas pas sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam yas 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdud rnams thams
161b6(mdo sde): cad btul nas byang chub dam pa rig / phan yon gyi le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
161b7(mdo sde): stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes par bya snyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
162a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/
162a2(mdo sde): bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la'ang yang dag par
162a3(mdo sde): rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/ /de la 'dod chags
162a4(mdo sde): ldang ba med cing zhe sdang med/ /khyu mchog la ni nam yang gti mug ldang ba med/ /des ni nyon mongs ma lus thams cad spangs pa yin/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang
162a5(mdo sde): shes pa/ /de ni bde gshegs thugs sras bslabs pa yong mi 'dor/ /dpa' bo bud med dbang du nam yang mi 'gro ste/ /de dang der ni bde gshegs bstan pa'i dga' ba myong //
162a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rang bzhin tshul gyi rigs pa gang shes pa/ /de ni mkhas pa blo ldan ye shes chog shes/ /de dang de ni sangs rgyas mtha' yas mu med mthong / /de ni gzugs dang ye
162a7(mdo sde): shes mtha' yas rab tu shes/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/ /de ni ring por mi thogs rkang gnyis gtso bor 'gyur/ /de dang de ni sman pa dpyad shes bde ba
162b1(mdo sde): sbyin par 'gyur/ /de ni sdug bsngal zug rngu thams cad 'byin par byed/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/ /de ni sems can 'di dag sdug bsngal na rig nas/ /de ni
162b2(mdo sde): rtag tu bdud rtsi dag gi rnga dag rdung / /de dang de ni ring por mi thogs 'dren par 'gyur/ /de ni sman gyi tshul la mkhas pa sman pa'i mchog /thams cad nad kyi gzhi dang gang gis 'thar pa
162b3(mdo sde): shes| |de ni yang dag tshul la bslabs pa blo gros ldan/ /bslabs nas shin tu 'khyams pa'i sems can mang po 'grol/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/ /de ni stong pa
162b4(mdo sde): nyid kyi tshul mkhas blo gros dpa'/ /de ni 'jig rten rtag tu ma chags bsod snyoms za/ /de ni sems can mang po byang chub mchog la 'god/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba
162b5(mdo sde): gang shes pa/ /de ni mi yi zla ba bzod pa'i stobs kyis 'phags/ /de ni rdo dang dbyug pas brdegs kyang mi khro ste/ /de ni lus dang yan lag bcad kyang 'khrug pa med/ /chos kyi rang
162b6(mdo sde): bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/ /de ni bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa stobs ldan yin/ /de ni rab tu zhi ba'i bzod pa'i dngos mi gtong / /de ni blo dpa' bzod pa'i stobs la rlom
162b7(mdo sde): sems med/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/ /de ni bdag bcad snyam du nam yang sems mi 'gyur/ /de yis srid pa thams cad rnam bshig rtag tu stong / /de yi 'du
163a1(mdo sde): shes thams cad ma lus rab tu spangs/ /de dang de dag chos kyi rang bzhin dam pa ston/ /de dag ring por mi thogs bla med byang chub rig /gang dag
163a2(mdo sde): chos kyi rang bzhin spyod yul nges rtogs pa/ /de dag gis ni sbyin pa mtha' yas mu med byin/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/ /de ni mdo sde bye ba mtha' yas
163a3(mdo sde): 'chad par byed/ /de las lhag par gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ /bshad kyang de yi spobs pa'i rgyun ni chad pa med/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/ /de ni bskal pa
163a4(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig stong du yang / /ye shes dag ni rtag tu 'phags pa ri rab bzhin/ /chos rnams ston pa dag ni zad par yong mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes
163a5(mdo sde): pa| |spobs pa yangs shing rgya che bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/ /byang chub dam pa rtag tu khor mor 'tshol ba na/ /mdo sde dag kyang bye ba mtha' yas rab tu 'chad/ /chos 'di thams
163a6(mdo sde): cad dngos po med par gang shes pa/ /rkang gnyis gtso bos chos gang ji snyed bshad pa yang / /de dag thams cad thos nas yongs su rdzogs par 'dzin/ /de ni tshig gcig
163a7(mdo sde): la yang the tshom 'byung mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes pa/ /de ni rtag tu bye brag 'phags shing gtong ldan 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal dag la bde ba sbyin pa'i
163b1(mdo sde): sbyin bdag yin/ /sems can sdug bsngal mthong nas rin chen tshim par byed/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes pa/ /de ni rtag tu dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan rgyal bor 'gyur/ /
163b2(mdo sde): dus kun du yang srog chags rnams la byams ldan te/ /rtag tu mtha' yas pa yi bde ba byed par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes pa/ /dpa' bo bu dang bu mo
163b3(mdo sde): bran dag gtong bar byed/ /mgo dang lag pa de bzhin rgyal srid yongs su gtong / /khyu mchog de yi yid ni zhum par yong mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes pa/ /de
163b4(mdo sde): yi lus dang yan lag gal te bcad gyur kyang / /rmi lam na yang de yi yid la khong khro med/ /des ni 'dren pa rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod pa yin/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par
163b5(mdo sde): gang shes pa/ /des ni 'das pa'i 'dren pa thams cad mchod pa yin/ /de bzhin ma byon pa yi rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod/ /des ni 'dren pa bzhugs pa thams cad ri mor byas/ /
163b6(mdo sde): gang dag mdo sde 'di thos zad pa'i 'dus la 'dzin/ /de ni mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mdzod 'chang yin/ /de ni gzungs mchog dag la rab tu gnas pa ste/ /de ni ring por
163b7(mdo sde): mi thogs 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di dag rab bshad mi brjod pa/ /mkhas pa de ni long bar nam yang mi 'gyur te/ /bskal pa mang por yan lag ma
164a1(mdo sde): tshang yong mi 'gyur/ /des ni mi khom brgyad po dag kyang rtag tu spangs/ /de ni ngan 'gror nam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ /rtag tu mtshan rnams 'chang
164a2(mdo sde): zhing byad bzhin bzang por 'gyur/ /mngon shes lnga po de dag rtag par des bsgoms te/ /dpa' bo de ni rtag tu bde gshegs spyan sngar gnas/ /ye shes can de 'phrul ba
164a3(mdo sde): mang po sprul byas nas/ /zhing rnams bye ba mang por 'dul ba'i don phyir gtong / /sangs rgyas sprul pa mang po gang gis mthong gyur pa/ /de yis sems can mang po byang chub mchog
164a4(mdo sde): tu btsud/ /gang dag mdo sde 'di thos zad pa'i dus la 'dzin/ /de ni dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing shes rab can/ /de ni rtag tu mthu dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan/ /gzi
164a5(mdo sde): brjid chen po chos kyi pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /zad pa'i dus la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'dzin pa ni/ /dpa' bo de yang tshangs pa'i gnas la shin tu gnas/ /des ni myur dus yang
164a6(mdo sde): brgyad dang gnyis dag 'thob/ /de ni myur zhing mgyogs par bdud rnams shin tu 'dul/ /gang gis mdo sde zhi ba 'di ni rtag bsgom pa/ /dbang dang ldan zhing mngon par 'phags
164a7(mdo sde): pa stobs dang ldan/ /de ni sems can dam pa sems can don phyir brtson/ /de ni byang chub shing drung byang chub mchog rtogs gyur/ /gang gis chos 'di rnams ni stong par goms
164b1(mdo sde): byas pa/ /de dag 'od zer bye ba stong rnams rtag tu 'gyed/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag kyang thams cad gzi med byas/ /dpa' bo de dag mi ring 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur/ /ngas sngon spyod yul
164b2(mdo sde): zhi ba 'di ni rab tu bsgoms/ /bskal pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig stong du yang / /lam 'dir ngas ni nam yang brtson 'grus rgyun ma bcad/ /de tshe mar me mdzad kyis rgyal par lung yang
164b3(mdo sde): bstan/ /mdo sde 'di la khyed kyang nga yi rjes su slobs/ /tshul 'di zab cing dam pa'i don rnams bstan pa ste/ /'di la mu stegs log pa mang po 'di dag 'khyams/ /byang chub la ni smad
164b4(mdo sde): byas ngan song 'jigs par ltung / /bskal pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig stong du yang / /de dag sdug bsngal mi bzad tsha ba der myong nas/ /bskal pa khrag khrig mang po dag ni 'das nas
164b5(mdo sde): kyang / /de ni de dag mi 'chi 'thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /gang dag phyi dus 'jigs la bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /mdo sde rab tu zhi ba 'di ni srung byed pa/ /de dag byang chub mchog rab
164b6(mdo sde): 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/ /de dang de dag phyi dus chos 'dzin lung bstan yin/ /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bcu pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems
165a1(mdo sde): d pa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa chen po'i byi dor bya ba yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
165a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/
165a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa chen po'i byi dor
165a4(mdo sde): bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing tshul khrims kyi phung po mchog tu mi 'dzin pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rlom sems med pa/ shes rab kyi
165a5(mdo sde): phung po rgyu ba med pa/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dben par mthong ba/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ste/ byang chub sems
165a6(mdo sde): d pa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa de dag dang ldan pas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa
165a7(mdo sde): 'di ni/ gzhon nu/ chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa chen po'i byi dor bya ba yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa chen po'i
165b1(mdo sde): byi dor bya ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /mngon shes chen po yongs sbyangs pa/ /
165b2(mdo sde): rtsod pa med par bstan pa ste/ /rtsod pa dag la gang spyod cing / /'dzin par byed pa de mi thar/ /mngon shes de yi shes rab ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /'dzin pa la ni gang
165b3(mdo sde): gnas pa/ /de la ye shes yong mi 'gyur/ /gang dag sgra yis bstan pa yi/ /chos rnams mang po bsam mi khyab/ /sgra de la yang gang chags pa/ /dgongs pa'i bshad pa mi shes so/ /ci
165b4(mdo sde): la dgongs te bshad pa yi/ /dgongs pa dag ni mi shes pa/ /chos nyid la ni ma bslabs pas/ /chos ma yin pa chos su 'chad/ /'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu/ /ngas ni mdo sde
165b5(mdo sde): gang bshad pa/ /chig 'bru tha dad don gcig ste/ /thams cad brjod par nus ma yin/ /chig gcig rnam par bsgoms na ni/ /de dag thams cad bsgoms par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
165b6(mdo sde): ji snyed thams cad kyis/ /chos rnams mang po rab bshad pa/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid/ /mi gang don la mkhas pa dag /tshig 'di bslabs par gyur pa la/ /sangs rgyas
165b7(mdo sde): chos rnams dkon ma yin/ /chos kun sangs rgyas chos yin te/ /chos nyid la yang gang bslabs pa/ /chos nyid rab tu shes pa ni/ /chos nyid dang yang 'gal mi byed/ /tshig kun kyang ni
166a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas tshig / sgra kun dngos po med pa ste/ /phyogs bcu dag tu btsal na yang / /sangs rgyas tshig ni mi rnyed do/ /tshig 'di sangs rgyas tshig yin te/ /
166a2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag tu rab btsal kyang / /bla med 'di ni mi rnyed de/ /ma rnyed rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas tshig ni bla na med/ /ltag na med pa sangs rgyas tshig /de la rdul tsam mi rnyed
166a3(mdo sde): pas| |de tshe bla na med ces brjod/ /chos ni rdul tsam mi rnyed de/ /rdul tsam sgrar ni bshad pa yin/ /rdul tsam rnyed par ma gyur kyang / /'jig rten du ni sgra yis bshad/ /chos rnams
166a4(mdo sde): rnyed med rnyed pa ste/ /rnyed pa la yang rnyed pa med/ /de ltar chos rnams gang shes pa/ /byang chub dam pa rtogs par 'gyur/ /byang chub bla med nges rtogs nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
166a5(mdo sde): rab tu bskor/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams ston par byed/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla med ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtogs par byed/ /sangs
166a6(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes rtogs byed pas/ /sangs rgyas zhes kyang de phyir brjod/ /dngos med smon pa med pa dang / /mtshan ma med dang stong pa nyid/ /rnam thar sgo ni 'di dag gis/ /sgo dag
166a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rab tu ston/ /mig dang rna ba sna dag dang / /lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid/ /de dag rang bzhin stong par ni/ /sangs rgyas dag gis rab tu bshad/ /re lta bu yi chos rnams
166b1(mdo sde): kyi| |rang bzhin dag ni sus shes pa/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid shes pas na/ /de ni rtsod par mi byed do/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' dag /dpa' bo skyob pa'i spyod yul te/ /chos
166b2(mdo sde): rnams stong par shes pa ni/ /de dag nam yang nem nur med/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shes pas na/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab cing / /dpag tu med
166b3(mdo sde): pa byang chub 'dul/ /sangs rgyas sgras ni gang byas pa/ /tshul khrims sgras kyang de byas te/ /sangs rgyas sgra dang tshul khrims sgra/ /de dag gnyi ga mtshan nyid gcig /'jig rten sgra dag brjod
166b4(mdo sde): pa ni/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sgra gcig la/ /sangs rgyas sgras ni bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas sgra ni yul mi gnas/ /phyogs la'ang gnas pa ma yin
166b5(mdo sde): brjod/ /skyes dang 'gags pa ma yin te/ /de bzhin gcig dang tha dad min/ /de dag gsar ram rnying ma yin/ /de dag la ni rlom sems med/ /ser po ma yin sngon po min/ /dkar po ma
166b6(mdo sde): yin dmar po min/ /brjod du med cing gzung med par/ /de ltar dbyangs kyis bstan mod kyi/ /de ni dbyangs kyi sa ma yin/ /thub pa dag gi cho 'phrul 'di/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /
166b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sku gzugs snang gyur te/ /de gnas yid la byas pa na/ /cho 'phrul rnams kyang de yis mthong / /gang gis mya ngan 'das reg pa/ /sems can de ni mi rnyed de/ /de bzhin chos
167a1(mdo sde): rnams rab bsten cing / /sems can mang po grol bar byas/ /ji ltar nyi ma zla ba dag /'khar ba'i snod du snang ba yang / /rang gi gzugs ni mi 'pho ltar/ /
167a2(mdo sde): chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra 'o/ /chos rnams mig yor lta bur yang / /gang gis ngo bo nyid shes pa/ /de dag gzugs kyi lus su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku la mi blta'o/ /chos 'di lus
167a3(mdo sde): gzugs med pa ste/ /'di la lus gzugs gang yang med/ /chos gang lus gzugs med pa ni/ /de ni sangs rgyas sku lus so/ /su dag chos kyi skur lta ba/ /de dag gis ni 'dren pa
167a4(mdo sde): mthong / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong / /rten cing so sor bstan pa ste/ /so so ma yin so sor bshad/ /dge sbyong nyid ni su 'dod pa/ /
167a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa 'di ni rig par gyis/ /gang dag bdag gis thob snyam pa/ /de phyir ma thob pa zhes bya/ /gang gis dge sbyong nyid ma thob/ /de phyir dge sbyong zhes kyang bya/ /su dag bslab
167a6(mdo sde): par ma gyur ba/ /zab mo'i chos 'di ga la smra/ /de dag zab mo'i ming du yang / /yongs su brjod par mi nus so/ /phung po lnga ni dngos med de/ /med pa las ni 'di dag byung / /su yi
167a7(mdo sde): phung po byung ba yang / /de la slong bar byed pa med/ /phung po'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa/ /chos kun de yi mtshan nyid yin/ /de yi mtshan nyid yod bshad de/ /mtshan nyid kyang ni
167b1(mdo sde): yod ma yin/ /ji ltar bar snang nam mkha' bzhin/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra bar/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'/ /da ltar byung pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' gzung ba
167b2(mdo sde): med par bshad/ /de la gzung ba mi rnyed de/ /chos kyi rang bzhin 'di nyid yin/ /gzung ba med pa nam mkha' 'dra/ /de lta bur ni chos bstan te/ /de la gang yang mthong ba med/ /su dag
167b3(mdo sde): chos 'di mi mthong ba/ /de yi chos rnams bsam mi khyab/ /chos 'di rnams ni rang bzhin med/ /'di dag rang bzhin mi rnyed de/ /sangs rgyas byang chub su brtson pa/ /rnal 'byor ba yi spyod
167b4(mdo sde): yul 'di/ /de lta bur ni sus shes pa /de ni chos la mi chags te/ /chos rnams la yang mi chags pas/ /chos kyi 'du shes rab tu rtogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yis/ /chos
167b5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad rnam par bshig / chos kyi 'du shes rnam bshig nas/ /sangs rgyas chos la rlom sems med/ /mtha' de rlom sems ma byas pa/ /brtags nas mthar ni bshad
167b6(mdo sde): pa ste/ /de ltar mtha' ni sus shes pa/ /bskal pa bye bar rlom sems med/ /byis pas sngon gyi mtha' brtags pas/ /'khor ba rnams su 'khor 'gyur te/ /phyogs bcu dag tu
167b7(mdo sde): btsol na yang / /de yi gnas ni mi rnyed do/ /'khor ba stong par rig nas ni/ /rgyal ba'i thugs sras chags mi 'gyur/ /byang chub don phyir spyod mod kyi/ /de dag spyod pa mi rnyed do/ /
168a1(mdo sde): nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /de dag rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /de 'dra'i rang bzhin byang chub de/ /byang chub sems dpas rtogs par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma
168a2(mdo sde): byed pa rab bslabs pa/ /sgyu ma dag ni ston pa ltar/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyang / /gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnyed dang mi rnyed rlom sems med/ /rnyed pa
168a3(mdo sde): la yang rnyed med de/ /ye shes de ni sgyu ma 'dra/ /sgyu ma de la gnas pa min/ /de bzhin chos rnams stong pa la/ /byis pa'i blo yis rnam brtags nas/ /rnam par rtog la spyod pa dag /
168a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba drug tu gzhol bar 'gyur/ /phung po skye rga nyer 'gro ste/ /de dag skye ba zad mi 'gyur/ /skye zhing 'chi ba'i phung po rnams/ /de dag sdug bsngal mtha' yas so/ /skye zhing 'khor ba
168a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal te/ /byis pa'i blo yis brtags pas na/ /de dag rtog pa mi zad de/ /de dag bskal pa bye bar 'khor/ /mi sbyor ba dang rab sbyor dang / /las kyi sbyor la gang gnas dang / /las
168a6(mdo sde): rnams len pa gang dga' ba/ /de dag las las mi thar ro/ /las kyi chu bos khyer ba de/ /las ni rtag tu zad mi 'gyur/ /bdud kyi phyogs la gang gnas pa/ /yang dang yang ni 'chi
168a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /bdud kyis zil non shes rab 'chal/ /nyon mongs pa yi las rnams kyis/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /skye zhing 'chi ba myong bar 'gyur/ /so so'i skye bo long ba yi/ /byis
168b1(mdo sde): pa de dag 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de dag btag cing rnam par gzhom/ /de dag 'gro ba mi bzad 'gyur/ /byis pa'i blo can mtshon cha yis/ /gcig la gcig ni gsod pa byed/ /de lta bur ni
168b2(mdo sde): sbyor ba dag / de dag sbyor ba rab tu 'phel/ /nga'i bu nga yi nor snyam du/ /byis pa'i blo yis rab btags te/ /med pa'i chos rnams btags pas na/ /'khor ba dag ni phyir zhing 'phel/ /
168b3(mdo sde): 'khor ba dag ni 'phel byed cing / /so so'i skye bo de dag 'khor/ /so so tha dad 'gro bas na/ /so so'i skye bor brjod pa yin/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bor nas ni/ /chos rnams mang po rab tu 'chad
168b4(mdo sde): bdud kyi dbang du song bas na/ /de dag thar pa rnyed mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i phyir ni byis pa rnams/ /bud med rul la sten byed de/ /'gro ba rul bar 'gro 'gyur zhing / /des ni ngan 'gror ltung
168b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa chen po'i zhags pa ni/ /bud med zhags pa mi bzad pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'dod pa dang / /bud med bsten pa'ang ma bsngags so/ /lam 'di byang
168b6(mdo sde): chub mi 'gyur bas/ /bud med rnams la ma rton par/ /sbrul gdug shin tu khro bo ltar/ /mkhas pas de ni rnam par spong / /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa ni/ /byang chub lam la sgom
168b7(mdo sde): par byed/ /lam de goms par bsgoms byas na/ /bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur/ /de dag bla na med 'gyur te/ /'jig rten gyi ni mchod rten 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes
169a1(mdo sde): kyis| |sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur/ /gso sbyong dag la bsnyen byed cing / /tshul khrims phung por yang dag 'dzud/ /sems can bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /
169a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu yang yang dag 'dzud/ /de dag sems can rnams kyi ni/ /bsam yas dpag med don byed de/ /dpa' bo shes rab chen po de/ /bdud rtsi yi ni rnga yang rdung / /bdud kyi
169a3(mdo sde): gnas rnams g.yo byed cing / /bdud kyi ris kyang g.yo bar byas/ /bdud rnams bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud/ /pha rol rgol ba tshar gcod cing / /mu stegs
169a4(mdo sde): can ni pham par byed/ /ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/ /sa yang rab tu g.yo bar byed/ /khyu mchog gyur pa du ma yis/ /lus kyi rnam par sprul byed cing / /shes rab chen po de dag ni/ /
169a5(mdo sde): cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston/ /zhing rnams bye ba g.yo byed de/ /gang+gA yi ni bye ma snyed/ /de dag bdud rnams pham byas nas/ /sangs rgyas grags pa chen por 'gyur/ /de dag
169a6(mdo sde): zhing rnams sprul byed de/ /rin po che yis rnam par brgyan/ /me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /dri dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong / /khang ba dang ni gzhal med khang / /khang pa brtsegs pa pu
169a7(mdo sde): shur bcas/ /dpa' bo de dag sprul pa byed/ /rdzing bu yid du 'ong ba dag /yan lag brgyad ldan chu yis gang / /dang zhing bsil la rnyog pa med/ /de las chu ni sus 'thungs pa/ /srid
169b1(mdo sde): pa gsum yang spong bar 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i chu 'thungs nas/ /de dag phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis/ /sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur/ /bla med zhi ba'i
169b2(mdo sde): 'jug par ni/ /'gro bar shin tu rig par gyis/ /'jug pa 'di ni mi shes pas/ /dmigs pa can dag shin tu brlag /su dag de la rten gyur cing / /de dag skal mnyam sems
169b3(mdo sde): can de/ /mnar med par ni de 'gro ste/ /mi bzad pa ni chen por ltung / /de yi sdug bsngal drag po ni/ /brjod par nus pa ma yin te/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa dang / /ngas ni
169b4(mdo sde): de dag rab tu shes/ /'di 'dra zab mo mthong dka' yi/ /chos la su dag nem nur byed/ /su dag dmigs la gnas pa yi/ /byis pa dag gis ma yin/ /bla med sangs rgyas zhing
169b5(mdo sde): du ni| |gang gis de dag 'gro 'gyur ba/ /gzugs ston pa ni du ma yi/ /bkod pa dag ni sprul par byed/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ji snyed kyi/ /gzugs 'grub phun sum tshogs yod pa/ /
169b6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad 'dir yang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul che ston/ /chos chen gyi ni go bges te/ /dpa' chen stobs kyang che ba dag /stong pa'i don chen rdo rje yis/ /gdab
169b7(mdo sde): pa dag kyang de dag 'debs/ /'od zer bye ba phrag stong dag /gang+gA yi ni bye ma snyed/ /de yi lus las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /des ni 'jig rten rab tu snang / /de dag bud med mi chags
170a1(mdo sde): te| |de dag yid byung mi byed la/ /bud med 'du shes rang bzhin gyis/ /'du shes de dag rnam par bshig /dpa' bo de dag gar gnas pa/ /sangs
170a2(mdo sde): rgyas zhing de mi stong ste/ /de dag la ni sdig can bdud/ /bar chad byed par ga la 'gyur/ /lta ba dag la de gnas pas/ /sangs rgyas mang po mnyes ma byas/ /gnod sems kyis
170a3(mdo sde): ni nyer brtan cing / /'dod dang chags la rab tu gnas/ /lta la gnas pa de dag kun/ /bdud yin par ni rig par bya/ /de la sdig can bdud rnams kyang / /bar chad byed par
170a4(mdo sde): mi 'jug go / sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes de ltar sus shes pa/ /'du shes thams cad rnam bshig nas/ /'du shes dag pa mi ldog gnas/ /sngon gyi
170a5(mdo sde): mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'/ /da ltar mtha' yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /de ltar chos rnams bstan mod kyi/ /de la cung zad bstan pa med/ /ye shes kyis kyang shes pa med/ /mi
170a6(mdo sde): shes pas kyang zhum mi 'gyur/ /ye shes mi shes rnam brtags nas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes brjod pa yin/ /rnam rig tshig dang brda rnams ni/ /byang chub sems dpas rab tu
170a7(mdo sde): shes| |de ni sems can don rnams kyang / /dpag med bsam yas byed par 'gyur/ /'du shes kun tu shes pa'i phyir/ /'dzin par yang ni de bstan te/ /'du shes de ni mi 'dzin pa/
170b1(mdo sde): dben pa'i don du rab tu bstan/ /dben pa gang yin 'du shes te/ /'du shes gang yin bstan pa de/ /'du shes rang bzhin ye shes de/ /de ltar 'du shes med par 'gyur/ /'du shes 'di
170b2(mdo sde): ni spang snyam du/ /gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/ /'du shes spros la spyod pa ste/ /'du shes las ni de mi 'thar/ /su yi 'du shes 'di dag byung / /su yi 'du shes 'di bskyed byas/ /sus ni
170b3(mdo sde): 'du shes reg par byas/ /sus ni 'du shes bkag par gyur/ /gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang chos ma brnyes/ /'dir ni don de bsam par gyis/ /de nas 'du shes med
170b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /nam tshe 'du shes skyes pa na/ /su yi 'du shes yin zhes brjod/ /sems kyi rgyud kyi rnam thar yang / /de la ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe rnam thar reg pa na/ /bsam pa thams
170b5(mdo sde): cad bsam pa med/ /gang tshe bsam pa bsam med pa/ /de tshe bsam du med par 'gyur/ /bsam pa'i sa la gnas nas ni/ /mthar gyis rnam par bsam byas te/ /bsam pa thams
170b6(mdo sde): cad rnam spangs na/ /de nas bsam du med par 'gyur/ /'di ni dkar chos rnam smin te/ /'du byed med pas mthong bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun gyis rnam bsam pa/ /skad cig gcig
170b7(mdo sde): la rab tu shes/ /sems can ci 'dra de bzhin bsam/ /bsam bzhin rgyal ba de 'dra ste/ /sangs rgyas bsam du med pa yis/ /bsam pa 'di ni rab tu bstan/ /gcig pu dben song
171a1(mdo sde): gang sems pa/ /nam zhig sems pa med par 'gyur/ /bsam pa dag ni mi sems na/ /bsam pa thams cad med par 'gyur/ /shi 'phos dus byas
171a2(mdo sde): shi ba'i tshe/ /gang gi bsam pa rab 'jug pa/ /bsam pa'i rjes su rnam shes 'brang / /bsam las de ni mi thar to/ /su dag bud med 'du shes gnas/ /de dag 'dod chags rab
171a3(mdo sde): tu 'phel/ /'du shes dag ni rnam bshig na/ /'dod chags kyis ni gos mi 'gyur/ /bsam pa 'di ni bsam pa che/ /chos kyi bsam pa bla na med/ /chos kyi bsam pa 'di
171a4(mdo sde): yis ni/ /yang dag bsam pa rab tu 'byung / /tshul ma yin pa rnam bsams pas/ /bsam pa bsam yas mang po dag /yun ring dus su rnam bsams kyang / /bsam pa dag
171a5(mdo sde): ni zad ma gyur/ /gang dag ming la sems pa yang / /zad pa la ni ye shes med/ /sgra shes pa la zad pa med/ /zad pa'i chos nyid de yin no/ /sgra dang rnam rig tshig gi lam/ /zad pa'i
171a6(mdo sde): sgrar ni bstan pa ste/ /chos de rnams ni bye brag med/ /shes bzhin zad pa de bzhin te/ /ma skyes shing ni ma 'gags pa/ /mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med/ /bskal pa bye bar
171a7(mdo sde): bshad kyang ni/ /mtshan ma med par bstan pa yin/ /dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas/ /dngos po med la rab gnas pa/ /dngos po gzhan du ma bstan te/ /dngos med pa
171b1(mdo sde): yang gzhan mi bstan/ /dngos med sgras ni rig byas te/ /dngos po med pa rab tu bstan/ /sangs rgyas dag ni kun gyis kyang / /dngos po med pa bltar mi nus/ /dngos po kun gyi dngos
171b2(mdo sde): po ni| |dngos po med par de bstan te/ /de ltar dngos po rnam rig na/ /dngos po med par 'gyur zhes bstan/ /dngos po med pa de yang ni/ /sus kyang nam du reg mi nus/ /dngos po med
171b3(mdo sde): pa reg pa yis/ /kun rdzob tu ni de bstan to/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur snyam/ /de ltar gang gi blo 'gyur ba/ /srid pa'i sred pas yongs mi gzir/ /mkhas pa byang chub rtogs
171b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag pa/ /chos ni gang la'ang smon mi byed/ /ci'ang med cing dmigs pa med/ /de ni byang chub brjod pa yin/ /byang chub tu ni nged zhugs
171b5(mdo sde): zhes| |mang du de skad smra mod kyi/ /'jug pa 'di ni mi shes pas/ /de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ring / /'du byed thams cad stong par ni/ /sgra yis chos rnams rab tu bshad/ /sgra yi rang
171b6(mdo sde): bzhin gang yin pa/ /zab cing phra ste mthong bar dka'/ /mngon shes che la mdo sde 'di/ /nges par bstan zhes bya ba yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i don phyir ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams
171b7(mdo sde): kyis bstan mdzad do/ /kun nas nyon mongs ji snyed pa/ /gnyen po thams cad de yis bcom/ /mngon par shes la rab gnas shing / /de dag rdzu 'phrul shin tu bsgoms/ /bsams
172a1(mdo sde): nas shes la de gnas te/ /shes pa de yang rnam par bshig /bsam gyis mi khyab dpag med kyi/ /ye shes thob pas ngoms pa med/ /ting nge 'dzin dang rdzu 'phrul
172a2(mdo sde): phyir| |de dag mngon par 'du byed med/ /dpa' po'i rnam smin de yin te/ dus kun du'ang mnyam par bzhag /rnam smin skyes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /zhing ni bye bar de 'gro ste/ /'jig
172a3(mdo sde): rten sgron ma mthong ba ni/ /gang+gA dag gi bye ma snyed/ /de dag 'chi 'pho skye ba yang / /sems gzhan du ni sgyur bar byed/ /sems la dbang yang thob pas na/ /de dag lus ni 'od gsal
172a4(mdo sde): lo| |sangs rgyas dag gi nyan thos gang / /bsgoms pa'i rdzu 'phrul gnas pa ni/ /'du byed med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la/ /de dag bcu drug char mi phod/ /lha rnams kyis kyang de dag gi /
172a5(mdo sde): bsam pa shes par mi nus te/ /'jig rten gyi ni mgon po dang / /de dag mtshungs gnas ma gtogs so/ /de dag spyi cer mi 'gyur te/ /mgo la skra dkar mi 'byung zhing / /rags
172a6(mdo sde): pa'i rga ba mi 'byung ste/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal 'chi ba med/ /the tshom yid gnyis mi 'byung ste/ /de dag la ni nem nur med/ /mdo sde bye ba brgya rnams na/ /nyin mtshan du yang
172a7(mdo sde): de dag 'tshol/ /ji snyed kun nas nyon mongs kyi/ /bag la nyal ni rab tu spangs/ /de dag sems can thams cad la/ /rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems su 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin bye ba khrag
172b1(mdo sde): khrig rnams/ /phyogs bcu dag tu nges par ston/ /dris pa bye stong rnams kyang / /mi gnas par ni lung ston to/ /pho dang mor ni 'du shes dang / /'du shes thams cad rnam par
172b2(mdo sde): bshig / dngos med 'du shes gnas nas ni/ /yang dag nges par ston par byed/ /yongs su dag pa'i ye shes kyis/ /ji bzhin du ni chos ston to/ /chos rnams yang dag bstan
172b3(mdo sde): la brtson/ /ting 'dzin ye shes spyod yul ldan/ /de yi ting 'dzin spyod pa yang / /dngos po dag la mi gnas te/ /de yi tshig kyang don med min/ /chos bstan pa yang 'bras bu
172b4(mdo sde): yod| |mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba/ /des ni mir 'gyur legs par 'thob/ /mi khom thams cad rab tu spangs/ /sangs rgyas kun la byas pa gzo/ /gang gis rin chen mdo 'di
172b5(mdo sde): las| |tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad bzung ba yang / /des ni 'khor ba gang bor ba/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba/ /de dag sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs
172b6(mdo sde): de ni sangs rgyas ri mor byas/ /myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba/ /de dag chos rnams thams cad la/ /the tshom dang ni nem nur med/ /de dag mya ngan 'das
172b7(mdo sde): dang nye/ /bya rgod phung por de bzhin gshegs/ /dpa' bo chen po de yis mthong / /thams cad sangs rgyas lung bstan te/ /rgyal ba byams pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byams
173a1(mdo sde): pa mthong nas ni/ /bzod pa bzang po thob par 'gyur/ /gang su zad pa'i dus la yang / /mdo sde 'di la rab gnas pa/ /de dag yang dag mtha' la gnas/ /
173a2(mdo sde): yang dag mtha' ni bsam mi khyab/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' la ni/ /de dag nem nur yod ma yin/ /rdul phran tsam yang rnam pa kun/ /de dag la yang the tshom med/ /rdul tsam rab
173a3(mdo sde): tu spangs pa ni/ /de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /zad dus shin tu 'jigs pa la/ /dka' ba dag ni spyad byas te/ /mdo sde rin chen 'di bslabs na/ /spobs pa dag kyang mi zad
173a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab bton na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod bsrungs te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun mchod pa/ /chos kyi mchod pa bsam mi khyab/ /ma rungs zad pa'i dus
173a5(mdo sde): la ni| |mdo sde 'di dag gang 'dzin pa/ /de dag ye shes rnyed mi dka'/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /gang gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas las/ /mdo sde 'di dag bzung ba ni/ /
173a6(mdo sde): de dag lus la 'chang gyur te/ /zad pa'i dus la rab tu 'don/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bye bar yang / /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar yang / /shAkya seng ge'i spyod pa rnams/ /de dag
173a7(mdo sde): sgra yang sgrog par 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas spyan sngar ni/ /rtag tu seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/ /mtha' yas pa yi spobs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'di yang smra/ /zad dus 'jigs
173b1(mdo sde): pa chen po'i tshe/ /byang chub 'di ni gang srung ba/ /bu ram shing gi rigs skyes rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan yin/ /de dag gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/ /mtshan rnams
173b2(mdo sde): kyis kyang rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas bye bar phyag 'tshal du/ /rnam par 'phrul bas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sgyu ma yi ni me tog dag /gser gyi mdog 'drar snang ba dang / /bai DUR+ya dang
173b3(mdo sde): shel dag dang / /dngul gyi yang ni me tog rnams/ /rin chen rigs rnams thams cad kyang / /de yi lag nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /byang chub lam rnams 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /de dag
173b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams la 'thor/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /rol mo sgrub pa phun sum tshogs/ /gang+gA yi ni bye ma snyed/ /ba spu'i khung nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can bye ba
173b5(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag sgra 'di thos pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla med las/ /de dag phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba de dag gi /bsngags pa bsam gyis mi khyab
173b6(mdo sde): brjod/ /bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rnams su/ /de dag sgra yang thos par 'gyur/ /gang gis sgra de thos pa ni/ /de dag 'du shes 'gags par 'gyur/ /'du shes dag ni 'gags nas su/ /
173b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mtha' yas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de 'dra ba yi ye shes kyis/ /byang chub spyod pa spyad nas ni/ /sems can kun gyi don byas nas/ /don byed pa yi rgyal bar 'gyur/ /gang gis
174a1(mdo sde): ting 'dzin bzung ba yi/ /mkhas pas 'dir ni gang 'thob pa/ /yon tan phan yon 'di dag ste/ /gzhan yang dpag tu med par 'gyur/ /bud med kyis
174a2(mdo sde): kyang mdo sde 'di/ /thos nas tshigs bcad gcig bzung na/ /bud med dngos po rnam bsgyur nas/ /chos smra bar yang de 'gyur ro/ /de ni phyis kyang bud med kyi/ /dngos po 'dzin
174a3(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/ /mtshan rnams kyis ni legs brgyan cing / /rtag tu byad bzhin bzang por 'gyur/ /mdo sde mchog rab 'di yi ni/ /yon tan dag kyang mchog bshad pa/ /de la de
174a4(mdo sde): dag thams cad 'byung / /byang chub nyid kyang myur du 'thob/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te/ /mdo sde 'di ni bzung nas su/ /de dag skye ba thams cad du/ /rtag tu 'jigs pa med
174a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba bshad pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyed pa ste/ /byang chub rtogs par su 'dod pa/ /mdo sde 'di ni brjod par gyis/ /de dag thub dbang bsnyen pa
174a6(mdo sde): ste| |sangs rgyas byang chub nye bar 'gyur/ /de dag ring por mi thogs par/ /mnyam gzhag zhi ba'i sa 'di thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dag /byang chub de la rtag gnas
174a7(mdo sde): nas| |sangs rgyas dag ni bye ba rnams/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed mthong bar 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba 'di ni des thob nas/ /sa bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por de 'gyur te/ /
174b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rdul bral shin tu sems zhi rnams mthong nas/ /'jig rten mgon po de dag tshigs bcad brgyas bstod 'gyur/ /shin tu grags pa chen po lha dang mi yi mchog /'dren pa
174b2(mdo sde): dag la mchod pa mtshungs med des byas te/ /des ni rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin du yongs spangs nas/ /gtsang zhing rnam par dag pas tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod/ /de ni thub pa mchog gi
174b3(mdo sde): bstan la rab byung nas/ /ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba 'di yang rab thob ste/ /de yang tshig dge ngag kyang shin tu 'jam gyur nas/ /blo ldan byin gyi brlabs kyis mdo sde bye ba 'chad/ /stong pa
174b4(mdo sde): mtshan med mchog tu gya nom zhi ba'i mchog / rab tu zhi chos spyad pa zhib cing thogs pa med/ /shin tu zhi brtag tu rdul bral rang bzhin stong / /ting 'dzin 'di thob skye bo mang la rab tu ston//
174b5(mdo sde): blo ni rtag tu zab cing blo yang mtha' yas te/ /blo yang rgya che dpag tu med pa'i don ldan blo/ /zab cing zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas ni/ /'jig rten thams cad du yang snang ba thob par
174b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di rnyed na/ /de ni tshangs par spyod pa rtag tu gtsang bar 'gyur/ /dri nga med cing rtag tu kun nas nyon mongs med/ /sems can bye ba gzhan
174b7(mdo sde): yang de la 'god par 'gyur/ /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /shes rab shin tu rno zhing shes rab mchog tu 'gyur/ /de thos rgya mtshor 'gyur zhing rtag tu blo mtha'
175a1(mdo sde): yas| |ngag dge blo gros mkhas shing cho ga shes par 'gyur/ /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /las kyi gnas dang de bzhin bzo yi
175a2(mdo sde): gnas rnams dang / /sman gyi gnas rnams dang ni de bzhin rtsi yi gnas/ /brtan pa de ni thams cad kyi yang pha rol phyin/ /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /snyan
175a3(mdo sde): dngags bstan bcos bzhad gad rol mo dang / /glu dang gar la shin tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin/ /'jig rten na yang rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/ /rdul dang bral ba'i
175a4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /byang chub spyod pa zhi ba dam pa mchog spyod cing / /de ni rtag par g.yog dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur/ /phyogs kyang rtag tu mi phyed mthun zhing 'tsham
175a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /mkhas pa de la mya ngan dag gi zug rngu dang / /mkhas pa'i sems la nam yang gnod pa mi 'byung ste/ /thams cad
175a6(mdo sde): dus su rtag par nad kyang med par 'gyur/ /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /lus kyi nad dang de bzhin sems kyi nad rnams dang / /so yi nad dang de bzhin mgo
175a7(mdo sde): yi nad rnams kyang / /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten dag na de la nad mi 'byung / /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /mi yi 'jig rten nad rnams mang po ci yod pa/ /lus kyi
175b1(mdo sde): nad dang de bzhin sems kyi nad rnams dang / /de la nad kyang de dag rtag tu yong mi 'byung / /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa ni gang
175b2(mdo sde): yod dang / /lus la yang ni nad kyi rnam pa gang yod pa/ /kun nas nyon mongs mang po de dag de la med/ /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /bar snang nam mkha' dag
175b3(mdo sde): la gos pa med pa ltar/ /rnam par dag cing rgya che rab tu 'od gsal te/ /de bzhin de yi sems kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /zla ba'i
175b4(mdo sde): 'od dang de bzhin nyi ma'i 'od rnams ni/ /dag cing gzung du med la rab tu 'od gsal ba/ /de bzhin de yi sems kyang shin tu 'od gsal 'gyur/ /ji ltar tshon rtsi thogs nas bar snang
175b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' la/ /rnam pa mang po du ma'i gzugs rnams bri bar dka'/ /de bzhin rdul bral zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms na/ /de yi sems la ri mor bri ba sla ma yin/ /rlung ni ji ltar
175b6(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi dag nas langs pa dang / /thogs pa med par phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi sems kyi rgyud kyang rlung dang 'drar 'gyur te/ /de ni 'jig rten dag na thogs med
175b7(mdo sde): ma chags 'gro / rlung langs pa ni rgya mos gzung du rung yang srid/ /rlung ni zhags pa dag gis bcing bar nus gyur kyang / /rdul dang bral ba zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms na/ /de yi sems
176a1(mdo sde): ni rab tu shes par sla ma yin/ /gzugs brnyan dag ni chu yi nang du gzung bar rung / /'bru mar gang ba'i snod dang chu yi nang du 'byung / /de bzhin rdul
176a2(mdo sde): bral zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms na/ /de yi sems ni rab tu shes par sla ma yin/ /sprin las 'brug zer glog gi 'khri shing byung ba dag /mi dag gi ni lag pas gzung bar nus
176a3(mdo sde): gyur kyang / /rdul dang bral ba zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na/ /de yi sems kyi tshad ni shes par sla ma yin/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing na sems can ci yod pa/ /sems
176a4(mdo sde): can de dag gi ni sgra skad gzung nus kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' nam zhig ting 'dzin 'di thob na/ /de yi sems kyi mtha' ni shes par sla ma yin/ /des ni rdul bral zhi ba'i ting
176a5(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di thob nas/ /kun nas nyon mongs med cing gos pa med par 'gyur/ /nam zhig des ni ting 'dzin zhi ba thob pa'i tshe/ /phyir yang srid pa gsum la nam yang chags mi byed/ /
176a6(mdo sde): nam zhig rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na/ /'dod pa dag la mi sred gzugs la mi sred de/ /bud med dag la mi sred sems kyang 'khrul pa med/ /zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba gos
176a7(mdo sde): pa med par 'gyur/ /nam zhig rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na/ /bu la mi sred bu mo dag la'ang sred mi 'gyur/ /chung ma dag la'ang mi sred g.yog la'ang sred pa med/ /rab
176b1(mdo sde): tu zhi ba'i spyod cing gos pa med par 'gyur/ /gser la mi sred nor rnams la yang sred med de/ /mtho ris mi sred rin chen rdzas la chags mi 'gyur/ /sems kyang shin tu rnam par
176b2(mdo sde): dag cing mi rtogs pa/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa'i bye brag yin/ /rgyal srid 'dod phyir tshangs par spyod pa de mi spyod/ /mkhas pa mtho ris sred pas rtag tu sbyin mi byed/ /byang chub
176b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas sbyin byed de/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag go /rgyal po'i srid phyir dka' thub brtul zhugs mi spyod de/ /srid pa gsum du dbang phyug 'dod
176b4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ma yin/ /skye bo mang la phan phyir byang chub sred pa yis/ /de ni rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin 'di sgrub bo/ /glu la mi sred gang la'ang sred pa ma yin te/ /spos la mi sred btung ba
176b5(mdo sde): dag la'ang sred ma yin/ /zas la'ang mi sred gos la yang ni sred mi 'gyur/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/ /mig la mi sred rna ba la yang sred ma yin/ /sna la mi
176b6(mdo sde): sred lce la sred pa ma yin zhing / /lus la mi sred sems la yang ni sred mi 'gyur/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/ /khyim la mi sred dgon par sred pa ma yin te/ /
176b7(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang la mi sred grong la'ang sred mi 'gyur/ /yul 'khor mi sred grong khyer la'ang mi sred de/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/ /sbyin la mi sred tshul khrims
177a1(mdo sde): dag la sred mi 'gyur/ /bzod la mi sred brtson 'grus la'ang sred ma yin/ /bsam gtan mi sred shes rab la'ang mi sred de/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin
177a2(mdo sde): dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/ /sems can la'ang mi sred srog la mi sred cing / /sangs rgyas dag la mi sred chos la sred mi byed/ /dge 'dun mi sred byang chub la'ang sred mi 'gyur//
177a3(mdo sde): 'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/ /yod la mi sred med pa la'ang sred ma yin/ /dbus la mi sred mtha' la'ang sred par mi 'gyur zhing / /kun la mi sred sred pa med
177a4(mdo sde): pa'ang ma yin te/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/ /rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di thob na/ /de la 'dod chags nam yang gnod pa mi skyed de/ /su dag bud
177a5(mdo sde): med sred pa de ni sems 'khrul 'gyur/ /'di ltar des ni 'dod chags rang bzhin yongs su shes/ /rdul dang bral ba zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na/ /de la nam yang zhe sdang gnod pa
177a6(mdo sde): mi skyed de/ /mkhas pas 'di ltar gnod sems rab tu bshig pa'i phyir/ /byams par byed cing zhe sdang thams cad shin tu bcom/ /de la nam yang gti mug gnod pa mi skyed de/ /
177a7(mdo sde): shes rab kyis ni gti mug ma rig nges par bsal/ /ye shes rab rib med pa dpag tu med pa thob/ /ting 'dzin thob pa'i yon tan 'di dag dpag tu med/ /mi gtsang bas ni 'dod
177b1(mdo sde): chags rtag tu tshar bcad de/ /byams pa yis kyang zhe sdang khor mor ma lus bcom/ /shes rab kyis ni gti mug nyon mongs dra ba bsal/ /ting 'dzin thob pa 'jig rten kun na rab tu
177b2(mdo sde): mdzes/ /de la nam yang gnyid ni gnod pa mi bskyed de/ /des ni nye ba'i nyon mongs rnam mang rnam par bshig /de ni gos pa med cing shin tu bral bar 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin thob pa'i yon
177b3(mdo sde): tan 'di dag dpag tu med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa/ /de la nam yang chags pa gnod par mi 'gyur te/ /'di ltar de ni dus kun tu yang gtong la
177b4(mdo sde): dga'/ /bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing bde ba sbyin par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa/ /de ni dpe med pa yi mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ni
177b5(mdo sde): rtag par stobs dang rjes su ldan 'gyur te/ /'jig rten na ni de dang mnyam pa su yang med/ /nam tshe 'jig rten du'ang 'khor los bsgyur ba yi/ /mi yi rgyal por de 'gyur dzam+bu'i
177b6(mdo sde): gling du 'ongs/ /de tshe skye bo mang pos shin tu mchod par 'gyur/ /khyad par thob pas rab rib med cing shes rab mchog /su dag gtso bor gyur cing rigs che rin chen mchog /longs spyod
177b7(mdo sde): che zhing g.yog bran mang la dbang yang che/ /gang la rta dang bal glang shing rta bzhon mchog yod/ /gser dang nor bu rin chen 'gron bu rab tu mang / /sangs rgyas ye shes dam pa 'di la
178a1(mdo sde): su dad pa/ /de dag 'dzam gling rin chen rigs zhes bya ba yin/ /de ni rin chen rigs mchog de ru skyes nas kyang / /gnyen bshes shin tu mang po'i tshogs
178a2(mdo sde): kyi don kyang byed/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'di dag na ma dad gang yod pa/ /de dag bag yod pas ni dad pa skyed par byed/ /sems can tshogs rnams byang chub sems la gang bkod pa/ /de
178a3(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas rang byung rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur/ /de dag mtshungs pa med pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing du mtshungs med 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de tshe chos kyi
178a4(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di ni sus shes pa/ /de dag ma lus mi skye'i chos la gnas par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag shin tu mang byed de/ /de dag rtag tu sems can rnams kyis
178a5(mdo sde): mchod par 'gyur/ /de dag dus kun tu yang mtshungs med don byed de/ /de dag sems can mig ni rab rib med par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rab dga' byams
178a6(mdo sde): pa'i sems/ /gos pa med pa de dag de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gar gnas pa/ /sems can dag gi don kyang tshad med byed par 'gyur/ /
178a7(mdo sde): tshangs spyod mtshungs med tshul khrims rnam dag rab tu bsrung / /bskal pa mtha' yas mang por ting 'dzin sgom par byed/ /rtag tu bsam gtan rnam par thar la shin tu
178b1(mdo sde): nges| |de tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas sras/ /de dag rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rtag tu bsnyen byed cing / /zhing rnams mtha' yas rnam pa mang por de song nas/ /bde bar gshegs
178b2(mdo sde): pas rab tu bshad pa'i chos nyan te/ /gzungs la rab tu gnas par thams cad 'dzin par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs la gnas pa ni/ /mdo sde dpag tu med
178b3(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas rab tu ston/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs la gnas pa ni/ /sems can dag gi don kyang dpag tu med pa byed/ /sems can 'chi 'pho skye ba dang / /'gro ba
178b4(mdo sde): dang ni 'ong ba shes/ /des ni ci 'dra'i las byas pa/ /rnam par smin pa de 'drar 'gyur/ /las rnams 'pho bar 'gyur ba yang / /rdul tsam yang ni mi rnyed de/ /byang chub sems dpa'
178b5(mdo sde): grags chen ni/ /de dag gi yang de shes so/ /stong pa bdag nyid chen po yi/ /gnas pa dag gi dam pa yin/ /sems can bye ba bsam yas kyang / /theg pa che la rab tu 'god/ /de
178b6(mdo sde): la ston par byed pa na/ /sems can 'du shes mi 'jug ste/ /chos rnams 'jug pa med par ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu ston/ /chos rnams rab tu ston pa na/ /dmigs pa
178b7(mdo sde): dag ni mi 'byung ste/ /ye shes brtan la rab gnas shing / /stong pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ /ston pa kun gyi gnas pa yi/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bstan byas nas/ /bud med 'du shes
179a1(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis/ /de la 'du shes mi 'byung ngo / /bud med 'du shes rnam bshig nas/ /byang chub snying por 'dug par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por 'dug
179a2(mdo sde): nas ni/ /bdud kyi 'du shes rnam par ldog /mkhas pa des ni bdud rnams dang / /bdud kyi sde yang mi mthong ste/ /bdud kyi bu mo gsum po yang / /des ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
179a3(mdo sde): byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni/ /'du shes thams cad rab tu spongs/ /'du shes thams cad rab spangs nas/ /sa 'di thams cad g.yos par gyur/ /ri rab rgya mtshor bcas pa
179a4(mdo sde): dag |phyogs bcu na yang ci yod g.yos/ /phyogs bcu dag na sems can rnams/ /kun gyis de ni mi shes so/ /sa dag rab tu g.yos pa 'di/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul
179a5(mdo sde): yin| |byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya ba/ /de tshe sa yang lan drug g.yos/ /'dus byas chos ni ji snyed dang / /chos gang 'dus ma byas pa yang / /chos de thams cad rab rtogs te/ /
179a6(mdo sde): chos kyi sgrar ni bstan pa yin/ /'di la rtogs byed gang yang med/ /seng ge'i sgra ni 'byung mod kyi/ /'byung ba dag kyang rnam rig nas/ /'od byed sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /rten
179a7(mdo sde): cing chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rten cing chos rnams rab tu skye/ /chos rnams kyi ni rten pa yang / /mkhas pa de dag thams cad shes/ /chos kun gyi ni cho ga shes/ /stong nyid
179b1(mdo sde): rtogs par khong du chud/ /de dag 'gro ba rab shes te/ /chos kun rtogs par khong du chud/ /de yi 'gro ba btsal na yang / /byang chub sems dpas mi rnyed de/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas thams
179b2(mdo sde): cad kyi/ /'gro ba bsam yas de yis rig /'gro ba thams cad shes pa gang / /de ni 'gro ba der 'gro ste/ /dam chos mtshan nyid rig pas na/ /ngan song thams cad chad pa yin/ /dam
179b3(mdo sde): chos mtshan nyid rig nas ni/ /zhing rnams thams cad rnam par lta/ /zhing kun la yang rnam bltas nas/ /byang chub snying por 'dug par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por 'dug nas su/ /
179b4(mdo sde): seng ge yi ni sgra sgrog ste/ /de bzhin zhing rnams bye ba snyed/ /bsam yas dpag med grags par byed/ /zhing de rnams kyang g.yo byed cing / /sangs rgyas dpa' bo grags chen dag /sems
179b5(mdo sde): can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin/ /sems can kha lo sgyur zhing 'dul/ /byang chub dam pa reg nas ni/ /byang chub snying po de las langs/ /dpag med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /sems can 'dul
179b6(mdo sde): ba'ang rnam par 'dul/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa mtha' yas sprul/ /zhing rnams bye ba stong du yang / /sangs rgyas sprul pa 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sems can
179b7(mdo sde): bye ba bsam yas rnams/ /byang chub mchog la rab tu 'god/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /chos kyi mchog kyang ston par byed/ /ye shes chen po de 'dra ste/ /sangs rgyas ye
180a1(mdo sde): shes bsam mi khyab/ /de phyir 'dun pa rab bskyed cing / /byang chub 'dun pa bla na med/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos rnams dang / /'dus pa'i dam pa dge 'dun
180a2(mdo sde): la| |byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo rnams/ /byang chub mchog 'tshol gus pa skyed/ /zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang / /g.yel ba med par ri mo gyis/ /de nas 'od byed
180a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas su/ /ring por mi thogs 'gro bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kyang / /zhing rnams stong nas lhags pa rnams/ /'jig rten sgron ma rang mthong ste/ /chos
180a4(mdo sde): kyis mchog kyang 'chad par mdzad/ /dpa' bo chen po 'dren pa la/ /rin chen chen pos 'thor bar byed/ /man+dA ra ba'i me tog dag /byang chub phyir ni 'thor bar byed/ /bla na med
180a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas zhing / /zhing 'di rab tu rgyan par byed/ /phyogs dang phyogs ni kun tu yang / /rin po che yi dra bas g.yogs/ /ba dan dag kyang gdags byas shing / /rgyal mtshan
180a6(mdo sde): bye ba mngon par sgreng / /du ma yi ni rgyan rnams kyis/ /zhing 'di shin tu legs par brgyan/ /khang pa brtsegs pa byed par 'gyur/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam par spras/ /khang pa pu
180a7(mdo sde): shu stegs bu dag / yid du 'ong ba grangs med rnams/ /gzhal med khang dang zla gam dang / /skar khung de bzhin bya rgya bres/ /rin chen sna tshogs brgyan pa yi/ /bdug pa'i
180b1(mdo sde): snod du bdug pa bdugs/ /bdug pa dag ni bdugs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di rab tu gang / /de yi dri ni yid 'ong ba/ /zhing yang bye ba stong du ldang / de dag kun tu khyab byas nas/ /spos
180b2(mdo sde): kyi char yang rab tu 'bebs/ /gang gis dri de mnams pa yang / /de dag sangs rgyas 'dren par 'gyur/ /de dag 'dod chags zug rngu spangs/ /zhe sdang sred pa yong med de/ /rgya mo chen
180b3(mdo sde): po rnam par dral/ /mun pa kun kyang med par 'gyur/ /der ni rdzu 'phrul thob gyur te/ /dbang stobs byang chub yan lag dang / /bsam gtan thar pa rnam par reg /de dag sbyin par 'os
180b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /stan yang yid du 'ong ba rnams/ /bye ba phrag lnga rab bshams te/ /rin chen dra bas brgyan pa yi/ /gos rnams bye ba rab tu bting / /de la dpa' bo grags pa che/ /byang
180b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag 'dug / mtshan dang de bzhin dpe byad kyis/ /de dag shin tu rnam par 'bar/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kyang / /rin chen shing gis legs brgyan te/ /
180b6(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang ba/ /rdzing bu dag ni rnam par sprul/ /rdzing bu'i 'gram na gnas pa rnams/ /de dag de las chu 'thungs nas/ /thams cad sred pa bsal nas ni/ /'jig
180b7(mdo sde): rten gyi yang mchod rten 'gyur/ /tha dad pa yi zhing nas kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' lhags pa rnams/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bsngags brjod par byed/ /sgra de su
181a1(mdo sde): dag thos pa ni/ /de dag 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur/ /phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /mdo sde 'di ni ngas rab bshad/ /pad+ma bye ba bsam mi khyab
181a2(mdo sde): 'dab ma dag ni gser las byas/ /snying po sprul gyi snying po ste/ /der ni de dag rab tu sprul/ /yal ga dag kyang bai DUR+ya/ /khog pa dag ni shel yin te/ /ze ba dpal gyi snying po can//
181a3(mdo sde): der ni mdzes pa rnams kyang sprul/ /de dag dri yang bsam mi khyab/ /rgyun mi chad par 'byung ba yis/ /zhing rnams bye ba kun tu gang / /pad+ma'i dri ni bsam mi khyab/ /yid du 'ong
181a4(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba yi/ /dri de su yis bsnams pa yang / /de dag rab tu sems dga' zhing / /nad rnams thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /ma lus
181a5(mdo sde): par ni zad 'gyur te/ /de dag nyes pa gsum zad nas/ /sangs rgyas bde ba sbyin par 'gyur/ /de dag las ni sgra 'byung ste/ /sangs rgyas sgra ni bsam mi khyab/ /dam pa'i chos dang
181a6(mdo sde): dge 'dun sgra/ /rnam pa kun ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang / /smon pa med pa'i sgra 'byung ste/ /de thos sems can bye ba mang / /phyir mi ldog par rab tu
181a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /sgra de dag ni byung ba yang / /zhing rnams bye bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sems can bye ba bsam yas rnams/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'god par byed/ /rma bya ka la ping+ka dang /
181b1(mdo sde): shang shang te'u dang bya rnams kyang / /de dag rab tu sgra 'byin pa/ /sangs rgyas sgra ni bla na med/ /kun la ri skegs khrung khrung dang / /khu byug dang ni bya rnams te/ /de dag sgra ni 'byin pa yang / /
181b2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab chos sgra 'byin/ /ne tso ngang pa ka lan+ta/ /ngur pa dang ni sa ra sa/ /de dag sgra rnams 'byin pa ni/ /bla med dge 'dun sgra yang 'byin/ /lha dag gi dang mi yi ni/ /bya rnams
181b3(mdo sde): ji snyed gang yod pa/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa rnams/ /de dag kun tu sgra yang 'byin/ /rin po che yi shing rnams ni/ /bye brag 'phags shing blta na sdug /yid 'ong nor
181b4(mdo sde): bu'i shing rnams kyang / /zhing 'di nyid du rnam par sprul/ /shing 'di kun la rgyan rnams kyi/ /chun po thams cad rab tu 'phyang / /sangs rgyas dag gi mthu yis ni/ /zhing 'di nyid du mngon
181b5(mdo sde): par sprul/ /zhing 'di na ni mi snang ba/ /de lta bu yi bkod pa ni/ /zhing kun na yang yod med de/ /de tshe shin tu bye brag 'phags/ /gong ma bzhin du 'di dag rnams/ /shAkya seng ge
181b6(mdo sde): skyob pas bshad/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /ye shes de la nem nur med/ /gang gi mtha' 'di rtogs pa ni/ /de dag 'jug pa bsam yas te/ /ye shes kyis
181b7(mdo sde): ni rnam par 'phel/ /'bab chu dag gis rgya mtsho bzhin/ /de dag la yang mtha' mi rnyed/ /rgya mtsho dag ni 'thung ba bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul/ /bsam gyis mi
182a1(mdo sde): khyab 'di dag bshad/ /dpa' bo mtha' 'dir gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags ldan rnams/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam 'byin pa/ /gang+gA yi ni
182a2(mdo sde): bye ma snyed/ /de bas dbyangs kyang bsam yas te/ /byang chub sems dpa' rlom sems med/ /rlom sems rab tu spangs pa na/ /byang chub tu yang nye bar 'gyur/ /de dag srog gi phyir
182a3(mdo sde): yang ni/ /tshul khrims 'dral bar mi byed de/ /byang chub sems dpa' bka' thub brtan/ /de ni mi 'dral spyod par byed/ /'dod pa yi ni 'du shes kyis/ /de kun phyir yang mi 'dral
182a4(mdo sde): te| |'du shes thams cad spangs pa la/ /ting 'dzin dag ni dpag tu med/ /mnyam par bzhag pas de spyod de/ /ting 'dzin la yang chags pa med/ /chags pa med cing bag
182a5(mdo sde): yod pas/ /de ni 'jig rten chags mi byed/ /'jig rten khams ni 'das nas kyang / /bde ba can du de 'gro ste/ /der song nas ni de yis kyang / /sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa
182a6(mdo sde): mthong / /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo gang / /mtshan rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan/ /mngon shes lnga ldan shes rab che/ /gzungs rnams spyod yul gyur pa dag /
182a7(mdo sde): zhing rnams bye bar rab 'gro zhing / /sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bsam yas su/ /snang bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur/ /skyon rnams thams cad
182b1(mdo sde): rab spangs shing / /nyon mongs thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ /nyon mongs thams cad rgyun bcad de/ /rgyal bar skye ba gcig gis gnas/ /zhing de nas ni mi rnams kyang / /ngan song du
182b2(mdo sde): yang mi 'gro ste/ /zhing der ngan song thams cad kyang / /ma lus par ni chad par 'gyur/ /skyob ba 'od ni dpag med pa/ /'jig rten mgon pos bshad pa ste/ /de la nem nur ma byed
182b3(mdo sde): cig |bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mdo sde rin chen 'di yi bsngags pa rnams/ /bud med gang thos sems kyang dad 'gyur ba/ /skyes bu mkhas pa mchog tu myur 'gyur te/ /rdzu 'phrul
182b4(mdo sde): gyis ni zhing stong bye bar 'gro / mchod pa tshad med rnam mang ji snyed pa/ /zhing ni bye ba khrag khrig gtams snyed du/ /skyes bu mchog la mchod pa de byas pas/ /byams pa'i sems la grangs dang
182b5(mdo sde): char mi phod/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin rtag tu bsnyen byas te/ /bsam gtan rnam thar de bzhin tshad med dang / /stong pa mtshan med rtag tu bsnyen byas na/ /ring por mi thogs 'jig rten
182b6(mdo sde): bde gshegs 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims tshogs gnas pa/ /des ni nga la mchod pa rab mchog byas/ /zad dus tha mar byang chub sems gnas pa/ /des ni sangs
182b7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad rtag tu mchod/ /zad dus mi bzad pa la byang chub sems dpa' gang / /bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos mchog 'di srung ba/ /de dag nga yi sras te phyi dus chos
183a1(mdo sde): skyong ba/ /de dag sangs rgyas bye ba stong gis yongs su gtad/ /mdo sde 'dzin pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //'phags
183a2(mdo sde): pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems
183a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas mtshan ma med
183a4(mdo sde): pa la gnas te de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa rgya cher bya ba la mngon
183a5(mdo sde): par brtson par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang /
183a6(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi re bas rang gi
183a7(mdo sde): lus dang srog gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi mchod rten la mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba rgya cher bya'o/ /chos thams cad
183b1(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang skad gsang mtho zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / bye brag tu 'phags pa'i tshig dang yi ge rgyun chags pas snying rje chen po la
183b2(mdo sde): dmigs pa'i sems dang / yid la byed pas gzhan la rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /rab tu gdon par bya'o/ /bshad par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba
183b3(mdo sde): dang | gzhi ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di yin no/ /gzhon nu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying
183b4(mdo sde): rje chen po dang / thabs kyis brtan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
183b5(mdo sde): rten rnams la mchod pa rgya cher bya ba la brtson par gyur cing / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab
183b6(mdo sde): tu ston pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la gnas par 'gyur te/ de
183b7(mdo sde): chos gang la'ang mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor la gnas pa ni smon lam thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
184a1(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam thams cad la gnas pa ni bdag dang sems can kun gyi smon lam thams cad yongs su
184a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang myur du thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ rnam grangs
184a3(mdo sde): 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gzhon nu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
184a4(mdo sde): dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
184a5(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbyangs byin zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /gzhon nu/
184a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin nges sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa/ zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod
184a7(mdo sde): d e| rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang rab
184b1(mdo sde): tu bkod nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/ /gzhon nu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dzam+bu'i gling na rgyal po dpal dbyangs zhes bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
184b2(mdo sde): 'das pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong byas te/ mchod rten re re la'ang mar
184b3(mdo sde): me'i yon bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong btsugs so/ /de bzhin du mchod rten re re la'ang rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba
184b4(mdo sde): dang | byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo/ /gzhon nu/ 'di ltar rgyal po dpal
184b5(mdo sde): d byangs kyis mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can la mchod pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu'i byang chub sems dpa'
184b6(mdo sde): mang po bsogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa la brtson par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
184b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang chos smra ba yin te/ spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi chos
185a1(mdo sde): ston pa/ yongs su dag pa'i chos ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go /gzhon nu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor de'i
185a2(mdo sde): nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin zhes bya ba yod de/ byis pa gzhon nu skra nag pa/ dang po'i lang tsho dang ldan pa/ na tshod dar la bab pa/ 'dod pa la
185a3(mdo sde): rnam par ma rtses shing / gzhon nur tshangs par spyad pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo gcig lon pa zhig yod do/ /gzhon nu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyis byang
185a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag la gsol pa btab pa/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa yang dag par sdud pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gzungs
185a5(mdo sde): chen po dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dbang dang 'dul ba chags pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la gsol ba btab
185a6(mdo sde): nas| de'i nub mo mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can rnams kyi mdun du mar me'i yon bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag rab tu 'bar bar byas te/ khyams kyi
185a7(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor yang phyag dar byas shing chag chag btab nas rab tu byug pa byas/ me tog mngon par bkram zhing / mal stan sna tshogs bting ste/ rgyal po dpal dbyangs de btsun
185b1(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ grong dang yul mi 'khor dang bcas/ grong mir bcas pa khyim gyi nang nas byung ste/ rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
