185b2(mdo sde): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams thogs nas mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi
185b3(mdo sde): snying po can rnams la mchod pa byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te khang thog tu dong ngo / /lha dang mi'i 'khor kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir mang du tshogs te byang
185b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bde bas byin gyis de dag mthong ba dang / mar me'i yon du phul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag rab tu 'bar bar byas pas de'i 'od kyis gcig tu khyab ste/
185b5(mdo sde): lha dang mi'i skye bo mang po rnams chos nyan par tshogs par rig nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni theg pa chen po la zhugs pa yin na/ da bdag ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa'i phyir
185b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa zhig bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa ji lta bus lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ngo mtshar du 'gyur ba dang / yi rangs pa dang /
185b7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi snang ba thob pa dang / rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa thams cad dang ldan pa
186a1(mdo sde): 'di'ang zil gyis mnan te/ rgyal po dpal dbyangs btsun mo'i 'khor dang zhabs 'bring bar bcas pa'ang ngo mtshar du gyur cing yi rangs pa dang / rab
186a2(mdo sde): tu dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur bar mchod par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin de ltar sems
186a3(mdo sde): dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes te/ chos nyan pa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus par rig nas de'i nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du 'dug nas lag pa g.yas
186a4(mdo sde): pa ras kyis dkris te 'bru mar gyi nang du bcug go / 'bru mar gyi nang du bcug nas 'bar bar byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin lhag pa'i
186a5(mdo sde): bsam pa la zhugs pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs shing / byang chub yongs su 'tshol ba'i lag pa g.yas pa da ltar 'bar
186a6(mdo sde): yang sems dang bzhin gyi mdog 'gyur ba med do/ /gzhon nu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyi lag pa g.yas pa bsregs nas rab tu 'bar
186a7(mdo sde): zhing mer gyur te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar bar gyur ma thag tu de'i tshe sa chen po 'di'ang rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /de'i lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar byis pa'i 'od des mar me yon du phul ba
186b1(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rnams mog mog por byas par gyur te/ phyogs thams cad du'ang snang ba chen po byung ngo / /'od des phyogs thams cad snang bar gyur te kun tu khyab
186b2(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang / de dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang skad 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / tshig
186b3(mdo sde): bye brag tu 'phags pa dang / tshig dang yi ge rgyun chags pas 'khor de dag thams cad la rgya cher go bar byed cing yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /der sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha khri
186b4(mdo sde): nyis stong chos nyan par 'dus pa de dag dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas lha'i mchod pa sna tshogs byed par gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo rnams kyang lha'i rol mo dag byed do/ /rgyal po dpal
186b5(mdo sde): dbyangs khang pa'i steng na 'dug pa bdag gi mi mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yang dag par bzung
186b6(mdo sde): bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyi lag pa 'bar bar byas te/ 'od de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing lha'i 'od mi'i las 'das pas snang bar byas pa
186b7(mdo sde): mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po thob pa yin no zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
187a1(mdo sde): bde bas byin la shin tu dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / gus pa nye bar bzhag ste/ ri mor bcas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po chen pos
187a2(mdo sde): b rtan pas btsun mo'i 'khor brgyad cu dang lhan cig khang pa'i steng de nas bdag nyid mchongs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin blta ba dang rab tu
187a3(mdo sde): dga' bar bya ba'i phyir mchongs te song ngo / /de gus pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas tshe de nyid la 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
187a4(mdo sde): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis yongs su gzung ba thob bo/ /de lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
187a5(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis yongs su bzung bas rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyang 'khor dang bcas pa khru stong phrag brgyar tshang ba'i khang ba'i steng nas
187a6(mdo sde): mchongs na/ de'i lus la gnod pa'am/ sems la gnod pa'am/ sems zhum par gyur pa med do/ /de nas rgyal po dpal dbyangs lag pa gnyis bsgreng ste/ skye bo'i tshogs
187a7(mdo sde): chen po dang lhan cig 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyi lag pa bsregs shing rab tu 'bar ba mthong nas skad chen po phyung ste cho nges btab bo/ /
187b1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po de skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig du zhing mchi ma phyung nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyi mdun du 'dug go /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems
187b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyis rgyal po dpal dbyangs mthong ste/ mthong nas de la smras pa/ ci'i slad du rgyal po chen po khyod skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di dag dang bdag
187b3(mdo sde): gi mdun na bzhugs shing skad chen po phyung ste/ cho nges btab nas bshums shing mchi ma 'byin pa mdzad/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa'
187b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/ shes rab chen po bde bas byin/ /chos smra ba ni mkhas pa yi/ /yan lag mtshang rig nas ni/ /skye bo 'di
187b5(mdo sde): dag de phyir du/ /gzi brjid phung pos 'phags pa yi/ /'di lta bu yi gzugs 'di yang / /lag pa nyams par shes nas ni/ /bdag kyang shin tu sdug bsngal lo/ /khyod kyi lag pa 'bar
187b6(mdo sde): byas pa/ /de yi 'od ni phyogs bcur btang / /khyod las byung ba'i lha rdzas kyis/ /mar me 'di dag mi gsal byas/ /sa 'di rab tu g.yos gyur te/ /khyod kyi sems ni zhum pa med/ /de nas
187b7(mdo sde): bdag gi sems skyes pa/ /mkhas pa tha mal ma yin snyam/ /bdag ni btsun mo'i 'khor bcas pa/ /khru ni stong phrag brgya pa yi/ /khang pa'i steng nas mchongs gyur na/ /bdag gi lus
188a1(mdo sde): la gnod pa med/ /legs so ye shes ngo mtshar khyod/ /legs so sems kyang bla na med/ /brtson 'grus rab brtsams legs pa ste/ /bsam pa che ba legs
188a2(mdo sde): pa yin/ /gang gi lag pa 'bar byas kyang / /khyod la nam yang g.yo ba med/ /dga' zhing rangs pa skyes nas su/ /phyir yang chos ni rab tu 'chad/ /ji ltar zla ba nya ba dang / /nam
188a3(mdo sde): mkha'i dkyil na nyi ma bzhin/ /ri rab ri yi rgyal po ltar/ /grogs po de ltar shin tu mdzes/ /bdag kyang de bzhin mkhas pa yi/ /smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ /lus
188a4(mdo sde): la phangs pa rab spangs te/ /bdag gis srog chags don rnams bgyi/ /chos kyi dga' bas rangs gyur te/ /bdag gi dga' ba bsam mi khyab/ /'di ltar yan lag ma tshang ba/ /
188a5(mdo sde): des ni rab tu sdug bsngal lo/ /lha dang klu yi mchod pa yis/ /bde bas byin gyis rgyal po la/ /mtha' yas pa yi spobs pa yis/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras/ /gang
188a6(mdo sde): la lag pa med pa yang / /de ni yan lag ma tshang min/ /su la tshul khrims med pa dag /de ni yan lag ma tshang yin/ /rus pa yi ni lus 'di yis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sbyin
188a7(mdo sde): pa'i gnas/ /'jig rten kun gyi mchod pa'i rten/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gis mchod/ /stong gsum dag ni mtha' yas pa/ /rin po che yis yongs bkang ste/ /sangs
188b1(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten mgon la rab tu sbyin/ /'jig rten pa yi mchod yod kyang / /su dag chos rnams stong rig nas/ /lus dang srog kyang gtong ba yi/ /mchod
188b2(mdo sde): pa de dag bsam mi khyab/ /bden pa'i tshig ni brjod par bgyi/ /rgyal po chen po bdag la gson/ /skye bo'i tshogs 'di thams cad kyang / /tshigs bcad 'di yi don rig bgyi/ /bden pa
188b3(mdo sde): gang gis sangs rgyas su/ /'jig rten mchod rten bdag 'gyur na/ /bden pa de yis sa 'di yang / /rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur cig /tshig 'di dag ni smras pa dang / /sa yang rab tu g.yos
188b4(mdo sde): par gyur/ /ngo mtshar gyur cing rmad byung ste/ /lha rnams bye ba rab tu dga'/ /lha dang mi dag dga' nas ni/ /byang chub tu yang sems bskyed de/ /dpag med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /theg
188b5(mdo sde): pa mchog la gnas par gyur/ /dge slong bde bas byin pa yis/ /ji snyed kyi ni don byas pa/ /de ni mi zad bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas dag gi ye shes 'jug /bden pa gang gis chos
188b6(mdo sde): de ni| |lag pa zhes kyang bya med na/ /bden pa de yis sngon ltar bdag /lag pa myur du byung bar shog /bden pa gang gis chos de ni/ /bde bas byin pa yod ma yin/ /phyogs bcu rnams
188b7(mdo sde): su btsal na yang / /stong pa yin pas mi dmigs so/ /sgra gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang / /de ni stong par rig par gyis/ /sgra ni brag cha lta bu ste/ /chos rnams de ltar shes par
189a1(mdo sde): gyis| |nam zhig 'jigs pa med 'gyur zhing / /stong pa rtogs par khong du chud/ /bden pa yi ni tshig de yis/ /'jig rten thams cad 'tshig mi 'gyur/ /
189a2(mdo sde): srid gsum sems can ji snyed pa/ /lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyang / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /thams cad mnyam par bzhag par shog /ji snyed lha dang mi
189a3(mdo sde): dag gis/ /'tshe bar gyur pa ci yod pa/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /de dag thams cad zhi bar shog /tshigs bcad 'di dag bshad pa dang / /lag pa yang ni slar skyes
189a4(mdo sde): te| |bde bas byin pa de yi lus/ /mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /lha yang bye ba phrag stong rnams/ /bar snang la ni 'dug nas su/ /de tshe me tog man+dA ras/ /dge slong
189a5(mdo sde): de la 'thor bar byed/ /mi ma yin pa'i me tog gis/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'di gang bar gyur/ /lha mo bye ba khrag khrig rnams/ /glu dbyangs rol mo rab tu byed/ /de tshe bde bas byin pa
189a6(mdo sde): yis| |sgra 'di dag ni phyung ba na/ /rnam 'phrul 'di ni sangs rgyas dag /bye ba stong gis gzigs par gyur/ /rang rang gi ni zhing dag tu/ /dge slong pha dang dge slong ma/ /dge bsnyen
189a7(mdo sde): ma dang dge bsnyen la/ /grags pa chen po go bar mdzad/ /dge slong bde bas byin pa de/ /mkhas shing stobs kyang che ba ste/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes phyir/ /des ni lag pa 'bar
189b1(mdo sde): bar byas/ /de yis zhing rnams stong dag dang / /gang+gA yi ni bye ma snyed/ /mar me des ni snang byas te/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa byung ba bzhin/ /me tog dang ni phye ma yis/ /zhing rnams thams
189b2(mdo sde): cad gang bar gyur/ /sa gzhi dag nas yan chad du/ /pus nub tsam du gang bar gyur/ /rin chen me tog thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gang bar gyur/ /bde bas byin la mchod
189b3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ /klu rnams mu tig char pa 'bebs/ /rin chen bkod pa thams cad kyis/ /zhing 'di rab tu brgyan par gyur/ /bde bas byin la mchod pa'i phyir/ /mu tig rin chen shin tu
189b4(mdo sde): bkram/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phyer bcas/ /gang+gA yi ni bye ma snyed/ /byang chub mchog la zhugs par gyur/ /bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la yang / /sangs rgyas
189b5(mdo sde): shAkya seng ge ni/ /dge slong dag gi dge 'dun mdun/ /rgyal ba seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa/ /bskal pa bye ba stong du ni/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/ /nga ni bde bas byin par gyur/ /ma pham
189b6(mdo sde): pa ni dpal dbyangs yin/ /dge slong bde bas byin pa ni/ /mthong ma thag tu de yi tshe/ /bud med dag kyang mtha' yas pa/ /bud med dngos po rnam par log /mi dbang gis ni lung
189b7(mdo sde): bstan te/ /de dag phyir yang ldog pa med/ /'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste/ /rang 'byung 'gyur zhes lung yang bstan/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa yi/ /mkhas pas mdo sde 'di
190a1(mdo sde): thos nas/ /lus la phangs par ma byed par/ /chos 'di rjes su bslab par gyis/ /ba de bas byin gyi le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas
190a2(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur ba la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du
190a3(mdo sde): b la na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la nye bar gnas na chos kyi sbyin pa'am zang zing gi sbyin pa la brtson
190a4(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sbyin pa de'ang bsngo ba bzhis yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thabs la mkhas pa gang gis
190a5(mdo sde): s angs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i thabs mkhas pa de dag thob par 'gyur bar sbyin pa
190a6(mdo sde): 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsngo ba dang po'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag las thabs mkhas pa thos shing 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / kun chub
190a7(mdo sde): par bya ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
190b1(mdo sde): de dag dang bdag rtag tu 'grogs par gyur cig ces de ltar sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsngo ba gnyis pa'o/ /longs spyod thob pa gang 'jig rten thams cad
190b2(mdo sde): 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i longs spyod thob pa de dag dang bdag phrad par gyur cig ces de ltar sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsngo ba gsum pa'o/ /bdag gi lus
190b3(mdo sde): grub bas sems can rnams la chos kyi phan gdags pa dang / zang zing gi phan gdags pa dang / phan gdags pa gnyis kyis phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba'i bdag gi lus grub par gyur cig
190b4(mdo sde): ces sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsngo ba bzhi pa ste/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsngo ba 'di bzhis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bsngo bar bya'o/ /

190b6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la g.yo med pas bsten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ rim gro bya'o/ /de la
190b7(mdo sde): g .yo med pa de ni ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na bar gyur cing nad mi bzad pas btab par gyur ba la rang gi sha dang khrag gis
191a1(mdo sde): kyang dge slong de na ba de las bslang bar spro bar bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ting nge
191a2(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas g.yo ba med cing 'jigs pa med pas rang gi sha dang khrag kyang yongs

191a4(mdo sde): med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
191a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
191a6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ gzhon nu/ smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa khyad
191a7(mdo sde): p ar du 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gang gi nyin par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
191b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i nyi ma ma 'das par sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul nas sems can tshad med pa gdul ba byas te/ zag pa zad pa
191b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod nas/ sems can tshad med pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod nas nyi ma de ma 'das par yongs su mya ngan
191b3(mdo sde): las 'das so/ /bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i dam pa'i chos lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par gyur to/ /gzhon nu/ bcom ldan 'das smon lam
191b4(mdo sde): b sam gyis mi khyab pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na dge
191b5(mdo sde): slong dmigs pa'i lta ba can mang po byung ste/ de dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde la mi sred mi mos shing phyir zlog par byed/ spong bar byed de/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong dag la'ang
191b6(mdo sde): gnod par byed cing srog kyang gcod par byed de/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa de dag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong stong srog bcad par gyur to/ /gzhon nu/ de'i
191b7(mdo sde): che de'i dus na rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba dzam+bu'i gling la dbang ba/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin la/ sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung ste/ gzhon nu/ yang de'i
192a1(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na dzam+bu'i gling 'dir dge slong yang dag blo gros zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa/ chos smra ba rgyal po de'i pho brang du 'gro zhing / dge ba'i bshes
192a2(mdo sde): gnyen byed pa/ phan par 'dod pa/ snying brtse ba don du 'dod pa zhig byung ste/ rgyal po de'ang de la rgyun mi chad par blta bas mi ngoms te rtag tu 'dod par gyur to/ /de'ang bstan pa
192a3(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi gtam bya ba dang / nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su dri ba dang / bzung ba dang tshig gis go bar byed nus shing dge slong chos smra ba de/ sems
192a4(mdo sde): can dag gi g.yo ba dang / spyod lam dang / mos pa dang / khams dang / bag chags la mkhas te/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa shes
192a5(mdo sde): shing / khams dang bag chags la'ang mkhas/ bden pa dang mtshams sbyar ba la'ang mkhas/ mtshams dbral ba dang tshig gi lan gtan la dbab pa la'ang mkhas/
192a6(mdo sde): spobs pa zab cing sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga la'ang mkhas/ gsong por smra zhing bzhin la khro gnyer med pa/ sems chen por gyur pa la gnas pa/ snying rje
192a7(mdo sde): chen po la brtson pa/ pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis ma non pa yin no/ /gzhon nu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs kyi bu mo skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa/
192b1(mdo sde): byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa ye shes ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i slob dpon ni dge slong yang dag blo gros

192b4(mdo sde): gis spangs par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ sras dang / sras mo dang / zhabs 'bring bar bcas pa dge slong de na bar rig nas rab tu du zhing
192b5(mdo sde): mchi ma byung ngo / /bud med brgyad khrir bcas pa dang / grong dang grong khyer gyi mi rnams su bcas pa dang / yul 'khor ba dang / grong 'dab pa dang / yul gyi mi dang / rtsis pa dang /
192b6(mdo sde): blon po dang / blon po chen po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor rnams su bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang dge slong de na bar thos nas rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma 'byin te/ dge slong 'di 'chi ba'i
192b7(mdo sde): dus byed par gyur ta re zhes skad 'dzer to/ /gzhon nu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po ye shes stobs la lha mo sngon snag gi gnyen mtshams su gyur pa zhig yod de/ de rgyal po de'i phyi
193a1(mdo sde): bzhin 'brang bas rmi lam du bstan pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gal te dge slong 'di la mi'i sha dang khrag gsar pa ma rul bas 'brum bu me dbal nag po
193a2(mdo sde): 'di la byugs te/ mi'i sha gsar pa ma rul ba las ro sna tshogs su g.yos byas te byin na dge slong 'di nad 'di las 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs
193a3(mdo sde): mtshan mo de 'das pa dang gnyid kyis log pa las sad de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs nas rmi lam gyi rnam pa de dag btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la bzlas te/ nga'i rmi lam

193a6(mdo sde): gtam byas kyang dge slong de la rtsi de sbyin par su'ang spro ba med do/ /de nas rgyal po'i sras mo ye shes ldan de dga' zhing mgu /yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / yid
193a7(mdo sde): bde ba skyes nas 'di lta bur brtson par byas te/ 'di ltar bdag gis rtsi 'di dag bdag gi lus las bcad de ji skad bstan pa bzhin du khrag gsar ba dang sha gsar ba sbyin par
193b1(mdo sde): bya'o| |rgyal po'i pho brang na bdag ni thams cad kyi nang na gzhon zhing chung ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin la/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i
193b2(mdo sde): ye shes btsal bar 'dod pas chos smra ba kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la bdag gi lus kyi sha dang khrag phul te/ dge slong 'di ci nas nad 'di las sos par bya'o snyam mo/ /de
193b3(mdo sde): nas rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan de rang gi gnas su song nas mtshon rnon po thogs te chos la zhugs pa'i yid kyis bdag gi brla las sha bcad nas/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa gyi
193b4(mdo sde): nom par g.yos byas nas/ khrag kyang thogs te 'phags pa de'i drung du song nas rgyal po ye shes stobs kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ khrag gis 'brum bu me dbal nag po de byugs nas/ g.yos

193b6(mdo sde): de zos ma thag tu dge slong de'i na tsha thams cad med par gyur te nad de thams cad kyang sos so/ /de yongs su gdung ba dang bral zhing bde ba dang ldan pas de lta de lta bur chos bstan te/

194a2(mdo sde): gang nas blangs/ /bu mo khyod kyis kha zas 'di byas pas/ /chos smra 'di yang 'di ltar bde bar gyur/ /sna tshogs bro dang ldan pa'i g.yos byas pa/ /bsad pa yin nam de ste shi ba

194b1(mdo sde): po 'di las kyang / /dge slong ji ltar thar bar bya/ /cho ga myur du ma byas na/ /rtsi sman dag ni ma byas pas/ /dge slong 'di ni nad 'di yis/ /myur du 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur/ /rang gi sha dang

195a2(mdo sde): kyis don chen 'di dag bgyis/ /dge slong 'di yang thar bgyis mi bde med/ /bdag gis bsod nams dag ni tshad med bgyis/ /bu mo de la rgyal pos 'di skad smras/ /bu mo khyod

195b1(mdo sde): nas| |rang gi brla las sha bcad rab tu stsal/ /rma dang sdug bsngal bdag la ma mchis te/ /bdag gi lus kyang sngon gyi bzhin du gyur/ /'di 'dra ba yi chos smra 'di lta bu/ /brgya lam na yang

196a2(mdo sde): par bgyid pa ni/ /de ltar bslang ba de yang de yi rgyu/ /de bzhin chos kyi mchod rten na ba yang / /chos la gus par rang gi sha dang ni/ /khrag gis byug pa dag gis thar bar bgyis/ /

196a7(mdo sde): dngos por bdag ni phyis mi 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na shin tu dka' bar spyad pa ngo
196b1(mdo sde): m tshar rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di thos nas chos smra ba na ba la sman shin tu dkon pas rim gro bya ba la brtson zhing bdag gi sha dang khrag gis kyang rim gror byas
196b2(mdo sde): te| than sor mo gcig tsam sbyin pas kyang 'gro ba'i chos kyi mchod rten la rim gror bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i gtam nges
196b3(mdo sde): par bstan pa 'di rgya cher tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /gang gis gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing / /rin chen bkang nas 'dren la phul ba bas/ /
196b4(mdo sde): gang gis rkang pa'i sor mo gcig byin na/ /de bas bsod nams mchog 'di bye brag 'phags/ /bu mo de ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong dag mthong bar gyur/ /kun
196b5(mdo sde): gyi bstan pa la yang rab byung nas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di rab tu bzung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag thams cad ni/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das pa phyi dus na/ /de ni rtag par rab tu
196b6(mdo sde): byung gyur te/ /bde gshegs sras mo kun nas nyon mongs med/ /mar me mdzad pa de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /bstan pa la yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad/ /der yang bud med dngos po
196b7(mdo sde): bsgyur nas su/ /de tshe de ni dge slong chos smrar gyur/ /rtag tu dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /mi dbang ye shes stobs ni byams pa yin/ /mar me mdzad ni chos smra der gyur te/ /
197a1(mdo sde): de tshe nga ni rgyal po'i bu mor gyur/ /lha mo sngon gyi snag gi gnyen gyur pa/ /mi dbang ye shes stobs kyi phyir 'brang zhing / /rgyal po'i rmi lam du yang ston
197a2(mdo sde): pa ni| |mi 'khrugs spyad pa spyod tshe der gyur to/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir/ /g.yo sgyu thams cad yongs su spangs nas su/ /bdag gi sha dag dang ni khrag gis
197a3(mdo sde): kyang | |chos smra ba la ngas kyang rim gro byas/ /dge slong na ba na tshas gzir ba de/ /gang dag mthong nas de tshe dus pa yang / /phyir mi ldog par de dag rab gyur te/ /log par ltung
197a4(mdo sde): ba'i sar ni yong ma song / /de dag rtag tu mig kyang na ba med/ /klad pa'i nad med rna ba'i nad med de/ /sna yi nad med lce yi nad kyang med/ /so yang na bar nam yang ma gyur to/ /dge
197a5(mdo sde): slong na ba de tshe sus bsnyen pa/ /de dag rtag tu kun nas mdzes par gyur/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan/ /dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis lus kyang 'bar/ /
197a6(mdo sde): de dag nga yi bstan la rab byung nas/ /rab tu 'jig dus byang chub dam pa 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyang bzung nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong dag mthong bar 'gyur/ /
197a7(mdo sde): byang chub mchog 'di legs par bzung nas su/ /rtag tu ri mo byas shing bcang byas na/ /de dag skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni/ /mi yi gtso bo mi 'khrugs mthong bar 'gyur/ /
197b1(mdo sde): de dag spyod pa bla med 'di thos nas/ /dga' ba zang zing med pa 'phags pa 'thob/ /de dag bdag gi sngon spyad thos nas ni/ /sangs rgyas dag la mchod pa rgya cher byed/ /dge slong mkhas
197b2(mdo sde): pa tshul khrims ldan mthong nas/ /g.yo med par ni rtag tu bsnyen par bya/ /zhe sdang tha ba dag kyang rnam spangs te/ /dge slong chos smra rtag tu bsnyen par gyis/ /gnod sems khro ba dag
197b3(mdo sde): kyang rnam spangs la/ /nga yi sras po chos skyong mchod par gyis/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por long ba dang / /log par ltung zhing sdug bsngal gyur ta re/ /gcig la gcig kyang gnod sems
197b4(mdo sde): byas na ni/ /de la tshul khrims thos pa skyob mi nus/ /bsam gtan mi skyob dgon gnas skyob mi nus/ /sbyin pa mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pa min/ /ye shes ldan gyi le'u ste/ sum
197b5(mdo sde): cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / //de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
197b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
197b7(mdo sde): kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol
198a1(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de'i phyir kun dga' bo bdag gi stan la 'dug la de
198a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /
198a3(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs
198a4(mdo sde): phye'o| |bde bar gshegs pa bdag la skabs phye'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stan la 'dug
198a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi rgyu gang gi rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mtha'
198a6(mdo sde): yas pa spyod pa dag lag pa bcad pa dang / rkang pa bcad pa dang / rna ba bcad pa dang / sna bcad pa dang / mig dbyung ba dang / mgo bcad pa dang / lus bcad pa dang / yan lag bcad
198a7(mdo sde): par gyur/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang myong bar gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen
198b1(mdo sde): gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
198b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par sgrub pa na/ ngas sdug bsngal ji snyed myong bar gyur pa khyod kyis shes shing de dag dran na ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems/
198b3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'di la skyes bu la la zhig rkang pa nas spyi bo'i bar du 'bar bar gyur te/ rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa de la skyes bu la la zhig dar nye
198b4(mdo sde): bar 'ongs te/ 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu tshur shog /lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par rtses shig /dga' bar gyis shig /yongs su spyod cig/
198b5(mdo sde): ces zer na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur te rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / yongs su
198b6(mdo sde): spyod par byed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/
198b7(mdo sde): skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur te rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / yongs su spyod pa byed du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang
199a1(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can rnams ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal bar gyur cing dbul ba dag mthong nas yid bde ba'am sems
199a2(mdo sde): dga' ba ma byung ngo / /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul
199a3(mdo sde): khrims ma zhig pa dang / tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur ba dang / tshul khrims ma 'bags pa dang / tshul khrims ma g.yos pa dang /
199a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims ma blangs pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'khrugs pa dang / tshul khrims mi yang ba dang / tshul khrims gzhan la ston pa ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims mi slu ba dang /
199a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims drang ba dang / tshul khrims dam bcas pa bzhin du byed pa dang / tshul khrims sems can rnams la phan gdogs pa yin te/ de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan
199a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa de dag ni lag pa bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ rkang
199a7(mdo sde): pa bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ rna ba bcad pa dang sna bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ mig phyung ba dang mgo bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi
199b1(mdo sde): 'gyur| lus dang yan lag bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang mi myong ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon
199b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ kun dga' bo/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ kun
199b3(mdo sde): dga' bo/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa/ mtshungs pa med par
199b4(mdo sde): gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
199b5(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad+ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes
199b6(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rin po che'i pad+ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
199b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur gyur to/ /nyi ma thams cad la nyin re zhing yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu
200a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do/ /rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sems can grangs med dpag tu med
200a2(mdo sde): rnams zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod do/ /rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das na sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
200a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad+ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon
200a4(mdo sde): p ar 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub
200a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ kun dga' bo/ rgyal po dpa' bas byin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po dpa' bas byin de la btsun mo'i
200a6(mdo sde): 'khor ni bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /bu pho ni stong yod do/ /bu mo ni lnga brgya yod do/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpa 'bas byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan
200a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yangs shing rgya che la sgo bzhi yod pa/ stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / pu shu dang / khang pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skyed mos
200b1(mdo sde): tshal gyis brgyan cing rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ lha'i gnas bzhin snang ba/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gyur pa zhig yod do/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i
200b2(mdo sde): dus na mdo sde 'di lta bu dag ni skye bo mang pos smad cing skye bo mang pos spangs te/ skye bo mang po dang mi 'phrod cing skye bo mang pos bor bar gyur te/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i dus su gyur pa/
200b3(mdo sde): gtse ba mang zhing char ches pa'i dus kyi tshe/ char mi 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ dus ma yin par char 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ sbrul 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/ lce 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ mu ge 'byung
200b4(mdo sde): pa'i dus kyi tshe/ log bar lta ba'i dus kyi tshe/ yang dag pa ma yin par lta ba'i dus kyi tshe/ mu stegs can gyi gsang sngags yongs su 'tshol ba'i dus kyi tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu 'jig
200b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / ljongs nas bskrad nas de dag chos
200b6(mdo sde): smra ba me tog zla mdzes dang lhan cig kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i nags khrod der rten cing gnas te dge slong de dag la gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to/ /kun dga' bo/ nags khrod
200b7(mdo sde): de'ang dus thams cad du snang ba'i me tog sna tshogs dang / snye ma dang 'khri shing dang 'bras bu dag dang ldan pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang 'dra ba/ shing sna tshogs kyis gang zhing sa'i gzhi'ang
201a1(mdo sde): gzugs dang kha dog du ma dang / sa bon dang myu gu thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ brag dang rdo ba sna tshogs mdzes shing dri ma med pa/ yangs shing mtho ba dang
201a2(mdo sde): gser gyi ri dag gis mdzes par byas shing sdug pa/ grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang dang / dri za'am/ skyes bu'am/ drang srong dang mi 'am ci dag gnas pa/ byad gzugs dang kha dog che
201a3(mdo sde): zhing rnam pa sna tshogs mang po gnas pa/ sangs rgyas du ma bzhugs bzhugs pa/ dga' tshal dang 'dra ba kun tu bzang zhing rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'i nags tshal dam pa kun
201a4(mdo sde): tu bzang po de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson zhing gnas par gyur to/ /yang kun dga' bo/ chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de gcig pu dben par song
201a5(mdo sde): nas| nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs te/ lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas bltas na/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sangs
201a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dir skyes te/ de dag gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa rnyed na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/
201a7(mdo sde): gal te gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa ma rnyed na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa dag mthong ngo / /de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes
201b1(mdo sde): d ran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po ga la yod pa der song ste byin nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad
201b2(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /kho bo ni 'gro'o/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'dab dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du song la sems can rnams la

201b4(mdo sde): dang | grong 'dab dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'gro ba 'di ni kho bo cag 'dod pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
201b5(mdo sde): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mang po dam pa'i chos spong ba dag byung ba'i dus la bab kyi/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa'i srog gcod par gyur na ma legs so/ /tshe dang ldan
201b6(mdo sde): pa ni shin tu mdzes shing byad bzhin bzang la blta na sdug ste/ dang po'i lang tsho dang ldan zhing / na tshod dar la bab ste/ mdog ni gser btso ma bzang po 'dra/ dpral ba ni dung dang zla ba
201b7(mdo sde): dang me tog kunada'i kha dog lta bu'i mdzod spus brgyan/ skra dang gtsug tor ni mthon mthing la lcang lor 'khyil ba yin pas rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po'am/ de dang 'dra ba gzhan dag
202a1(mdo sde): kyang phrag dog dang 'jungs pas non pa'i sems kyis khyod kyi srog bcad na ma legs so/ /de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
202a2(mdo sde): tshogs chen po de la 'di skad du gal te kho bos bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na kho bos 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa
202a3(mdo sde): bsrung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bdag tu 'du shes 'di la gnas nas su/ /bstan pa 'di la bsrung bar yong mi nus/ /mi
202a4(mdo sde): bzad phyi dus bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /byang chub bstan pa bkod pa chen po yin/ /gang gis bdag tu 'du shes kun spangs shing / /sems can 'di dang gang zag smra gnas dang / /
202a5(mdo sde): gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang / /reg bya spong ba de ni bstan pa bsrung / /bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /dang ba'i sems kyis zas dang skom rnams dang / /gdugs
202a6(mdo sde): dang ba dan mar me'i phreng ba yis/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rim gro byas/ /gang gis dam chos rab tu 'jig pa dang / /bde gshegs bstan pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /
202a7(mdo sde): nyin mtshan du ni bslab pa gcig spyod pa/ /bsod nams 'di ni de bas bye brag 'phags/ /skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni dam pa'i chos/ /'jig par 'gyur tshe gang dag btang snyoms
202b1(mdo sde): sgom| |de yis rgyal ba bkur sti byas ma yin/ /'dren pa dag la ri mor des ma byas/ /khyed bde rang gi don gyis la/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsrung bar gyis/ /khyed ni rtag tu byams gnas
202b2(mdo sde): shing | |'dul ba 'di la bag yod gyis/ /ma 'dres dag gtsang dri med pa/ /tshul khrims drang por bsrung bar gyis/ /gang gis tshul khrims dri ma med/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa
202b3(mdo sde): bsrungs pa ni/ /de yis ji snyed sngon byung ba/ /bde gshegs thams cad ri mor byas/ /de yis thams cad bskyabs pa yin/ /skye bo'i tshogs rnams byang chub bkod/ /sngon gyi sangs
202b4(mdo sde): rgyas dag gis bstod pa yi/ /tshul khrims dri ma med pa sus bsrungs pa/ /de dag gis ni sems can mang po yang / /sems can dmyal ba dang ni sdig las drangs/ /chos mchog rin
202b5(mdo sde): chen sbyin pa sbyin par gyis/ /bzod pa dag kyang rtag tu bsrung gyis la/ /dgon par gnas shing ting 'dzin mkhas pa dang / /'jam zhing mnyen pa dag kyang bsgom par gyis/ /rnam pa
202b6(mdo sde): kun tu rtsod pa ma byed par/ /spyad pa bzhi mchog 'di la rnam par spyod/ /bdag ni sems can rnams kyang bskyab pa'i phyir/ /grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro bar bya/ /blo gros che 'chang sems
202b7(mdo sde): can dam pa'i mchog / drang srong de ni 'gro bar byas pa dang / /kha cig rkang pa la yang 'ju bar byed/ /snying rje bar yang ngu zhing mchi ma zag /mkhas pa blo gros chen po ma bzhud par/ /sgra
203a1(mdo sde): 'jam yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa yi/ /zhing 'di rnams la gzigs shing rtog pa mdzod/ /bdag nyid bsrung ba mdzod la ma bzhud cig /sngon gyi stobs
203a2(mdo sde): bcu 'dren pa de dag kyang / /dbang po zhi zhing shin tu nges pa rnams/ /nags tshal brag dang ri yi rtser gshegs nas/ /byang chub dam pa dag ni thugs su chud/ /byang chub rgyur
203a3(mdo sde): yang spyod pa dam pa spyad/ /de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan/ /de dag rjes slobs nags khrod gnas par mdzod/ /brtul zhugs bzang po 'di nas ma bzhud cig /
203a4(mdo sde): lus ni shin tu mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan/ /khyod kyi skra yang mthon mthing kha dog ste/ /gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra 'od byed pa/ /sa 'di kun kyang rab tu snang bar gyur/ /khyod kyi
203a5(mdo sde): mdzod spu bzhin gyi smin mtshams na/ /shin tu mdzes pa dung dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /rgyal po dag kyang de bzhin srid kyi phyir/ /phrag dog bskyed nas khyod kyi lus bshig 'gyur/ /de nas
203a6(mdo sde): chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ ji snyed sngon gyi bde gshegs byung ba ni/ /thams cad mkhyen cing zag
203a7(mdo sde): pa zad pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad 'jig rten don mdzad de/ /srid pa gsum du byang chub dam pa rtogs/ /spyad pa'i dam pa byang chub rgyu spyad de/ /de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog
203b1(mdo sde): dang ldan/ /de yi rjes bslabs byang chub sems dpa' yang / /sems can khrag khrig rnams kyi skyabs byed 'dod/ /drang srong mkhas pa kun gyis bskor byas te/ /rkang pa la yang phyag
203b2(mdo sde): 'tshal shugs phyung nas/ /mi bzad snying rje bar ni sgra 'byin cing / /nyam thag mi bde cho nges 'debs par byed/ /kha cig rab tu 'gyel cing brgyal nas su/ /sa la lhung ba sA la bcad
203b3(mdo sde): 'gyel bzhin/ /'on kyang drang srong sems can don 'dod pa/ /bsod nams bsag pas de las phyir mi ldog /drang srong chos gos lhung bzed thogs nas chas/ /ji ltar seng ge
203b4(mdo sde): ral ba can dag bzhin/ /de ni chos kyi rang bzhin gnas pas na/ /de la yon tan nyes par bya ba med/ /'jig rten 'di na nags khrod bdag gnas pas/ /sems can ngan song song
203b5(mdo sde): na ma legs zhes/ /de ni sems can brgyal ba'i don gyi phyir/ /grong khyer pho brang mchog tu song bar gyur/ /de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal
203b6(mdo sde): dang | ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas sems can rnams la chos bstan te/ de'i snga dro der 'ongs nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa
203b7(mdo sde): dgu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do/ /da dung rgyal po'i pho brang der ma phyin pas de mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa
204a1(mdo sde): der phyin pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der nye bar song ste/ shing blag sha dang sA la'i drung du 'dug go /de de'i nub mo 'das pa dang rgyal
204a2(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs par gyur te/ zhugs nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod kyang da dung
204a3(mdo sde): zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/
204a4(mdo sde): 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro gnyis pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa
204a5(mdo sde): gsum sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de zas gnyis pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom
204a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro gsum pa la rgyal po'i pho brang
204a7(mdo sde): 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de zas gsum
204b1(mdo sde): pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang ma yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das
204b2(mdo sde): par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro bzhi pa la rgyal pI pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bla na med pa
204b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de zas bzhi pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung
204b4(mdo sde): ste| bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro lnga pa la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi
204b5(mdo sde): nang du song nas bud med brgyad khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod do/ /grong khyer de nas kyang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa
204b6(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de nyi ma lnga zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin
204b7(mdo sde): chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dro drug
205a1(mdo sde): p a la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas rgyal po'i bu stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod
205a2(mdo sde): de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de nyi ma drug zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal pI pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na
205a3(mdo sde): yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro bdun pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa dang rgyal
205a4(mdo sde): po dpa' bas byin skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba mthong ste/ gser gyi shing rta la ngos ni dngul/ mda' ni sprul gyi snying pI tsan+dan/ 'khor lo ni bai DUR+ya/ gdugs dang / rgyal
205a5(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ shing rta'i mda' la dar gyis dkris shing ras bcos bu phrugs kyis g.yogs pa de bu mo gzhon
205a6(mdo sde): nu brgyad brgyas rin po che'i tha gus btags shing 'dren te/ de dag byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa/ byis pa
205a7(mdo sde): rnams dga' bar byed cing tshim par byed pa ste/ mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/ /rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mtho dman du
205b1(mdo sde): 'gro'o/ /bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mtho dman du 'gro'o/ /khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring
205b2(mdo sde): mtho dman du 'gro'o/ /rgyal pI bu mo lnga brgya'ang rin po che'i khyogs kyi nang du bzhugs nas mdun thog thag tu 'gro ste/ de dag gis dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang
205b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /btsun mo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag drung cu rtsa brgyad kyang dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
205b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu rnams bkrol te lham rnams bzhag nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
205b5(mdo sde): te| pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod do/ /de nas bu mo gzhon nu de dag kyang sngon gyi dge
205b6(mdo sde): b a'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul bas khyogs de dag las babs nas nor bu dang gdu bu dag bkrol te lham rnams bzhag nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
205b7(mdo sde): la btsugs nas dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dge slong 'di ni byon pa'i tshe/ /nyi ma lta bur thams cad du/ /'di dag rab tu snang
206a1(mdo sde): bar bgyis/ /skye bo'i tshogs kyang 'dun par gyur/ /'dod chags zhe sdang rgyun bcad cing / /gti mug dag kyang bsal bar gyur/ /de tshe zhe sdang
206a2(mdo sde): khro ba dang / /phrag dog thams cad bcad par gyur/ /rgyal po dpa' bas byin pa yi/ /zhabs 'bring sras la sogs pa yang / /su yang rgyal po mi lta ste/ /su yang zhabs 'bring
206a3(mdo sde): mi bgyid do/ /ji ltar zla ba nya ba ni/ /skar ma dag gis bskor ba bzhin/ /rgyal pI bu yis mdun bdar bas/ /dge slong 'di yang mdzes par gyur/ /ji ltar gser gzugs
206a4(mdo sde): ri mo dag / mkhas pas ri mor bris pa dang / /sA la'i rgyal po rgyas pa ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong mdzes par gyur/ /mthu chen brgya byin lha yi dbang po ni/ /grong khyer 'jig
206a5(mdo sde): pa bdag po mig stong ldan/ /ri rab spyi la sum cu rtsa gsum dbang / /de bzhin dge slong byon pa 'di yang mdzes/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa gnas pa 'dra/ /rab 'phrul
206a6(mdo sde): lha yi bu ni lha dbang bzhin/ /'dod khams 'thab bral mchog gi lha bzhin du/ /dge slong byon pa 'di yang de bzhin mdzes/ /nyi ma bzhin du bar snang lhan ner bgyis/ /'od
206a7(mdo sde): zer stong ldan mun nag rab tu sel/ /phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyid pa ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong byon pa mdzes par gyur/ /bskal pa mtha' yas rgya cher sbyin pa byin/ /
206b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims ma 'dres rtag tu bsrung ba bgyis/ /bzod pa mtshungs med 'jig rten kun tu bsgoms/ /de ni mtshan gyis brgyan cing 'di ltar mdzes/ /'phags pa'i skye bos rab
206b2(mdo sde): bstod brtson 'grus bskyed/ /bsam gtan bzhi yang zhum med sems kyis bsnyen/ /nyon mongs dra ba bsal cing shes rab bskyed/ /de phyir dge slong 'jig rten kun tu gda'/ /
206b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstan pa mtshungs med sems can snying po ste/ /dpa' bo 'das pas chos mchog dag kyang rab tu bshad/ /ma 'ongs dus dang de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi/ /chos kyi
206b4(mdo sde): rgyal po dbang brnyes rnams kyi sras de lags/ /dge slong khyod ni mi rtag nam yang ma gyur cig /gzugs ni 'di ltar 'jig rten kun na rab tu lhan/ /gzi brjid che zhing dbyangs sgra
206b5(mdo sde): shin tu snyan par gda'/ /rgyal po'i gzi brjid shin tu lham me snang mi bgyid/ /chos 'di ji ltar khyod bdag nyid kyis rab rtogs shing / /sangs rgyas dag gis bka' stsal 'jig
206b6(mdo sde): rten kun tu rgyu/ /de bzhin bdag cag bud med dngos po kun spangs te/ /bdag cag thams cad dge slong 'di bzhin 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de dag thams cad sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas
206b7(mdo sde): nas| |tshigs bcad 'di dag smras te gos rnams 'thor bar byed/ /gser gyi phreng ba dang ni rin chen do shal dang / /rna ba'i rgyan dang mgul gyi rgyan dag rnam mang 'thor/ /ji ltar
207a1(mdo sde): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dag / stobs ldan sa 'di kun la rnam par lta/ /sras su 'du shes dag ni nye bar 'jog /gling rnams bzhi po 'di dag kun
207a2(mdo sde): tu 'gro / rgyal rigs dang ni tshong dpon bram ze dang / /khyim bdag mkhar gyi rgyal po bdag gi mi/ /de dag gcig la lhag par sdug pa med/ /thams cad la yang byams pa mnyam
207a3(mdo sde): par bskyed/ /de bzhin dge slong des pa 'di yang ni/ /gzungs dang dbang rnams la ni shin tu bslabs/ /byang chub yan lag stobs dang dbang po dang / /yan lag brgyad ldan
207a4(mdo sde): lam yang rnam par 'byed/ /mtshan mo zla ba skar tshogs dbus na yang / /ji ltar rab tu mdzes par snang ba bzhin/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe/ /gzi brjid ldan
207a5(mdo sde): zhing rnam par snang bgyid bzhin/ /dbang po zhi zhing stobs bcu ldan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas des pa kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis ni bsngags pa bskal pa brgyas/ /zad par byed
207a6(mdo sde): nus skyes bu su yang med/ /bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por ni/ /yon tan brjod kyang zad pa yong med de/ /'jig rten rab mchog gi ni spu gcig kyang / /bsngags pa dag ni zad
207a7(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro/ /des ni mtshungs med 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /ye shes dag gi gnas kyang shin tu bstan/ /zhib cing rdul bral chos rnams bshad pa mdzad/ /de ni gang na'ang snang
207b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba med/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze lha dang klu/ /lha min bdud dang tshangs par bcas la sogs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis/ /rgya mtsho dag ni zad par
207b2(mdo sde): yong mi nus/ /gang gis thugs sras 'di 'dra mnga' ba yi/ /sman rgyal mtshungs med rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshigs bcad 'di dag smras nas de yi tshe/ /rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu thams
207b3(mdo sde): cad dga'/ /gser dang gser phye dag kyang 'thor bar byed/ /gos rnams kyang ni rab tu 'ding bar byed/ /gtsug gi nor bu do shal mdzes pa dag /rin thang bye ba phrag ni brgya ri bas/ /
207b4(mdo sde): dge slong de la mngon par g.yogs nas ni/ /dga' nas byang chub phyir yang rab tu zhugs/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma btsun mo'i 'khor 'di dag ni
207b5(mdo sde): log par zhugs te skye bo'i tshogs kyang log go snyam mo/ /skye bo de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu bkrol/ lham bzhag nas gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
207b6(mdo sde): btsugs nas dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas phyag btsal to/ /dge slong de byad gzugs bzang ba tsam du rgyal po dpa' bas byin byad bzhin mi bzang / de tsam du blta na
207b7(mdo sde): sdug pa ma yin/ de tsam du mdzes pa ma yin te/ de rgyal po'i srid kyi phyir shin tu dngangs par gyur to/ /dge slong de'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa mthong nas shin tu khros so/ /dge
208a1(mdo sde): slong de rgyal po'i lam na 'dug pa'i mig tu rdul song ba dang de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la
208a2(mdo sde): bltas te/ 'dis mig gis kyang brda byas so/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ da dge slong 'di la srog gcod par byed pa su yod snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyi zhabs 'bring
208a3(mdo sde): du bu stong 'brang ba de dag bos nas/ gzhon nu dag /dge slong 'di srog dang phrol cig ces byas na/ gzhon nu de dag rgyal po dpa' bas byin la slar zlog go /dge slong de'i phyir de 'di
208a4(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu dag kyang bka' mi nyan te/ bdag gcig pu gnyis su med par bzhag nad dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed pa su yod snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po dpa'
208a5(mdo sde): bas byin la gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed ces bya ba gtum po brtse pa med pa ma rungs pa zhig yod pa de rgyal po'i lam na rgyal po dpa' bas byin dang ha cang yang mi ring bzhig na 'dug go/ rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis de mthong nas dga' mgu yi rangs te/
208a6(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas de sems 'di snyam du sems te/ dga' byed 'dis dge
208a7(mdo sde): slong 'di srog dang dbral bar byed snyam mo/ /de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed rgyal po dpa' bas byin gang na 'dug pa der 'ongs pa dang / dga' byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
208b1(mdo sde): khyod| bya dga' cher sbyin na/ dga' byed khyod /dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed nus sam/ dga' byed kyis smras pa/ lha| shin tu rngo thogs so/ /bka' bzhin 'tshal/ da dge slong 'di srog
208b2(mdo sde): dang dbral bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ dga' byed/ de'i phyir de'i dus la dbab par shes na mtshon rnon po thogs la dge slong 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa chod cig /rna ba dang sna'ang
208b3(mdo sde): chod cig / 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas kyi/ de'i phyir 'di'i mig kyang skam pas phyung zhig ces byas so/ /de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed kyis
208b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe ral gri rnon po thogs nas dge slong de'i lag pa dang rkang pa bcad do/ /rna ba dang sna'ang bcad do/ /mig gnyis kyang phyung ngo / /de nas dge slong de'i mgo dang rna ba dang rkang lag bcad pa
208b5(mdo sde): las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang byung / 'o ma'i rgyun du ma'ang byung ste/ phyogs bcur bskor nas slar yang dge slong de'i lus kyi nang du nub bo/ /bcad cing gtubs pa'i 'phro
208b6(mdo sde): nas dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / 'khor lo la sogs pa nang nas byung ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kun tu snang ngo / /de nas rgyal po de skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang dong
208b7(mdo sde): nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po des dge slong de lam na bcad gtubs shing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ ngo mtshar du gyur nas ngu zhing cho nges btab ste smre
209a1(mdo sde): sngags bton nas phyir yang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan par song ngo / /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin zhag bdun 'das pa dang skyed mos tshal
209a2(mdo sde): mchog na 'dug pa mi dga'/ mi rtse/ yongs su mi spyod de/ skyed mos tshal nas de logs nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa dang / des
209a3(mdo sde): dge slong de rgyal po'i lam du bor ba shi nas zhag bdun lon yang lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'di'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa las bltas
209a4(mdo sde): na dge slong 'di ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/ bdag gis sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig
209a5(mdo sde): pa'i las byas kyi/ bdag ni myur du sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes de de ltar sems pa na/ steng gi bar snang las lha'i bu brgyad khris sgra skad dbyangs
209a6(mdo sde): gcig tu smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ni de bzhin te/ khyod ji skad zer ba ltar dge slong 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no zhes
209a7(mdo sde): zer ro/ /bar snang las lha dag gi sgra thos nas de shin tu 'jigs shing skrag nas bag tsha zhing spu zing zhes byed de 'gyod par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin sdug bsngal
209b1(mdo sde): zhing yid mi bde ste/ 'gyod par gyur pas de'i tshe cho nges cher btab nas tshig 'di skad zer ro/ /rgyal po'i srid dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang / /nor bu rin chen mu tig gser dbyig spang / /bdag
209b2(mdo sde): nyid mtshon thogs bdag nyid 'chi bar bya/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blo can las dan ldan/ /dge slong me tog zla mdzes 'dir byung ba/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te/ /snang bar
209b3(mdo sde): byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs/ /zla ba nya tshe skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod ngan pas bdag dkrugs te/ /rab tu dga' bar bud med tshogs rnams dang / /shing rta'i
209b4(mdo sde): nang du zhugs te de nas dong / /rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su 'khor bar bskor/ /dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'di nyid ni/ /'dir byon dge slong de yang mthong nas su/ /bud med
209b5(mdo sde): tshogs rnams rab tu dgar gyur cing / /mos pa skyes nas gser gyi phreng ba gtor/ /thams cad sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis dge slong de la bstod//
209b6(mdo sde): rgyal po yi ni glu yi dbyangs sgra rnams/ /de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur/ /de yang shing rta'i nang du zhugs nas ni/ /rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur/ /bde bar
209b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sras mchog mthu che ba/ /dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'dir byon na/ /bdag gi sems ni rab tu ngan gyur te/ /dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug pa'i tshe/ /bud med
210a1(mdo sde): tshogs chen dga' bar lta mthong nas/ /rmongs pas de la phrag dog khro ba bskyed/ /phyogs bzhi kun tu snang bar bgyid pa ni/ /zla ba sgra gcan zin thar mdzes
210a2(mdo sde): pa bzhin/ /dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug mthong nas/ /bud med tshogs rnams dga' zhing sgra yang 'byin/ /bdag gis der ni gtum ba'i tshig smras te/ /bu stong dag la de nyid
210a3(mdo sde): khyod song la/ /dge slong 'di ni dum bu dum bur gyis/ /'di ni nga yi dgra mchog ma rungs pa/ /gzhon nu thams cad mnyen zhing tshul ldan te/ /bdag la phan sems dge slong de
210a4(mdo sde): la 'dud/ /rgyal po 'di 'dra'i bka' bzhin bgyir mi rung / /de tshe bdag ni mya ngan non par gyur/ /dge slong shin tu tshul khrims mchog ldan pa/ /byams ldan pha bzhin zhugs pa
210a5(mdo sde): mthong nas ni/ /shin tu gtum pa'i sems kyis gsod du btang / /phyi dus bdag ni lhung nas mnar med sreg /dga' byed de ni rgyal po'i lam 'dir gnas/ /ma rungs las bgyid
210a6(mdo sde): mi la sdug bsngal skyed/ /bdag gi bka' bzhin de 'drar der bgyis te/ /me tog phreng brgyus 'dra ba'i dge slong gtubs/ /nags mche ga kun tu bzang po dga' ba na/ /bya yis gang
210a7(mdo sde): zhing me tog dri zhim rgyas/ /de na dge slong tshogs gzhan rab mang ba/ /bu gcig bu ni ma dang bral ba bzhin/ /dge slong bzhengs la nags su gnas par mdzod/ /mi yi don kyang
210b1(mdo sde): shin tu rgya cher bgyis/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir byon pa'i tshe/ /dge slong shin tu snying rjer du zhing 'tshol/ /lag pa g.yas pas me tog rgyal mtshan thogs/ /g.yon pa yis kyang blta
210b2(mdo sde): sdug mdzes pa gzhan/ /lam yang spyangs shing gos kyis khebs par g.yogs/ /dge slong bzhengs la chos mchog bshad pa mdzod/ /rgyal po'i khab 'dir khyod zhugs ring lon kyang / /dge
210b3(mdo sde): slong rab tu snying rjer du zhing 'tshol / rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig pa'i tshe/ /khyod kyi srog gi bar chad 'gyur du dogs/ /ji ltar skyes bu mthu chen la la dag /phyogs dang phyogs
210b4(mdo sde): mtshams rtag tu sgra grags pa/ /srid gsum 'di kun thams cad zil mnan nas/ /g.yang sa chen por mchongs te sar lhung ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong mtshan mchog rab brgyan pa/ /
210b5(mdo sde): byad bzhin bzang pos 'dir 'gyel bar gyur/ /me tog zla mdzes zhe sdang gtum med pa/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i sems kyis dum bur brlags/ /me tog zla mdzes bkrongs nas sar
210b6(mdo sde): lhung ba/ /chos smra 'di ni mthong nas myur bar yang / /dge slong thams cad sdug bsngal gzir gyur te/ /mi dga' skyes 'gyur de bzhin sems mi bde/ /me tog zla mdzes ri yi rgyal po
210b7(mdo sde): ltar| |sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te/ /phreng ba brgyus pa bud med thogs pa 'dra/ /'dir ni dum bu dum bur rnam par bcad/ /bdag gis dngos sdig shin tu mi bzad bgyis/ /
211a1(mdo sde): mgon med mnar med gshin rje'i yul du mchi/ /'dir yang dge slong dum bur brlags pa yis/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang ring bas ring / /bdag
211a2(mdo sde): gis shin tu las ngan bgyis pas na/ /bu dang gnyen bshes tshogs rnams skyabs mi 'gyur/ /blon po dang ni zhabs 'bring bkrabs pa yang / /de dag dmyal bar bdag song skyabs mi
211a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang / /phyogs bcu dag na gang su bzhugs pa yi/ /ded dpon stobs bcu nyon mongs med pa rnams/ /rdo rje stug sra sku mnga'i skyabs su
211a4(mdo sde): mchi| |der ni dge slong dum bur byas mthong nas/ /lha rnams rab tu snying rje cho nges 'debs/ /de dag der song dge 'dun go bar byas/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir
211a5(mdo sde): bsad/ /chos smra ba ni mkhas shing rtogs pa de/ /mthu chen phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab tu grags/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gnas pa de/ /me tog zla mdzes
211a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin pa sna tshogs byin/ /tshul khrims mi g.yo skyon med gang srung zhing / /'jig rten kun tu mtshungs med bzod sgom pa/ /me
211a7(mdo sde): tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /bskal pa mtha' yas rtag tu brtson ldan zhing / /zhum med sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi la sgom/ /nyon mongs 'joms pa'i shes
211b1(mdo sde): rab gang bsten pa/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /lus la phangs pa thams cad rab spangs shing / /de bzhin srog la ma chags gyur nas ni/ /kun tu bzang po'i nags
211b2(mdo sde): nas babs nas su/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /lha yi cho de'i snying rje thos nas ni/ /dge slong de kun shin tu sdug bsngal nas/ /me tog zla mdzes nyes med bsad pa
211b3(mdo sde): la| |lta ba'i phyir yang thams cad grong du lhags/ /des pa de dag rgyal po'i khab 'ongs nas/ /dge slong dum bu dum bur byas mthong ste/ /nyam thag skad kyis mi bzad cho nges 'debs//
211b4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad brgyal nas sa la 'gyel/ /dge slong dge 'dun rgyal po de la smra/ /tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams pa yi/ /dge slong 'dis ni nyes pa ci zhig byas/ /'di ni sngon gyi
211b5(mdo sde): skye ba bsam yas dran/ /'di ni ye shes gzungs dbang pha rol phyin/ /'di ni 'dus byas 'di dag stong par shes/ /'di ni 'gro ba dag la mtshan med ston/ /'di ni smon lam 'du shes
211b6(mdo sde): thams cad spangs/ /'di ni yid 'ong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byin/ /'di ni des shing dbang po rab tu zhi/ /'di ni sngon gyi gnas kyi pha rol phyin/ /'jig rten thams cad las kyang mngon
211b7(mdo sde): par 'phags/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rang byung ye shes kyis/ /khyu mchog gyur cing 'jig rten ri mor byas/ /dag cing rab rib mad pa'i mig gis lta/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje shin tu che/ /
212a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa ngan cing gtsog la sdug bsngal bskyed/ /mtho ris rnam par ma rung byed pa ste/ /'dod pa bsnyen na rna ba med par 'gyur/ /mi dag shes rab dang
212a2(mdo sde): yang bral bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na/ /long bar 'gyur zhing pha dang ma yang gsod/ /'dod pa bsnyen byas tshul khrims ldan pa gsod/ /de bas mi yis
212a3(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnam par spang / /rgyal pos 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na/ /sa bdag dam pa 'byor pa 'di bor nas/ /mi bzad sdug bsngal rtsub byed sems dmyal nas/ /sems can
212a4(mdo sde): dmyal ba 'jigs pa chen por 'gro/ /'di 'dra'i dge slong mkhas pa gsod byed de/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa/ /sdig pa rnam
212a5(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs spang bar bya/ /lus ni sgyu ma gsog dang 'dra ba dang / /de bzhin rna mig sna lce rig nas ni/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri mchog dang / /reg bya chos rnams zhum
212a6(mdo sde): med sems kyis gtong / /sbyin la bslabs shing tshul khrims mnyam pa med/ /bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus de bzhin te/ /bsam gtan sten cing shes rab pha rol song / /
212a7(mdo sde): sems can dag gi don kyang rab tu byed/ /'jig rten lha dang mir bcas thams cad kyang / /byams pas rgyal ba la ni rab tu lta/ /de phyir mig ni mun gnag gtibs gyur kyang / /byang
212b1(mdo sde): chub zhi ba nyid ni 'tshang rgya 'gyur/ /rta dang bal glang yang thogs khri rnams dang / /khyogs dang sngas rnams kyang ni de bzhin te/ /glang po dag dang bzhon dang dgal ba dang / /grong dang yul
212b2(mdo sde): 'khor dga' ba gtong bar byed/ /grong khyer dang ni rgyal srid yongs gtong zhing / /gser dang dngul dang shel dang byu ru dang / /de bzhin gnas dang bu dang bu mo dang / /rang gi mgo yang
212b3(mdo sde): gtong zhing byang chub zhugs/ /me tog dang ni spos dang bdug pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan lha yi ba dan dang / /rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs thogs nas ni/ /dga' nas mchod pa mtshungs
212b4(mdo sde): pa med pa byed/ /srid pa dag ni stong par shes nas kyang / /srid pa'i 'gro ba dag la dga' mi byed/ /de phyir stobs bcu mtshan gyis rnam brgyan cing / /phyogs bcu thams cad du yang snang bar
212b5(mdo sde): byed| |byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /'dod pa'i khams rnams dang ni gzugs kyi khams/ /gzugs med khams la de dag ma chags te/ /khams gsum dag
212b6(mdo sde): la snga nas chags pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /bdag tu 'du shes sems can 'du shes med/ /srog tu 'du shes gang zag 'du shes med/ /tshangs par
212b7(mdo sde): spyod pa ma 'dres rtag tu spyad/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /dngos por 'du shes dngos med 'du shes med/ /bde bar 'du shes mi bder 'du shes med/ /grangs
213a1(mdo sde): su 'du shes grangs med 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /yod par 'du shes med par 'du shes med/ /bud med
213a2(mdo sde): 'du shes skyes par 'du shes med/ /grong gi 'du shes grong khyer 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /yul 'khor 'du shes grong 'dab 'du shes
213a3(mdo sde): med| |'dod chags 'du shes 'dod bral 'du shes med/ /zhe sdang 'du shes sdang bral 'du shes med/ /gti mug 'du shes rmongs bral 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa'
213a4(mdo sde): gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /nga rgyal nga rgyal bral ba'i 'du shes med/ /ma rig ma rig ma yin 'du shes med/ /lta dang lta ba ma yin 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa'
213a5(mdo sde): gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /de dag dbang po stobs la mi chags te/ /byang chub yan lag bsam gtan chags pa med/ /khams gsum nyes pa thams cad rab tu spongs/ /'dod
213a6(mdo sde): chags chags med zhe sdang gtum pa med/ /gti mug rmongs med rtag tu g.yo med 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas stobs bcu mthong nas bkur sti byed/ /blo gros ldan pa mtho ris smon
213a7(mdo sde): mi byed/ /su dag gzhan las chos mchog thos nas ni/ /de la nam yang de ma nur mi byed pa/ /'bru mar gang ba'i snod bzhin dang zhing dag /bcad dang ma bcad gzhan gyi blo yang
213b1(mdo sde): zhes| |mdza' ba byas na rjes su chags pa skye/ /de yang nyon mongs pa ni chen po yin/ /zhe sdang byas na khong khro skye bar 'gyur/ /dgra dang 'jigs pa sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung / /'di gnyis
213b2(mdo sde): rab tu rnam par spang byas te/ /blo gros ldan pa dag ni byang chub zhugs/ /de dag mi yi khyu mchog stobs bcur ni/ /'jig rten du yang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nang dang phyi rol dag
213b3(mdo sde): kyang rnam spangs te/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab gnas shing / /tshul khrims phung po dag kyang rnam par sbyangs/ /ral ba med cing ma 'dres skyon yang med/ /nam yang de dag gi ni tshul khrims
213b4(mdo sde): dag |'bags shing 'dres pa dag tu mi 'gyur te/ /mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis po yongs spangs nas/ /blo gros 'chang ba byang chub zhi rtogs 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis
213b5(mdo sde): d ge slong gi dge 'dun las chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyi yon tan bye brag chen po yangs shing rgya che ba thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
213b6(mdo sde): chen po la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ nags khrod stug po kun tu bzang po ni/ /sdong po chen pos gang zhing 'bras bus mdzes/ /dus kun skye ba me tog sdug pas brgyan/ /sna tshogs
213b7(mdo sde): tha dad bya rnams sgra yang 'byin/ /gser gyi ri yang mdzes shing mtho bas brgyan/ /mi 'am ci yi glu dbyangs snyan pa dang / /rol mo shin tu thabs ldan yid 'ong grag /grub pa'i bu mo rtag
214a1(mdo sde): tu gar yang byed/ /nags de lha yi dga' ba'i tshal bzhin te/ /gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar ba yi shing gis dkrigs/ /me tog rnam pa sna tshogs tha
214a2(mdo sde): dad bkram/ /ut+pal pad+mas brgyan cing chu yang 'bab/ /'di 'dra ba yi nags mchog nyams dga' ba/ /drang srong rtag tu gnas par mthun pa dag /bor nas sems can don
214a3(mdo sde): dang phan bzhed pas/ /sdig pa'i phung po bdag drung grong du byon/ /de ltar chos smra yon tan 'chang ba 'di/ /me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te/ /byon nas sdig pa bgyid pa bdag
214a4(mdo sde): gis bkrongs/ /'di bkrongs pas ni bdag kyang dmyal bar ltung / /byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje stobs ldan gang / /dpa' bo sems can phan phyir 'jig rten spyod/ /de dag
214a5(mdo sde): sdig bgyid bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig / byang chub sems dpa' de skyabs bdag mchi'o/ /gang yang rang rgyal dag ni gnyis pa dang / /gang gzhan nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa ste/ /
214a6(mdo sde): zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med mchi ba skyobs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de
214a7(mdo sde): lta bas na/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus dang srog la ma chags par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ lus dang srog la chags
214b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rtag tu rul ba'i lus 'di dang / /srog kyang g.yo zhing dbang med de/ /rmi lam
214b2(mdo sde): sgyu ma 'dra ba la/ /sems can gang dag chags pa ni/ /shin tu ma rungs las byas nas/ /gti mug dbang song de dag ni/ /sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par/ /mi mkhas bdud
214b3(mdo sde): kyi gzhol bas song / /dbu ba rdos 'dra'i lus dang ni/ /chu yi chu bur 'dra srog la/ /mi gang chags par mi byed pa/ /de dag 'gro ba mchog tu 'gro /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
214b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang
214b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar byas te/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams
214b6(mdo sde): pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ dper na/ dben pa na bde bar gnas pa dang / dgon pa dang nags khrod spangs te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /
214b7(mdo sde): ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / ri khrod rnams su zhugs te/ ci nas sems can de dag nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lam phyir mi
215a1(mdo sde): ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur sems can rnams la chos bstan par
215a2(mdo sde): b ya'o| |de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di nyid rgya cher tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas par rab
215a3(mdo sde): tu bstan to/ /ngas sngon spyad pa dag ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe rgyal po dpa' bas byin par gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan zhes bya/ /skyed mos tshal gyi sar ni byung bar gyur/ /
215a4(mdo sde): shing rta zhugs pas de tshe dge slong mthong / /kun nas mdzes shing blta na sdug pa ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa/ /phyogs rnams thams cad du yang snang bar
215a5(mdo sde): byed| |me tog zla mdzes phyogs su grags pa ste/ /snying rje gnas pa phan zhing snying brtse ba/ /dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis mdzes pa ni/ /sems can rnams la brtse phyir grong
215a6(mdo sde): du 'ongs/ /nga ni gzugs kyang de tsam mi phod pas/ /de la nga yang 'jungs pa ma rungs skyes/ /'dod la chags shing srid la bcings bas na/ /'di ni bdag gi srid las skyod
215a7(mdo sde): snyam ste/ /nga yi bu rnams stong du tshang ba yang / /shing rtar zhugs shing zhabs 'bring mtho dman 'gro /cod pan dang ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sum cu dbang phyir lha yi bu
215b1(mdo sde): 'brang bzhin/ /de na nga yi bu mo lnga brgya dag /nor bu thogs shing lham gyon blta na sdug /mgo rgyan dang ni lhab lhub brgyan gyis spud/ /de dag gser gyi dra bas shing rta 'dren/ /nga yi bud med
215b2(mdo sde): dag ni brgyad khri yang / /gzugs mdzes shin tu blta na sdug pa dag /shing rtar zhugs pas dge slong de mthong ste/ /ri rab bzhin du gzugs bzang dpal 'bar ba/ /mthong nas de dag
215b3(mdo sde): phar yang 'du shes bskyed/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skyes te/ /de tshe tshangs pa'i spyod par yang dag btsud/ /yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan rnams de la gtor/ /de tshe nga ni phrag dog skyes
215b4(mdo sde): par gyur/ /gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba mi bzad de/ /dbang phyug rgyags pas bu la 'di skad smras/ /mdun na 'dug pa'i dge slong bsad par gyis/ /gzhon nu de dag nga yi tshig thos
215b5(mdo sde): nas| |shin tu sdug bsngal yid kyang mi dgar gyur/ /yab gcig de skad kyi ni tshig ma gsung / /dge slong 'di 'dra ba dag cag mi 'gums so/ /bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /bdag
215b6(mdo sde): cag lus dang yan lag bcad gtubs kyang / /dge slong 'di ni 'gums par mi bgyid do/ /'di ltar bdag cag byang chub sems skyes so/ /rgyal po de tshe bu yi tshig thos nas/ /khros
215b7(mdo sde): te gsod pa'i gshed ma 'bangs la smras/ /nga yi btsun mo'i mdun na 'dug pa yi/ /dge slong 'di ni myur du gsod de phul/ /de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma phyi bzhin 'ongs/ /shin
216a1(mdo sde): tu gtum sems dga' byed snying rje med/ /'bru mar ngar btags ral gri thogs nas su/ /de yis dge slong dum bu brgyad du byas/ /de yi lus dang yan lag
216a2(mdo sde): bcad pa las/ /khrag kyang mi drag 'od zer stong byung ste/ /bcad pa'i 'phro na dpal be'u 'khor lo dag /mtshan rnams de yi lus kyi nang na yod/ /shin tu ma rung sa las ni byas nas
216a3(mdo sde): su| |skyed mos tshal du de yi mod la byung / /dge slong me tog zla mdzes dran nas ni/ /de yi rtsed mo dga' bar ma gyur to/ /rings pa'i gzugs su myur zhing mgyogs par ni/ /de nas
216a4(mdo sde): bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang song / /gang du dge slong du ma bu brgyad byas pa/ /sa phyogs der ni shing rtar zhugs nas phyin/ /lha rnams khrag khrig mang po bar snang la/ /cho nges 'debs pa'i
216a5(mdo sde): sgra dag des thos te/ /rgyal po khyod kyis mi dge sdig mang bgyis/ /shi 'phos nas mi mnar med mi bder 'gro /rgyal po des ni lha yi sgra thos nas/ /shin tu sdug bsngal mi dga' sems
216a6(mdo sde): skrag gyur/ /bdag gis me tog zla mdzes bkrongs pa ni/ /bdag gis sdig pa mi bzang mang po bgyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas ldan/ /sangs rgyas mi yi khyu mchog
216a7(mdo sde): sras po gang / /dbang po bsrungs shing des pa zhi ba'i yid/ /de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams gang 'dzin cing / /zad pa'i dus la
216b1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /'jig rten kun tu chos kyi sgron ma mdzad/ /de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/ /'jig rten kun na sman pa'i rgyal po gang / /sems can na ba rtag tu
216b2(mdo sde): gso byed cing / /bdud rtsi dag gis bkru sman gtong ba yi/ /dge slong bdag gis 'dod pa'i don phyir bkrongs/ /zhib cing zab la zhi ba blta dka' ba'i/ /chos rnams skye dgu dag la gang
216b3(mdo sde): 'chad cing / /byang chub snying po mchog kyang gang ston pa/ /de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/ /'dren pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin cing / /'jig rten ldongs pa'i sgron mar
216b4(mdo sde): gyur ba ste/ /gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po gang 'dzin pa/ /de ni ci slad bdag gis 'dod phyir bkrongs/ /nyon mongs med cing rnam dag ye shes can/ /zhi bar bzhi rtag tu mnyam gzhag
216b5(mdo sde): pa| |'dod pas ldongs pas bdag gis deng bkrongs te/ /des ni shin tu ma rungs dmyal bar ltung / /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang / /mi yid dam pa rgyal ba gang
216b6(mdo sde): yang bzhugs pa ni/ /bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams/ /de dag kun la thal mo sbyar te skyabs su mchi// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal
216b7(mdo sde): po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes bsad de shi ba'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur par sa la 'gyel cing 'dug pa mthong nas
217a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod cing myos par gyur nas de'i tsho cho nges rab tu cher btab bo/ /chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de la'ang 'di lta bur yang dag
217a2(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan gyis bstod pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kun tu bzang por 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis/ /khyod la rnam pa mang po bsgo ba bgyis//
217a3(mdo sde): khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byung nga re/ /rin chen ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma bzhud/ /khyod kyis dge slong dge 'dun tshig ma bzung / /mgon po grong khyer du ni ci slad byon/ /khyod ni gang
217a4(mdo sde): gi don du byon pa yi/ /don de sgron ma mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ /lha rdzas myu gu sna tshogs brgyan pa'i sa/ /gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar shing ljon mang pos dkrigs/ /grub pa'i
217a5(mdo sde): rig 'dzin gnod sbyin mchog gis bsrungs/ /lha rnams zhugs shing bya rgyal sgra yang sgrog /kun tu bzang po sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs pa/ /nags tshal dam pa dga' ba bor
217a6(mdo sde): nas ni/ /bgyi ba gang phyir khyod ni 'dir byon pa/ /des pa bgyi ba de deng bdag la gsungs/ /khyod kyi tshig thos nas ni bka' bzhin bgyi/ /sangs rgyas sras bo bzhengs la bka'
217a7(mdo sde): stsol cig / kye ma da ni ci bgyi lha yi lha/ /bdag ni mgon med khyod kyi skyabs su mchi/ /gcig pu seng ge ri dwags rgyal po ltar/ /dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khyu bor nas/ /
217b1(mdo sde): sems can mtha' yas pa la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /rang gi srog kyang btang ste 'dir byon na/ /'dod chags zil non shin tu 'jungs ba yis/ /bdag gis dpa' bo dum bu dum bur
217b2(mdo sde): bcad/ /'di ni dge slong dge 'dun mtha' dag kyang / /khyod la lta bar pho brang ma lhags par/ /bdag ni 'jigs skrag khyod la ci gsol ba/ /bde bar gsol ba gcig ni mdzad par
217b3(mdo sde): 'os/ /me tog zla mdzes mi 'jigs bdag stsol la/ /nya dus zla ba nya 'drar bzhengs su gsol/ /sems can gtso bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod/ /chos smra khyod ni zhe sdang rnam par grol/
217b4(mdo sde): de ring bdag la sna gcig gnang bar mdzed/ /nyi ma bzhin du snang mdzad bzhengs su gsol/ /chos smra mchog ni bdag gis bkrongs bgyis te/ /sdig pa ma legs bdag gis deng
217b5(mdo sde): bgyis ba/ /'di nas 'chi 'phos mi bzad dmyal bar skye/ /bdag la de yi skyabs su 'gyur ba med/ /nyon mongs byed pa sdig sems ci ru rung / /rgyags pas khengs pa'i rgyal srid ci
