217b6(mdo sde): ru rung / /thams cad spangs te gcig pu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'di nas bdag gis snying po ci ma blangs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang bcom pa rnam dag chos/ /snyan par gsung ba bdag thul
217b7(mdo sde): thugs rje can/ /'gro ba'i gnyen gcig sun 'byin mi mdzad pa/ /me tog zla mdzes bdag gis ci phyir bkrongs/ /kye ma bzod dang dka' thub nor phyug brtul zhugs bzang / /kye ma gzugs
218a1(mdo sde): dang des pa dag gi yon tan ldan/ /kye ma g.yo med dpal stug spros pa mi mnga' ba/ /bdag cag bor nas khyod ni gang du bzhud par mdzad/ /'phags pa
218a2(mdo sde): khyod kyi lus dang yan lag bcad pa na/ /'o ma rab tu zag cing 'od zer stong dag byung / /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad shin tu ngo mtshar gyur/ /ngo mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin
218a3(mdo sde): 'dren pa bzhengs su gsol/ /kye ma me tog zla ba dul ba thugs rje can/ /kye ma byams dang snying rje'i phung po ri bo tshur/ /kye ma chos rnams zab mo shin tu ston pa'i mchog /lha
218a4(mdo sde): khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs brtser mdzad du gsol/ /kye ma zla ba nya zhal tshur spyon cig /kye ma sa bcu legs gnas tshur spyon cig /kye ma dpa' bo stobs bcu mngon
218a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa/ /tshe la khyod dbang bdag po gang du bzhud/ /kye ma dpa' bo tshur spyon bdag la gsungs/ /khyod kyis yun ring bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / /brtson 'grus thugs rje de
218a6(mdo sde): dag gang du mchis/ /byams pa chen po bzhengs la gsung phyung zhig /kye ma shin tu mchod 'os lha yi lha/ /chos smra cang mi gsung bar ci slad bzhugs/ /mkhas pa bzhengs la
218a7(mdo sde): bdag gi khyim du bzhud/ /bud med tshogs la khyod kyis chos ston cig /lha khyod lus ni bcad par mi nus te/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin srin pos kyang / /khyod kyi lha yi lus 'di
218b1(mdo sde): mi shigs kyi/ /mkhas pa khyod deng sgyu dag ma mdzad cig /lha khyod sgyu mdzad bzhugs pa ga la gda'/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma mi mdzes so/ /sgyu ma thams cad spongs la bzhengs
218b2(mdo sde): su gsol/ /rin chen ldan pa'i grong du chos shod cig /kye ma 'phags pa me tog zla mdzes tshur/ /kye ma khams gsum 'dod chags bral ba tshur/ /kye ma pha ma lta bu 'dren pa tshur/ /
218b3(mdo sde): bdag gi sems dmyal sgo ni gcad du gsol/ /ngan song skyes pa rnams kyi rten dang dpung / /srog chags mnar med chen por lhung ba yi/ skyabs mdzad me tog zla mdzes tshur spyon
218b4(mdo sde): cig |bdag gi bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbye bar gsol/ /mgon po khyod ni dgung bdun bshos ma gsol/ /re zhig deng bzhengs bdag gi bshos gsol cig /bdag gi bshos gsol
218b5(mdo sde): rin chen ldan pa 'dir/ /sems can du ma chos la dgod pa mdzod/ /kye ma chos mchog rtogs pa bdag gi yab/ /kye ma sems can rnams la 'khon med sems/ /kye ma tshur spyon bdag
218b6(mdo sde): mdun chos ston cig / kye ma tshur spyon khyod smon myur grub shog /dge slong dge 'dun de ni mgon med gyur/ /kye ma ldongs shing mi dran mya ngan bgyid/ /sems can snying po khyod ni myur
218b7(mdo sde): bzhengs la/ /dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang dbyung bar mdzod/ /kye ma 'jig rten gsum na sgron gyur pa/ /kye ma tshur spyon kun tu bzang por bzhud/ /kun tu bzang po'i nags khrod
219a1(mdo sde): bzhud nas ni/ /dge slong dag la phan phyir khyod ston cig /kye kye chos 'dzin yon tan rmad byung che/ /a shwad me tog bzhin du rnyed bar dka'/ /
219a2(mdo sde): shes rab thugs rje'i spyan ni dri med pa/ /kye kye dge slong dge 'dun gzigs su gsol/ /tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i gzugs de yang / /kye kye dge slong dag la bstan du gsol/ /
219a3(mdo sde): kye kye zla ba shar ba bzhin du 'dir/ /me tog zla ba de ring bzhengs su gsol/ /kye kye rgyal sras bdag la thugs brtse ba/ /dbugs 'byin mdzad pa ston pa bla na med/ /kye kye mtshon
219a4(mdo sde): dang dbyug pas btab pa bzod/ /bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu des/ /kye kye me tog zla mdzes thugs rje can/ /rab sbyin 'dren pa khyod ni bzhengs su gsol/ /kye kye
219a5(mdo sde): khyod ni bzhengs la bdag la yang / /mthong bar dka' ba'i gzungs rnams bshad du gsol/ /kye kye 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa/ /shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog
219a6(mdo sde): kye kye sems can dag gi phan don la/ /brtson mdzad 'dren pa thugs rje'i stobs dang ldan/ /kye kye me tog zla mdzes bzhengs su gsol/ /dpa' bo sems can dag gi don mdzad pa/
219a7(mdo sde): kye kye sems can dag ni bye ba dang / /khrag khrig rnams kyang zhi ba'i grong du khod/ /kye kye tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros che/ /mkhas pa bslabs pa'i nor gyis shin tu phyug /kye kye tshul
219b1(mdo sde): khrims brtul zhugs rab gnas shing / /chos kyi shing gi myu gu mngon par dga'/ /kye kye chos gos dur smrig kha bsgyur 'chang / /rtag tu mngon par byung la dga' bar mdzod/ /kye kye me
219b2(mdo sde): tog zla ba brtul zhugs mchog / rab sbyin dka' thung bzang po khyod bzhengs shig /kye kye dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul/ /rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan/ /kye kye du la ba/
219b3(mdo sde): rab du la rjes su bzhud/ /zhi ba dbang po rab zhi khong nas des/ /kye kye sems can nyal zhing gnyid log pa/ /chos kyi sgra yis rtag tu sad par mdzod/ /kye kye sems can bye ba khrag khrig
219b4(mdo sde): dag |sad par bgyid nas theg ba mchog la khod/ /kye kye sbyin pa yi ni spang leb la/ /brtson 'grus thag gus sprel ba'i gru sbyor te/ /kye kye sems can rgya mtsho chen por ni/ /rab tu lhung
219b5(mdo sde): zhing srid pas de da pa rnams/ /kye kye stobs bcu ldan pa me tog mchog /mnyan pa gdogs 'dzin mkhas pa bzhengs su gsol/ /kye kye shin tu sra ba'i grur yang ni/ /zhugs nas bdag
219b6(mdo sde): dang de dag bsgral bar mdzod/ /kye kye sman pa'i dam pa brtul zhugs la/ /shin tu spyad cing rig mdzad sman pa'i mchog /kye kye ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi
219b7(mdo sde): dag sbyin mdzad pa/ /kye kye nad ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /btab pa'i sems can na ba rnam gzigs nas/ /kye kye myur du bzhengs la de dag la/ /chos kyi sman rnams shin tu stsal
220a1(mdo sde): bar mdzod/ /kye kye ye shes sman pa'i rgyal po mchog/ mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin/ /kye kye nad rnams shin tu gso mdzad cing / /thugs
220a2(mdo sde): rjes sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad/ /kye kye na bar gyur pa'i sems can khams/ /'dod chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa rnams/ /des ni sems can thams cad bde ba
220a3(mdo sde): dang | |nad rnams med cing mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /kye kye mkhas pa ye shes rgya chen bslabs/ /chos kyi rnga dag shin tu brdung bar mdzod/ /kye kye 'jig rten gyi ni the tshom gyi/ /'khri
220a4(mdo sde): shing thams cad ye shes rgya mtshos chod/ /kye kye legs thos chos rnams 'dzin mdzad pa/ /rdul bral mdo sde bye ba brgya dag kyang / /'khor gyi nang du gdan la rab bzhugs la/ /
220a5(mdo sde): mi mchog mkhas pa brjod pa mdzad du gsol/ /me tog zla ba mtshan mchog brgyan pa kye/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu tshang ba kye/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus lus brgyan kye/ /srid
220a6(mdo sde): pa'i mtsho brgal spros med tshur sbyon kye/ /srid pa'i btson rar chud khrol bzhengs shig kye/ /ye shes mchog rig tshangs pa 'dra ba kye/ /me tog zla ba thugs rje chen po kye/ /byams dang thugs
220a7(mdo sde): rje skyed la bzhengs shig kye/ /me tog zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs/ /dge slong dge 'dun khyod kyis ma dor bar/ /tshur gshegs dge 'dun yongs su bsdu ba mdzod/ /bzhengs la nags
220b1(mdo sde): khrod der yang gshegs sam kye/ /me tog zla ba bsam gtan dgyes pa mchog /mdza' dang mi mdza' mtshungs par byams shing phan/ /gzungs la rab tu gnas pa tshur spyon kye/ /ye
220b2(mdo sde): shes sdong po mtshungs med khyod bzhengs shig / ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa kye/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems can mnyam yid kye/ /me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs nga kye/ /bzhengs
220b3(mdo sde): la shing gi drung du 'tshang rgya mdzod/ /lha yi rna ba chos kyi mchog 'chang kye/ /lha yi mig mkhas ye shes rtogs pa kye/ /bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shing thugs rje can/ /grags pa mtha'
220b4(mdo sde): yas bdag gi tshig gson kye/ /'jig rten kun la phan dang don mdzad kye/ /me to zla ba shin tu sbyin dgyes gye/ /bzhengs la myur du bdag gi re rdzogs mdzod/ /khyod 'dir du ma pu dum
220b5(mdo sde): bur ma bzhugs shig / gong 'dir skye ba bud med tshogs rnams kyang / /khyod mthong thams cad shing bzhin sa la 'gyel/ /snying skam 'gyur ba'i mya ngan rnams kyang bgyid/ /thugs rje mchog
220b6(mdo sde): gi spyan gyis de la gzigs/ /gang gi slad du byams pa bsgoms pa dang / /ye shes shes rab thabs kyi stobs rnams dang / /khyod kyi thugs rje btang snyoms dga' ba yangs/ /de dag rdzogs
220b7(mdo sde): mdzod bzhengs shig me tog mdzes/ /lha klu lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / /gnod sbyin srin pa mi dang mi 'am ci/ /snyim pa me tog bdug pas bkang nas ni/ /thams cad mthong bar dga'
221a1(mdo sde): nas lhags shing 'khod/ /drang srong chen po'i tshig ni deng rtogs te/ /skye dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin/ /yid kyi nad du 'gyur ba ngan 'gro'i
221a2(mdo sde): rgyu| |de phyir 'dod pa'i spyod pa spang bar bya/ /dge slong bdag gis bsad pa sdig gi las/ /shin tu ma legs mi bde byas pas na/ /bdag ni mi bzad dmyal ba mnar med 'gro /
221a3(mdo sde): bdag la de yi mgon skyabs byed pa med/ /bdag ni rgyal po'i srid btang tshangs spyod gzhol/ /spos dang me tog byug pa rnams kyis ni/ /mchod pa dam pa rnams kyang rab tu bya/ /
221a4(mdo sde): shin tu mdzes par mchod rten bdag gis bya/ /bu dang bu mo bud med khyim bdag dang / /blon po dang ni tshong dpon de dag dang / /grong pa dang ni rgyal rigs mang po rnams/ /de dag thams
221a5(mdo sde): cad la ni ngas bsgo ba/ /a ga ru dang tsan+dan shug pa dang / /shi tu zhim pa'i spos mchog ci yod pas/ /myur du sgrom gyi snying po'i khyogs 'chos la/ /dge slong 'di ni bsreg pa'i cho ga
221a6(mdo sde): gyis| |grong khyer mi kun rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /spos mchog dag kyang thogs nas khyogs bcas te/ /spos rab bzang po yid du 'ong las byas/ /der ni dge slong de yang bcug
221a7(mdo sde): nas su/ /a ga ru dang tsan+dan tsam pa ka /rgya spos spri ka de bzhin pa ta la/ /me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dag/ shin tu bzang dang 'bru mar dag gis bsregs/ /de yi rus pa'i sgro ma ni byas
221b1(mdo sde): par gyur/ /dge slong dag gis de yang der bsregs te/ /rgyal pos de yi mchod rten byas nas su/ /'di la ngas ni mchod pa bya zhes zer/ /me tog dang ni phreng ba byug ba dang / /gdugs dang
221b2(mdo sde): ba dan rgyal mtshan thogs nas su/ /rgyal pos deng ni sil snyan stong dag dang / /bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyang len du btsud/ /nyi ma gcig la rgyal po dus gsum du/ /dge slong de yi
221b3(mdo sde): mchod rten da drung du/ /sdig pa sngan chad cung zad ci byas pa/ /de tshe dus gsum du yang shin tu 'chags/ /lo stong bye pa phrag ni dgu bcu lngar/ /nyes pa byas pa dag kyang rab bshags te/ /
221b4(mdo sde): phyis kyang tshul khrims dam pa ma ral bsrungs/ /rnam par dag cing gtsang la dri ma med/ /lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar/ /gso sbyong dag kyang de tshe rab gsos te/ /de ni de tshe bdag
221b5(mdo sde): gi lus zhig nas/ /mnar med mi bzad par ni de lhung gyur/ /'dod phyir snying rje med pa'i las byas pas/ /sdug bsngal mang po dag kyang myong bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag dgu
221b6(mdo sde): bcu lnga/ /de tshe de dag bdag gis ma mnyes byas/ /lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar/ /de yi tshe na nga ni long bar gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig drug cu gnyis/ /snga chad nga yi mig
221b7(mdo sde): kyang bcar bar gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong dang / /shin tu mang bar nga yi mig phyung phrogs/ /mgo dang rna ba dang ni rkang lag kyang / /bskal ba mtha' yas khrag khrig bcad par
222a1(mdo sde): gyur| |bskal ba dag ni bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /mir gyur pa dang skye ba gzhan du yang / /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis rab gtses shing / /sdug bsngal tshor
222a2(mdo sde): ba yun ring myong bar gyur/ /sdig pa'i las rnams byas pas 'khor ba na/ /yun ring shing tu sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/ /de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa/ /srid pa gsum du sdig
222a3(mdo sde): pa mi bya'o/ /rgyal po mchog gis sngon gyi las bshags kyang / /snga ma'i nyes byas rnams las de mthar/ /mi bzad gzugs kyi las rnams sngar byas pas/ /de shi dmyal ba mi bzad
222a4(mdo sde): mnar med song / /nga yi rna ba de bzhin rkang lag bcad/ /bskal pa mtha' yas mang por sna yang bcad/ /spyod pa spyod tshe mtshon cha dbyug thogs nas/ /'debs byed nan gyis nga yi
222a5(mdo sde): mig kyang phyung / /byang chub phyir ni mgo lag lus bcad dang / /bu dang chung ma mig dang rang gi sha /rkang lag dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs btang yang / /sngon gyi sdig pa'i las ni zad
222a6(mdo sde): ma gyur/ /kun dga' de ltar bskal pa mtha' yas spyod/ /sangs rgyas dpal stug dpag tu med pa mthong / /byang chub spyod mchog 'di ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe sdug bsngal 'di dag
222a7(mdo sde): sngon myong gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas shing / /byams spyod rtag tu mi g.yo mi 'gul ba/ /sangs rgyas rdul sbyangs lha yi lha mchod nas/ /de dag nam yang
222b1(mdo sde): ngan song sar mi 'gro / sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go bgos pa/ /chos rjes sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur su 'dod pa/ /tshul khrims ma 'dres g.yo ba med par srungs/ /gzungs la rab gnas
222b2(mdo sde): chos kyang bstan par gyis/ /nga ni de tshe rgyal po dpa' byin yin/ /nga yi bu rnams phyi dus chos skyong ba/ /me tog zla mdzes pad+ma bla ma yin/ /dga' byed de ni zhi ba'i rgyal bar gyur/ /'jig
222b3(mdo sde): rten gsum dpa' 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pa/ /de bzhin gshegs brkang gnyis gtso bor gyur/ /skye dgu dag ni don chen mdzad nas ni/ /mar me bzhin du 'dren pa mya ngan 'das/ /bud
222b4(mdo sde): med tshogs dang rgyal rigs mang po dag / khyim bdag dang ni blon po stobs chen dang / /tshong dpon de bzhin grong pa'i mkhar gyi rgyal/ /thams cad stobs bcu nyon mongs med par gyur/ /
222b5(mdo sde): me tog zla mdzes kyi le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems
222b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
222b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang par bya/ bklag par bya/ rab
223a1(mdo sde): tu gdon bar bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas mang du bsgom par bya/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan
223a2(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi phung po la'ang rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul
223a3(mdo sde): khrims tshogs gnas shing / /bdag la phan sems spyad pa gang spyod pa/ /mngon dga'i sangs rgyas zhing du myur song nas/ /bzod pa des thob chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /de phyir gnod
223a4(mdo sde): sems med cing kun mthun gyis/ /thams cad rtag tu yid du 'ong bar gyis/ /dpal stug sangs rgyas dpag med mthong nas ni/ /byang chub reg nas chos kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /de phyir
223a5(mdo sde): phan yon mchog 'di thos nas ni/ /dge slong tshul khrims mchog dang ldan mthong na/ /mkhas pas g.yo med rtag tu bsten par bya/ /ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin 'di 'thob 'gyur/ /
223a6(mdo sde): gal te gter rnams dpag med tshad kyang med/ /rin chen sna bdun nor bus gang gyur pa/ /de bzhin zhing rnams gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /nor bu rin po che yis gang ba rnams/ /byang chub
223a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sbyin la mos pa yis/ /nyin mtshan re rer sbyin pa 'di dag byin/ /de bzhin bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /rgyun mi chad par sbyin pa byin pa bas/ /byang chub sems dpa'
223b1(mdo sde): gang gis ting 'dzin 'di/ /thos nas bde gshegs mdzod mchog 'dzin byed pa/ /bsod nams phung po des ni gang bzung ba/ /sbyin pa de kun de yi char mi phod/ /mi gang rjes su mthun la
223b2(mdo sde): dad pa dag / ting 'dzin rdul bral mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /bsod nams phung po dpe med mchog 'di yin/ /ye shes mdzod de dpag med 'byung gnas so/ /ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba 'di
223b3(mdo sde): bzung na/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni nor chen 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du thos pa'i gter/ /de la bsod nams tshad yong yong mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi mchog rnams bsam gyis
223b4(mdo sde): mi khyab pas/ /shin tu rgyas byas byang chub sems dpar brjod/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni su dag ston byed pa/ /de ni nam yang byang chub mthe tshom med/ /bsod nams phung po mchog dang gang
223b5(mdo sde): ldan zhing / /gang la tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'jig rten slob dpon sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren/ /rang byung thugs rje chen po ma gtogs par/ /de yi 'og tu sems can su dag
223b6(mdo sde): kyang / /ston chen 'di na bsod nams phung po dang / /mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes kyis/ /mnyam par gyur pa nam yang yod med do/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas 'dzin pa
223b7(mdo sde): dang / /klog cing yongs su chub par byed pa dang / /mtshungs med sangs rgyas byang chub 'tshol ma gtogs/ /de yi ye shes mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing
224a1(mdo sde): bklags pa yis/ /bsod nams phung po ji snyed bsags pa yang / /gzhon nu ji ste chos de gzugs yod na/ /'jig rten khams mang 'dir yang shong mi
224a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /gzhon nu de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang / /'das dang 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'dod pa yis/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung
224a3(mdo sde): zhing bklag par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yin te/ /gzhon nu nga yi tshig la dad par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdzun gyi tshig mi gsung / /'di 'dra'i sems can
224a4(mdo sde): brdzun du smra ba med/ /sngon gyi bskal pa brgya phrag bsam yas su/ /byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di rab spyod cing / /ting 'dzin 'di ni yongs su 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /ngas ni bdag tu lta ba
224a5(mdo sde): 'dir sbyangs so/ /de phyir chos kyi mdzod 'di mnyan par gyis/ /'di las mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig 'byung / /'di ni bsod nams phung po bsam yas yangs/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas
224a6(mdo sde): ye shes myur du 'thob/ /mkhas pa 'jigs med de dag gang ston pa/ /'di ni mdo sde kun gyi dam pa'i mdo/ /dge ba bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung gnas te/ /chos de rnams la mtha'
224a7(mdo sde): thugs rnyed mi 'gyur/ /stong chen dag ni bcad cing bshig nas su/ /rdul gyi tshogs rnams bgrang bar nus na yang / /mdo sde brgya phrag bsam yas tshad med pa/ /rgyun mi chad par de
224b1(mdo sde): ston bgrang mi nus/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi sems can thams cad kyi/ /phyi nang rgyu ba'i dbugs ni bgrang nus kyang / /ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang ston pa/ /mdo sde de dag mthar thug
224b2(mdo sde): nus mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /'gro ba der yang sems can gang skyes pa/ /de dag sems ni bgrang bar nus kyang srid/ /rtag ston mdo sde de dag bgrang mi nus/ /
224b3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma ci yod dang / /klung dang mtshe'u dang gshong gi bye ma dag /bskal pa bye ba dag gis bgrang nus kyang / /de dag 'chad pa'i mdo sde mtha' yas so/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni
224b4(mdo sde): bya ba mang po na/ /chu yi phung po rtag 'dug ci yod pa/ /brgya tshal skra yi rtse mos bgrang nus kyang / /de yi dbyangs kyi yan lag kun mi bgrangs/ /gang sngon 'dir ni sems can ci 'byung ba/ /
224b5(mdo sde): rang gi lus la snying por 'dogs pa rnams/ /bskal pa byed ba mang pos bgrangs nus kyang / /de dag mdo sde sgrub pa shes mi nus/ /phyogs bcu dag na sems can ci yod pa/ /srog chags kun
224b6(mdo sde): gyi sgra skad bgrang nus kyang / /de dag rtag tu mi 'chad ston pa yi/ /mdo sde de dag bgrang bar yong mi nus/ /chos rnams thams cad bstan par rab shes shing / /nges pa'i tshig dang bstan
224b7(mdo sde): pa tshig don mkhas/ /gtan la bab pa'i yang dag tshul la bslabs/ /blo gros yangs shing rtag dga' shes rab can/ /yangs pa'i don sems rab tu phye ba'i blo/ /bsam dang mi bsam
225a1(mdo sde): pa yang rtag tu shes/ /dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rgya chen thams cad rig /sgra dbyangs de dag ston kyang chags mi 'gyur/ /thogs med de ni chos smrar brjod
225a2(mdo sde): pa ste| / 'gro ba kun la ston kyang chags mi 'gyur/ /dri ba nges par bstan pa brgya la mkhas/ /de ltar de yis don dam rab tu rtogs/ /mdo sde gcig gis phyogs kyang bye ba snyed/ /
225a3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab des ston chags pa med/ /chags med ston pa tshig gi don la mkhas/ /'khor gyi nang du de 'chang chags mi 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin 'di la legs par gang gnas pa/ /
225a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de ni g.yo ba med/ /chos la stobs bskyed bye brag thob pas ni/ /srog chags bye ba mang po'i don de byed/ /ji ltar ri rab mi g.yo mi 'gul te/ /rlung rnams
225a5(mdo sde): kun gyis 'gul bar mi nus pa/ /de bzhin dge slong chos smra mkhas pa yang / /pha rol rgol ba kun gyis bskyod mi nus/ /stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di na/ /ri gang mi g.yo
225a6(mdo sde): bar ni brjod pa rnams/ /de dag rlung gis rab tu bskyod nus kyang / /stong pa'i chos gnas dge slong bskyod mi nus/ /su dag stong pa nyid la rtag brtson pa/ /sangs rgyas gnas su
225a7(mdo sde): nges pa de yin te/ /gtan la bab pa stong pa'i chos rab shes/ /de ni rgol ba kun gyis dkrug mi nus/ /phas kyi rgol ba dag gis mi bskyod cing / /smra ba thams cad kyis kyang zil mi
225b1(mdo sde): non| |ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bstan byas na/ /zil gyis mi non smad pa med par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bshad byas na/ /de yis stong nyid rtogs par khong du chud/ /de ni chos rnams
225b2(mdo sde): kun la nem nur med/ /ye shes mtha' yas dag la khor mor gnas/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing bklags pa na/ /stobs dang byang chub yan lag rnyed mi dka'/ /yang dag rig dang rdzu 'phrul
225b3(mdo sde): pas ma mi khyab/ /de la mngon par shes pa rnyed mi dga'/ /mtha' yas ye shes rgyal ba mthong ba yang / /srid par grub pa dag ni rnyed mi dka'/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab//
225b4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di 'chang de yis mthong bar 'gyur/ /de ni rgyal ba de dag thams cad las/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang thos 'gyur te/ /yang dag rig dang dbang gi pha rol phyin/ /sangs rgyas ye
225b5(mdo sde): shes mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ /stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di dag /lha rdzas nor bu rin chen bzang mchog gis/ /'og nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/ /nor bu rin chen
225b6(mdo sde): dag gis gang gyur dang / /zhing yang mtha' yas rnam mang ji snyed pa/ /dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser bkram gang ba kun/ /sa yi 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i mchog la
225b7(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin/ /sems can rnam pa mang po ji snyed pa/ /bskal pa mtha' yas mang por sbyin pa byin/ /sangs rgyas rnams la khor mor mi chad byin/ /byang chub 'dod phyir byin pa'i sbyin tshogs
226a1(mdo sde): la| |dge slong gang dag stong nyid mngon dga' zhing / /stobs bcu la ni thal sbyar phyag 'tshal na/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid mngon dga' la/ /sbyin
226a2(mdo sde): pa'i phung po snga mas char mi phod/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i mi des de rnyed nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs med 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /dad pa rgya cher bskyed nas sbyin pa byin/ /de yi
226a3(mdo sde): dpe 'di skyes bu dam pas bstan/ /su dag ting 'dzin dam pa'i mchog 'di las/ /tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad sems dga' 'dzin pa yang / /de yi bsod nams phung po bsags
226a4(mdo sde): pa la/ /sbyin pa de kun brgya yi char mi phod/ /ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba ma thos par/ /phan byed byang chub sems dpas sbyin byin kyang / /thos pas sangs rgyas ye shes myur thob
226a5(mdo sde): ltar| |de tsam sangs rgyas ye shes myur mi 'thob/ /gang gis zhi mchog sa 'di thob nas su/ /rdul bral ting 'dzin stong pa'i rigs 'di ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas
226a6(mdo sde): rtogs byed pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas ye shes myur du 'thob/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi gter rnyed pa/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /de dag lha dang de bzhin mi rnams
226a7(mdo sde): kyi| |nor bu rin po che yis gang bar gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas ting 'dzin 'di thob ste/ /rtag tu chub par byed cing mi ngoms pa/ /thul bar dka' zhing mdzod rnams shin tu
226b1(mdo sde): mang / /nor yang mang zhing rin chen nor dang ldan/ /ji ltar ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di thob nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' zhing rangs pa ltar/ /rgyal srid shin tu 'byor cing rgyas thong
226b2(mdo sde): kyang / /mkhas pa de dag nam yang dgar mi 'gyur/ /de dang de dag sangs rgyas kun mkhyen gyi/ /chos rnams rtag tu 'dzin par byed pa yin/ /zad pa'i mthar thug dus su gyur pa'i tshe/ /
226b3(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul mchog rgya cher 'dzin par 'gyur/ /chos kyi mdzod 'chang blo gros chen po 'chang / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyang 'chang ba yin/ /de dang de dag sems can bye stong dang / /
226b4(mdo sde): khrag khrig chos kyi dbyangs kyis mgu bar byed/ /de dag tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros can/ /skyes bu de dag bslabs pa'i nor gyis phyug /de dang de dag tshul khrims brtul zhugs gnas/ /
226b5(mdo sde): mngon dga' chos kyi sdong po'i myu gu yin/ /de dag chos gos ngur smrig rin chen 'chang / /khyim nas 'byung la rtag tu dga' bar byed/ /de dag sems can phan phyir mnyam pa med/ /thams
226b6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu zhugs/ /de dag dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul/ /rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan/ /de dag dul zhing rab dul rjes su song / /zhi ba'i dbang po
226b7(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba yin/ /de dag sems can nyal ba gnyid log pa/ /rtag tu chos kyi skad kyis sad par byed/ /sems can dag ni sag par byas nas su/ /rin chen chos bzang mchog la
227a1(mdo sde): 'god par byed/ /de dang de dag sbyin pa'i bdag po yin/ /khor mor rtag tu gtong la brkyang ba ste/ /mkhas pa de dag 'jungs dang 'grogs mi byed/ /
227a2(mdo sde): gtong ba chen po dag la rtag tu dga'/ /de dag sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal rnams/ /mthong nas longs spyod kyis kyang tshim par byed/ /de dag sems can bde zhing phan
227a3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtag par zhugs/ /de dag ye shes rtag tu bslabs pa ste/ /chos kyi rnga yang rgya cher shin tu rdung / /skye bo kun gyi the tshom 'khri shing gcod/ /rtag
227a4(mdo sde): par ye shes la yang rab tu zhugs/ /de dag legs thos chos 'dzin rdul bral ba/ /'khor gyi nang du stan la 'dug nas su/ /mkhas pa blo gros 'chang ba de dag ni/ /mdo sde bye ba
227a5(mdo sde): brgya dag rab tu ston/ /de dang de dag mang du thos pa yin/ /thos pa 'dzin pa sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin/ /chos kyi mdzod rnams shin tu 'dzin byed de/ /thub pa'i chos kyi gter
227a6(mdo sde): la dga' ba yin/ /de dang de dag shes rab yangs pa yin/ /dga' ba dag kyang rgya cher rtag tu skyed/ /zhi ba cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba blta dka' ba/ /zhi ba'i chos mchog rnams
227a7(mdo sde): kyang rab tu ston/ /de dag chos dang chos min shes pa ste/ /des shing blo gros ldan pa chos la gnas/ /chos kyi rgyal srid rab tu ston byed cing / /mtshungs med chos kyi mchog la
227b1(mdo sde): rtag tu spyod/ /de dag chos kyi mchog la lhur byed de/ /bla ma la yang ri mo byed par gnas/ /chos kyi grong khyer mchog la gnas pa ste/ /blo gros ldan pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng / /de
227b2(mdo sde): dag drags shing rgyags pa'i sems can rnams/ /rtag tu bag med pa la gnas pa mthong / /rab tu ma rung log pa'i lam song zhing / /'khor ba'i lam la gnas pa mthong nas ni//
227b3(mdo sde): de la byams dang snying rje rgya cher bskyed/ /dga' dang btang snyoms dag la'ang rab gnas te/ /de dag la ni yan lag brgyad ldan pa/ /lam mchog gzhi ba blta dka' rab tu ston/ /de dang
227b4(mdo sde): de dag legs byas chos kyi gru/ /bshams nas 'khor ba'i rgyun du song ba dag /rgya mtsho chen por lhung zhing khyer ba yi/ /sems can mang po dag ni sgrol bar byed/ /byang chub yan lag
227b5(mdo sde): stobs dang dbang po yis/ /go bgos dam pa'i chos kyi grur zhugs nas/ /pha rol 'gram bde rtag tu 'jigs med par/ /khor mor sems can rnams kyang 'god par byed/ /de dag
227b6(mdo sde): sman pa'i gtso bo dka' thub la/ /shin tu spyad pa rig byed sman pa'i mchog /rig pa ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi yang sbyin par byin/ /nad ni rnam pa mang pos
227b7(mdo sde): btab pa yi/ /sems can na ba dag kyang mthong nas su/ /de dag la ni chos kyi bkru sman gtong / /chos rnams kyis ni de dag gso bar byed/ /de dag smra ba pha rol rgol ba 'joms/ /
228a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten dbang po tshig gi dbang phyug ldan/ /shes bya kun la 'od byed blo gros 'chang / /ye shes dam pa'i sa la rab tu gnas/ /dpa' bo ye shes stobs ldan stobs
228a2(mdo sde): 'joms pa/ /ye shes ldan pa dag gis yang dag bsngags/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag /chos la gnas nas shes bas mgu bar byed/ /de dang de dag bdag
228a3(mdo sde): po ded dpon te/ /gsal ba sems can rnams kyi skyabs 'dod pa/ /sems can rin chen lam la rmongs gyur cing / /rtag tu bdud kyi rnying zhugs mthong nas ni/ /de dag la
228a4(mdo sde): yang lam mchog zhi zhing bde/ /rtag par mya ngan 'das pa rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa dag ni ye shes la ma de yis/ /sems can mang po byed rgya 'dren par byed/ /de dang de dag
228a5(mdo sde): gnas dang rten du 'gyur/ /skyabs dang mig dang sgron ma byed pa yin/ /'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs rab tu sbyin/ /skrag pa rnams kyang rtag tu dbugs 'byin byed/ /de
228a6(mdo sde): dag sems can shin tu sdug bsngal dang / /dmus long gyur pa 'di dag ri gnas ni/ /yang dag tshul bslabs rin chen chos rnams kyis/ /chos kyi snang ba dag kyang byed par
228a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /'jig rten na ni bzo mchog ci yod pa/ /bzo bo byed pas sems can phan 'gyur zhing / /gang gis sems can rtag tu bder 'gyur pa/ /bzo yi rnam pa de dag shin tu
228b1(mdo sde): bslabs/ /su dag byang chub tu ni mngon zhugs te/ /blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten mig sbyin pa/ /bslabs pa rnams la mchog gi pha rol phyin/ /mkhas rab 'jig rten na yang ngo mtshar
228b2(mdo sde): thob| |sangs rgyas dag gi chos mchog thos pa yis/ /mtshungs pa med pa ngoms par yong mi 'gyur/ /tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pha rol phyin/ /zab mo yi ni chos rnams
228b3(mdo sde): shin tu thos/ /de dag zhi ba rin chen chos rnams ni/ /gzhan la ston pas ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ /thar pa'i thabs kyi char yang rab 'bebs shing / /chos kyis skyes bu dag ni tshim par
228b4(mdo sde): byed| |de yi drung du sems can mang po ni/ /chos 'dod mkhas pa ji snyed lhags nas su/ /chos mchog bzang po dam pa rin po che/ /drang zhing gsal ba'i lam rnams mnyan snyam pa/ /
228b5(mdo sde): de dag blo gros 'chang bas the tshom bcad/ /chos kyis de dag shin tu mgu bar byed/ /tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pha rol phyin/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rab tu shes/ /
228b6(mdo sde): ye shes ldan zhing ye shes mchog rab kyi/ /pha rol phyin pa sems can bsam la mkhas/ /sems can pha rol sems dang spyod pa dang / /gang dag gtam ni ci 'dra'i chos brjod
228b7(mdo sde): pa| |ye shes gtam ni brjod la gang dag gis/ /sems can khrag khrig chos mchog mig thob 'gyur/ /de dag ye shes bye brag pha rol phyin/ /lam rnams kyang ni nye bar ston par
229a1(mdo sde): byed| |mkhas pa de dag gi ni sems rnams kyang / /bdud rnams bye ba stong gis yong mi shes/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la ni bya song ba/ /de yi rjes ni gang
229a2(mdo sde): du'ang shes mi nus/ /ye shes stobs ldan dul zhing rab tu zhi/ /zhi ba 'phags pa'i ye shes dag la gnas/ /dpa' bo khyu mchog bdud rnams thams cad bcom/ /byang chub zhi
229a3(mdo sde): ba mngon par 'tshang yang rgya/ /rtag tu rdzu 'phrul dag gi pha rol phyin/ /zhing yang brgya phrag mang por 'gro bar byed/ /sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig mthong / /ji bzhin gang+gA yi ni
229a4(mdo sde): bye ma snyed/ /de yi mig kyang thogs par mi 'gyur te/ /phyogs bcu dag gi gzugs mang mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji snyed phyogs bcu yi ni srid pa na/ /sems can yod dgu de dag
229a5(mdo sde): 'dren par gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag mang por ni/ /de dag de yi phan yon kun brjod cing / /spobs pa yi ni rab tu bshad mdzad kyang / /sngon gyi spyod pa'i bsngags pa zad mi
229a6(mdo sde): nus/ /ting 'dzin mtshungs med rdul dang bral ba 'di/ /skyes bu su gang 'dzin par byed pa ni/ /sangs rgyas dag gi nor rnams mi zad de/ /shin tu rgya che ye shes rgya mtsho bzhin/ /tshul
229a7(mdo sde): khrims kyi phung po nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon
229b1(mdo sde): nu| de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo mtshor dang / rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag dang / gzhan yang tshad med pa 'dod pa dang / /
229b2(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin
229b3(mdo sde): 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcad bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon bar bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas bsgom
229b4(mdo sde): par bya ba gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya/ des bzod pa'i stobs bsgom par bya/ bzod pa bstan par bya/ mang du bya/ chos la don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs
229b5(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa dang / chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /des gnas gsum la brtson par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/
229b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa zad pa dang / bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya'i/ 'jig rten gyi bde ba la reg par
229b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te/ gnas gsum po de dag la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i
230a1(mdo sde): phyir sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di dag tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /bskal pa stong du ji ltar ngas spyad pa/ /gzhan
230a2(mdo sde): nur gyur pa nga las mnyan par gyis/ /ting 'dzin bzang po dam pa 'di 'tshol phyir/ /sangs rgyas dag ni stong phrag brgya yang mchod/ /de ltar bskal pa 'das pa bsam yas su/ /zhing
230a3(mdo sde): brgya yi ni bye ma ci yod pa/ /dper bsten de snyed 'das par gyur pa na/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /bye ba stong phrag drug cu mi nyung ba/ /rgyal ba de yi tshogs ni byung
230a4(mdo sde): gyur te/ /thams cad zag pa med cing nyon mongs zad/ /rnam thar brgyad la gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa/ /de yi dus nas 'di thams cad kyang / /bde zhing lo legs 'khrug pa med par
230a5(mdo sde): gyur| |mi rnams thams cad skyid cing bde dang ldan/ /mi yi bde bdag gis rgyas par gyur/ /thams cad bsod nams stobs dang ldan pa ste/ /blta na sdug cing de bzhin dga'
230a6(mdo sde): bar gyur/ /thams cad phyug cing nor mang 'byor pa ste/ /lus ni lha yi bde dang ldan par gyur/ /des shing brtul zhugs bzang la nyon mongs chud/ /bzod pa'i stobs la dpa'
230a7(mdo sde): zhing byad gzugs bzang / /lha yi gnas na lha yi sras po bzhin/ /tshul khrims yon tan 'chang zhing blo gros ldan/ /de yi dus nas bdag byung ba ni/ /rgyal po me tog mchog ces
230b1(mdo sde): bya ba yin/ /de yi bu yang lnga brgyar tshang bar byung / /dran dang ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan par gyur/ /rgyal po'i bu de yis kyang rgyal ba yi/ /skyed mos tshal brgya stong phrag drug cu dag /thams
230b2(mdo sde): cad me tog 'bras bus brgyan pa yang / /thugs rje ldan pa de la rab tu phul/ /skyed mos tshal ni brgya stong sna tshogs dag /'chags mal stan bzhugs gnas stong rnams dang / /chos
230b3(mdo sde): gos kyang ni bye ba brgya stong gis/ /'chags bzhugs gnas rnams su gding ba byas/ /de ltar rnam pa du ma stong dag dang / /dge sbyong dag gi longs spyod ji snyed pa/ /rgyal po'i bu ni
230b4(mdo sde): shin tu yid dad pas/ /bde gshegs de la thams cad nye bar phul/ /rgyal po de yang dge ba'i las bcu yi/ /lam la rab tu gnas par gyur nas su/ /skye bo srog chags khrag khrig
230b5(mdo sde): brgya stong gis/ /mdun du bdar te 'dren pa lta bar song / /me tog dang ni byug pa bdug pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sil snyan thogs nas su/ /rgyal ba de la de yis mchod
230b6(mdo sde): byas te/ /thal mo sbyar nas spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/ /lha dang mi dang lha min gnod sbyin dang / /dge slong stong yang de tshe dga' bar gyur/ /rgyal ba mchod pa 'di ni lung ston tam/ /
230b7(mdo sde): mi yi dbang po legs par chos gsung ngam/ /rgyal po'i bu de yi ni bsam pa dang / /bla med sems kyang rang byung mkhyen nas ni/ /mos pa'i gnas la pha rol phyin pa yis/ /de la ting
231a1(mdo sde): 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad do| |gang tshe ba de bar gshegs pas gsung phyung ba/ /de tshe nags tshal bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos/ /nam mkha' las ni me tog
231a2(mdo sde): char yang bab/ /sa las pad+ma brgya dag byung bar gyur/ /ston pa don gyi tshig la rab bslabs pas/ /bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dren pas lung bstan te/ /mi yi dbang pos ting 'dzin
231a3(mdo sde): zhi ba bshad/ /de yi don tshig rnams kyang mnyan par gyis/ /srid pa thams cad srid pa med pa ste/ /kun brtags gsog dang smig rgyu 'dra ba yin/ /sgyu ma ji bzhin glog dang sprin 'dra
231a4(mdo sde): ste| |stong g.yo bdag dang sems can srog kun med/ /gzod ma nas ni stong zhing ma 'ongs chos/ /song ba med cing gnas med gnas kyis dben/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtag tu snying po
231a5(mdo sde): med| |thams cad dag cing rnam dag nam mkha' bzhin/ /mi sngo mi ser dkar po ma yin te/ /ming ni gsog gyur sgra yi rang bzhin yin/ /sems ni dben zhing sems med rang
231a6(mdo sde): bzhin te/ /skad cig yin pas thams cad sgra dang bral/ /bshad pa na yang yi ge 'pho ba med/ /ma bshad na yang yi ge 'grib mi 'gyur/ /yi ge dag ni phyogs su'ang mi 'gro ste/ /yi
231a7(mdo sde): ge gang nas kyang ni 'ongs ma yin/ /yi ge mi zad zad cing 'gags pa ste/ /bshad par byas sam bshad par ma byas kyang / /yi ge 'di dag rtag par mi zad brjod/ /gang gis yongs
231b1(mdo sde): shes de yang zad mi 'gyur/ /chos ni stong phrag brgya dag rab brjod nas/ /sangs rgyas brgya stong dag ni gang 'das pa/ /chos kyang ma zad yi ge'ang zad ma gyur/ /skye ba'ang med de de phyir mi zad
231b2(mdo sde): pa| |gang gis mi zad chos rnams rab shes pa/ /rtag tu mi zad pa yi chos shes pas/ /mdo sde brgya stong dag ni bshad byas kyang / /chos rnams thams cad yi ge med par shes/ /rgyal ba'i
231b3(mdo sde): chos ni gang dag rab ston pa/ /de yang mi zad pas na mi mthong ste/ /chos 'di snga nas bdag med sems can med/ /de dag rab tu ston kyang zad mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa de ni tshig kun
231b4(mdo sde): smra byed kyang / /tshig gis sems ni 'phrogs par mi 'gyur to/ /tshig rnams thams cad ri yi brag ca bzhin/ /de phyir nam yang tshig la chags mi 'gyur/ /de ni sgyu ma'i tshig gis
231b5(mdo sde): chos ston te/ /tshig de thams cad de yi mod la 'gags/ /tshig de yi ni mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba/ /chos rnams kun kyang mtshan nyid de 'drar gyur/ /chos kun mtshan gzhi med cing mtshan
231b6(mdo sde): gzhi bral/ /thams cad mtshan med mtshan nyid rnam par dag /rtag tu dben zhing gtsang ba nam mkha' bzhin/ /mdor na de dag bgrang bar nyer mi 'gyur/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas
231b7(mdo sde): kun dben pa/ /drang srong de dag la ni rnam rtog med/ /'gro ba kun tu 'dus ma byas thob bas/ /lta ba dag las khor mor rnam par dben/ /gang dag 'di 'dra'i chos rnams shes pa
232a1(mdo sde): ni| |rtag tu ma chags mi gtum ma rmongs te/ /de yi sems ni rang bzhin mnyam par bzhag /de ni ting 'dzin stobs can stobs dang ldan/ /brag phug ri dang
232a2(mdo sde): gtsang rong klung rnams su/ /rkyen gyis ji ltar brag ca 'byung ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'dus byas 'di kun rig par gyis/ /'jig rten thams cad sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin/ /gang du ting 'dzin zhi ba
232a3(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa/ /yon tan chos su gyur pa shes rab stobs/ /drang srong ye shes stobs kyis mngon par shes/ /tshig ni thabs mkhas pa yi nges pa'i tshig /brtags pa tsam du
232a4(mdo sde): brtags nas brjod pa yin/ /'khor ba la ni mtha' ma mi rnyed de/ /gang dag sngon byung mtha' ni mtshan nyid med/ /ma 'ongs dus kyang shes par bya ba'i phyir/ /las dang bya bas
232a5(mdo sde): de ltar zhugs gyur te/ /rab dang tha ma dag tu'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chos rnams rtag tu dben zhing rang bzhin stong / /thams cad bdag med par yang shes par gyis/ /kun rdzob tu
232a6(mdo sde): ni rgyal bas chos bshad de/ /'dus byas 'dus byas ma yin de ltar ltos/ /yang dag nyid du bdag dang mi med de/ /'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid de 'dra'o/ /dge dang nag po'i las
232a7(mdo sde): rnams mi 'jig ste/ /bdag gis byas pa dag ni myong bar 'gyur/ /las kyi 'bras bu 'pho bar mi 'gyur te/ /rgyu med par yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /srid pa thams cad sgyu ma
232b1(mdo sde): dbang med pa/ /gsog dang gsob tu gyur pa dbu ba bzhin/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur rtag tu stong / /sgra yis de bshad de dag dben pa yin/ /de ltar rnam par rig pa rlom sems med/ /tshul
232b2(mdo sde): khrims la yang chags pa med pa'i sems/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis cung zad mi rtog ste/ /de ltar spyod pa mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur/ /rgyal po des ni ji tsam chos rig pa/ /de tsam du na rgyal ba
232b3(mdo sde): des bshad de/ /rgyal pos rgyal ba'i chos 'di thos nas ni/ /'khor dang bcas pas bslab pa yang dag bzung / /rgyal po'i bu des ting 'dzin 'di mnyan nas/ /dga' zhing yi rangs tshig kyang
232b4(mdo sde): 'di skad smra/ /shin tu legs par ting 'dzin 'di bshad de/ /khyod kyi zhabs la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /der yang srog chags stong phrag brgyad cu dag /yang dag don dam nges par bstan
232b5(mdo sde): pa 'di/ /chos kyi rang bzhin bzang po 'di thos nas/ /de dag mi skye ba yi bzod pa thob/ /skyes bu la ni skye dang 'gag pa med/ /de bzhin chos 'di rtag tu snga nas dben/ /de ltar rab shes yongs su
232b6(mdo sde): mi 'bri ste/ /rgyal pos mi skye bzod pa thob par gyur/ /de tshe rgyal pos rgyal srid rnam spangs te/ /rgyal ba de yi bstan la rab tu byung / /rgyal po'i sras kyang lnga brgya mi nyung ba/ /de dag kun kyang
232b7(mdo sde): rjes su rab tu byung / /rgyal po sras dang bcas pa rab byung nas/ /de tshe srog chags mang po stong gzhan yang / /bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du rab tu byung / /rgyal ba de la chos rnams 'tshol
233a1(mdo sde): bar byed/ /lo ni brgya phrag nyi shur yongs tshang bar/ /rgyal ba des ni chos rnams rab tu bshad/ /rgyal po bur bcas skye bor bcas pa yis/ /lo yang brgya
233a2(mdo sde): phrag nyi shur chos rnams spyad/ /de nas dus kyang gzhan du gyur pa'i tshe/ /rgyal ba de yang yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'das par gyur/ /de yi chos rnams
233a3(mdo sde): kyang ni nyung bar gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po de yi bu yod pa/ /bsod nams blo gros dad cing dang ba ste/ /de yi khyim du nyer 'gro dge slong yod/ /des ni ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang bshad/ /de ni 'jam
233a4(mdo sde): zhing mnyen par gyur pa ste/ /srog chags brgya stong dag gis bkur sti byas/ /lha yang bye ba brgya dag phyir 'brang zhing / /grong du 'ongs nas bsngags pa brjod par byed/ /de ni dran dang
233a5(mdo sde): ldan zhing rtogs par ldan/ /brtul zhugs bzang zhing des pa tshul khrims dga'/ /dbyangs kyang snyan cing mi rtsub 'jam pa ste/ /khams rnams shes pa'i dbang mchog rab tu thob/ /dge
233a6(mdo sde): slong de ni snyan pa'i 'od ces bya/ /chos gos bye ba brgya yang rab tu rnyed/ /de yi bsod nams stobs ni mi bzod pas/ /de tshe dge slong stong dag phrag dog skyes/ /bsod nams stobs
233a7(mdo sde): dang gzugs kyi stobs rnams dang / /ye shes stobs dang rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang / /tshul khrims stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs rnams dang / /chos kyi stobs kyis dge slong
233b1(mdo sde): yang dag 'phags/ |skye bo'i yid du 'ong zhing phangs pa ste/ /dge slong dge bsnyen dang ni dge slong ma/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la sems can gang dad pa/ /de dag gis ni mchod cing bkur ba
233b2(mdo sde): yin| |rgyal po'i bu ni der yang gang byung ba/ /bsod nams blo gros rtag tu dad mos te/ /dge slong mang po yid 'khrug rig nas ni/ /slob dpon de la srung ba byed du btsud/ /srog chags dag
233b3(mdo sde): ni stong phrag lnga brgya rnams| / go bgos mtshon cha ral gri dbyug thogs pa/ /de dag gis ni dge slong rtag tu bskor/ /yang dag spyod pa mu med 'chad cing smra/ /de ni 'khor la chos rnams
233b4(mdo sde): rab ston te/ /chos 'di bdag med stong pa srog med 'chad/ /dmigs par lta ba bdag la chags pa rnams/ /de dag dge slong ci smra mos mi byed/ /su dag stong pa zhi ba mi 'dod pa/ /
233b5(mdo sde): dge slong 'di ni chos min rab ston gyis/ /'di bsad na ni bsod nams 'gyur zhes nas/ /dge slong dag ni lag na mtshon thogs 'ongs/ /mthong nas dge slong mtshon gyis mi
233b6(mdo sde): 'jigs te/ /'di la sems can skyes bu gsod pa med/ /chos 'di rnams ni gsog ste rtsig pa 'dra/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams rjes su dran/ /dge slong des ni spyi bor thal sbyar te/ /
233b7(mdo sde): tshig smras rgyal ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden pa gang gis chos 'di stong pa na/ /mtshon che 'di rnams me tog man+dar gyur/ /thub pa tshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan ba
234a1(mdo sde): yis| |gzhan su mi 'gyur tshig 'di smras ma thag / nags tshal bcas pa'i sa yang rab tu g.yos/ /mtshon cha de dag me to mnar gyur/ /dmigs
234a2(mdo sde): pa can dag mtshon cha thogs pa yi/ /dge slong de tshe lus ni zhum gyur nas/ /tshur yang de nas nye bar 'ong ma nus/ /skrag cing shin tu ngo mtshar chen por gyur/ /su dag thub
234a3(mdo sde): dbang la ni dang mos shing / /gang dag stong pa zhi pa 'dod pa rnams/ /de dag a la la stong brjod nas su/ /ras bcos brgya yis dge slong mngon par g.yogs/ /dge slong de ni
234a4(mdo sde): de la byams bskyed nas/ /sems can su dag nga la sdang byed pa/ /de dag phyir ni byang chub bdag spyod ces/ /skye bo thams cad kyi yang mdun du smra/ /des ni lo yang brgyad cu mi
234a5(mdo sde): nyung bar/ /stong pa rgyal ba rnams kyi mdzod bshad de/ /phyir rgol ba yang dge slong stong dag byung / /de dag rgyal po'i bu yis phyir bzlog byas/ /de yang de tshe yongs su brnyas gyur
234a6(mdo sde): te| |de yi dge slong dag kyang nyung bar gyur/ /de tshe mi snyan pa yi tshig thos kyang / /bzod pa'i stobs las nam yang nyams ma gyur/ /de ni gzhan gyi dus su gyur pa'i tshe/ /srog
234a7(mdo sde): chags brgya dag gi yang don chen byas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyang rjes su dran/ /bsod nams blo gros dga' ba chen po skyes/ /der yang ri mo rgya cher byas nas ni/ /dge slong
234b1(mdo sde): de la bsod nams blo gros smras/ /bdag gi slob dpon la ni su yis kyang / /sems la mi 'thad ci zhig ma bgyis sam/ /des smras rgyal sras gzhon nu gsan du gsol/ /bzod
234b2(mdo sde): pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag byung / /su yis bdag la mi snyan tshig smras pa/ /de la bdag ni byams pa rgya yang che/ /gang gis bskal pa stong phrag brgya dag tu/ /sngon
234b3(mdo sde): gyi srid pa la ni bzod bsgoms pa/ /dge slong snyan 'od de ni nga yin zhes/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub pas tshig brjod do/ /gang gis dge slong snyan 'od bsrungs pa yi/ /bsod nams blo
234b4(mdo sde): gros rgyal po'i bu de ni/ /tshe rabs stong du nga yi grogs gyur te/ /sangs rgyas byams par ngas ni lung bstan to/ /gang gis ston pa tshogs kyi dbang phyug mchod/ /gang gis gnas
234b5(mdo sde): khang bzang po mchog byas pa/ /gang sngon me tog bzang zhes bya ba de/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo mi yi dbang por gyur/ /de ltar bskal pa mang po mtha' yas par/ /rgyal pa dag gi dam
234b6(mdo sde): chos ngas bzung ste/ /ngas sngon bzod pa'i stobs kyang yang dag bsgrubs/ /gzhon nu thos nas nga yi rjes su slobs/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das gyur phyi ma'i tshe/ /dam pa'i chos ni rnam
234b7(mdo sde): par 'jig pa na/ /dge slong mu stegs blo la brtson pa dag /de dag nga yi zhi ba'i chos la spong / /khengs shing rgod la gtum zhing spyi rtol che/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i zas la chags pa
235a1(mdo sde): dag |chos gos lhung bzed dag la chags shing brkam/ /rnyed la gnas shing de dag chos la spong / /de dag yid gtum zhe sdang byas mi gzo/ /dma'
235a2(mdo sde): pa'i rigs dang dbul pa'i rigs las ni/ /nga yi bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas/ /de dag zhi ba'i chos 'di spong bar byed/ /bdud kyi blo yis sems can mun gtibs shing / /'dod
235a3(mdo sde): chags dbang du song bas mngon par chags/ /gti mug dbang gis byis pa rmongs pas na/ /de dag stong pa zhi ba'i chos mi 'dod/ /dge slong dge slong ma dang khyim pa rnams/ /
235a4(mdo sde): sdig ba'i blo yis 'dzin bcug rmongs byas te/ /de dag dbang du rtag par song gyur pas/ /phyi ma'i dus la byang chub spong bar byed/ /nga yi tshig 'di gzhon nu thos nas su/ /dge
235a5(mdo sde): slong dgon pa pa dag rtag tu bsten/ /su dag stong pa zhi la dga' ba ni/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di bzung ba yin/ /su dag ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dzin gyur pa/ /de dag nga yi
235a6(mdo sde): bstan la rab byung zhing / /dge slong bsnyen rdzogs gso sbyong las rnams byas/ /zas la mi chags mi brkam za ba yin/ /lus dang srog la lta ba rab spongs la/ /stong pa shin
235a7(mdo sde): tu zhi ba sgom par gyis/ /brtson zhing rab tu brtson pa'i yid kyis kyang / /ri dwags bzhin du dgon par gnas par gyis/ /rgyal ba dag la rtag tu mchod pa gyis/ /gdugs
235b1(mdo sde): dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba gnas khang gis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod par gyis/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni myur du thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed
235b2(mdo sde): gyis la/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi mchod rten dag /gser gyis brgyan cing dngul gyis bskus pa dang / /rin chen sna tshogs gzugs legs byed du chug /byang chub phyir ni yi
235b3(mdo sde): dam bca' gyis la/ /'jig rten mchod pa bzang po ji snyed pa/ /lha dang mi yi dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams/ /thams cad 'tshol la sangs rgyas mchod pa gyis/ /chos nyid du yang mi dbang
235b4(mdo sde): thams cad ltos/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs dang / /rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa kun snang ste/ /chos nyid kyis ni sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhugs/ /gtong ba
235b5(mdo sde): kun la shin tu mos par gyis/ /tshul khrims dag par gyur cing brtan pa'i sems/ /bzod la dga' zhing rtag tu byams la dga'/ /chos rnams thams cad stong par shes par
235b6(mdo sde): gyis| |ma zhum ma 'gong brtson 'grus rab skyed la/ /bsam gtan dga' zhing rab tu dben la mos/ /shes rab rnam dag shes rab rab shes kyis/ /ring por mi thogs snying rje
235b7(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur/ /mi gtsang bas ni 'dod chags rtag zhi gyis/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis zhe sdang tshar chod cig /shes rab stobs kyis gti mug bsal bar gyis/ /rgyal bas bsngags
236a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /lus ni snying po med cing dbu ba 'dra/ /sdug bsngal rul ba dri nga bsgom par gyis/ /phung po thams cad gsog tu
236a2(mdo sde): shes par gyis/ /ye shes bla med myur du thob par 'gyur/ /bdag dang skyes bu dang ni sreg rnams su/ /sdig pa'i lta ba nam yang ma 'dzin cig /chos rnams thams cad stong
236a3(mdo sde): par shes par gyis/ /bla med byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur/ /rnyed la chags par nam yang ma byed cig /zas rnams ma rnyed na yang gdung ma byed/ /bstod dang smad pa dag
236a4(mdo sde): gis ma g.yo bar/ /ri rab bzhin du rab tu mi 'gul gyis/ /gus pa skyed la chos rnams btsal bar gyis/ /thos nas de tshe de yang myong bar gyis/ /rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul gnas
236a5(mdo sde): gyis dang / /bde ba can gyi zhing du myur du 'gro /'gro ba kun la sems kyang mnyam gyis la/ /sdug dang mi sdug pa yi sems ma byed/ /rnyed dang snyan pa dag ni ma 'tshol cig /myur
236a6(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas thub pa'i dbang por 'gyur/ /yon tan gang thos sems can dad 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas yon tan dag la mos bskyed pa/ /yang dag yon tan nges pa'i tshig
236a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu bshad par gyis/ /rtag tu slob dpon dang ni pha dang ma/ /de bzhin 'gro ba kun la gus par gyis/ /nga rgyal dgra gi dbang du ma 'gro zhig/
236b1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams thob par 'gyur/ /'du 'dzi dag ni ma lus rnam spangs nas/ /rtag tu dben pa la yang dga' bar gyis/ /des shing brtul zhugs bzang la rtag tu
236b2(mdo sde): zhi| |bdag la phan zhing sems can gzhan la phan/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje bsgom par gyis/ /dga' dang btang snyoms la yang rtag mos gyis/ /rtag tu rgyal ba'i bstan pa
236b3(mdo sde): rjes su ltos/ /'jig rten du yang myur du phan byed 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po nam yang ma bsten par/ /grogs po gang dag rgya cher bsten par gyis/ /su dag stong pa zhi ba 'di 'dod
236b4(mdo sde): pa| |de dag byang chub mchog la zhugs pa yin/ /nyan thos sar ni nam yang ma slob cig /de yi spyod la'ang dga' bar ma byed cig /sangs rgyas yon tan dag las sems ma btang / /myur
236b5(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur/ /bden tshig dam pa rtag tu smra bar gyis/ /rdzun rnams dang ni rtsub po'i tshig ma smra/ /rtag tu 'jam zhing dga' ba smra bar gyis/ /'jig rten slob
236b6(mdo sde): dpon dag gi gsung thob 'gyur/ /lus dang srog la chags par ma byed cig /gzhan la smod cing bdag la bstod ma byed/ /bdag gi yon tan yang dag sgrub gyis la/ /gzhan gyi spyod
236b7(mdo sde): pa dag la btang snyoms gyis/ /rnam thar stong la rtag tu dga' bar gyis/ /'gro ba rnams su smon par ma byed cig /mtshan ma thams cad ma lus rnam par spongs/ /rtag tu mtshan ma med la
237a1(mdo sde): gnas par gyis/ /dus kun tu ni mtha' yang rnam par spongs/ /rtag dang chad la gnas par ma gyur cig /thams cad rkyen las gyur par rtag rig gyis/ /
237a2(mdo sde): de ltar byas na ston pa ji bzhin 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i dga' ba rnams la dga' ba spongs/ /zhe sdang tha ba dri ma rnam spangs shing / /gti mug mun pa thams cad rnam bsal na/ /zhi bar
237a3(mdo sde): dga' ba'i mi yi seng ger 'gyur/ /rtag pa mi rtag par yang rtag tu ltos/ /srid pa kun gyi sdug bsngal bde grol zhing / /bdag dang gtsang la mi gtsang bdag med par/ /bsgom
237a4(mdo sde): par byas na mi yi dbang por 'gyur/ /'jig rten sgron mdzad rgyal ba rnams kyis ni/ /gang la tshul bzhin chos rnams rab bstan pa/ /de yis bdud kyi stobs rnams bcom nas
237a5(mdo sde): su| |bla na med pa'i byang chub yangs pa thob/ /yon tan ji snyed ngas bshad thob byas te/ /nyes pa brgya dag ngas ni gang bstan pa/ /rnam par spangs nas slob par byed pa ni/ /gzhon
237a6(mdo sde): nu de tshe 'dir yang sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /snyan pa'i 'od kyi le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/
237a7(mdo sde): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gzhon nu/ lus kyi sdom pas bsdam par bya'o zhes/ gzhon nu/ de ltar bslab par
237b1(mdo sde): bya'o| |gzhon nu/ de la lus kyi sdom pa gang zhe na/ lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'gyur pa
237b2(mdo sde): de ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur
237b3(mdo sde): ba de ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par 'gyur ba de ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes
237b4(mdo sde): bya'o| |lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bcu thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
237b5(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gzhon nu/ lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob ste/
237b6(mdo sde): gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum thob par 'gyur pa 'di ni/ gzhon nu/ lus kyi sdom pa zhes
237b7(mdo sde): bya'o| |lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po dang / snying
238a1(mdo sde): rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po 'di bzhi thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu/ lus kyi
238a2(mdo sde): sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob ste| bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so
238a3(mdo sde): so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang / so so yang dag par
238a4(mdo sde): rig pa 'di bzhi thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu/ lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyogs
238a5(mdo sde): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob ste/ sum cu rtsa bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
238a6(mdo sde): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag thob par 'gyur
238a7(mdo sde): ba de ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la gnas pa thob pa dang / btang snyoms chen po la
238b1(mdo sde): gnas pa thob pa dang / bde ba'i rnam par rtog pa thob pa dang / rab tu dben pa'i chos rnams thob par 'gyur bde ni/ gzhon nu/ lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang / gzhon nu/ lus
238b2(mdo sde): kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog gcod pa spong par 'gyur ba dang / ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang /
238b3(mdo sde): phra ma'i tshig dang / tshig rtsub po dang / 'khyal bar smra ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / srang la g.yo byed pa dang / tshad la g.yo byed pa dang / nor la g.yo
238b4(mdo sde): byed pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcing ba dang / btsa' ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gcad pa dang / dbug pa dang / zhe la gnon pa dang / chags pa dang / ser sna ma spangs
238b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / lag pa rgod pa dang / rkang pa rgod pa dang / rkang lag ma bsdams pa dang / de'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len spangs shing ta la'i mgo bcad pa bzhin du
238b6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu/ lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gzhon nu/ sngon
238b7(mdo sde): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
239a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
239a2(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ gzhon nu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das ye shes snang
239a3(mdo sde): ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cur gyur to/ /dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag drug cu'i nyan thos kyi dge
239a4(mdo sde): 'dun byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'ang dpag tu med pa byung ngo / /gzhon nu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po khyad par sems
239a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po khyad par sems de srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'ongs so/ /'ongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
239a6(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /rgyal po khyad par sems phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de
239a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de nas ye shes snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rgyal po khyad par sems
239b1(mdo sde): ' khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las lus kyi sdom pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor 'jug pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par
239b2(mdo sde): rab tu bstan to/ /ji ltar bar snang nam mkha' rnam dag ste/ /shin tu dag cing rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /de bzhin lus kyi sdom pa dag pa yang / /dbyangs kyis bstan par nam yang
239b3(mdo sde): nus mi 'gyur/ /lus kyi sdom pa 'di ni dben zhing stong / /'di 'dra gnyis po lus kyi mtshan nyid de/ /de dag mtshan nyid med pa bar snang bzhin/ /lus kyi sdom pa de yi mtshan nyid bshad
239b4(mdo sde): sdom pa'i mtshan nyid de 'drar sus shes pa/ /de la sdom pa nam yang med mi 'gyur/ /mi 'jug pa de yi spyod yul ga la yin/ /zag pa med pa la ni skye ba med/ /gzugs dang longs spyod
239b5(mdo sde): la ni sred bskyed nas/ /'dod pa dag la brten pas mi nus te/ /srid pa dag gi nyes pa mi shes pas/ /lus kyi sdom pa 'di ni shes mi nus/ /zag med sdom pa gang gis rab shes pa/ /de
239b6(mdo sde): la skye ba nam yang yod mi 'gyur/ /dgra bcom pa yi chos ni de 'ang ste/ /mu stegs can gyis shes par sla ma yin/ /gang dag khams gsum kun la yid skrag cing / /'dod pa'i longs
239b7(mdo sde): spyod la yang 'dod mi skyed/ /rgyal po'i srid dang longs spyod yong mi 'dod/ /de dag lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra shes/ /lus kyi sdom pa 'di ni don ces bya/ /don ni sgra yis bstan par
240a1(mdo sde): mi nus te/ /'di 'dra'i chos kyi tshul ni gang shes pa/ /de ni sdom pa 'di la gnas pa yin/ /don la zhugs la ngas ni don bstan te/ /mkhas pa su dag
240a2(mdo sde): don gyi tshul la mos/ /don med rnam spangs don la gnas pa rnams/ /de dag sdom la rtag tu gnas pa yin/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la don du gang brjod dang / /ji lta bur ni don yin
240a3(mdo sde): rnam rig ste/ /don tshul rang bzhin gang gis shes pa ni/ /lus kyi sdom pa la yang gnas zhes bya/ /gang gis bdag med gsog dang stong nyid dang / /mtshan ma med par rnam
240a4(mdo sde): par rig gyur pa/ /de la nam yang sdom pa med mi 'gyur/ /'di ltar des ni yang dag nges la bslabs/ /dngos po dag ni dngos med gang rig pa/ /de ni dngos po dag la yong mi
240a5(mdo sde): chags/ /dngos po kun la nam yang mi chags pa/ /de ni mtshan med ting 'dzin reg par 'gyur/ /ngo bo nyid stong rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /bdag med chos rnams de yis rnam
240a6(mdo sde): rig na/ /de la nam yang sdom pa med mi 'gyur/ /'di ltar des ni yang dag nges par rtogs/ /gang gis phung po lnga rnams stong par shes/ /rang bzhin stong zhing bdag med
240a7(mdo sde): rig na ni/ /lus kyis las gang yang dag spyod byed pa/ /de la nam yang sdom pa med mi 'gyur/ /mtshan ma dag la 'dzin cing ma bsdams te/ /khor mor bdag tu 'du shes rab
240b1(mdo sde): gnas pa/ /gzugs la chags par gyur pa'i skye bo dag /ma bsdams pa yi 'dod chags rab tu ldang / /gang rnams yang dag mtha' la bslabs gyur cing / /stong pa rtogs par rig pa des pa
240b2(mdo sde): dag |sdom med gang gis ngan 'gror 'gro ba yis/ /'dod chags de la nam yang ldang ba med/ /ji ltar ri rab dag ni chen po la/ /grog ma kun gyis g.yos shing 'gul mi nus/ /de bzhin
240b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa yang dag tshul bslabs pas/ /lha yi gzugs kyis kyang na de mi g.yos/ /nam mkha' la ni ri mor bri nus shing / /lag pas nam mkha' gzung du rung gyur kyang / /'dod chags
240b4(mdo sde): zhe sdang bdud rnams bye ba yis/ /de la rnam par bskyod par yong mi nus/ /la las brag ca dag ni gzung nus shing / /chu yi steng na rdo yang 'phyo gyur kyang / /lus sdom pa 'di 'dra sus
240b5(mdo sde): bslabs pa/ /de yi bsam pa dag kyang bltar mi nus/ /'jig rten kun na sgra mang ji snyed pa/ /gzung ste sgrom du gzhug par nus gyur kyang / /lus kyi sdom pa'i gnas dang mi gnas pa/ /sus
240b6(mdo sde): kyang rnam par rig par byed mi nus/ /sprin las sgra bsgrags glog rnams rgyu ba dang / /nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i 'od zer gzung nus kyang / /lus kyi sdom pa 'di la sus bslabs pa/ /de yi rang
240b7(mdo sde): bzhin shes par nus mi 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir ldang pa ni/ /rgya dang rnyi yis gzung bar nus gyur kyang / /lus kyi sdom pa 'di la gang gnas pa/ /de yi lus ni nam yang
241a1(mdo sde): shes mi nus/ /srog chags kun gyi spyod yul de ma yin/ /sems sdom gang la mkhas pa de gnas shing / /spyod yul gang gnas lus kyi sdom pa ni/ /'jig
241a2(mdo sde): rten chos kyis mi gos nam mkha' bzhin/ /phyogs bzhir nam mkha' la ni rgyu ba yis/ /srog chags kun rjes so sor blta nus kyang / /de yi lus dang sems kyi spyod yul la/ /tshad
241a3(mdo sde): bzung bar ni su yang nus pa med/ /lus kyi sdom pa 'di la gang gnas pa'i/ /nyon mongs rnam mang thams cad med par 'gyur/ /de yi nyon mongs nye ba rab tu spangs/ /'di ltar
241a4(mdo sde): des ni lus kyi sdom pa bslabs/ /de la mtshon cha dang ni mes mi tshugs/ /de ltar de yi lus ni bzung du med/ /de ni bzhi ba rab zhi ting 'dzin gnas/ /'di ltar des ni lus kyi sdom pa
241a5(mdo sde): bslabs/ /de ltar gnas pa 'jigs med skrag pa med/ /de la 'khrug sems mi skye phrag dog med/ /lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra sus bslabs pa/ /de ni gtse ba kun las thar pa yin/ /
241a6(mdo sde): dug dang mtshon gyis nam yang mi 'jigs shing / /me dang chu yi nang na'ang 'jigs pa med/ /lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra sus bslabs pa/ /de ni gtse ba kun las thar pa yin/ /chom rkun
241a7(mdo sde): g.yon can sdig pa byed pa dang / /sprul gdug nang du song yang 'jigs med de/ /'di ltar de ni bdag tu 'du shes med/ /'du shes rnam par grol la 'jigs mi 'byung / /'jigs
241b1(mdo sde): las rnam par grol ba skrag mi skye/ /skrag pa med la g.yo ba mi 'byung ste/ /mi g.yo ba la skrag pa ga la yod/ /de ni bdud rnams bye bas bskyod mi nus/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
241b2(mdo sde): phan pa'i phyir/ /sdom pa gang spyod bshad cing rab bstan pa/ /'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa sus bslabs pa/ /de ni bdud rnams bye bas bskyod mi nus/ /chos rnams kun la ye shes thogs
241b3(mdo sde): pa med/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su tshang / /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi ri mo dag /sdom par gnas la rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab
241b4(mdo sde): cing | |tshad kyang med par rtogs par su 'dod pa/ /'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa des slobs shig /'jig rten thams cad kyi yang mchod rten 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas stobs bcu mnga' ba
241b5(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab/ /drang srong chen po'i chos 'di gang 'dod pa/ /des ni lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra slobs/ /gang slob de la stobs rnams rnyed mi dka'/ /'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom la gang slob pa/ /
241b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres bco brgyad po/ /rgyal ba gang la rab tu gnas pa yang / /de dag de la rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/ /'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa gang slob pa/ /drang srong chen po'i byang chub
241b7(mdo sde): yan lag bdun/ /so so yang dag rig dang rdzu 'phrul rkang / /de la de dag rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang ni bsam gtan dang / /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams gang
242a1(mdo sde): bshad dang / /bde ba'i rnam rtog rab tu dben pa yang / /sdom par gnas pa la ni rnyed mi dka'/ /lus kyi sdom pa la ni gang gnas pa/ /snying rje'i gnas
242a2(mdo sde): dang btang snyoms thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin spyod pa 'jug pa byams pa'i mchog /'gro ba kun la'ang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur/ /dran pa nyer gzhag yang dag spong ba dang / /drang
242a3(mdo sde): srong chen po'i dbang lnga stobs lnga dang / /'phags pa'i lam mchog yan lag brgyad po yang / /lus kyi sdom par gnas la rnyed mi dka'/ /gzhan yang dam pa sangs rgyas chos rnams
242a4(mdo sde): ni| |bsam gyis mi khyab gang la tshad med pa/ /lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra sus bslabs pa/ /de la thams cad rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/ /'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa thos nas ni/ /rgyal
242a5(mdo sde): po glang mchog khyad par thob gyur te/ /dga' ba mtshungs med rangs shing mgu ba skyes/ /rgyal ba de yi bstan la rab tu byung / /rab tu de byung lo yang bye brag bcur/ /tshangs par spyod
242a6(mdo sde): mchog gtsang ma spyad par gyur/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la yang bsgom pa byas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas la shin tu bsgom byas pas/ /
242a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu mthong bar gyur/ /de las lhag par gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /des ni tshangs spyod mchog 'di rab tu spyad/ /thams cad kyi yang bstan par rab byung ste/ /tshangs par
242b1(mdo sde): spyod pa bzang zhing dag par spyad/ /mang du thos shing spobs par ldan pa yi/ /dge slong chos smra ba yang mchog tu gyur/ /lus kyi sdom pa 'di ni rab shes na/ /tshul khrims ma dral tshul
242b2(mdo sde): khrims skyon med 'gyur/ /tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims 'dres pa med/ /'phags pa'i tshul khrims zag pa med la gnas/ /de tshe rgyal po glang mchog khyad par sems/ /gzhon
242b3(mdo sde): nu gzhan zhig yin par sems gyur na/ /de ni gzhan zhig yin par mi blta ste/ /nga ni spyad pa spyod tshe der gyur to/ /de phyir gzhon nu nga yi rjes slobs la/ /lus kyi sdom pa 'di la gnas
242b4(mdo sde): par gyis/ /srog chags bye ba gzhan la'ang rab ston dang / /ring por mi thogs ji bzhin nga 'drar 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/
242b5(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ de lta bas na lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub
242b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal ba dag la mi 'jigs/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan song dag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur
242b7(mdo sde): ro| |chus mi 'jigs/ mes mi 'jigs/ dug dang / mtshon dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dred dang / bal glang dang / glang khyu ba dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis 'jigs par mi
243a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong gsum gyi stong pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
243a2(mdo sde): 'di lag mthil du bzhag ste/ ta la gcig tsam mam/ ta la gnyis tsam mam/ ta la gsum tsam mam/ ta la bzhi tsam mam/ ta la lnga tsam mam/ ta la drug tsam mam/ ta
243a3(mdo sde): la bdun tsam du steng du 'phen to/ /ji tsam du 'dod pa de tsam du'ang 'phen to/ /gzhan yang / gzhon nu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
243a4(mdo sde): chen po ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams yongs su bzung zhing dben pas
243a5(mdo sde): dben par gyur te/ thams cad du rjes su song zhing de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas zag pa med pa'i bsod nams yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la thogs
243a6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i mig tu gyur pas de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de la rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na/ gang 'grub pa dang / smon pa dang / 'byor pa dang / yongs su rdzogs
243a7(mdo sde): pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul zhes bya'o/ /de la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa mang po
243b1(mdo sde): myong bar byed pa yin te/ gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur/ mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur/ /snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar yang 'gyur/ rtsig pa la'ang thad kar 'gro/ ra ba
243b2(mdo sde): la'ang thad kar 'gro / ri la'ang mi thogs par 'gro /nam mkha' la'ang 'gro ste/ dper na/ 'dab chags bya bzhin no/ /sa la'ang steng du 'byung ba dang / byi'u zla byed de/ dper na/ chu
243b3(mdo sde): la bya ba bzhin no/ |chu la'ang mi nub par 'gro ste/ dper na/ sa'i phung po chen po la bya ba bzhin no/ /du ba 'thul bar yang byed/ 'bar bar yang byed de/ dper na/ me'i phung po chen po bzhin
243b4(mdo sde): no| |bdag gi lus las chu'i rgyun chen po khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'byin te/ dper na/ sprin chen po bzhin no/ /chu'i rgyun de dag gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten
243b5(mdo sde): gyi khams 'di bsregs shing rab tu 'tshig ste/ mes rab tu 'bar zhing 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa zhi bar byed do/ /zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che
243b6(mdo sde): ba| 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba yang lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sems can rnams la lus kyis dbang bsgyur ro/ /de nas yang bcom
243b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sa la byi'u zul byed cing steng byung byed/ /chu dag la yang thogs pa med par 'gro /bya bzhin nam mkha'i ngos la
244a1(mdo sde): 'gro bar byed/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni dud 'thul 'bar bar byed/ /ji ltar bar snang la ni rlung mi thogs/ /sprin gyi phung po mang po 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin
244a2(mdo sde): rnal 'byor ba yang nam mkha' la/ /rlung dang sprin bzhin du ni thogs med 'gro /zhing rnams me yis tshig cing 'bar ba dag /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas de mthong nas/ /
244a3(mdo sde): des ni rang gi lus las chu phyung ste/ /phye ba snyed kyi zhing de zhi bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa 'dug bzhin du/ /nyi zla la ni lag pas yongs su 'dzin/ /des ni tshangs
244a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten nyer rig nas/ /tshangs pa'i phye ba dag la chos ston byed/ /gang tshe de ni chos ston 'dod gyur na/ /stong gsum chen po des ni go bar byed/ /'dod na de ni zhing mang
244a5(mdo sde): bye bar yang / /srog chags bye ba mang la chos rnams ston/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na lus kyi spyod
244a6(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
244a7(mdo sde): chen po ni lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis sgra rnams lha'i dbang / mi'i dang / sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kyi dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
244b1(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi sgra nye ba'am rgyang ring po'ang thos so/ /gzhan yang / gzhon nu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
244b2(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stan pa la 'dug bzhin du lha'i sna'i dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
244b3(mdo sde): khams na lha'i yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dri ji snyed yod pa nye'ang rung rgyang ring po'ang rung ste de dag thams cad tshor ro/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
244b4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i
244b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang spyod pa sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
244b6(mdo sde): te| 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyang 'dod chags
244b7(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bcas pa dang /
245a1(mdo sde): gti mug dang bral pa dang / sred pa dang bcas pa dang / sred pa dang bral ba dang / len pa dang bcas pa dang / len pa dang bral ba dang / bsdus pa dang /
245a2(mdo sde): g.yengs pa dang / log pa dang / ma log pa dang / chen por gyur pa dang / chen por gyur pa ma yin pa dang / 'od gsal ba dang / 'od gsal ba ma yin pa dang / tshad dang bcas pa
245a3(mdo sde): dang | tshad med pa dang / bla na yod pa dang / bla na med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa ma yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol
245a4(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nyon mongs pa med
245a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyang nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gzhon nu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
245a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ni sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ skye ba gcig kyang rjes su dran/ gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang /
245a7(mdo sde): sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / skye ba brgya'ang rjes su dran no/ /skye ba stong dang / skye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du'ang rjes su dran
245b1(mdo sde): no| |sdud pa'i bskal pa dang / 'byung ba'i bskal pa'ang rjes su dran no/ /sdud pa dang / 'byung ba'i bskal pa du ma'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa'ang rjes su dran no/ /bskal
245b2(mdo sde): pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no/ /sngon gyi mtha' bya ba'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no/ /
245b3(mdo sde): bdag sngon che ge mo zhig tu skyes te/ ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ kha dog ni 'di 'dra/ zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ 'tsho ba ni 'di 'dra/ tshe ni 'di
245b4(mdo sde): tsam zhig tu thub/ yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong / de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyas te/ de nas kyang shi 'phos nas
245b5(mdo sde): 'dir skyes so/ /zhes rnam pa dang bcas pa dang / yul phyogs dang bcas pa dang / gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma yang dag par rjes su dran no/ /
245b6(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang /
245b7(mdo sde): skye bo dang / kha dog bzang ba dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gror song ba dang / ngan 'gror song ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / bzang 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i
246a1(mdo sde): sems can las bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang
246a2(mdo sde): ldan| ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan te/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa/ log par lta ba dag log par lta ba yang dag par 'dzin pa'i
246a3(mdo sde): rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/ /sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis legs
246a4(mdo sde): par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/ 'phags pa rnams la mi skur ba yang dag par lta ba dag yang dag pa lta ba yang dag par bzung ba'i rgyus lus
246a5(mdo sde): zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skyes so zhes de ltar lha'i mig rna par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang /
246a6(mdo sde): kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gror song ba dang / ngan 'gror song ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / bzang 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro
246a7(mdo sde): ba'i sems can las bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gzhon nu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
246b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po ni skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis gang cung zad shes par bya ba dang / blta bar bya ba dang / mnyan par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya
246b2(mdo sde): ba dang / rnam par 'phrul bar bya ba de thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /thos so/ /mthong ngo / /rtogs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs
246b3(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi/ /mngon par shes pa'i rim pa bstan/ /ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas na/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes
246b4(mdo sde): kyang bya/ /de dag rna ba rnam sbyong ste/ /lha yi rnam pa bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad pa yi/ /chos rnams de yis thos par 'gyur/ /stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams
246b5(mdo sde): dag na/ /lha yi dri rnams ji snyed yod pa kun/ /lha yi sna yis ji ltar 'dug bzhin du/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de snom byed/ /'dod chags bcas dang 'dod chags med
246b6(mdo sde): pa dang / /zhe sdang bcas dang zhe sdang bral ba dang / /gti mug bcas dang gti mug bral ba yi/ /sems rnams srog chags kun gyi rab tu shes/ /bskal pa bye ba stong du ni/ /gang
246b7(mdo sde): da de dag sngon gnas pa/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams rab tu shes/ /de dag la ni thogs pa med/ /de dag mig kyang rnam sbyong ste/ /bla na med pa'i lha yi mig /des ni sems can skye ba
247a1(mdo sde): dang | |'chi 'phro de dag rab tu mthong / /skad cig gcig dang ldan pa yi/ /shes rab kyis ni tshe rabs kun/ /chos rnams la ni shes bya ba/ /ci
247a2(mdo sde): yod pa yang yang dag shes/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na ngag gi sdo pas bsdam par bya'o zhes
247a3(mdo sde): khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ de la ngag gi sdom pa gang zhe na/ ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa drug
247a4(mdo sde): cu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs thogs pa med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu/ dag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /ngag gi sdom pa
247a5(mdo sde): gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig btsun pa thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu/ ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas
247a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu/ ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /ngag gi sdom pa gang dang
