322a2(mdo sde): gcod pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i skye mched thams cad la dngos po dang / dngos po med pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
322a3(mdo sde): lag ces bya'o/ /gang gzugs la rnam par bltas nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag sgrib pa med pa'i rkyen dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
322a4(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad gcig tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /gang gzugs la dngos po med
322a5(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du mngon du yang dag par rtog pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / rab tu 'dzin pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rnam
322a6(mdo sde): par 'byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa dang / ye shes dang / ye shes la mnyam pa nyid dang / thob pa'i chos thams cad mi skyed pa dang / rgyu ba med pa dang / ting
322a7(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams skye ba med pa'i mtha' dang thob pa rnams mi 'tshol ba de ni btang snyoms
322b1(mdo sde): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /gang gzugs mthong nas khams dang skye mched rnams la dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du mthong zhing yan lag dang yan lag med
322b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam rnams lam med pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang mi 'grogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam rnams dang lta bar gyur
322b3(mdo sde): pa thams cad mtshan nyid med par gcig pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang mi 'grogs pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad mthong
322b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba zhes bya ba dang / mi skye ba thob pa'i tshul gyis lam zhes bya ba'am/ mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
322b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / lam dang lam ma yin pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis lam zhes bya ba de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o/ /gang gzugs la rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog
322b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ dngos por mi rtog pa dang / dngos po med par mi rtog pa dang / chad par mi rtog pa dang / rtag par mi rtog pa dang / skye bar mi rtog pa
322b7(mdo sde): dang / mi skye bar mi rtog pa dang / rtog pa dang / mi rtog pa la mi rtog pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la mi rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog
323a1(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gzugs la chos thams cad brjod du med pa dang / brjod pa med pa dang / dbyangs dang / dbyangs med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / ming
323a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / ming du brjod pa med pa dang / 'tshol ba med pa dang / lam gyi yan lag ma yin pa dang / yang dag pa zhes bya ba ngag gi lam thams cad la kun tu mi rgyu zhing mi brjod
323a3(mdo sde): pa dang / lam zhes bya ba'i chos ma lus pa brjod pa de ni yang dag pa'i dag ces bya'o/ /gang gzugs la las thams cad kyi rang bzhin la las med par mngon par zhen pa 'di
323a4(mdo sde): lta ste| mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mngon par zhen pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa thob pa rnams la 'tshol ba med pa dang / yang dag pa 'tshol ba'am/ log
323a5(mdo sde): pa 'tshol ba'am/ log pa ma yin pa 'tshol ba'am/ las 'tshol ba'am/ las ma yin pa 'tshol ba'am/ las dang / las ma yin pa thams cad khas mi len pa de ni nges pa
323a6(mdo sde): dang ma nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid dang / log pa nyid dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / lam dang / lam
323a7(mdo sde): ma yin pa mtha' yas pa skye ba med pas bsdus pa dang / mig yor lta bu'i tshul gyis las kyi mtha' thams cad mi byed pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' zhes bya'o/ /gang
323b1(mdo sde): gzugs la kun tu longs spyod pa dang / kun tu longs spyod pa ma yin pa shes pa dang / de la gnas pa chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag pa dang / log pa'i tshor ba
323b2(mdo sde): mi dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pas 'tsho ba dang / las 'jig pa de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya ste/ yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go /'tsho ba zhes
323b3(mdo sde): bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i tshig go / lam zhes bya ba dang / lam ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni mi 'tshol ba'i don gyis lam zhes bya'o/ /'tsho ba dang / 'tsho ba ma yin pa'i 'du
323b4(mdo sde): shes la rnam par mi rtog pa'i don gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/ /yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don te/ de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/ /
323b5(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis gang gzugs la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rtsol ba med pa ni chos kyi dbyings la rtsol ba med pa ste/ yang dag pa zhes bya ba
323b6(mdo sde): de ni mi skye ba la gnas pa'i chos rnams blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i
323b7(mdo sde): tshig go / lam zhes bya ba de ni blang ba med pa dang / dor pa med pa'i tshul dang / mi 'tshol ba'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i don 'tshol ba ste/ de ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes
324a1(mdo sde): bya'o| |gang gzugs la dran pas mi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid ni dran pa med pa dran pa med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa la sbyor ba ste/ yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni dmigs
324a2(mdo sde): pa med pa mnyam pa nyid sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig go / dran pa zhes bya ba de ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rjes su dran pa'i tshig go /stong pa nyid rjes su dran pa'i tshig
324a3(mdo sde): dang | mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rjes su dran pa'i tshig dang / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin lhun gyis grub pa'i rjes su dran pa'i tshig de ni yang
324a4(mdo sde): dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gzugs la dbyer med pa shes pa ni mnyam pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi las yang dag par bsgrubs pa ste/ gzugs gang dang mnyam pa tshor
324a5(mdo sde): pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de dang mnyam zhing / phung po gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /
324a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam par yang
324a7(mdo sde): dag par rjes su mthong ba chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gang dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su
324b1(mdo sde): mthong ba byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad gang dang mnyam par yang dag par
324b2(mdo sde): rjes su mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa 'das pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang de
324b3(mdo sde): dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /
324b4(mdo sde): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ji lta ba bzhin du las dang / rnam par smin pa'ang de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ dus gsum mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs
324b5(mdo sde): la zhugs pa de ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /gang gzugs la de kho na shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid shes pa de ni bden pa shes pa ste/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gang
324b6(mdo sde): yin pa de ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rang bzhin no/ /chos nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi rang bzhin med par bden pa nyid du
324b7(mdo sde): mos so/ /byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba de ni slu ba med pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi slu ba gang yin pa de ni bden pa'i phyir ro/ /de la gnas pa ni yang
325a1(mdo sde): dag pa'i smon lam brjod pa dang / las yang dag par spyod pa mngon sum du 'gyur te/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag la de bzhin gshegs
325a2(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston par byin gyis rlob bo/ /sa'i bden pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa chu dang / me dang / rlung gi bden pa nyid kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /nam mkha'
325a3(mdo sde): dang / chos dang / sgra dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / mtshan nyid dang bcas pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / chags pa dang bcas pa dang / chags pa ma yin pa dang / bsdus pa'i bskal
325a4(mdo sde): pa dang / rgya che ba'i bskal pa dang / grangs yod pa'i bskal pa dang / grangs med pa'i bskal pa dang / sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa dang / sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i
325a5(mdo sde): bskal pa dang / 'das pa'i bskal pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa'i bskal pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa'i bskal
325a6(mdo sde): pa dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa'ang de dang mnyam ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bskal pa la rnam par byang ba'i bskal pa dang / rnam par
325a7(mdo sde): byang ba'i bskal pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bskal pa dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi bskal pa la mnyam pa nyid kyi bskal pa 'jug ste/ 'jug pa shes pa de la mngon par zhen
325b1(mdo sde): pa med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings bden pa nyid kyi phyir bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ste/ gzugs nyid bden pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
325b2(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa nyid bden pa'o/ /de la gnas pa'i bden pa'i ngag gang yin pa de ni byin gyi rlabs te/ de ni bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/ /gang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis
325b3(mdo sde): gang gzugs la 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / gtong ba dang / dor ba de ni gtong ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/ /gang gzugs la blang ba med pa dang /
325b4(mdo sde): dor ba med pa shes pa de ni g.yo ba dang / 'gul ba thams cad zhi ba'o/ /byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba ni zhi ba de la gnas nas kun nas nyon mongs pa ni rnam par byang bar byin gyis rlob pa
325b5(mdo sde): dang | rnam par byang ba ni kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyi rlob pa dang / zhi ba de la gnas nas spyod lam kun tu bstan pas tshangs pa nye bar zhi ba'i spyod lam can rnams kyang
325b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa skyed pa dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan pas ma zhi ba'i spyod lam can rnams sam/ bdud thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs la mos par byed
325b7(mdo sde): pa'o| |nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad shin tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba ste/ nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par yang dag
326a1(mdo sde): par rjes su mthong ba de ni nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/ /gang gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs la chos kyi dbyings dang
326a2(mdo sde): dbyer med par shes shing spros pa dang bral ba'i shes rab kyis shin tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / spros pa med pa'i chos thams cad phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
326a3(mdo sde): thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa de ni shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/ /yang na byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rjes su
326a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi gnas te/ de'i phyir bdag gis lus 'dom gang tsam po 'di la 'jig rten gdags par bya'o/ /'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten 'gog pa dang / 'jig rten
326a5(mdo sde): 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar yang gdags par bya'o snyam pa ste/ de ni shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
326a6(mdo sde): 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi
326a7(mdo sde): stobs du zhig dang ldan na rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di thob/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon
326b1(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs sum cu rtsa drug dang ldan na/
326b2(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob ste/ sum cu rtsa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / smon
326b3(mdo sde): lam rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / yongs su bsngo ba rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / thos
326b4(mdo sde): pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / cho ga dang / spyod yul rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / dran
326b5(mdo sde): pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / thabs la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / sems can la dmigs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi
326b6(mdo sde): stobs dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / gtong ba rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / sems can rjes su 'dzin pa rnam
326b7(mdo sde): par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / byams pa chen po yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / snying rje chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi
327a1(mdo sde): stobs dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /
327a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyis rjes su 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / bzod pas rjes su 'dzin pa rnam par dag
327a3(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus yang dag par len pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi
327a4(mdo sde): stobs dang / khams la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / bsam gtan la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / zhi gnas la mkhas
327a5(mdo sde): pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / thos pa rnam par nges pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /
327a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par nges pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / shes pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / 'dus byas
327a7(mdo sde): dang / 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba rnam par
327b1(mdo sde): dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / mi skye ba la bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi
327b2(mdo sde): stobs dang / don dam pa dang / kun rdzob rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus tshad med pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs te/ 'jam
327b3(mdo sde): dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs sum cu rtsa drug po de dag dang ldan na rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting
327b4(mdo sde): nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/ /'jam dpal/ yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal
327b5(mdo sde): par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
327b6(mdo sde): dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams la lha'i zas dang / lha'i ras bcos bu'i na bza' rnams phul ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
327b7(mdo sde): rdal phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos rab tu bkang ste dbul ba phul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyir yang nor
328a1(mdo sde): bu rin po che snang ba thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i mchod rten tshad dzam+bu'i gling tsam du yod pa/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug pa/ nor bu rin po che
328a2(mdo sde): glog gi sgron ma'i kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra ba bres pa/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba/ tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas
328a3(mdo sde): bskus pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/ mchod rten re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis bskal par
328a4(mdo sde): lha'i mchod pa mtshungs pa med par byas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang gis dad pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la mos nas/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i
328a5(mdo sde): sems can la zan chang gcig tsam byin na bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /
328a6(mdo sde): stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub
328a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di la dad de/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
328b1(mdo sde): l a bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur byas pa bas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan ting nge 'dzin 'di la mchog tu 'jug na de de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par
328b2(mdo sde): skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis bskal pa khrir dkon mchog gsum la dbul ba phul ba bas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang gis rab
328b3(mdo sde): tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming thos te/ thos nas kyang than yud tsam zhig nyan 'dod par gyur na de de bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par byed
328b4(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /dran pa ldan zhing blo gros
328b5(mdo sde): ldan| |shes rab ldan pa mi 'jigs pa/ /de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes pa/ /skad cig gcig la mnyes
328b6(mdo sde): byed na/ /gang dag ngas ni sngon bshad pa/ /mi khom brgyad rnams rnam par spong / /gzugs dang kha dog phun sum tshogs/ /mtshan rnams kyis kyang legs par brgyan/ /mthu
328b7(mdo sde): stobs dang yang rab tu ldan/ /le lo 'dod par yong mi 'gyur/ /skyid cing nor yang chen por 'gyur/ /bsod nams ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jig rten snang byed mthong
329a1(mdo sde): nas kyang / /phyi phyir zhing ni mchod pa byed/ /bdag med stong pa thos nas kyang / /de ni chos la mi rmongs te/ /chos rnams ji bzhin mkhas pa ni/ /dad pa
329a2(mdo sde): myur du rab tu thob| / rigs kyi mchog dang mod pa dang / /skyid pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /sbyin pa'i bdag po dpa' bor 'gyur/ /ser sna med cing lhug par gtong / /gang dag
329a3(mdo sde): la la 'dzam gling du/ /khyad par 'phags pa mdzes par rigs/ /der ni brten pa skyes pa dang / /smad pa'i 'gro ba ma yin dang / /skye ba kun tu 'di lta bur/ /khyim bdag dbang
329a4(mdo sde): cher grags pa dang / /dpal dang gzi brjid 'phags pa yang / /tshul 'dir yi rang spyad par 'gyur/ /bram ze sA la che 'dra ba/ /tshul khrims ldan dang mang thos 'gyur/ /rgyal rigs sA la che 'dra ba/ /skyid
329a5(mdo sde): cing nor yang chen por 'gyur/ /bsod nams mdzod kyis 'phags pa yi/ /rgyal po rdzu 'phrul cher 'gyur te/ /rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas kyi/ /sa la chos kyi ston par
329a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /rin chen bdun gyi dbang phyug che/ /'khor los bsgyur ba rgyal dbang 'gyur/ /rgyal por gnas nas sangs rgyas la/ /phyi phyir bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ /shi
329a7(mdo sde): 'phos nas ni mtho ris 'gro / sangs rgyas bstan la dad par 'gyur/ /ri rab rtse mo'i dbang phyug po/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin 'gyur/ /lha dbang 'thab bral rab tu 'gyur//
329b1(mdo sde): de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'gyur/ /lha dbang rab tu 'phrul ba dang / /dbang byed 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /tshul 'dir yi rang byas pa ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa'i
329b2(mdo sde): mchog mkhas pa lha rnams bye ba yis/ /mchod pa bye ba'i dbang phyug 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde dkon mchog 'dir/ /phyi phyir rjes su yi rang na/ /sus kyang de yi yon tan mtha'/ /
329b3(mdo sde): brjod par nus pa ma yin no/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na/ /bskal ba bye ba rnams su yang / /nam du'ang long theng mi 'gyur te/ /ston pa bla na med par 'gyur/ /rtswa shing ri
329b4(mdo sde): dang sdong po dang / /'khri shing sman yang de bzhin te/ /me tog 'bras ldan ljon shing yang / /gang du 'gro bar 'dud par 'gyur/ /mar me mdzad nas bzung nas su/ /brtul
329b5(mdo sde): zhugs bzang po gang 'gro ba/ /phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten khams/ /mtha' yas 'od kyis snang bar byed/ /gang dag 'das pa'i bar de dang / /gang dag ma 'ongs
329b6(mdo sde): shing rnams kyi/ /me tog 'bras bu lo ma dag /de dag rnam par shes par nus/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang / /khrag khrig phrag brgya rnams kyis kyang / /de dag gi ni
329b7(mdo sde): yon tan mtha'/ /brjod par nus pa ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ni/ /mdo 'di phyir zhing mos byed pa/ /de yi bsngags pa'i phreng ba yi/ /mtha' ma brjod
330a1(mdo sde): bar mi nus so/ /mdo sde yon tan gang brjod pa/ /de dag thams cad de dang ldan/ /de bas rab tu lhag yod de/ /de yi yon tan mtha' thug
330a2(mdo sde): med| |mi gang de la dga' bar mi byed cing / /yod pa min dang bsngags pa mi smra dang / /mi gang khros nas mi snyan smra ba 'am/ yang na de la 'khrugs pa byed pa dag /
330a3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar skye 'gyur te/ /lus ni chen por gyur nas su/ /de ni sdug bsngal myong 'gyur te/ /yid rab mi bde ma rung 'gyur/ /dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad
330a4(mdo sde): tsam du/ /da yi lus ni skye bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i las kyis rtag tu yang / /bye bas bskor nas za bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa dag ni du mar yang / /lus ni dpag tshad
330a5(mdo sde): lnga brgyar 'gyur/ /de la mgo yang lnga brgya ste/ /de las nyung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mgo rnams re re dag la yang / /lnga brgya'i lce las mi nyung ste/ /lce gcig la yang
330a6(mdo sde): thong gshol ni/ /lnga brgyar tshang ste mi nyung ba/ /'bar bas de la rmo byed de/ /skur 'debs sdig pa'i las kyis so/ /tshig rtsub dag ni smras pas na/ /shin tu tsha bar
330a7(mdo sde): sreg par 'gyur/ /gang dag sdom par mi byed cing / /byang chub sems dpa' gnod byed pa/ /de ni sems can dmyal skye ste/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'gro bar 'gyur//
330b1(mdo sde): tshul 'di spong bar byed pa ni/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang / /brgya dang khrag khrig rnams su yang / /mnar med par ni sdug bsngal rnyed/ /de nas shi 'phes rab gdug
330b2(mdo sde): cing / /shin tu mi bzad sprul du 'gyur/ /bkres shing skom pas mngon gzir kyang / /shin tu mi bzad las rnams byed/ /bza' ba rnyed kyang sdig pa yis/ /nam yang
330b3(mdo sde): tshim par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te de nas shi 'phos nas/ /mi yi nang du skye na yang / /yid mi gzhungs shing dmus long 'gyur/ /gnod par sems shing sdom pa med/ /
330b4(mdo sde): nyes pa'i tshig rnams smras nas ni/ /'phags pa mnyes par mi byed pa/ /mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/ /slar yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba stong
330b5(mdo sde): rnams su/ /nam yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' la/ /gnod par mi byed rab bsdams dang / /gang zhig chos dang ldan pa yi/ /chos
330b6(mdo sde): smra de dag srung byed pa/ /ngan 'gro rnams ni kun spangs nas/ /brgya byin rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/ /tshangs pa 'thab bral dga' ldan dang / /dbang byed par yang de 'gyur
330b7(mdo sde): ro| |gal te mir ni gyur na yang / /rtag tu 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /tshong dpon dang ni khyim bdag 'gyur/ /rtag tu skyid cing nor cher 'gyur/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i
331a1(mdo sde): bye snyed kyi/ /bskal pa de snyed rtag tu yang / /'jigs med dran pa phun sum tshogs/ /bde dang ldan zhing gnod pa med/ /tshe rabs tshe rabs
331a2(mdo sde): phyi phyir zhing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod par 'gyur/ /blo ldan gang zhig sangs rgyas la/ /bskal pa de snyed mchod pa bas/ /phyi dus chos ni 'jig pa na/ /gang dag mdo sde
331a3(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin pa/ /chos gang 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /bstan pa'i mdo sde 'di la des/ /nyin zhag gcig tu bzung ba yi/ /de ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ /phyogs
331a4(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa/ /de dag kun la mchod par 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'di 'dra 'dzin pa ni/ /gang dag ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang / /'das pa'i sangs rgyas
331a5(mdo sde): gang dag dang / /de dag de yis mchod par 'gyur/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin
331a6(mdo sde): la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba skyed dam/ 'dum par mi byed dam/ brnyas thabs gang yang rung bas brnyas te/ ngan
331a7(mdo sde): pa'i rigs su skyes pa zhe'am/ rnyed pa chung ba zhe'am/ yid gzhungs pa chung ba zhe'am/ shes rab chung ba brnyas sam ci'ang rung ste/ tshul khrims kyi yan lag
331b1(mdo sde): nyams pa zhe'am/ mdog ngan pa zhe'am/ gzugs dang mi ldan pa zhe'am/ gzi brjid chung ba zhes brnyas sam/ tha na yud tsam zhig khros te lta na'ang de mi dge ba'i las des
331b2(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa tshang par ngan song rnams su sreg par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ ngas ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i sems gcig bskyed
331b3(mdo sde): pa las kha na ma tho ba che ba'i chos de lta bu gcig kyang ma mthong ngo / /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
331b4(mdo sde): gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la mtshon gyis btab bam/ dbyug pas brdegs pa bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis theg pa chen po la mos
331b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la tha na gnod sems sam/ tha ba'am/ zhe sdang gi sems gcig bskyed dam/ khros te brnyas pa'i sems bskyed na de de bas sdig pa ches mang
331b6(mdo sde): du skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa'am/ brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa ji tsam pa de snyed kyi bskal par
331b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' des sems can dmyal ba rnams su gnas par go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa btab pa ma gtogs par/
332a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan gang gis kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che rdo
332a2(mdo sde): rje ni rdo rje nyid ma gtogs par shing ngam/ bong ba'am/ dbyug pa'am/ rdo ba'am/ mtshan chas gcag par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
332a3(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa btab pa ma gtogs par las gzhan gyis log par ltung bar byed mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
332a4(mdo sde): mo gang la las lha'i bskal pa bye bar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'khor bzhi la ci 'dod pa sbyin pa byin pa bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
332a5(mdo sde): gzhan gyis mthun par bya ba'i don du g.yos de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni g.yung drung ngo zhes tshig tu smra na'ang de de bas ches bsod nams
332a6(mdo sde): grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la las lha'i lo stong du dkon mchog gsum la ci dgos pa byin pa pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
332a7(mdo sde): gang gzhan zhig tha na se gol gtogs pa srid du 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal pa'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni stong pa'o/ /
332b1(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/ /snyam du dpyod na de de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed do/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu brgyad stong ni byang chub
332b2(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed do/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya ni theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par
332b3(mdo sde): gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las kyi
332b4(mdo sde): phyir steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams kyi char chen po'ang rab tu bab bo/ /tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i spos kyi char chen
332b5(mdo sde): po'ang mngon par rab tu bab bo/ /gos kyi char dang / rin po che'i char dang / rgyan gyi char chen po'ang rab tu bab bo/ /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med brjod du med pa'i rdul
332b6(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
332b7(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lag pa mngon par sprul te/ lag pa re res kyang lha'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal
333a1(mdo sde): du med pa'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / ba dan gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i sprin dang / rgyan gyi sprin
333a2(mdo sde): dang | seng ge'i rgyal mtshan zla ba'i sprin dang / nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad bsags pa'i sprin dang / nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi rnam
333a3(mdo sde): grangs 'di la mchod do/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la'ang gtor cing mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs par gsungs so/ /bde
333a4(mdo sde): bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten du yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye
333a5(mdo sde): ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/
333a6(mdo sde): brjod du med pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dang / mnad ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / yid dga' dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / ta ra Ni dang / ba la la ki dang /
333a7(mdo sde): ko ta ra Ni dang / dri mchog dang / d+ha nu ska ri de ba dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po la sogs
333b1(mdo sde): pa lha'i me tog gi char chen po rab tu phab bo/ /lha'i gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char rab tu phab bo/ /lha'i tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i char dang / rin
333b2(mdo sde): po che sprin gyi char dang / rgyan gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab bo/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa grangs
333b3(mdo sde): med pas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dzam+bu'i gling gi tshad tsam gyi me tog gi sprin dang / gos kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab bo/ /
333b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med bsam
333b5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med pa dag gis kyang lha'i me tog gi char dang / spos dang / gos dang / rin po che'i char mngon par phab ste/ lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs
333b6(mdo sde): sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa byas nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs par gsungs so/ /bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs te/ kye ma'o/ /
333b7(mdo sde): bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/ /kye ma'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par gyur cig /ces smras so/ /bcom ldan
334a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs
334a2(mdo sde): med pa dag dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa dge bsnyen stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag dang / nyan thos chen po dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
334a3(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya phrag grangs med pa dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
334a4(mdo sde): bstod do/ /'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi
334a5(mdo sde): tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad
334a6(mdo sde): du| AR+ya mA yo pa ma sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas
334a7(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer wA ra Na sI na drang srong lhung ba
334b1(mdo sde): ri dwags kyi nags na/ dgra bcom pa nyi khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
334b2(mdo sde): po seng ge'i seng ge dang / seng ge'i blo gros dang / legs par gnas pa'i blo gros dang / dpe med blo gros dang / sa 'dzin dang / mes byin dang / chu lha dang / dkon mchog
334b3(mdo sde): 'byung gnas dang / phug spas dang / bzang skyong dang / glog lha dang / rnam par snang byed dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / ye shes 'byung gnas dang / brtson
334b4(mdo sde): pa mi gtong dang / mthong ba don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /lha'i bu
334b5(mdo sde): mtshams bzang dang legs par gnas pa'i blo gros la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa nyi khri dang yang thabs gcig go / de nas bcom
334b6(mdo sde): 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po stan las
334b7(mdo sde): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
335a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan
335a2(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
335a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas dris pa lung
335a4(mdo sde): bstan pa'i phyir/ rtag tu skabs phye'i/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris
335a5(mdo sde): shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
335a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
335a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing / ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji
335b1(mdo sde): l ta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa
335b2(mdo sde): dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das
335b3(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
335b4(mdo sde): po khyod ni 'di ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ste/ khyod
335b5(mdo sde): 'di ltar sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje par zhugs pas pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
335b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /
335b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan
336a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ chos gcig dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
336a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing ting nge 'dzin de thob ma
336a3(mdo sde): thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba
336a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na /
336a5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum pa thams cad la mi gnas pa yin te/ nang ngam phyi rol la gnas par mi byed do/ /de gnas
336a6(mdo sde): pa med pas yang dag pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa mthong bas yang dag pa la sbyor bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa la sbyor bas ci la'ang blo thogs par mi 'gyur ro//
336a7(mdo sde): de blo thogs pa med pas yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod do/ /yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/
336b1(mdo sde): chos gang yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin no/ /chos thams cad ni rkyen las 'byung ba ste/ rkyen med par 'byung ba'i chos ni gang yang med do/ /chos gang rten cing 'brel bar
336b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba de ni ma skyes pa'o/ /de ltar na chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa ste/ chos thams cad ma skyes par rtogs par gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa rtogs
336b3(mdo sde): pa 'thob bo/ /'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po dang / snying rje'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /de de ltar mos pas chos thams cad sgyu ma
336b4(mdo sde): lta bur rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad ni yongs su brtags pas sprul pa ste/ yongs su brtags pa de'ang shin tu stong pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong par rtogs pa de ni sgyu
336b5(mdo sde): ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul
336b6(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
336b7(mdo sde): ro| |de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
337a1(mdo sde): 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa gang la la dag 'khor 'dir 'dus pa lta mchis sam/
337a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ 'khor 'di na bsams bzhin du go cha bgos pa gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa skyes bu
337a3(mdo sde): dam pa drug cu yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa drug cu po dag sgyu ma lta
337a4(mdo sde): bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa
337a5(mdo sde): lags sam/ 'on te 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na'ang gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag kyang mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
337a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub kyi phyogs cha logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde
337a7(mdo sde): ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
337b1(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
337b2(mdo sde): po mthu chen thob ces bya ba dang gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin te/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzhan
337b3(mdo sde): dag nub bdun du 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
337b4(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
337b5(mdo sde): po ni mang du mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sgrim mi
337b6(mdo sde): 'tshal bar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ ji skad zer pa de de bzhin
337b7(mdo sde): te| de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag ni tshad med grangs med do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom
338a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs
338a2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji lta bu'i sems kyi mtshan ma bstan pas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi
338a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'ang 'jig
338a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di nas gda' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa legs par mdzad du gsol/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes
338a5(mdo sde): bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs
338a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lan thos pas/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi
338a7(mdo sde): khams bde ba can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'ang mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang rigs kyi bu'am
338b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang / der skyes ma thag tu bla na
338b2(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal
338b3(mdo sde): gyi snying pos gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba
338b4(mdo sde): chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri'i tshogs dang / shing ljon pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri btang gzung dang /
338b5(mdo sde): btang gzung chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po gang dag yod pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog
338b6(mdo sde): gi snang ba des khyab par gyur to/ /nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag kyang mig gi dbang po la snang bar
338b7(mdo sde): ma gyur to/ /nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong las thal nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de thams cad gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos
339a1(mdo sde): khyab par gyur to/ /de nas 'od de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi
339a2(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag btsal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der
339a3(mdo sde): skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing de bzhin
339a4(mdo sde): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis
339a5(mdo sde): bltas pa de'ang mthong ste/ dper na/ skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa ltar mthong nas/ de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher skyes te/ bcom ldan
339a6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams
339a7(mdo sde): mi mjed 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gang dag 'dus pa dge slong dang / dge
339b1(mdo sde): ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
339b2(mdo sde): mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de dang /
339b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun/
339b4(mdo sde): gyis bltas te/ ri'i rgyal po bzhin du 'bar ba de dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang sa ler mthong ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pas
339b5(mdo sde): 'dom gang tsam gyi phyogs na skyes bu gcig shos kyi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sgrim mi dgos par mthong ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
339b6(mdo sde): 'di nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya
339b7(mdo sde): stong du mas gang ba yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa de'ang snang ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
340a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do/ /sangs
340a2(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing yang dag par bstan pa mdzad pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
340a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
340a4(mdo sde): su bsngo'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong
340a5(mdo sde): nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing
340a6(mdo sde): tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes kyang brjod do/ /
340a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i tshe/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam pa
340b1(mdo sde): drug tu 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/

340b5(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do/ /skyes bu dam pa de gnyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
340b6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de mthu brtan pa brnyes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar to/ /de ci'i
340b7(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i mtshan brjod
341a1(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis sems ma mchis pa'i dogs 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
341a2(mdo sde): dpag med kyis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

341a4(mdo sde): do| |sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang 'od des reg pas rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa de bzhin

341a6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos so/ /thos
341a7(mdo sde): nas kyang de dag thams cad 'dus nas mgrin gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de dag kyang bcom ldan
341b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par lung bstan to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

341b3(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i 'od 'di btang ba rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par ni/ bcom ldan

341b5(mdo sde): slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des 'di ltar yid du mchi ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od bkye ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni ci lags/

341b7(mdo sde): te| rgyu med rkyen med par bcom ldan 'das des 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi bkye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
342a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de/ deng byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rin
342a2(mdo sde): po che bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des chos bstan pa de'i snga ltas su 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / 'di ltar

342b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

342b4(mdo sde): dang | chos bstan pa de'ang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
342b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dang / gzhan dag na yod pa spangs nas/ smon lam dang / thugs rje chen pos sangs
342b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can der byung ste/ sems can dman pa la mos pa 'dod chags kyi shas che ba/ zhe sdang gi shas che ba/ gti mug gi shes che ba rnams kyi nang du/
342b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni dka' ba mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis tshig 'di smras ma thag

343a4(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi

343a7(mdo sde): po mthu chen thob| byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas dong ngo / /de
343b1(mdo sde): nas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag thams cad re re la'ang khang pa
343b2(mdo sde): brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sprul pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas so/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi
343b3(mdo sde): zug pa/ cha mnyam par legs par rnam par phye ba/ legs par zin pa sha stag go /khang pa brtsegs pa re re'ang 'phang du ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ rgyar ni dpag tshad brgyad
343b4(mdo sde): do| |khang pa brtsegs pa dag gser las byas pa dag kyang yod/ dngul las byas pa dag kyang yod/ bai DUR+ya las byas pa dag kyang yod/ shel las byas pa dag kyang yod/ mu tig
343b5(mdo sde): dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug las byas pa dag kyang yod do/ /rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / sna gnyis pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / sna
343b6(mdo sde): gsum pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / shel dang / sna bzhi ba dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / shel
343b7(mdo sde): dang / mu tig dmar po dang / sna lnga pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang /
344a1(mdo sde): sna drug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang /
344a2(mdo sde): rdo'i snying po dang / sna bdun pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ tsan+dan dmar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po las byas pa dag
344a3(mdo sde): kyang yod/ a ga ru dang / tsan+dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ a ga ru nag po dang / tsan+dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ tsan+dan thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs
344a4(mdo sde): pa dag kyang yod/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ sna ma'i me tog dang / paR+sha ka dang /
344a5(mdo sde): tsam+pa ka dang / skya snar dang / a ti mug+ta ka dang / ta ra ni dang / go ta ra ni las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog da nu ska ri las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs
344a6(mdo sde): pa dag kyang yod/ me tog mnad ra dang / mnad ra chen po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang /
344a7(mdo sde): many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / kun tu 'khor lo dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i
344b1(mdo sde): 'khor lo dang / me tog zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / zla ba mchog dang / s+tha la dang / s+tha la chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i s+tha la las byas
344b2(mdo sde): pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ kha dog du ma pa/ kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog brgya stong du ma
344b3(mdo sde): pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yongs su dag pa/ 'od gsal ba dag kyang yod do/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul te/ de na lha'i bu
344b4(mdo sde): mo kha cig gi lag na dung dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / glu dbyangs sgra snyan pa dang / gling bu dang / rgyud can pi wang dang /
344b5(mdo sde): pi wang rgyud gsum pa rnams thogs te/ sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra skad rnam pa mang po de lta bu len cing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan+dan dmar
344b6(mdo sde): po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi
344b7(mdo sde): phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru nag po dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan+dan thams cad kyi
345a1(mdo sde): phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po'i me tog gi phye ma'i phur ma
345a2(mdo sde): thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog man+dA ra dang / mnad ra chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po
345a3(mdo sde): dang / me tog mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / kun tu 'khor lo dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo
345a4(mdo sde): dang / me tog zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / zla ba mchog dang / s+tha la dang / s+tha la chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i s+tha la'i me tog gi
345a5(mdo sde): phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog thams cad dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i phur ma thogs
345a6(mdo sde): shing 'khod do/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa'i de bzhin
345a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang mu tig dkar po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / mu tig mthon ka'i mu tig gi phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi
345b1(mdo sde): stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i ras bcos bu'i rgyal mtshan gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to//
345b2(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang spos kyi phur ma brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang gdugs kha dog du ma pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog
345b3(mdo sde): brgya stong du ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ legs par las su byas pa/ dbyibs shin tu legs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang
345b4(mdo sde): shing ta la'i phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs
345b5(mdo sde): pa re rer yang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba gang dag rlung gis bskyod pa na 'di lta bu'i sgra dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i sil snyan yan lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan pa
345b6(mdo sde): m khas pa dag gis legs par blangs nas sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba brgyad khri bzhi
345b7(mdo sde): stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rdzing bu gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ bai DUR+ya dang / shel gyis spras pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi kha khyer gyis bskor ba/
346a1(mdo sde): me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ ngur pa sgra 'byin pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ bya
346a2(mdo sde): rog gis btung du rung bar mu dang kha da chad du gang ba dag sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor to/ /rin po
346a3(mdo sde): che'i skud pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kun nas dkris so/ /rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa re re'i 'od kyis kyang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du snang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin
346a4(mdo sde): du khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa dag so sor byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub
346a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa ji snyed yod pa/ khang pa
346a6(mdo sde): brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na bkod pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad khang pa brtsegs pa re rer mngon par sprul to/ /snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ khang
346a7(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa re rer yang de ltar bkod pa rnams mngon par sprul nas/ bkod pa de lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu
346b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las rkyong ba dang / brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam gyis de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig
346b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
346b3(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
346b4(mdo sde): byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan
346b5(mdo sde): pas shin tu lhag ga'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi 'od kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems
346b6(mdo sde): dpa' de gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
346b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig
347a1(mdo sde): tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis tshig mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
347a2(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /gzi brjid mtshungs med yon tan phung po gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong chen po kun mkhyen yon tan kun gyi pha rol
347a3(mdo sde): gshegs/ /thams cad zil gnon srid pa gsum gyi chags pa'i lam las 'das/ /shAkya khyu mchog dri bral zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma dri med lta bu'i sku
347a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnam par mdzes/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi go cha man bas gyur cing / /dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa 'jig rten kun tu gsal/ /mi
347a5(mdo sde): mchog khyod mtshungs 'jig rten gsum na gang yang yong ma mchis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yi 'od kyis gang tshe reg gyur pa/ /de tshe 'jig rten nyi ma zla ba nor bu zhugs
347a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa lha dang de bzhin mi ci rnams kyi 'od/ /snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du mog mog mi snang gsal ma mchis/ /rgyal ba zhing gcig na ni yang
347a7(mdo sde): dag bzhugs par gda' bzhin du/ /'gro ba'i don du skad cig gcig gis mtha' yas zhing du gshegs/ /ston pa'i bzhud dang byon pa 'tshal ba su'ang yod ma mchis//
347b1(mdo sde): mdzad pa dag dang 'dul ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can 'dul/ /spu yi khung gcig nang du mtha' yas zhing rnams ston mdzad kyang / /'phel ba dang ni bri bar gyur pa gang
347b2(mdo sde): yang yongs ma mchis/ /'di ni ji bzhin las dang byed pa rgyu dang 'bras gda' la/ /sems can rnams la gnod pa ma mchis 'dres par gyur ma mchis/ /gang na sems can
347b3(mdo sde): dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dwags ma mchis shing / /rgyal ba'i sras po grags pa chen po dag gis yongs gang la/ /mi khom brgyad po dag dang bral te mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i/ /
347b4(mdo sde): yongs dag zhing de dag kyang mi mchog la lar ston pa mdzad/ /lha mi gang dag mi 'jigs bag ma mchis pa bkang slad du/ /sems dmyal dud 'gro yi dwags 'gro ba shin
347b5(mdo sde): tu mi bzad pa'i/ /kun nas nyon mongs zhing rnams la la dag kyang bstan mdzad nas/ /de dag thams cad bde bar gshegs la skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /zhing gzhan la la dag
347b6(mdo sde): kyang nam mkha' lta bur ston bar mdzad/ /de bzhin gzhan yang zhugs kyis gtams shing me lce 'khrugs pa dang / /zhing gzhan dag kyang chab kyis yongs su gtams par ston pa
347b7(mdo sde): mdzad/ / /rnam 'phrul 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul lags so/ /'dul ba'i don du gzugs kyi rnam pa mtha' yas ston mdzad pa/ /la lar 'dod pa'i dbang
348a1(mdo sde): phyug 'od chags gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i bdag po mchog tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnyed pa dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang
348a2(mdo sde): phyug mig stong rdo rje 'bar ba dang / /srog chags brgya phrag mang po rab tu dga' bas mchod bgyid cing / /dge ba bcu po dag gis sems can mtha' yas 'dul bgyid
348a3(mdo sde): pa| |blon po tshong dpon dag dang bka' la gtogs pa'i gtsor gyur cing / /shin tu 'jigs med dgra tshogs phab nas chad pas mi gcod la/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po
348a4(mdo sde): bzhi pos sems can rnams ni sdud bgyid cing / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la sems can rab tu 'jog bgyid pa/ /bsod nams las kyis rin chen bdun dang ldan
348a5(mdo sde): par gyur pa yi/ /gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba dag tu gyur/ /'jig rten 'di na la lar bltams pa lta bur ston mdzad de/ /dog sa la ni gom pa
348a6(mdo sde): bdun dag bor zhing gshegs nas kyang / /nga ni skyes nas skye dang 'chi ba'i tha mar dbyung ngo zhes/ /yid 'ong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod pa mdzad//
348a7(mdo sde): mar me mdzad pa tshun chad dri ma thams cad spangs lags kyang / /'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la yongs smin mdzad slad du/ /la lar sems can dag pa btsun
348b1(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor na bzhugs par gda'/ /mi yi dbang po btsun mo dag dang sras kyang ston pa mdzad/ /yab yum dag dang gnyen gyi rtsa lag sdug pa'i 'khor rnams dang / /yul 'khor

348b3(mdo sde): par gda'/ /'gro la sman slad dgung lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas ni/ /bsam gtan mkha' khyab rin chen mchog la bsam gtan mdzad par gda'/ /mu stegs can gyi tshogs
