348b5(mdo sde): mdzad slad du/ /mi dbang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin mchog la bzhugs mdzad nas/ /sku yi tshul ni gang gis 'jig rten rnam par 'dul 'gyur ba/ /rgyal ba de 'dra nyid kyi sku
348b6(mdo sde): yi cha lugs 'dzin par mdzad/ /ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'gro ba rmongs par bgyi slad du/ /sgyu ma mang po'i rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu ston bgyid pa/ /de bzhin 'gro ba sgron
348b7(mdo sde): mas sems can 'dul bar mdzad slad du/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul ba mang po rnams kyang ston/ /thub pa dpa' bo la lar dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul ston//
349a1(mdo sde): gang la pha rol mu stegs tshogs kyi 'gro ba ma mchis shing / /rdul bral mya ngan ma mchis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa/ /bla na med pa 'gyur ba
349a2(mdo sde): ma mchis 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas byang chub brnyes/ /phyogs kyi lam rnams thams cad du'ang 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad/ /mi
349a3(mdo sde): yi dbang po kun nas zhal ldan chu zla bzhin du bzhugs/ /bde gshegs rang byung mtha' yas yul la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /la la dag la sangs rgyas chos kyi sku ni
349a4(mdo sde): ston mdzad pa/ /rtag pa brtan pa ther zug 'gyur ba ma mchis gyur pa dang / /ma bgyis ma skyes dri ma ma mchis 'gog pa ma mchis chos/ /mig yor 'dra bas phyogs
349a5(mdo sde): bcu dag ni shin tu rgyas par 'gengs/ /ring por mi thogs par ni sdug pa dag dang bral 'gyur gyi/ /'dus byas 'di la khyed cag yid brtan bya ba'i mi rigs
349a6(mdo sde): zhes| |'gro ba thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang / /mi rtag mi brtan skad cig par yang la la dag la ston/ /bde gshegs sku yi 'phrin las mtha'
349a7(mdo sde): dang pha rol yong ma mchis/ /gsung dang thugs kyi 'jug pa'i spyod yul dag kyang dpag mi lang / /nam mkha' lta bur rgya che tshad ma mchis pa ston mdzad de/ /rgyal ba'i
349b1(mdo sde): spyod yul sems can rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags/ /phyogs bcu dag na mchis pa'i sems can ma lus ji snyed pa/ /de dag shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar shes rab
349b2(mdo sde): ldan gyur kyang / /rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po'i dngos po'i yul tshad ma mchis pa/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad de dag rnams kyis rig mi nus/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye
349b3(mdo sde): shes mkha' 'dra pha rol mtha' ma mchis/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ma lus pa/ /'di na rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang ni/ /rkyen
349b4(mdo sde): gyi rgyal ba 'dus pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags/ /de ltar 'di dag la sogs mtha' yas thabs dang ldan pa yi/ /'dul ba'i don du sku yi mdzad pa mtha' yas
349b5(mdo sde): ston par mdzad/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par mtha' yas sku dang ldan gyur pa/ /mgon po rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal
349b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu brgal gyur pa/ /nyon mongs thul ba rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa yi/ /bsod nams ci mchis ngas ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /byang
349b7(mdo sde): chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa'
350a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom
350a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ bcom ldan
350a3(mdo sde): 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bsnyun gsol lo/ /nyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang / bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang bsnyun gsol
350a4(mdo sde): lo| |'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag 'jig rten gyi khams nyams dga' ba la bltar stsol cig ces kyang gsung ngo / /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams
350a5(mdo sde): mi mjed 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po des yongs su khyab pa
350a6(mdo sde): dang / rin po che sna tshogs dag kyang mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'dir lhags pa
350a7(mdo sde): 'di dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'am/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi mthu yin snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus
350b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khang pa
350b2(mdo sde): brtsegs pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda' ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ /gang dag 'jig
350b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu lags sam/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag
350b4(mdo sde): gi mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
350b5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par snang ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
350b6(mdo sde): pa'i mthu ma yin gyi/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyi
350b7(mdo sde): mthu yin no/ /gsol pa/ 'di ltar 'di dag gis mthus 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab
351a1(mdo sde): par gda' ba ni skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das
351a2(mdo sde): ngo mtshar te/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ skyes bu
351a3(mdo sde): dam pa 'di gnyis ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa yin no/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ skyes bu dam pa 'di
351a4(mdo sde): gnyis ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa yin te/ 'di gnyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ston to/ /
351a5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ khyod shar gyi phyogs cha logs su de na ci snang ltos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos byang chub
351a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i lha'i mig sgrib pa med pas bltas na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
351a7(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems
351b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob gnyis phyag btsal nas tshig 'di skad ces/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
351b2(mdo sde): rgyas 'od dpag med/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam shes snyung gsol lo/ /nyam ngab nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang / bde bar reg pa la gnas sam
351b3(mdo sde): zhes kyang snyun gsol lo zhes smra'o/ /de bzhin du lho'i phyogs cha dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du 'og dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin
351b4(mdo sde): du phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par mthong ngo / /
351b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na skyes bu dam pa de gnyis
351b6(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar yang mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang shi tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
351b7(mdo sde): po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa ni bsam
352a1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar te/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mchog to ngo mtshar to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam
352a2(mdo sde): pa 'di gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par
352a3(mdo sde): 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos phyogs bcu kun gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
352a4(mdo sde): de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de bzhin du thams
352a5(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu
352a6(mdo sde): dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla
352a7(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
352b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang las bla na med pa yang dag par
352b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid ci lags/ de'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
352b3(mdo sde): legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang de'i bya ba dang / de'i spyod pa dang / de'i smon lam
352b4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i
352b5(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad+ma'i dpal
352b6(mdo sde): gyi snying po/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong gi rdul phra
352b7(mdo sde): rab ji snyed yod pa de snyed du tshad med pa/ de snyed du bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rdul phra rab gyi rdul ji tsam yod pa de bas kyang ches mang ba'i bskal pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na
353a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
353a2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med
353a3(mdo sde): pa| lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od seng ge rnam pa rol pa'i rgyal bo zhes bya ba byung ste/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ bcom ldan 'das
353a4(mdo sde): d e bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yon tan bkod pa gang dag
353a5(mdo sde): yod pa dag dpe cung zad tsam gyis cung zad cig brjod par bya'i nyon cig / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin
353a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang
353a7(mdo sde): lags so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad ma mchis te/ dag gi las kyis lan gdab par sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi
353b1(mdo sde): snying po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po las chu thigs pa gcig blangs na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ 'di ji snyam
353b2(mdo sde): du sems/ /chu blangs pa dang / lhag ma lus pa de gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ blangs pa ni nyung / lhag ma lus pa ni tshad ma mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i
353b3(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po/ khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/ /mi des skra'i rtse mo brgya gshegs pa'i rtse mo des rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa ji snyed pa
353b4(mdo sde): de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ /rgya mtshor chen po chu'i phung
353b5(mdo sde): p o ji snyed pa de tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam pa rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi
353b6(mdo sde): zhing gi yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ /de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag tu med de/
353b7(mdo sde): ji ltar da ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med do zhes bya na/ de las brgya stong du bsgres pa bas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
354a1(mdo sde): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ches
354a2(mdo sde): mang ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun yang de snyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ni theg pa gsum kho na las brtsams te chos ston to/ /
354a3(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ des bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od
354a4(mdo sde): seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag/ nyan thos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang / bde ba'i rgyu las brtsams te chos bstan
354a5(mdo sde): par 'dod kyang / nga'i spobs pa'ang zas par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de'i mthar phyin par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po /
354a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po'i de'i gsung rab la 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi dbang phyug chos
354a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la bu bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ rgyal
354b1(mdo sde): bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par gyur to/ /de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems la yang dag
354b2(mdo sde): par zhugs par gyur to/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi yongs su longs spyod pa'i skyed mos tshal ni bdun khri drug stong yod do/ /rgyal bu re re la'ang
354b3(mdo sde): longs spyod kyi skyed mos tshal khri khri yod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs
354b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ de ni med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ming yang mi grag
354b5(mdo sde): ste| rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang tshangs par spyod pa las gyur pa/ brdzus te byung ba sha stag go /sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / chos
354b6(mdo sde): kyi dga' ba'i zas can yin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na kha zas rags pa med par gyur to/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ni las gzhan med de/ bu de
354b7(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das de la lo bye ba stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bsnyen bkur byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des de'i lhag pa'i bsam
355a1(mdo sde): pa mkhyen nas tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ tshad med pa
355a2(mdo sde): phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spyod pa tshad med pa dag don du
355a3(mdo sde): gnyer bar mi bya ba de gang yang med do/ /rtul ba tshad med pa gang dag brtsam par mi bya ba de gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin
355a4(mdo sde): pa ni tshad med do/ /tshul khrims ni tshad med/ bzod pa ni tshad med/ brtson 'grus ni tshad med/ bsam gtan ni tshad med/ shes rab ni tshad med/ 'khor ba sangs rgyas
355a5(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa ni tshad med/ sems can dag la byams pa ni tshad med/ zhing gi bkod pa dag ni tshad med/ nyan thos dag ni tshad med/ gzugs yongs su grub pa dag ni tshad
355a6(mdo sde): med/ dbyangs ni tshad med/ spobs pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ byang chub sems dpa' ni than sems bskyed pa gcig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
355a7(mdo sde): ci mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad tshad med pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/ /ji ltar yongs su bsngos pas tshad med par 'gyur zhe na/ gang gi tshe sems can thams cad
355b1(mdo sde): la yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de'i tshe sems can 'di dag thams cad skye ba med par mngon sum du byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
355b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ yongs su bsngo bas tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /stong pa nyid tshad med pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa tshad med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa tshad med pa'o/ /
355b3(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa tshad med pa'o/ /de ltar na 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag pa'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings rnam par grol ba/ ma skyes pa/ dben pa/ bral ba/ mya ngan
355b4(mdo sde): las 'das pa/ tshad med pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ mdor na chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'o/ /de'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa zhes bya'o/ /gang mi skye
355b5(mdo sde): mi 'gag pa de ni tshad med pa'o/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i
355b6(mdo sde): rgyal po sde ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /des kyang chos tshad med pa
355b7(mdo sde): dag la nges par sems par byas par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis bcom ldan 'das de las chos dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/
356a1(mdo sde): yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad pa dag
356a2(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod pa/ /'dren pa chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba/ /smra ba'i tshogs rnams yang dag rab tu 'dzoms/ /bdun gyi rtsod dang nyon mongs kun sel ba//
356a3(mdo sde): mtshungs med ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi zla dag dang ma yi 'od rnams dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa nor bu glog 'od rnams/ /bde gshegs gzi brjid kyis ni
356a4(mdo sde): mog mog gyur/ /mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa bskal pa rgya mtsho 'das pa yang / /dka' ba rnam pa du ma spyod par mdzad/ /'phrin las de yi
356a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu yid 'ong ste/ /des na 'gro bas bltas na ngoms mi 'gyur/ /skye dang rga dang na dang 'chis gtses shing / /sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir gzigs
356a6(mdo sde): nas| |de dag rnams la thub chen thugs rje ste/ /rtag tu mi 'pho zhi ba'i chos kyang ston/ /srid gsum srog chags kun gyi sman pa 'dra/ /'dod chags zhes sdang mun pa thams
356a7(mdo sde): cad spyod/ /thugs rje bskyed pa mdzad nas chos kyi sman/ /zhi ba bla na med par rab tu ston/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /rab 'byams zhing rnams kun na
356b1(mdo sde): srogs chags kyi/ /mkhyen nas gang gis mya ngan 'das mchog la/ /reg par 'gyur ba de 'dra'i chos kyang ston/ /mi mchog khyod kyi thugs rje ci 'dra ba/ /ji snyed rab 'byams zhing gi
356b2(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / /rkyen byung thub pa ma lus de dag la/ /de 'dra ba yi snying rje yod ma mchis/ /bsod nams phung po mtshan mchog rnams dang ldan/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi ri bo 'dra//
356b3(mdo sde): bye ba'i nyi las lhag pa'i gzi mnga' ba/ /mi mchog mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos sprin rgyal las chos char 'bebs pa na/ /gang dag rgya chen mos pa spyod yul
356b4(mdo sde): pa| |sngon gyi sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis/ /de dag rtag tu bde gshegs mdun na mchis/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su/ /mi mchog mthong ba rnyed
356b5(mdo sde): par shin tu dka'/ /bsod nams las kyis bsam pa yongs sbyangs pa/ /de dag mig lam rnam par 'dren rnams gda'/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni chos dbyings rgyas par 'gengs/ /
356b6(mdo sde): zhing rnams rab 'byams thams cad na yang gda'/ /bzhud dang byon par mngon pa yong ma mchis/ /'on kyang 'jig rten dag na snod bzhin gda'/ /bden pa gzigs shing
356b7(mdo sde): don dam ston pa'o/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag gzhi ba'i thugs ldan pa/ /brgal nas srog chags bcings gyur gzhan sgrol ba/ /bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod
357a1(mdo sde): kyis skye ba'i shing ljon rtsa nas bton/ /nga rgyal ri bo sra ba rdul du brlags/ /god pa mi mnga' g.yo dang sgyu dang bral/ /rab zhi thugs dang ldan la
357a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mchog chags pa thams cad yod mi mnga'/ /dgongs pas dang chu dang me dang 'dra/ /rgyal ba sems can kun la snyoms thugs ldan/ /rlung dang nam
357a3(mdo sde): mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa chen po yon tan 'di 'dra'i gter/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan/ /bskal pa khrag khrig ngag tu de brjod kyang / /
357a4(mdo sde): yon tan rgya mtsho zad par nus ma lags/ /yon tan rgya mtsho lha mis mchod pa la/ /bdag ni bu dang bcas te mchod pa bgyid/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i bsod nams ci
357a5(mdo sde): mchis pa/ /des ni thub pa chen po khyod 'drar shog /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dus gzhan zhig na/ skyed mos tshal na bsam gtan
357a6(mdo sde): gyi gnas pas gnas shing 'dug pa'i glo g.yas g.yon nas/ tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i pad+ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ dag pa gnyis byung ngo / /pad+ma de gnyis las khye'u ming
357a7(mdo sde): rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba gnyis rdzus te byung nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid
357b1(mdo sde): de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas khye'u gnyis skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /khyed gnyis lha 'am klu yin nam/ /gnod
357b2(mdo sde): sbyin dri za mi 'am ci/ /mi 'am mi ma yin nam ci/ /dris pa smros shig grogs po dag /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi g.yas phyogs su byung ba'i
357b3(mdo sde): khye'u gang yin pa des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ grogs po chos kun stong pa yi/ /ming ni 'dri bar byed dam ci/ /chos rnams thams cad ming
357b4(mdo sde): med na/ /gang gi ming ni 'dri bar byed/ /stong nyid gang la'ang lha med cing / /klu med srin po yod ma yin/ /mi'am mi ma yin yang rung / /thams cad de na yod med do/ /pad+ma'i
357b5(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po/ de nas khye'u gcig shos des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /ming ni ming gis stong pa ste/ /ming la ming ni yod ma yin/ /chos
357b6(mdo sde): rnams thams cad ming med do/ /'on kyang ming gis yongs su brjod/ /ming gi rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /de ni ma mthong ma thos so/ /las kyis 'gags pa ma yin na/ /'di na gang
357b7(mdo sde): gi ming zhig 'dri/ /tha snyad du ni ming byas nas/ /ming btags byas te bstan pa ni/ /kho bo'i ming ni rin chen sems/ /gcig shos rin chen mchog ces bya/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
358a1(mdo sde): po| de ltar khye'u gnyis kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dang lhan
358a2(mdo sde): c ig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste
358a3(mdo sde): phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /
358a4(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ pad+ma dag dang dri bda' dang / /me tog phreng
358a5(mdo sde): dang na bza' dang / 'on te zas dang skom gyis sam/ /rgyal po ji ltar mchod par bgyi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso/ /ji ltar mchod par 'gyur ba lags/
358a6(mdo sde): don 'di legs par bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa thos nas 'tshal bar bgyi/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
358a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas des khye'u de gnyis la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na/ /mtshan mchog sum cu
358b1(mdo sde): gnyis ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dag la mchod par 'gyur/ /mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas zhing / /gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag /me tog rnams kyis bkang byas te/ /'jig rten
358b2(mdo sde): mgon la phul ba bas/ /gang gis 'dir ni thal sbyar nas/ /byang chub tu ni sems btud na/ /'di ni bsod nams ches mang ste/ /de la tshad ni yod ma yin/ /byang chub sems
358b3(mdo sde): ni ci 'dra ba/ /de ltar blo mchog gis bstan pa/ /de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang med/ /de 'dra ba yi dpal yang med/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis slar
358b4(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /bdag cag yi dam yang dag 'cha'/ /bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra/ /lha dang mi
358b5(mdo sde): dag gas na mdzod cig / ji srid du ni 'khor ba yi/ /sngon gyi mtha' ni mi dmigs pa/ /de srid bskal pa du mar yang / /sems can phyir ni spyad par bgyi/ /ji tsam sngon gyi
358b6(mdo sde): mtha' dran pa/ /rnam grangs 'di yi tshul dag gis/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /de srid bskal par spyad par bgyi/ /gal te de ring slan chad du/ /'dod chags kyi ni
358b7(mdo sde): sems 'byung na/ /phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bslus par 'gyur/ /de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang / /phrag dog ser sna'ang de bzhin no/ /rtag tu
359a1(mdo sde): bden pa'i tshig smra zhing / /rdzun gyi tshig ni spang bar bgyi/ /gal te de ring slan chad du/ /rdul med byang chub ma thob bar/ /bdag cag nyan thos
359a2(mdo sde): sems gyur pa/ /des ni brdzun du smra bar 'gyur/ /nam yang rang sangs rgyas su ni/ /bdag cag dga' bar mi bgyid de/ /sems can rnams la snying rje zhing / /bskal pa
359a3(mdo sde): bye bar spyad par bgyi/ /ji ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhing / /grub pa rnam pa 'di dag las/ /gzhan du yon tan bye ba snyed/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing du bgyi/ /de na nyan
359a4(mdo sde): thos gang yang med/ /rang rgyal 'dren pa dag kyang med/ /de tshe bye ba tshad med pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gnas/ /bde ba 'di dang ldan pa yi/ /skye bo dri ma
359a5(mdo sde): med par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mdzod ni bzung bas na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyin to/ /gal te 'di dag gzhan min par/ /de bzhin du ni 'gyur nges na/ /rgya mtshor
359a6(mdo sde): bcas dang rir bcas pa'i/ /sa 'di thams cad g.yos par shog /tshig 'di smras pa'i mod la ni/ /sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /sil snyan dag ni ma dkrol bar/ /de
359a7(mdo sde): na thams cad sgra yang 'byin/ /stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis/ /me tog char dang phye ma'i char/ /spos kyi char ni yid 'ong dang / /na bza' bye ba rab tu phab/ /pad+ma'i dpal
359b1(mdo sde): gyi snying po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs sam yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
359b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur to/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/
359b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba de gnyis gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de'ang de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
359b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khye'u rin chen mchog ces bya bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob 'di ni
359b5(mdo sde): khye'u rin chen sems zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa ni de yin no/ /de skad ces bka'
359b6(mdo sde): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa 'di
359b7(mdo sde): gnyis ji tsam du zab mo la mos pa gyur pa dang / gang gi ming yang ma dmigs pa de srid du 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das la skyes
360a1(mdo sde): bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la rim gro bgyis par gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/
360a2(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i
360a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni de lta ma yin te/ de srid du 'di gnyis kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
360a4(mdo sde): go cha bgos shing yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan te/ 'di gnyis kyi yon tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
360a5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi ba de dang / bcom ldan
360a6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de 'di nas phyogs gang logs na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
360a7(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nub phyogs logs na ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu
360b1(mdo sde): med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol
360b2(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal
360b3(mdo sde): po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod ba ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan
360b4(mdo sde): thos phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / tshe ji tsam pa dang / longs spyod ci 'dra ba dang / 'od ci 'dra ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
360b5(mdo sde): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba de dag legs par bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
360b6(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam chen po bshad pa thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de
360b7(mdo sde): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ de'i phyir legs
361a1(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das la/ legs so/ /zhes bya ba
361a2(mdo sde): gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe'i tshad ni
361a3(mdo sde): dpag tu med de/ de'i mtha' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du bshad kyang rtogs par sla ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe
361a4(mdo sde): dpag tu med du zin kyang 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ yun du gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'das
361a5(mdo sde): p a de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
361a6(mdo sde): ro| |de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du de'i dam pa'i chos gnas te/ ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin
361a7(mdo sde): du yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub ste/ lhag chad med par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan du na sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs
361b1(mdo sde): pa de mthong ba med par zad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur/ de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong
361b2(mdo sde): ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'od dpag med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag dang / shing ljon pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs
361b3(mdo sde): pa de ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du pad+ma dag dang / shing ljon pa de dag las kyang chos kyi sgo brgya phrag du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
361b4(mdo sde): m ed yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos nub ma thag pa'i mtshan mo skya rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
361b5(mdo sde): phyug rin po che du ma'i bkod pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de mngon par rdzogs
361b6(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas nas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal
361b7(mdo sde): p o de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bstan kyang mtha' rtogs par mi nus
362a1(mdo sde): so| |sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i bde ba'i rgyu dang / yon tan gyi rgyu ni de snyed du 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang / rigs kyi bu/ dpe tsam du cung zad cig bshad par
362a2(mdo sde): bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa yon tan gyi bkod
362a3(mdo sde): pa snga ma dag ni yon tan bkod pa 'di dag gi brgya'i char yang mi chog stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi
362a4(mdo sde): zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis gang bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs
362a5(mdo sde): kyi bu| da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus kyang bcom ldan 'das
362a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi brgya'i char yang mi chog ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong
362a7(mdo sde): gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de'i tshe tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro/ /de'i dam pa'i chos ni bskal
362b1(mdo sde): pa bye ba drug cu rtsa gsum du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol
362b2(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming yang bde ba can zhes bgyi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni ma yin te/ 'jig
362b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de ni rin chen kun nas bsags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i tshe ji
362b4(mdo sde): srid gnas pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de srid du byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang
362b5(mdo sde): de'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos yun ring por gnas par bya ba'i phyir spro bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi ma'i dus su der dam pa'i chos nub nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
362b6(mdo sde): der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
362b7(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
363a1(mdo sde): 'das yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
363a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa dang / snang ba phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba de ltar/

363a4(mdo sde): te| lhag chad med cing shin tu lhag pa med par 'gyur ro/ /tshe'i yun dang / dam pa'i chos gnas pa'ang de srid du 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag
363a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu gnas
363a6(mdo sde): pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
363a7(mdo sde): po| bud med gang la las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dang / ma 'ongs pa de
363b1(mdo sde): gnyis kyi mtshan thos na de bud med kyi rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcur 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
363b2(mdo sde): las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rjes nas kyang rab tu 'byung ba
363b3(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang / mi dang / skye dgu'i
363b4(mdo sde): srog chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ gang dag ma byon pa de dag dang / gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag dang / phyogs
363b5(mdo sde): bcu na gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gi mtshan gang lags pa de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang ngo / /tshig 'di
363b6(mdo sde): skad ces kyang smra ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag lhan cig tshogs pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes smras so/ /
363b7(mdo sde): de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /srog chags khrag khrig brgya phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni chos rnams la chos kyi
364a1(mdo sde): mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas
364a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
364a3(mdo sde): m ngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis phyogs bcu na bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang
364a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa mthong ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/ /mthong nas kyang tshig 'di skad 'dzer to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji
364a5(mdo sde): tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis legs par yongs su bzung ba lags te/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di
364a6(mdo sde): gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed cig lung ston pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces
364a7(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
364b1(mdo sde): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
364b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su 'dri ba'i gtam 'dis ci zhig bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can dman pa la mos pa de dag de bzhin
364b3(mdo sde): gshegs pas gsungs pa la yid mi ches par 'gyur pa'i phyir te/ de ltar 'di dag yun ring por gnod pa dang / phan pa med pa dang / bde ba med pa dang / log par ltung bar
364b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag rgya chen po la mos pa dang / mos pa mang ba dag kyang mchis/ slad ma'i skye bo
364b5(mdo sde): rnams la'ang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur na de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
364b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom
364b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di la mi gang la la
365a1(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ ji tsam sems can gyi khams su gdags pas
365a2(mdo sde): btags pa'i sems can gyi khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ches mang par gsungs kyi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin te/ sems can de dag thams cad bskal pa bye
365a3(mdo sde): ba mtha' yas mu med par mgo bo'am/ phrag pa'am/ lag pa na thogs te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de dag la gos dang zas dag byin te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
365a4(mdo sde): kyis rim gror byed/ bla mar byed na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ mi de gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ sems can gcig la'ang se
365a5(mdo sde): gol gtogs pa tsam zhig byams pa'i sems kyis khyab par bgyis na de tsam gyis kyang bsod nams mang du bskyed na/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas mu ma mchis par sems
365a6(mdo sde): can thams cad bzung ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bgyis pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyi
365a7(mdo sde): khong du chud par bya'o/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di byang chub kyi sems la gnas te/ len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun
365b1(mdo sde): chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa la zhugs pa/ mos pa mang ba dag gzhi de las bsod
365b2(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
365b3(mdo sde): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bdag gis blang bar bgyi/ gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/
365b4(mdo sde): bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos tshig de
365b5(mdo sde): skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis dbyangs gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang mdo
365b6(mdo sde): sde 'di lta bu 'di blang bar bgyi/ gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ /
365b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bud med
366a1(mdo sde): kyis thog ma thag tu bud med kyi dngos po las 'gyur te/ rgyu gnyis ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ phrag dog dang / ser sna'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po
366a2(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag gis lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dag bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems
366a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la mngon par gtor to/ /lha yi sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gsil nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang 'dzer to/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
366a4(mdo sde): gang dag gi rna lam du grag bdag legs par bton nas 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs
366a5(mdo sde): par rnyed pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa
366a6(mdo sde): dang | gang dag thos nas mos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ de nas sring mo rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'khor
366a7(mdo sde): der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de/ stan las langs nas lhag pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas
366b1(mdo sde): brag dog dang / ser sna spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mad pa gsung ba
366b2(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhing bud med gzhan gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas thos pa'i mod la bud med kyi dngos po las
366b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba lta na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du/ phung po 'di nyid la bud med kyi dbang po mi gda' bar 'gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur cig ces smras so/ /de nas
366b4(mdo sde): srid mo de de nyid du bud med kyi dbang po mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur to/ /de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
366b5(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyon mongs pa thams cad zlog pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /bcom
366b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' mang
366b7(mdo sde): po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sgyu ma lta
367a1(mdo sde): bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes
367a2(mdo sde): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na mu drA sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
367a3(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
367a4(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka'i gnas na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
367a5(mdo sde): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sum cu thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
367a6(mdo sde): la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba/ smon lam bcos ma ma yin pa/ smon pa med pa la gnas pa/ spyod lam bcos pa med pa/ sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/
367a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du bzod pa thob pa/ mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i gzungs thob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam pa dang /
367b1(mdo sde): spyod pa'i tshul shin tu shes pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ting
367b2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes
367b3(mdo sde): pa dang bral pa/ rtsa ba med pa/ rten pa med pa/ dmigs su med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa med pa/ zla med pa/ nga yi ba med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ mi bya ba/ ma byas pa/ ma song ba/ ma
367b4(mdo sde): 'ongs pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ mi gnas pa/ rgyun chad pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/ blang ba med pa/ dor ba med pa/ 'dus ma byas pa/ mngon
367b5(mdo sde): par 'du mi byed pa/ 'du ba med pa/ bral ba med pa/ sems med pa/ sems dang bral ba/ kun tu 'byung ba med pa/ rtsom pa med pa/ yong su grub pa med pa/ ma byung ba/ kun tu ma byung ba/
367b6(mdo sde): rab tu rgyu ba med pa/ yang dag par rgyu ba med pa/ shin tu stong pa/ 'dre ba med pa/ chos thams cad la sgro btags pa med pa/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi
367b7(mdo sde): sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'ang mi snang / sku'i mtshan
368a1(mdo sde): ma'ang mi snang / sems dang / sems kyi mtshan ma'ang mi snang / na bza' dang / na bza'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang / gdan dang / gdan gyi mtshan ma'ang mi snang / gzims
368a2(mdo sde): pa dang / gzims pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang / 'chag pa dang / 'chag pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhengs pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang / gnas pa dang / gnas pa'i mtshan ma'ang
368a3(mdo sde): mi snang / grib ma'i dbyibs dang / grib ma'i dbyibs kyi mtshan ma'ang mi snang / bzhugs pa dang / bzhugs pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang zhing / sgra dang / sgra'i mtshan ma'ang mi grag go /de nas ting
368a4(mdo sde): nge 'dzin de'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ 'di lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar
368a5(mdo sde): byas te/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang / nyi ma dang / skar ma dang / me dang / nor bu dang / glog gi 'od rnams kyang mi
368a6(mdo sde): snang | dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyad pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / skar ma rnams dang / lha'i gzhal med khang gi 'od kyang mi snang / brgya
368a7(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus gang lha kha cig kyang lha'i dri mi tshor te/ stong
368b1(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad lha'i dri las shin tu 'das pa'i dris dri rab tu zhim par byas so/ /'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang snang bar gyur
368b2(mdo sde): khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po'ang snang bar byas/ ri rab dang / de ma yin pa ri'i rgyal po gzhan dag dang / ri nag po dag kyang snang bar gyur te/ phyis ni sems can gang gi mig
368b3(mdo sde): gi dbang po la'ang snang bar ma gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rin po che'i dra bas kun tu bskor bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed
368b4(mdo sde): 'di thams cad du'ang dar gyi lda ldi bres shing pog snod nas spos kyis bdugs la me tog sna tshogs bkram par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka'i gnas kyang bya
368b5(mdo sde): rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang bcas te/ de dag thams cad lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing / shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa/ dri
368b6(mdo sde): rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong bas kun gang bar gyur to/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang rin po che'i dra ba'i gdugs kyis g.yogs shing brgyan to/ /yul ma ga d+hA thams cad kyang gos ka tsa lin+di ka
368b7(mdo sde): ltar reg na bde bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
369a1(mdo sde): tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ tshad med pa/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa brgya stong rnams kyang so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bskul te/ rigs kyi bu dag/
369a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du dengs shig /de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
369a3(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston pa de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rigs
369a4(mdo sde): kyi bu dag / ting nge 'dzin de thos pa tsam gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gces spras byed par 'gyur te/ thabs mkhas pa med par bskal pa brgya stong du pha rol tu phyin
369a5(mdo sde): pa drug la spyad pa ni de lta ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzin de nyan du dengs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ltar
369a6(mdo sde): mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag btsal te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas rang rang gi mngon par shes pa'i
369a7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ga la ba dang / dbus kyi gling bzhi pa ga la ba dang / dzam+bu'i gling ga la ba dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po
369b1(mdo sde): ga la ba dang / 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags
369b2(mdo sde): nas| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
369b3(mdo sde): nas| phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+ma chen po la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de bzhin du sbyor te/ lho phyogs dang /
369b4(mdo sde): nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs mtshams dang nye ba dang / phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi
369b5(mdo sde): zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag
369b6(mdo sde): tu med ba brgya stong de dag so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bkye ste/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyed 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du dengs shig /de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
369b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin
370a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /ting nge 'dzin de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang / byang chub
370a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyis gces spras byed par gyur te/ thabs mkhas pa med par bskal pa brgya stong du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa ni de lta ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzin de nyan du dengs shig
370a3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal te/ skad cig thang cig yud
370a4(mdo sde): tsam zhig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas rang rang gi mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ga la ba dang / dbus kyi gling bzhi pa ga la ba dang /
370a5(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i gling ga la ba dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan
370a6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
370a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs
370b1(mdo sde): kyi pad+ma chen po la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na dge slong gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ byang chub
370b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas pa yul so sor rgyu zhing dong ba de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
370b3(mdo sde): ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang du'ang ma mthong ngo / /ma mthong nas thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal lo/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin
370b4(mdo sde): ' di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad
370b5(mdo sde): cu 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/ /nyan thos 'bum phrag gsum yang 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
370b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha thams cad dang / lha'i dbang po rnams dang / klu thams cad dang / klu'i dbang po rnams
370b7(mdo sde): dang | gnod sbyin thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang / dri za thams cad dang / dri za'i dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams
371a1(mdo sde): dang | nam mkha' lding thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams dang / mi'am ci thams cad dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po
371a2(mdo sde): thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams dang / 'dab bzang thams cad dang / 'dab bzang gi dbang po rnams dang / de dag thams cad so so'i g.yog srog chags bye ba khrag
371a3(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong mang po dang / 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang du'ang ma mthong ngo / /ma
371a4(mdo sde): mthong nas thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal lo/ /de'i tshe dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang /
371a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
371a6(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge snyen ma dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di steng du srid pa'i rtse mo man chad sa phyogs gang yang ma gang ba med de/ tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha bzhag pa tsam
371a7(mdo sde): yang dag pa med par gyur to/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / maud+gal gyi bu chen po dang / gnas brtan gsus po che dang / kA t+ya'i bu chen po dang / 'od srung chen po dang /
371b1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ 'jam dpal
371b2(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar gang na bzhugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshul 'di ci 'dra/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
371b3(mdo sde): bzhugs pa de ci 'dra/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed cag thams cad kyang
371b4(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po shes rab dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa/ mthu che ba/ dbang che ba/ mkhas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa/ yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa
371b5(mdo sde): spyad pa yin na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /so so nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa yongs su tshol cig /
371b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de ga la yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de ci 'dra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa ci 'dra ba yongs su tshol cig /de nas nyan thos
371b7(mdo sde): chen po de dag rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du brtags te/ brtags nas kyang de bzhin gshegs
372a1(mdo sde): pa'i sku'ang ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa'ang ma mthong ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po de dag gis de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

377b7(mdo sde): las gang ci yin pa de dag thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ldem po dag khong du chud par 'dod pas ting
378a1(mdo sde): de 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chos bstan pa khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba ston par 'dod pas
