378b3(mdo sde): ro| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i shing gis sems can
378b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam pa thams
378b5(mdo sde): cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ ye shes mtha' yas phyag rgya mdo sde 'di/ /ye shes
378b6(mdo sde): phung po ye shes khyad 'phags mchog / ye shes 'od dang ye shes 'byor pa'i mdzod/ /ye shes 'byung gnas ye shes sgor 'jug pa/ /shes dbang shes rab 'byung
378b7(mdo sde): gnas shes rabs/ /shes rab sgron ma shes rab 'od mun sel/ /shes rab mi zad shes rab tshul rab bshad/ /nyi ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum na lhan/ /mnyam pa 'byor pa mnyam pa nyid la
379a1(mdo sde): gnas| |'dzin pa thams cad gcod dang bden pa'i tshul/ /ting 'dzin kun sgo ye shes phyag rgya ni/ /sangs rgyas so so yang dag rig pa'i rig /zad
379a2(mdo sde): mi shes pa'i nor mdzod pha rol 'gro / shes rab rdzu 'phrul shes rab 'byung gnas gter/ /bsam pa ji bzhin dga' bde'i rtsa ba ste/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya 'di ni bde gshegs
379a3(mdo sde): nor| |rin chen ldan pa'i yul 'khor rgyal pos bsten/ /rin chen dam pa rin chen mchog 'byung gnas/ /'dod chags rdul dang zhe sdang dri ma sel/ /mdo bshad 'di ni
379a4(mdo sde): rin chen rtsa pa'o/ /zhi zhing zhi la yid ni zhi byed pa/ /mdzes pa byed dang bdag tu lta ba sbyong / /sangs rgyas gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di rnyed pas/ /dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis bdud
379a5(mdo sde): ni rab tu 'joms/ /shes bya'i srog chags ye shes shes byed pa/ /ye shes 'byung gnas ye shes 'byor shes rab/ /ye shes snang ba pha rol mtha' yas te/ /mdo sde 'di
379a6(mdo sde): ni ye shes sgo 'byung gnas/ /dul ba dul ba mdud pa gnyis gcod pa/ /lta byas drug cu gnyis kyi lta ba sbyong / /rgyal ba'i sgo ste bdud rtsi 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni sum cu
379a7(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis mtshan 'byung gnas/ /byang chub shin tu byang chub rang bzhin mthun/ /mu stegs shes byed byang chub rgyu shes byed/ /byang chub 'di ni gnyid log sad byed pa/ /byang
379b1(mdo sde): chub tshul 'dir mtha' yas zad mi shes/ /chos kyi tshul dang rigs pa rnam par sgom/ /mtha' yas pa yi gzungs rnams rab tu sgrub/ /stobs bcu rnams kyi chos la 'jug pa ste/ /
379b2(mdo sde): gzungs 'di nyid ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o/ /'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa sgrub/ /'di ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin dang bzod/ /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab mi zad de/ /'dir
379b3(mdo sde): gnas pha rol phyin pa phun sum tshogs/ /las dang nyon mongs pa la 'jigs ma byed/ /blo gros ngan pa'i bdud kyis ma 'jigs shig /'di la sbyor la rab tu mchod med de/ /ji ltar
379b4(mdo sde): bsam bzhin byang chub sde 'tshang rgya/ /mdo sde 'di ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ /phyogs bcu gang lhags byang chub mi byed snod/ /sras rnams dag ni bskal pa bzang 'di la/ /'dug
379b5(mdo sde): pa de dag dpang du gyur pa yin/ /'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ /mdo sde 'di ni ma byon rnams kyi yum/ /da ltar byung ba thams cad 'di las byung / /de phyir rgyal
379b6(mdo sde): ba'i spun rnams 'dir sbyor cig / gang dag mdo 'di tshul la rab gnas pa/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor 'thob cing / /las kyang rnam dag spyod pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ /
379b7(mdo sde): mi ldog sa 'thob 'dam las brgal bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis ting nge
380a1(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad ni bskal pa brgya stong nas bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag
380a2(mdo sde): nas| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ /de dag thams cad kyis skad cig mi zad pa bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo/ /lha
380a3(mdo sde): d ang mi'i skye dgu dkrigs pa phrag drug cu po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
380a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems bskyed nas/ thams cad ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo / /de dag ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bla na med
380a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/ /de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa 'bum phrag sum cu na 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya
380a6(mdo sde): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /de dag las kha cig yun ring po nas smon lam btab pa
380a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dag ni bzod pa thob bo/ /kha cig smon lam myur du 'debs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
380b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya bar ming mthun par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
380b2(mdo sde): 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de lta bas na khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul du gnas shing spros pa
380b3(mdo sde): med pa la dga' bas mi gnas par spyad par bya'o/ /chos thams cad la mi gnas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig
380b4(mdo sde): brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di kun tu bsrung bar bya'o/ /gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /spros pa med pa la dga'
380b5(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ /gnas med par spyod pa dang / chos thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / phrag dog med par bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ gos
380b6(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
380b7(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun tu bsrung zhing rab tu bsrung
381a1(mdo sde): bar spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub gang lags pa de ni gang gi'ang ma lags/ gang nas kyang ma lags/ gang na'ang ma lags/ gang gis
381a2(mdo sde): kyang ma lags/ ci'ang ma lags te/ mi snang ba/ gzung du ma mchis pa/ thob pa ma lags pa/ chud zos pa ma lags pa'o/ /de nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
381a3(mdo sde): brgya phrag sum cu stan las langs nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med
381a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di bsrung ba dang / gzung ba dang / bstan pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya
381a5(mdo sde): cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par spro'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol te/
381a6(mdo sde): smon lam yang btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma
381a7(mdo sde): la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i bsam pas soms shig / 'di khyod kyi las yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs
381b1(mdo sde): nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
381b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i bsam pas bsams lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
381b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag sum cu po 'di dag ni nang na brgyad stong
381b4(mdo sde): ni dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma ni dmu rgod dmigs par 'dzin pa la mngon par
381b5(mdo sde): zhen pa/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ de dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i tshe/ nga yi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa
381b6(mdo sde): grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di spong bar 'gyur/ 'gal bar byed par 'gyur/ mi ston par 'gyur/ mi 'dzin par 'gyur te/ rab tu 'dzin par
381b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ rnam pa bdun gyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
382a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i
382a2(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can gyi khams mthong nas snying rje chen po skyes te byang
382a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bsti stang du byas te sbyin pa bzang po
382a4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gzhan yang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mthong nas byang chub sems
382a5(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi yon tan bsngags pa yongs su rdzogs pa thos nas
382a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/ byams pa/ rnam pa bdun po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byams pa/ de la
382a7(mdo sde): gang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang / gang dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na dam pa'i
382b1(mdo sde): chos yongs su bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang / gang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can gyi
382b2(mdo sde): khams mthong nas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po skyes te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa/ sems bskyed pa 'di
382b3(mdo sde): gsum ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bsrung ba yin te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /byams
382b4(mdo sde): pa| sems bskyed pa de dag las lhag ma bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur ba'o/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan
382b5(mdo sde): na phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/ pha rol gyi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la phrag dog med pa
382b6(mdo sde): yin| srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa mi smra ba yin/ shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi
382b7(mdo sde): chags pa yin/ chos zab mo la mos pa yin te/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba sna tshogs la mos pa ma yin gyi/ chos thams cad la chos zab mo dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa/ byang chub
383a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na byang
383a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dmu rgod du rig par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzi brjid chung zhing bka' blo mi bde ba yin/ /dman pa la mos shing thams cad la dman pa'i
383a3(mdo sde): chos ston pa yin/ shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la chags shing slong ba ster ba'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yin/ sgyu dang ldan zhing g.yo byed pa yin/ stong pa nyid la
383a4(mdo sde): ngag gi las lhur len pas mi drang ba yin te/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na dmu rgod du rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
383a5(mdo sde): chos lnga dang ldan na phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya'o / lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag mi dmigs shing bdag la mi bstod pa dang / sems can mi dmigs pa
383a6(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog pas mi ston pa dang / byang chub mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi lta ba ste/ byams pa/ byang
383a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
383b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /phrag dog can dang shes kyi khe 'dod dang / /gnod pa byed dang 'chos dang zur za dang / /smra ba tsam dang dman pa'i tshul can
383b2(mdo sde): gyis| |bde gshegs byang chub 'di ni bsrung mi nus/ /bas mthar dga' zhing dgon dben spyod yul ba/ /tshig tsam ma yin zab mo bzod pa dang / /bse lta bu dang shes khe bde
383b3(mdo sde): bsrings pa/ /de ni byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba srung / /tshogs las bsrings shing rab tu zhi la mos/ /ri dwags lta bur 'jigs shing gnas med rgyu/ /nam mkha' rlung bzhin rnyed
383b4(mdo sde): la mi chags pa/ /de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin/ /lus la mi lta srog don mi gnyer na/ /shes kyi khe 'dod par lta ga la 'gyur/ /brtson brtsams bdag gi ma yin ci
383b5(mdo sde): yang min/ /de ni ma 'ongs dus na byang chub snod/ /phyi ma'i dus na sems can 'byung ba ni/ /bdag cag byang chub la ni spyod ces 'dzer/ /de dag sems rgod tshul 'chos
383b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs bcas/ /de dag rnams kyis chos 'di bsrung mi nus/ /'dren pa mar me mdzad kyi pha rol gyi/ /bskal pa dag ni stong phrag bye ba na/ /sangs rgyas zla ba'i tog
383b7(mdo sde): ces bya ba byung / /'gro ba rnams la ting 'dzin 'di bshad dran/ /rgyal ba de yi 'dus pa dang po ni/ /phyir mi ldog pa khrag khrig brgyad cu ste/ /'dus pa gnyis pa khrag
384a1(mdo sde): khrig bdun cu yin/ /'dus pa gsum pa bdun cu rtsa gsum mo/ /rgyal ba'i tshe ni bskal pa bye ba mang / /'od kyang dpag tshang drug cu rtsa gsum
384a2(mdo sde): pa| |dge 'dun bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu ste/ /thams cad dgra bcom dbang ldan gyur pa'o/ /de yi tshe na rgyal po byung ba ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba bsod nams 'phags
384a3(mdo sde): zhes bya/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi tshad du gyur pa ni/ /mtshungs par dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu'o/ /gling bzhi rnams kyi tshad kyang de bzhin no/ /rgyal po'i sras ni bye ba drug cu
384a4(mdo sde): tham| |bu ni stong tham pa ste nyung ma yin/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba'i 'od ces bya/ /grong khyer dag ni bye ba brgyad cur gyur/ /thams cad skyed mos tshal rgyas mdzes
384a5(mdo sde): par gnas/ /thams cad lo legs bde zhing dga' ba ste/ /sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang gnas 'dra/ /rgyal pos rmi lam du ni zla ba'i tog /sangs rgyas byung ngo zhes
384a6(mdo sde): ni thos gyur nas/ /g.yog 'khor bye ba brgya phrag drug cu dang / /rgyal ba de yi drung du nyer song nas/ /des ni ting 'dzin zab mo rgyal ba'i sku/ /mdo sde bshad pa 'di ni thos
384a7(mdo sde): nas su/ /ston pa ji ltar bzhed bzhin spyad gsol zhes/ /rgyal srid thams cad sangs rgyas de la phul/ /grong khyer kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /gtsug lag khang
384b1(mdo sde): ni tsan+dan rgyus bsgrubs byas/ /des ni thams cad rtse rgod bcas par phul/ /'chag pa'i sa ni gser gyi gyim bag g.yogs/ /lo ni stong phrag brgyad cur tshang bar yang / /rgyal po
384b2(mdo sde): las gzhan mi byed mchod pa byed/ /rgyal po nam du'ang rmugs dang gnyid mi bskyed/ /'dod la mi 'dun rgyal srid sred ma yin/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir/ /
384b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma re re zhing / /bkod pa gang dag phul bar gyur pa ni/ /thams cad tshig gis bshad par mi nus so/ /lkog tu song nas rtog pa skyed gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin
384b4(mdo sde): 'di ni mchog tu zab pa ste/ /zang zing 'dzin pas ye shes phyag rgya yi/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bsgrub par mi nus snyam/ /de ni rab byung rgyal srid thams cad spangs/ /sha na ka yi ras gyon
384b5(mdo sde): bsod snyoms spyod/ /lo ni stong phrag brgyad cu tshang bar yang / /gnyid kyis ma non ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /skabs der sangs rgyas kyis ni ji tsam gang / /rab tu bshad pa'i chos
384b6(mdo sde): rnams des bzung nas/ /bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das 'og des/ /mchod rten bye ba drug cu rtsa bzhi byas/ /rin chen bdun gyis spras shing mdzes byas pa'i/ /gdugs
384b7(mdo sde): ni lnga brgya kun la rab tu phul/ /kun la sil snyan khrol ba brgya rnams dang / /mar me stong phrag brgya yang rab tu phul/ /yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul la gnas nas su/ /lo ni
385a1(mdo sde): bye ba stong phrag bdun cu gsum/ /zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gnas nas ni/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di 'khor la rab tu bshad/ /legs zhes bya
385a2(mdo sde): ba'ang 'dod pa ma yin na/ /shes kyi khe 'dod par lta ga la 'gyur/ /de'i tshe chos bsrung ba yi bsam pa yis/ /mgron du bos pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de bzhin
385a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa bye ba brgyad cu dang / /khrag khrig bdun cu des ni mnyes par byas/ /de dag kun la de 'dra'i bkod pa byas/ /thams cad las kyang ting 'dzin 'di thob bo/ /gang
385a4(mdo sde): dag byang chub 'di ni bsrung 'dod pa/ /de dag 'dod pa med cing mos pa dang / /g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pas sgom pa yis/ /rgyal po de 'dra bar ni bslab par gyis/ /chos
385a5(mdo sde): 'dod ma yin rnyed pa don gnyer la/ /bsdams pa min dag byang chub slob bo zhes/ /smra 'gyur kha cig phyi ma'i dus 'byung ste/ /smra la dga' zhing thams cad stong zhes smra/ /stong
385a6(mdo sde): nyid ji bzhin stong pa mi shes te/ /'tsho chags tha bar bcas shing nyon mongs bcas/ /tshig gis 'di dag stong nyid 'dzin 'jug cing / /bdag ni byang chub the tshom med
385a7(mdo sde): ces smra/ /de tshe rgyal mchog tshe ni dpag med gyur/ /bu stong dag ni bskal pa bzang 'di pa/ /mdun na 'dug pa'i 'khor rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag thams cad de tshe rab
385b1(mdo sde): tu byung / /rgyal ba bye ba khrag khrig rnams dran te/ /de las rab tu byung ste de dag gis/ /gang ci bshad pa ngas kun sgra tsam bshad/ /ngas ni gnas pas stong pa nyid kyang bsgoms/ /
385b2(mdo sde): da lta'i thabs kyis bskal pa mtha' yas par/ /ngas ni gnas pas sangs rgyas gang dag mchod/ /nga ni de yi byang chub ma thob kyi/ /gzhan du 'di la gnas te bsgrubs pas
385b3(mdo sde): na| |mar me mdzad pa mthong ma thag tu ni/ /som nyi spangs nas mnyam pa nyid mthong bas/ /de nas khyod ni shAkya seng ge yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes 'dren pas bdag lung
385b4(mdo sde): bstan/ / //'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ de nas
385b5(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa ma skyes dgra'i ma dpal bzang zhes bya ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa bye ba ldan gyi bu mo gser mchog
385b6(mdo sde): snang ba zhes bya ba'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal bzang dang / gser mchog snang gnyis stan las langs nas/ bcom
385b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar song ste phyin pa dang / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
386a1(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas par so so nas ras bcos ma brgya stong ri ba phrugs res bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la
386a2(mdo sde): mngon par gsol to/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi skon bu lnga brgyas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
386a3(mdo sde): cag gnyis slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'di la mos par bgyi/ yid ches par bgyi/ gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/

386a5(mdo sde): dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro bgyi bar spro'o/ /sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
386a6(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bgyi'o/ /stong pa nyid spangs par mi bgyi'o/ /tshig lhur blangs bar mi bgyi yi/ nan tan gyis bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lus dang / srog la'ang blta bar
386a7(mdo sde): mi bgyi na/ slad rol gyi dngos po rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ btsun mo dam pa de gnyis 'di lta bur rjes su slob pa na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo'i 'khor bud

386b6(mdo sde): gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma/ kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang /

400a2(mdo sde): su med/ /tha snyad tsam ste de la snying po med/ /spros pa mtshan ma spyod yul de dag ni/ /dngos po gzhig phyir mya ngan 'das pa smra/ /sems kyis sems kyi ngo bo nyid mi shes//
400a3(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyis sems kyang mi shes te/ /chos rnams thams cad rmi lam ngo bo nyid/ /de ni gnyis su bden zhes kha cig smra/ /skye ba'i chos de bden pa ma yin te/ /'gog
400a4(mdo sde): pa yang ni cung zad bden ma yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skye ba'i chos min te/ /de lta'i thabs kyis bden par 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas ye shes cung zad ma rnyed de/ /
400a5(mdo sde): bstan pa'i chos kyang cung zad bstan pa med/ /sus kyang sems can gang yang bkrol ba med/ /de ltar sangs rgyas mi skye sangs rgyas so/ /gal te 'di ni rang bzhin mya ngan
400a6(mdo sde): 'das/ /rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pa de nyid 'gro/ /ther zug chos ni mya ngan 'da' ma yin/ /spros pa med pa nam yang mkhas mi 'gyur/ /gang gis sems can sems can don
400a7(mdo sde): mi mthong / /de ltar 'jig rten kun rdzob sems can bstan/ /sems can yang dag ngo bo nyid mthong na/ /de ni mya ngan 'da' ba gzhi med gnas/ /gang dag 'di la phung
400b1(mdo sde): po bden smra dang / /kha cig srid 'gog lam ni bden zhes 'dzer/ /skye ba med pa bden pa gcig yin na/ /de la kha cig bden pa bzhi zhes 'dzer/ /byang chub snying por 'dug nas
400b2(mdo sde): bden gcig kyang / /grub par ma mthong bzhi lta ga la zhig /de ltar blo gros ngan mang rab byung nas/ /nga yi bstan pa rnam par 'jig par byed/ /dge sbyong yon tan 'tshol bar
400b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa dag / ting 'dzin 'di la rab tu sbyar ba'i phyir/ /ma bsdams rnams dang 'dris pa med byas te/ /bse ru lta bur dgon par gnas par bya/ /rkang gnyis dam pa bye ba
400b4(mdo sde): brgyad cu yis/ /'di la rab tu sbyor la dgongs pa mdzad/ /gang dag bden pa mthong ba'i lha mang po/ /de dag nyin dang mtshan du de la srung / /gang dag ting 'dzin blta dka' 'di
400b5(mdo sde): sgom la/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni de yi rmi lam du/ /snang ba gsal ba mtha' yas mi zad pa/ /bsgrub pa 'jug pa'i sgor 'jug sbyin par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
400b6(mdo sde): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
400b7(mdo sde): rgya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su sgrub par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par
401a1(mdo sde): bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
401a2(mdo sde): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang /
401a3(mdo sde): rang byung nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /byang
401a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa thob
401a5(mdo sde): par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba dang / ye shes dang / gzungs dang / sems can gyi skad kyi brda dang / rigs pa dang /
401a6(mdo sde): tshul dang / sgo thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' lam la 'jug pa dang / 'od phun sum tshogs pa dang / so so yang dag
401a7(mdo sde): par rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / rnam par gdon mi za ba'i stobs bskyed pa la mkhas pa thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /byang chub sems
401b1(mdo sde): dpa' spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / lta ba phyin ci ma log pa dang / mnyam pa nyid rtogs par khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir
401b2(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson pa ni yon tan gyi phan yon 'di thams cad 'thob bo/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi phan yon
401b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /'dren pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o/ /yongs su 'dren pa zhes bya'o/ /ston pa zhes bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /rgyal
401b4(mdo sde): ba zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bya'o/ /rang byung zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar smra ba de bzhin byed pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyam pa med pa dang / mi
401b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /mchog tu smra ba/ yang dag par smra ba/ bde ba smra ba/ dus su smra ba zhes bya'o/ /'dul ba smra ba zhes bya'o/ /bla na med
401b6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o/ /mi'i dam pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ nges ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma
401b7(mdo sde): thag tu byang chub thob bo/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad gzigs ma thag tu byang chub brnyes nas/ bcom ldan
402a1(mdo sde): 'das/ ci'i slad du slar bskal pa grangs ma mchis par 'khor ba na 'khor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba
402a2(mdo sde): byed cing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor mod kyi/ 'on kyang /
402a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ der ngas byang chub dang / de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bzung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs
402a4(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'di dang ldan pa 'dren par 'gyur te blo gros mtha' yas blo gros mchog /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya mang po dag gis
402a5(mdo sde): dgongs par 'gyur/ /mdo sde brgya yi tshul dag shin tu rab 'byed bsam yas dpag med de/ /mdo sde 'di la rab tu sbyor ba mi zad gzungs 'thob rnyed par 'gyur//
402a6(mdo sde): 'di ni ye shes ting 'dzin rnam par gdon mi za ba skad kun sgo/ /rab tu rtogs dang rnam par grol dang chags med 'dzin pa thams cad zhi/ /mi skye ba dang 'gog dang
402a7(mdo sde): gzhi med mya ngan 'das dang rims nad med/ /stobs dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang dang rgyal ba'i yon tan kun sgrub pa/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag kun dang sna tshogs
402b1(mdo sde): mtha' yas skad rnams yongs su sbyong / /rjes su rtogs dang tshim pa dang ni sbyong dang 'dzin pa thams cad bral/ /shin tu rnam par shes dang gdon mi za mchog nyon mongs
402b2(mdo sde): thams cad zad/ /mdo sde 'di la rab tu sbyor ba byang chub drung du song ba yin/ /rtse gcig yid kyis mngon sum du na 'di la tshul bzhin rab sbyar la/ /gnyid dang le lo ma
402b3(mdo sde): byed shes kyi khe bde mngon par dga' ma byed/ /rtag tu tshul khrims gnyen dang phrag dog med dang byams pa'i yid du byos/ /dga' ba'i ngang tshul gus dang bcas pas
402b4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur/ /mnyam sems shin tu bsdams pa drang po rtag tu rnam par dga' ba dang / /gnas med 'dris med shes kyi khe dang bde la pad+ma chu
402b5(mdo sde): bzhin byos/ /ji ltar bya bzhin nga med mos pa brtan zhing sred dang g.yo med pa/ /de ni phyi ma'i dus na gzungs mchog rgyal po 'di ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /stong gsum dag ni rab tu
402b6(mdo sde): g.yos nas lha brgya sil snyan dkrol bar byed/ /nam mkha' las ni byug pa gos dang phye ma dag dang rgyal mtshan brgya/ /mdzes phreng mgul rgyan rna cha zla gam dung dang rkang
402b7(mdo sde): gdub do shal brgya/ /nor bu mu tig dpung rgyan gtsug rgyan sor gdub sna tshogs 'thob bar byed/ /lha dang lha yi bu mo klu dang dri za 'dab bzang tshogs mang po/ /nam mkha'
403a1(mdo sde): lding dang lha min dbang po dge bsnyen dge slong brgya mang dang / /de bzhin dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen ma ni mang po dga' 'gyur langs/ /rang gi gos
403a2(mdo sde): dag dang ni rgyan rnams phul nas byang chub sems bskyed do/ /chos 'di shin tu bstan tshe sems can mang po byang chub zhugs pa dang / /kha cig phyir mi ldog par gyur pa bstan
403a3(mdo sde): cing tshad gzung nus ma yin/ /dgra bcom nyid du btul bar gyur ba mtha' yas gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /'dren pa blta phyir zhing ni brgya nas lhags pa de dag dga' nas dong //
403a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so/ /byang
403a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug
403a6(mdo sde): cu dang / 'bum phrag gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen
403a7(mdo sde): ma dpag tu med pa dang / sems can tshad med pa dag gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
403b1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag
403b2(mdo sde): dang | mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang / byams pa dang / seng ge rab snang dang / snang byed la thug pa'i bar la
403b3(mdo sde): sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
403b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal bzang dang / gser mchog snang dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
403b5(mdo sde): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
403b6(mdo sde): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / mu ni warma dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab
403b7(mdo sde): pa|| ||rgya gar skad du AR+ya shU rang ga ma sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang
404a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya
404a2(mdo sde): rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong sum khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /
404a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa'i ye shes thob pa/ gzungs kyis mi brjed pa'i chos dang ldan pa/
404a4(mdo sde): spobs pa mi zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gnas pas mi g.yo ba/ shes rab kyi mig sgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ bzod pa thob pa/ gzungs
404a5(mdo sde): kyi tshul thob pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la zhugs pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba tshar phyin pa/ smon lam phun sum tshogs pa/ bdud dang / phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sangs
404a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa yongs su bzung ba/ byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba/ brtson 'grus chen pos rtul ba/ tshig
404a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig ston pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ spyod pa yongs su dag pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la gnas pa/ ye shes dus gsum la ma chags pa thob
404b1(mdo sde): pa| khams gsum las mngon par byung ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos la mos pa mang ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/ sgra thogs pa med pa/ sgra yid du 'ong bas go bar byed pa/ spyod
404b2(mdo sde): lam thams cad yongs su brtags pa ma yin pa/ dkris pa dang bral ba/ mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i go cha ba gos pa/
404b3(mdo sde): dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtan pa dang ldan pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thogs pa
404b4(mdo sde): med par chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
404b5(mdo sde): chen po sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gtsang zhing dri ma med par yongs su sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
404b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba dang / dad pa'i spyod lam ston pa dang / byang chub
404b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan dam pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad mi slu ba'i blo dang ldan
405a1(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
405a2(mdo sde): chen po 'du shes ldog pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul ba rtag tu legs par brtsams pa dang /
405a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu mnyam par gzhag cing dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i
405a4(mdo sde): sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha thams cad kyis bstod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi
405a5(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang
405a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
405a7(mdo sde): lhun po'i rtse 'dzin brtsegs pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che bkod pa rgya mtsho'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
405b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa chen po'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che
405b2(mdo sde): chen po'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
405b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po 'od bkod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / byang
405b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu brtan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri
405b5(mdo sde): nyis stong dang thabs gcig go / gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma
405b6(mdo sde): yin pa gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa/
405b7(mdo sde): gzi brjid che ba/ gzi brjid che ba che zhing che ba 'ongs shing lhags pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ rgya chen po la mos pa de dag thams cad kyang 'khor der tshogs shing 'khod
406a1(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de 'di snyam du sems
406a2(mdo sde): t e| gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ji lta bu'i zhu ba zhus pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyang yongs su 'dzin par
406a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rigs kyang yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs kyang shin tu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang mog
406a4(mdo sde): mog por byas par 'gyur ba dang / gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyang shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ba dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyang dge
406a5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems ma
406a6(mdo sde): bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag phyir mi
406a7(mdo sde): ldog pa de dag kyang myur du bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmigs pa can thams cad dang / bdag
406b1(mdo sde): tu mngon par zhen pa rnams kyang lta ba de dag las bskyod par 'gyur ba dang / sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la mos par 'gyur ba
406b2(mdo sde): dang | sems can rgya chen po la mos pa rnams kyang mgu zhing mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba kun zhu bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
406b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
406b4(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan
406b5(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
406b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros brtan pa/ dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phye yi/
406b7(mdo sde): blo gros brtan pa/ khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus shig dang / zhu ba zhus pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka'
407a1(mdo sde): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
407a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
407a3(mdo sde): dang | sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang / phyogs bcur snang ba'i phyir snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud thams cad tshar
407a4(mdo sde): gcad pa'i phyir shes rab rgya chen po grags pas rnam par 'phrul bar 'gyur ba dang / rang byung gi chos thob pa'i phyir ye shes la dbang du 'gyur ba dang / ma bstan pa'i ye
407a5(mdo sde): shes dang ldan pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar ston pa'i phyir spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / tshe bskal ba dpag
407a6(mdo sde): tu med par 'dzin pa'i byir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos la mos pa rnams la nyan thos kyi theg pa ston par 'gyur ba dang / sems
407a7(mdo sde): can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la mos pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bston par 'gyur ba dang / sems can theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa rnams la sangs
407b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa ston par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'chad la nyan thos kyi nges par gyur pa la'ang mi 'jug pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
407b2(mdo sde): kyang 'tshal cing 'chad la rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur pa la'ang mi 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'chad la shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang
407b3(mdo sde): thob par mi bgyid pa dang / nyan thos kyi kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang / cha byad rnams kyang ston la byang chub kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
407b4(mdo sde): kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang / cha byad rnams kyang ston la sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po dang yang mi 'bral ba dang / sa bcu'i stobs bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i
407b5(mdo sde): phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / cha byad kyang ston pa dang / srid pa tha ma dang ldan pas dga' ldan
407b6(mdo sde): gyi gnas rab na gnas par yang gda' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir mngal du 'jug pa dang / btsas pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa dang /
407b7(mdo sde): bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po'ang ston pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir byang chub kyang rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi
408a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor ba'ang ston pa nas ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du'ang yongs su ston pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir lus 'jig par yang ston pa dang /
408a2(mdo sde): smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba'ang ston pa'i ting nge
408a3(mdo sde): 'dzin de gang yang mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan
408a4(mdo sde): bkod pa rnam par sprul pa'ang ston cing gzugs su mthong ba thams cad kyang ston la/ shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur
408a5(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros
408a6(mdo sde): brtan pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /yang blo gros brtan pa/ khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po
408a7(mdo sde): che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/ blo gros
408b1(mdo sde): brtan pa/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu bar sems pa legs so/ /legs so/ /'di ltar/ blo gros brtan pa/ khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
408b2(mdo sde): pa| sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ theg pa chen po 'di la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnams
408b3(mdo sde): su nges par byung ba/ bdud dang / nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ chos la phan gdags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos la rang dbang yod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ byang
408b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sdud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o/ /'di ltar/ blo gros brtan pa/ khyod
408b5(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zhu ba zhus pa'i lung bstan pa tshar phyin pa'o/ /blo gros brtan pa/ ngas ni skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu theg pa chen po la yang
408b6(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa go cha chen po bgos pa ma gtogs par 'khor 'di na/ lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'am/
408b7(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po'am/ mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'ang rung ste/ gang
409a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri nus pa de ma mthong ngo / /blo gros brtan pa/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
409a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan na yon tan gyi bye brag de dag dang / de bas kyang shin tu ches khyad par du 'phags pa gzhan dag kyang
409a3(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin de ngas khyod la bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa bcom ldan 'das
409a4(mdo sde): kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros brtan pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa'
409a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dag ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rnam par sprul pa'ang ston la shin tu yongs su mya ngan las
409a6(mdo sde): 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur/ gzugs su ston pa thams cad kyang ston la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las chos rnams 'khrugs par yang mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
409a7(mdo sde): cad du'ang 'gro la sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su 'du shes pa'ang med/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad par yang 'gyur la chos kyi dbyings tha dad par yang mi byed/ spyod
409b1(mdo sde): pa thams cad du'ang snang la de dag la spyod pa yongs su dag pa'ang shes/ lha dang / mi thams cad kyi bdag po'ang yongs su 'dzin la de dag rgyags shing bag med par 'gyur
409b2(mdo sde): ba'ang mi skyed/ bdud kyi yul thams cad kyang ston la bdud kyi las la gnas pa'ang ma yin/ khams gsum thams cad du'ang spyod la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin shes pa
409b3(mdo sde): las kyang mi g.yo/ 'chi bar yang mi 'gyur/ skye bar yang mi 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad du'ang skye la 'gro ba sna tshogs su 'du shes pa'ang ma yin/ chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba
409b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyang ston la yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi tshul rtogs pa las kyang mi g.yo/ gcig tu mnyam par yang bzhag la sems can yongs su smin par byed par
409b5(mdo sde): spyod par yang snang la mi zad pa dang / mi skye ba la bzod pa dang yang ldan pa chos rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'gog pa'ang rnam par 'jog /thams cad du ma zhum pa'i phyir seng ge'i
409b6(mdo sde): rtsal gyis kyang 'gro zhing 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba thams cad na'ang snang la pad+ma bzhin du mi chags pa'i phyir rtag tu chos kyi kun dga' mchog la
409b7(mdo sde): dga' zhing mos par yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag dang / lha'i bu dag dang / thams
410a1(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming tsam yang sngon ma thos na/ rgya cher rnam par
410a2(mdo sde): phye zhing bshad pa lta ci smos te/ gang bdag cag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming thos pas na bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bdag cag 'khor 'dir
410a3(mdo sde): legs par 'ongs so/ /bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag dpa'
410a4(mdo sde): b ar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ste bshad pa 'di thos nas mos shing yid ches la dad pa de dag the tshom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
410a5(mdo sde): mi ldog par 'gyur na/ gang dag thos nas len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid du
410a6(mdo sde): nan tan byed pa lta ci smos snyam mo/ /de nas brgya byin dag dang / tshangs pa dag dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag dang / lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag
410a7(mdo sde): cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khri gang la bzhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa'i chos kyi khri/ skyes
410b1(mdo sde): bu dam pa'i khri/ bkod pa chen po'i khri/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i khri'i seng ge'i khri nges par bsham par bya'o snyam mo/ /khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas dpa'
410b2(mdo sde): par 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu re re zhing yang bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri shom gyi gzhan ni ma yin no snyam mo/ /de
410b3(mdo sde): nas lha'i bu dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang rang gis seng ge'i khri sna tshogs pa/ blta
410b4(mdo sde): na sdug pa/ 'phang mtho ba/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa/ ras bcos bu rgya stong du ma bting ba/ steng gi bar snang las rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dra bas g.yogs
410b5(mdo sde): pa| khor khor yug tu rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba/ g.yas g.yon du rin po che'i shing ljon pa du mas brgyan pa/ dar gyi lnga ldi bres pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba dbyangs pa/
410b6(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba/ bla bre bres pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/ gser dang / dngul dang /
410b7(mdo sde): mu tig dang / nor bus brgyan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i rgyan gyi bkod pas legs par brgyan pa/ gser phye bkram pa/ lha'i tsan+dan dang / spos dang
411a1(mdo sde): phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / spos thams cad kyis bsgos pa/ me tog sna tshogs gtor ba/ snying po dam pa dang ldan pa'i phog por nas
411a2(mdo sde): bdug pa bshams par gyur te/ de ltar de'i skad cig than cig yud tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
411a3(mdo sde): phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bshams par gyur kyang 'khor dang sa chen po la sgrib par yang mi byed/ lha'i bu gcig gis lha'i bu gcig shos kyi khri bshams pa'ang ma mthong ste/ lha'i
411a4(mdo sde): bu re re zhing yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bshams pas bdag gi seng ge'i khri la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
411a5(mdo sde): 'di 'chad par shes so/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i
411a6(mdo sde): khri bshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi seng ge'i khri 'di la bzhugs te/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
411a7(mdo sde): 'di bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas/ seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad
411b1(mdo sde): cu rtsa bzhi po de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul nas/ seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa dag bzhugs
411b2(mdo sde): par snang ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad nas/ de na lha'i bu re re zhing bdag bdag gi seng ge'i khri de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par mthong
411b3(mdo sde): gi phan tshun du gcig gis gcig gi khri ni ma mthong ste/ de na brgya byin re re zhing brgya byin gnyis pa la/ kye grogs po/ de bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyi
411b4(mdo sde): ltos shig ces ston to/ /gnyis pa'ang gsum pa la/ kye grogs po/ de bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyi ltos shig ces smra'o/ /de bzhin du brgya byin dang /
411b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang / lha de dag thams cad kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig /kye grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i
411b6(mdo sde): khri la bzhugs kyi ltos shig ces ston to/ /de na re re zhing yang re re dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'chad pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyi khyod
411b7(mdo sde): kyi la ni ma yin no zhes de skad ces smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang dang / dpa'
412a1(mdo sde): bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang brtsam pa tsam bstan pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su bsdu ba'ang bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe ci nas kyang brgya byin
412a2(mdo sde): dang | tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / lha'i bu de dag gis seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
412a3(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzhugs par mthong ba de lta bu'i ltas bstan to/ /de na 'khor de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas bdag bdag gi stan de dag las
412a4(mdo sde): langs te/ thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag btsal te/ tshig 'di skad ces legs so/ /legs so/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
412a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'di dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes smras so/ /de ltar lha'i
412a6(mdo sde): bu ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri bshams pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas/ thams cad
412a7(mdo sde): kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi
412b1(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa
412b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar da ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
412b3(mdo sde): par 'phrul pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas te/ rnam par 'phrul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la
412b4(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /lha'i bu dag /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal
412b5(mdo sde): zhi bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
412b6(mdo sde): pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i dam pa yin no/ /de nas tshangs pa'i 'khor de'i nang nas tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das
412b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa gang bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa lags sam/ gang gzhan gyi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa
413a1(mdo sde): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa/
413a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bur byung ba/ rnam par sgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid byed pa med pa/ yongs su rtog pa las byung ba ste/
413a3(mdo sde): de dag ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar rnam par sgrub bo/ /tshangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin no/ /tshangs pa/ ji ltar
413a4(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad yang dag pa ma yin zhe na/ 'di dag ni bden pa ma yin te/ 'di dag ni mi bden bas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang
413a5(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin no/ /byung ba ma yin/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang ma yin pas na/ de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni 'byung ba chen pos ma bsdus
413a6(mdo sde): pas na/ de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no/ /'di dag ni phung pos ma bsdus/ khams kyis ma bsdus/ skye mched kyis ma bsdus pas na/ de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag
413a7(mdo sde): pa ma yin no/ /'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin/ skyes pa ma yin/ byung ba ma yin pas na/ de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no/ /'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin te/
413b1(mdo sde): thog ma ji lta bar tha mtshar yang de bzhin/ bar du'ang de bzhin pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no/ /tshangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad ni
413b2(mdo sde): mnyam pa ste khyad par med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad dun de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad mnyam ste khyad par ma mchis pa lags/ bcom
413b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
413b4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo/ /tshangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad ni thog ma'i mtha'i de bzhin
413b5(mdo sde): nyid kyis mnyam/ tha ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam mo/ /tshangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni sgyu ma'i chos
413b6(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/ mig yor gyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pas na/ de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo/ /tshangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni ma
413b7(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam /ma chags pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam pa zhes
414a1(mdo sde): bya'o/ /chos thams cad gang dang mnyam pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam/ sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam /
414a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad gang dang mnyam pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gang dang mnyam pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam pas na/ tshangs pa /
414a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo/ /tshangs pa/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni mnyam pa nyid
414a4(mdo sde): las ma 'das te/ de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo/ /tshangs pa/ de lta bas na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
414a5(mdo sde): rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas
414a6(mdo sde): pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ gzugs
414a7(mdo sde): kyi sku yongs su grub pa'ang sems can rnams la ston pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ de ni sngon dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sbyangs
414b1(mdo sde): pa'i khyad par yin te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs kyi sku yongs su grub
414b2(mdo sde): pa'ang sems can rnams la ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas chos la rjes su mthun pa'i
414b3(mdo sde): bzod pa thob bo/ /lha'i bu khris kyang chos la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas/ de bzhin gshegs
414b4(mdo sde): pa'i sku de dag thams cad mi snang bar byas pa dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
414b5(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros brtan pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros brtan pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la gnas pas mi 'thob/ sa gnyis pa
414b6(mdo sde): la gnas pas ma yin/ sa gsum pa la gnas pas ma yin/ sa bzhi pa la gnas pas ma yin/ sa lnga pa la gnas pa ma yin/ sa drug pa la gnas pas ma yin/ sa bdun
414b7(mdo sde): pa la gnas pas ma yin/ sa brgyad pa la gnas pas ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pas mi 'thob kyi/ blo gros brtan pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting
415a1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pas 'thob bo/ /blo gros brtan pa/ de la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ 'di
415a2(mdo sde): lta ste/ nam mkha'i khams bzhin du sems bskyed pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems la rtog pa mngon sum du gyur pa dang / sems
415a3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang / las rnam par 'byed
415a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa mi brjed pa dang / khams sna tshogs dang / khams du ma dag mngon sum
415a5(mdo sde): du gyur pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mthong zhing shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
415a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa thams cad gcig tu gyur pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pas rnam par lta ba dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / lha'i
415a7(mdo sde): mig thogs pa med pas mthong ba dang / zag pa zad par bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba'i phyir dus gcig tu 'thob pa shes pa dang / gzugs dang / /gzugs med pa'i mnyam
415b1(mdo sde): pa nyid la 'jug pa shes pa dang / gzugs thams cad ston cing rnam par 'phrul pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sgra skad thams cad brag ca'i sgra dang mnyam pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag
415b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa dang / gzungs la 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos 'chad pa dang /
415b3(mdo sde): dus dang dus ma yin pa la rnam par lta ba dang / dbang po 'gyur ba shes pa dang / chos 'chad pa don med pa ma yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa shes pa dang /
415b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad rab tu gzung ba dang / tshar gcad pa la mkhas pa shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / spyod lam ma brtags pa
415b5(mdo sde): dang | rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa dang / chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa mnyam pa'i ngos la 'jug pa shes pa
415b6(mdo sde): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du skad cig gis lus ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bshad pa 'dzin cing mi brjed pa
415b7(mdo sde): dang | mig yor lta bu'i lus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par 'phrul ba dang / theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba ston pa la mkhas pa dang / theg pa
416a1(mdo sde): chen po las mi nyams pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'dzin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal por go cha sra zhing yongs
416a2(mdo sde): su mi skyo ba dang / skye ba'i gnas thams cad du ci rigs par byed pa ston pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / nyan thos
416a3(mdo sde): dang | rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyis gting dpag dka' ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad mngon par sgrub pa bstan pa shes pa dang / chos thams
416a4(mdo sde): cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i gnas shes pa dang / bskal pa gcig tu bskal pa grangs med pa 'jug pa dang / bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa gcig 'jug
416a5(mdo sde): pa dang / zhing thams cad du zhing gcig yang dag par 'du zhing 'jug pa dang / zhing gcig la zhing thams cad ston pa shes pa dang / skra'i khyon gcig la sangs rgyas
416a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems can gcig gi lus la sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par 'du zhing 'jug
416a7(mdo sde): pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / rang gi lus la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs
416b1(mdo sde): pa dang / rang gi lus lus thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa la mkhas pa dang / thabs thams cad la mkhas pa dang /
416b2(mdo sde): thabs thams cad la mkhas pa'i bya ba shes pa dang / sgra skad gcig byung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags pa dang / tshig gcig la brtsams nas bskal pa grangs
416b3(mdo sde): med par 'chad pa dang / chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su rtogs pa dang / chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad bstan pa la mkhas pa shes pa dang / 'gre ba dang / 'gre
416b4(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa la mkhas pa shes pas rnam par dpyod pa dang / zung gi rim pa dang / snrel zhi'i rgyud bstan pa shes pa dang / bdud kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par
416b5(mdo sde): 'da' ba shes pa dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pas shes rab dang / ye shes kyi 'od zer gtong ba dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba
416b6(mdo sde): dang | mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon du gyur cing thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis sems can gyi khams thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /
416b7(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis kras par rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
417a1(mdo sde): thams cad du sems can gyi tha snyad thams cad rtogs pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i chos sgrub pa la the tshom med pa dang / skye ba thams cad la dbang thob pa
417a2(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yo byad la dbang thob pa dang / sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin du tshim par byed pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims
417a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa la sbyin gnas su sems mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba thams cad thob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'ong zer gtong ba
417a4(mdo sde): dang | thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dug can pa gting dpag dka' ba shes pa dang / sems dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang mnyam pa dang / tshig bstan pa
417a5(mdo sde): thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa dang / ma bstan par rang gis bzod pa dang / ye shes thob pa dang / rin po
417a6(mdo sde): che lta bu'i sems bskyed bas kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri mas mi gos pa dang / spu gcig gi khung bur chu'i phung po thams cad chud par byed la/ chu na gnas
417a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa'i bsod nams gsog pa'i snying po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i bya ba shes pa dang /
417b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / 'phrul pa la ye shes thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbugs 'byin pa thob pa dang / rang
417b2(mdo sde): gi lus kyi smon lam gyis sems can 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i gnas rgyun ma bcad pa kun tu ston pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
417b3(mdo sde): ye shes la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa dang / rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / longs spyod thams cad kun tu ston pa dang / sems
417b4(mdo sde): zhi zhing rab tu zhil nye bar zhi ba dang / thos pa tshad med pa 'dzin pa rdzogs pa dang / thos pa thams cad kyi nan tan rgyun mi gcod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su
417b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa dang / bskal pa grangs med pa snga dro gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing chos 'chad pa dang / spyod lam thams cad du
417b6(mdo sde): lkug pa dang / grum po dang / rna ba mi gsang ba dang / glen pa dang / 'on pa dang / long ba ston cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / lce'i dbang pos sangs rgyas kyi
417b7(mdo sde): zhing ma lus pa thams cad khebs bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa dang / lag na rdo rje 'bum rtag tu phyi bzhin du
418a1(mdo sde): 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rang byung gi ye shes la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang / rtag par 'du shes pa'i
418a2(mdo sde): sems can rnams la sreg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang / tshe'i tshad bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig pa rgya stong du byin gyis rlob pa dang / sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud
418a3(mdo sde): tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston cing 'gro ba shes pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod la ma ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams
418a4(mdo sde): cad rgyun mi gcod pa dang / zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang / mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin
418a5(mdo sde): pa dang / de bya bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa dang / thos pa dang / mthong ba dang / phyag bya
418a6(mdo sde): ba dang / 'dod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / bstan pa dang / rjes su dran par byas te/ sems can mtha' yas pa/ tshad med pa/ yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sems kyi skad
418a7(mdo sde): cig sems kyi skad cig la 'dul ba'i sems can ji ltar yongs su smin pa la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / rnam par grol pa ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
418b1(mdo sde): dag mngal du 'jug pa dang / btsas pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs
418b2(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po dang / lus 'jig pa'ang ston la byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid de'ang mi gtong zhing
418b3(mdo sde): shin tu phung po med par yang mya ngan las mi 'da' ba 'di ni/ blo gros brtan pa/ dpa' bar 'gor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul lo/ /
418b4(mdo sde): gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji ltar nam mkha' dag gyur cing / /rdul gyis gos par mi 'gyur bzhin/ /dpa' 'gro ting 'dzin gnas pa yang /
418b5(mdo sde): yid ni de ltar sgom par byed/ /gang phyir lus can thams cad kyi/ /rnam par bcas pa'i sems shes pa/ /des na 'di ni bdag nyid che/ /de yi mtshan mar rab tu shes/ /dpa'
418b6(mdo sde): 'gro rtogs par khong chud pas/ /sems can dag gi dbang po rnams/ /rno ba dag dang rtul ba dang / /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes/ /lus kun rnam par phye ba dang / /rnam
418b7(mdo sde): par smin pa sna tshogs dang / /sems can rnams kyi mos pa yang / /bde gshegs sras des shes par 'gyur/ /sems can khams ni mkhas pa la/ /de ni chags par 'gyur
419a1(mdo sde): ba med/ /gang phyir de yis mi rmongs pas/ /tshangs dbyangs ting 'dzin shes par 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin/ /sra ba des ni shes gyur nas//
419a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gzhan ste/ /lag na 'dug bzhin mthong bar 'gyur/ /chos rnams kun gyis lam gyur pa/ /thams cad du ni gang 'gro ba'i/ /dam pa thub pas bshad
419a3(mdo sde): pa ste/ /de dag 'dis ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /de nas de yi sngon gyi gnas/ /shes pa la ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /lha mig dri ma med pa yis/ /'gro ba dag ni mthong bar
419a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /zag pa dag ni zad byas kyang / /mkhas de mya ngan 'da' mi byed/ /gzugs yod pa dang gzugs med pa'i/ /mtshan nyid gcig pa mnyam pa shes/ /ji ltar
419a5(mdo sde): sgyu ma'i mkhan po dag / sna tshogs rnam par rtse ba ltar/ /dpa' bo des ni gzugs kun kyang / /ting nge 'dzin gyis rim gyis ston/ /sgra kun gyi ni mnyam pa nyid/ /brag
419a6(mdo sde): ca lta bu rnam dag dang / /sems can kun gyi skad rnams kyang / /skad cig tsam gyis des shes so/ /gzungs dang ye shes ldan pas na/ /skad kyi byed la myur du 'jug
419a7(mdo sde): sgra dbyangs kyi ni thog ma'i mtha'/ /ji lta bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur/ /rdul med dran dang blo gros kyis/ /thub pa gshegs par myur du 'jug /legs bshad pas
419b1(mdo sde): ni sems can la/ /sdig pa med pa yid dga' byed/ /sems can rnams la ci rigs par/ /dgra bcom pa ni chos 'chad de/ /mi yi dus dang dus ma yin/ /blos ni rnam par
419b2(mdo sde): rtog par byed/ /ji ltar dbang po rnams 'byung ba/ /de lta nyid du phyi phyir zhing / /cho ga bzhin du shes gyur nas/ /brtan pa dam pa don yod ston/ /yang dag mtha' ni phra ba nyid/ /nad
419b3(mdo sde): dang gral bas rtogs par 'gyur/ /sems can bsdus dang char bcad la/ /dus rnams kun tu mkhas par 'gyur/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog kun bcom/ /kun tu rtog pas ma bsgribs
419b4(mdo sde): pa| |pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol thob/ /spyod lam la ni mi rtog go /chos dbyings 'dres pa med pa yang / /ye shes kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas gang dag phyogs
419b5(mdo sde): bzhugs pa/ /skad cig tu yang kun tu snang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /chos bstan gang dang ci yod pa/ /de kun shes rab ldan pas len/ /rmongs pa dag
419b6(mdo sde): tu 'gyur pa med/ /mi g.yor lta bu'i lus rnams kyis/ /zhing kun du yang snang bar 'gyur/ /nad med theg pa thams cad pa/ /blo ldan na sangs rgyas bzhin du 'chad/ /brtul
419b7(mdo sde): zhugs brtan par gyur pa de/ /theg chen de las mi nyams te/ /dkon mchog gsum rigs gnas bya'i phyir/ /de ltar rnam pa gsum du 'chad/ /phyi ma'i mthar ni go bgos
420a1(mdo sde): kyang / /de ni skyo bar mi 'gyur te/ /snying rje las ni byung ba ste/ /sems can ris ni kun na snang / /shin tu blo dang ldan pa yis/ /skye ba'i mtshan nyid
420a2(mdo sde): kun bstan te/ /mkhas pas sems can thams cad ni/ /myur du yongs su smin par byed/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa dang / /sems kyi spyod yul shes pas na/ /de bas
420a3(mdo sde): de ni nyan thos dang / /lus can kun gyis rtogs par dka'/ /gang du gnyis ni med pa der/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag kun bsgrub sgrub/ /chos rnams kun las 'phags
420a4(mdo sde): zhib/ /gzhal yas chos ni ston par byed/ /rnam grol shes pa bskal gcig tu/ /bskal ba du ma ston par byed/ /bskal pa rnam pa du ma dag /bskal pa gcig tu
420a5(mdo sde): ston par byed/ /zhing ni rnam pa du ma dag /zhing gcig tu ni ston par byed/ /zhing gcig rnam pa du ma yi/ /zhing rnams su ni ston par byed/ /skra yi rtse mo gcig tu
420a6(mdo sde): yang | |zhing rnams thams cad ston par byed/ /de bzhin du ni lus gcig la/ /sdig med lus kun ston par byed/ /zhing kun dper na nam mkha' bzhin/ /dag pa
420a7(mdo sde): nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/ /de ni bdag gi lus kyis kyang / /zhing rnams thams cad khyab par byed/ /bdag gi lus dang chos kyi dbyings/ /de gnyis mnyam par
420b1(mdo sde): rab tu shes/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mtshan ma med/ /snang ba med pa nyid du rtogs/ /sna tshogs kyi ni thabs la mkhas/ /sgra bsam mi khyab nam mkha' bzhin/ /don rig tshig gcig brtsams
420b2(mdo sde): byas nas/ /bskal ba'i bar du 'chad par byed/ /sems can chen po chos kun la/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni chos su rtogs/ /tshig gi rab tu dbye bstan la/ /de yi mkhas pa 'jug par
420b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /zung dang sgrel zhi sgrub par byed/ /bdud kyi lam ni mnan 'gyur nas/ /lus las 'od zer gtong bar byed/ /de yi lus dang dag yid kyi/ /las
420b4(mdo sde): ni ye shes sngon du 'gro/ /de ni tshe rabs tshe rabs su/ /rdzu 'phrul mngon par thob bar 'gyur/ /so sor rig pa'i stobs bskyed pas/ /dbang ldan chos kyi dbyings su ni/ /rnam par 'phrul
420b5(mdo sde): pa du ma byed/ /g.yo ba med pa'i gnas 'chad do/ /bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po yis/ /sems can bu gcig bzhin du sdud/ /de dag gi ni smra ba dang / sgra dang skad kyang shes par 'gyur/ /
420b6(mdo sde): des ni sgyu ma 'dra ba'i chos/ /byin gyis brlabs nas rnam par 'phrul/ /sems can thams cad skye bar gnas/ /nam mkha' lta bur snang bar 'gyur/ /rnam thos bu ni ji bzhin
420b7(mdo sde): du| |yo byad kun ldan phyug thob nas/ /sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa yi/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed/ /tshul khrims 'chal dang khrims ldan la/ /de yi
421a1(mdo sde): sems ni de tshe mnyam/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba yang / /gang zag dam pas shes par 'gyur/ /'od zer dra ba byas nas kyang / /'jig rten
421a2(mdo sde): khams rnams khyab byed de/ /shes rab ldan pas gting dpag dka'/ /rgya mtsho chen po chu ldan bzhin/ /sa chu me dang mtshungs pa dang / /rlung dang nam mkha' 'dra ba'i
421a3(mdo sde): yid| |de ni rtag par sems can la/ /snying brtse pa yi phyir 'jug go /srid pa sel ba de yis ni/ /mi skye dam pa'i bzod thob nas/ /nor bu rin chen dag pa ltar/ /de
421a4(mdo sde): bzhin nyon mongs mi gos so/ /spu yi khung bu gcig tu ni/ /chu yi phung po kun 'jug cing / /bskal pa chen po rnam par rtse/ /dge ba phun sum tshogs par byed/ /yongs
421a5(mdo sde): su bsngo bar bya ba la/ /de yi shes pa mi rmongs te/ /sems can rnams kyi spyod shes nas/ /'phrul ba chen po byed par 'gyur/ /chos kun rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /de
421a6(mdo sde): yi sems ni rtag par 'jug / lus ni sbyangs shing rdul med de/ /mya ngan bral pa ser sna med/ /sems can rnams ni gang las skye/ /de ni smad pa med pas shes/ /
421a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul yang / /smra ba'i mchog gis rab tu shes/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang mkhyen pa/ /de kun la ni rtog par byed/ /sangs rgyas
421b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi gsang ba kun/ /des ni rjes su rtogs par 'gyur/ /gang yang rtse dang dga' ba dang / /de dag thams cad nges ston te/ /thos pa dag ni tshad med pas/ /thos pa rgya mtsho thob par
421b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /thos pa 'tshol bas ngoms pa med/ /'jig rten chos dang mthun 'jug pa/ /'jig rten gyis ni mi gos te/ /mtshe'u'i pad ma ji bzhin no/ /de ni snga dro gcig tu yang / /bskal
421b3(mdo sde): pa mang po ston par byed/ /bdag ni glen pa lkugs pa yi/ /dbyibs dag tu ni ston par byed/ /lag na rdo rje stong dag dang / /'grogs shing sems can smin par byed/ /rang byung ba
421b4(mdo sde): ni rtag tu shes/ /de nyid la ni rtog par byed/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /tshe ni skad cig gcig la ston/ /de ni nyan thos rang rgyal gyi/ /byed pa dag kyang ston par byed/ /
421b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la/ /rtag pa kho nar rjes su 'jug /sems kyis rtag tu zhi ba dang / /nye bar zhi zhing phung po med/ /sems can dga' bar byed pa yi/ /sil snyan
421b6(mdo sde): dkrol pa kun kyang shes/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal dang / /bsnyen bkur bya ba gtong mi byed/ /mthong ba dang ni thos pa yis/ /sems can mang po smin par byed/ /skad
421b7(mdo sde): cig tu ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /sems can dag ni ston par byed/ /dpa' bo la lar btsas pa dang / /mngon par 'byung dang 'chi bston/ /la lar yongs su mya ngan 'da'/ /la
422a1(mdo sde): lar 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ /la lar bdud rnams rab tu 'joms/ /la lar dka' ba spyod byed kyang / /sems can thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ /shin
422a2(mdo sde): tu mya ngan mi 'da'o/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin gyi/ /yul ni 'di 'dra 'di yin te/ /gang gis ting 'dzin de thob pa/ /dri med de ltar rnam par rtse/ /blo gros brtan pa/
422a3(mdo sde): de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ de'ang dpa' bar 'gor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul yin no/ /gzhan dag kyang dpag tu med pa yod do/ /blo gros brtan pa/ de
422a4(mdo sde): ltar na dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshad med pa bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / /yul bkod pa ston pa'o/ /sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho
422a5(mdo sde): ba'o/ /'gro ba thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /blo gros brtan pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa gcig tu mi blta/ /spyod yul gcig tu ma yin/ rnam
422a6(mdo sde): pa gcig tu ma yin/ dmigs ba gcig tu ma yin/ don gcig las byung bar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros brtan pa/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
422a7(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / rnam par thar pa thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa de dag thams
422b1(mdo sde): cad ni dpa' bar 'gor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du 'dus shing chud par blta'o/ /blo gros brtan pa/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka dang /
422b2(mdo sde): chu phran dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rgya mtsho chen por 'dus par blta'o/ /blo gros brtan pa/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
422b3(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa gang ji snyed pa dag dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa de dag thams cad ni
422b4(mdo sde): dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du 'dus par blta'o/ /blo gros brtan pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad ni dpa' bo g.yul
422b5(mdo sde): du 'jug pa'i lag tu song zhing dbang du gyur yin te/ dpa' bo g.yul du 'jug pa gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'ang 'gro'o/ /blo gros brtan pa/ de bzhin tu
422b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'am/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo'am/ chos la gnas pa'i sgo'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo'am/ gzungs kyi sgo'am/ mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / rnam par
422b7(mdo sde): grol ba'i sgo gang ji snyed pa chos la gnas pa'i sgo de dag thams cad ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lag tu song ba yin/ /dbang du gyur pa yin/ mngon du gyur pa yin te/ blo
423a1(mdo sde): gros brtan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du chos la gnas pa'i sgo thams cad
423a2(mdo sde): 'gro'o/ /blo gros brtan pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gar 'gro ba der rin po che sna bdun yang 'gro'o/ /blo gros brtan pa/ de bzhin du dpa'
